At no point in time did Expedia notify me that the flight was canceled. I found out through a friend who booked with booking.com. Because of this I had to book another flight with air link. 

Multiple times I contacted Expedia and confirmed with air Botswana that my flight to and from maun was cancelled. They said Expedia had to write them and confirm the refund. Expedia for months now has give me the run around. The air Botswana flights never took place. Air Botswana confirmed before and after the trip that those flights were cancelled and yet Expedia will not get me my refund. 

Basically at this point they have stolen $415 from me. Crooks I will never use them again. | Make it easier to get ahold of live support | When ever i check it says something wrong from our site try again later?! | Says a lot about Expedia following communism. I will no longer support this company. | No help at all! Let me book a hotel that was closing before my trip and now I have not seen my refund. Not a happy camper! This app is no help! | The Expedia app doesn’t remove information regarding itineraries that have been canceled, which makes it confusing if you’re trying to reschedule a trip that has similar dates, etc.. | Please don’t ever use Expedia for booking anything they don’t help out with any issues that they caused. You’re better off booking flights and hotels on your own. Otherwise they will ruin your trip. | I want to inquire about changing a reservation on May 7 from Atlanta to SFO. There is no phone number to talk to a live person.  And navigating the site is difficult. | Our room was on the east side 3rd floor. View of the bay and mountains. Very quiet room, comfortable bed. Great breakfast, everything one could want. | I had been using the Expedia app for years and very satisfied with it. It has always been my first stop. But find it unusable since about a year. It crashes almost ALL the time, you have to do 5 quizzes to to prove you are a human before you can get on. It takes longer to return any result, and if you try to look at a hotel closer, or sort airfares more than once it is certain to crash. By that time I am usually fed up and switch to another app to complete my search and booking. You have ruined it. I deleted the app today since it has not been useful at all lately, and is only a sure source of frustration as I start any search/booking. Bye

title: Nowy: AI Travel Social Planner
description:
Are you looking for an effortlessly AI travel itinerary planning app that includes everything in one place? - Automatically create your visual itineraries, and personalized travel plans that you can add activities, experiences, hotels and flight altogether?

Look no further than NOWY: Your Ultimate AI TRAVEL PLANNER! 

Nowy is an AI Visual trip planner app that creates personalized itineraries, visual trip plans & detailed travel guides based on your personal preferences and interests all-in-one place. Say forever goodbye to spending hours searching and planning your next vacation.

INTRODUCTION TO NOWY: AI TRAVEL SOCIAL PLANNER

Nowy is your ultimate AI travel planning and pocket-sized travel buddy! Download Nowy to:

+ AI Travel Planner to create visual itineraries
+ AI Travel Assistant
+ Add you hotels, flights, activities and experiences and book anytime seamlessly!
+ Save your custom routes, maps, transportation, bookings, guides
+ Uncover nearby hidden treasures & local gems
+ Share your full itinerary

Transform YOUR travel planning experience with groundbreaking Nowy AI planner to effortlessly craft YOUR personalized itineraries tailored to YOUR preferences, saving you time and ensuring truly unique adventures in a Day-to-day detailed trip. Find the hidden gems of the city you want to travel to, do seamless bookings, and make social connections worldwide for unforgettable journeys. 

Discover the future of trip planning in uniquely your own way. With Nowy, you will have access to a wide range of AI-powered travel features. Create a personalized itinerary and make it as much or as little as you want with the help of the latest AI technology used in this app!

KEY FEATURES OF NOWY: AI TRAVEL SOCIAL PLANNER

GET PERSONALIZED VISUAL ITINERARIES – 3 SIMPLE STEPS

1. Travel Destination
2. Days of duration
3. Any of travel needs or preferences

Nowy's AI Planner will create your personalized itinerary with AI-curated storytelling, full maps, routes, transportation, and bookings saved for use.


1. REAL-TIME AI-POWERED TRAVEL TALES

+ Chat with Nowy AI Assistant 24/7!
+ Get personalized and quick answers to your travel questions.
+ Discover your dream destinations and hidden gems with AI-powered recommendations.


2. CREATE VISUAL ITINERARIES AND SAVE YOUR CUSTOM ROUTES

+ Discover your favorite destinations. 
+ Collect your favorite place.
+ Map your locations and personalize your travel routes
+ Automatic maps, travel durations, routes, and transportation options
+ Instant bookings linked to book what you see now!


3. EXPLORE AND INSPIRE WITH NOWY SOCIAL TRAVEL HUB

+ Find your dream destinations with inspiring travel stories and authentic experiences
+ Discover top adventures and top destinations from the world's top attractions.
+ Discover local attractions and hidden gems with the help of the Nowy community.


4. UNCOVER HIDDEN TREASURES NEARBY

+ Find fun places around you
+ Get instant travel ideas from a map view
+ Use filters to get the best destination results, including types of places, price ranges, ratings.


5. AI-ENHANCED TRAVEL STORYTELLING

+ Save your time for extra research
+ Use the power of AI for storytelling 
+ Easily create and share your adventures


6. COLLECT POSTS AND LINKS FOR YOUR TRIP PLANS

+ Journal your trip stories and link them to your trip plan
+ Save your travel memories and keep track of your journey
+ Share your posts using the Nowy Postcard 


7. CONNECT WITH THE COMMUNITY AND SHARE THE WANDERLUST

+ Build your community with like-minded adventurers
+ Follow your friends and connect with fellow travelers
+ Exchange thoughts, ideas, and travel experiences
+ Save your posts, collections, and likes for future trips and visits!


So, what are you waiting for? DOWNLOAD NOWY: AI TRAVEL SOCIAL PLANNER now and Embark on your dream trip with Nowy's AI-powered planning!
releaseNotes:
Attention, adventurers! All-new Nowy 4.0 is ready to revolutionize your travel experiences.

-> Feast your eyes on brand new "My Travel Map" - brings your travel memories to life like never before! Track your travel footprint as every photo you've ever taken is beautifully pinned on your own world map.

-> Transform your journeys on simple "Upload Photos" - a major AI upgrade! Let Nowy transform your precious snapshots into your personalized travel stories with maps and locations!

Nowy 4.0 boasts a sleek new look and even smoother navigation, making your travel planning a breeze!
Don't miss out these game-changing features and upgrade today to Nowy 4.0 Now!
reviews:
The function to automatically generate an itinerary starting from the days of duration of the trip is quite nice | I have used more than dozens of travel apps, but this one hands down the best I’ve ever used. It does not only gives you a detailed plan for attractions in cities - which is just a start, you can find the closest hotels, add your flight; customize your routes and find any activities as well. You can switch it to Google map as well. I’m so impressed with this app and really is “The” travel cọmpanion. | Nowy has many useful features, including AI-powered travel itinerary generation, hotel booking, and flight booking. Although I don’t have any travel plan at the moment, I can create and share future plans with my family and friends. Additionally, it’s easy to edit! | OMG this is such a game changer! They used AI to help me journal my past trips too and never thought it can be such an easy and fun way to journal my trips. I have been using Nowy to plan my trips and now I can journal past trips as well. It makes me wanna travel more! | Finally found a travel app that I can search any cities and even small destinations in Brazil and Mexico. It’s amazing, easy to use, great idea and cute pages. The best thing I like is the AI can keep recọmmending different hidden gems besides what you already had in the existing itinerary. Simply amazing! | It is really great and does everything I need. It’s perfect for organizing trip details and plan everything together.  I personally love it and worths 5 stars | I loves traveling and exploring new places but always struggles with planning. I can’t believe how this app is so easy to get a planning for you. Definitely recọmmend this app to anyone who wants to simply your travel. | I am so happy to have found Nowy! I used to spend so much time with vacation planning, but Nowy does it all for me in just a few minutes. Plus, I can book flights, hotels, and activities all in this app! No need for 10 different apps or websites anymore. Highly recommend Nowy!!! | I was booking a last minute trip to Amsterdam and decided to try Nowy to help me plan. Let’s just say, I am so impressed! It helped us find a last minute hotel one stop from the main station for a really good price. It also gave us suggestions of where to eat, what museums to attend and planned out the days with efficient travel routes. Some of the highlights of my trip that Nowy’s AI assistant suggested were: the Heineken Experience, the body museum, and a nighttime canal cruise to Amsterdam during the winter light festival (which was our favorite). It also gave us some great suggestions of local places where the locals eat. I can’t wait for my next trip! | I used to use Google Drive and sheet to plan out my trips. I NO longer need to do so.
This is app has made our trip planning so easy especially while planning a 10 day road trip from Las Vegas to Arizona and Utah! The itinerary has all the website, photos and addresses everything. Surprisingly we can see our live location inside the our trip and know the distance to the next stop!

After we finished the trip and organized the final itinerary, I found the itinerary can be shared completely to our friends and see the full itinerary by the share link! This is amazing and I don’t need to send Doc any more. What a life saver!

So good and helpful! | I was trying to plan a 3-day trip to Tokyo, and the AI generated a decent itinerary based on my preference. I shared the itinerary with my friend, and it got us started on planning out the Tokyo trip!! Highly recommend it to anyone looking to save time when planning trips. I hope the app will automatically find me the best deals based on my finalized itinerary. | I’ve been searching for an app that’s user friendly and aesthetic to journal my trips and after using Nowy for a while I know this is it! The app is easy to navigate through and has many great options to customize your trips the way you want. On top of that, I can search what fun locations are near me to explore. As a lazy but eager traveler, this feature has pushed me to go outside more. There’re new features coming out continuously to create better user interfaces. I absolutely love it! | This is an awesome app, great idea, very useful for travel and provide a lots of information. Thanks for the designer.

title: Pogo - Travel Planner
description:
Pogo - Plan on the Go — Plan a trip and find the best things to do in one simple, fun and beautiful app.

– Save everything in one place

Say goodbye to travel stuff splattered across notes, emails, Instagram and WhatsApp. With Pogo, you can save everything for a trip on one Pinboard. From places and notes to documents and checklists. 

- Book a Stay with Booking.com

Find a place you like the look of in Pogo? Simply view in Booking.com to save the hassle of searching around. When you're done, jump right back into your Pinboard and continue planning your trip.

- View a personalised map with all your Pins

Tap on 'Map View' and see a personalised Map of all the pins you've got saved in your Pinboard. When you arrive at your destination it makes planning where to go and what to do so much easier.

– Discover tried and tested recommendations

Fed up of spending countless hours scouring the web, looking for the best things to do? With Pogo, it's easy to discover personalised and authentic recommendations from like-minded travellers.

– Share your travel tips and plan together

Make tedious trip planning group chats a thing of the past. With Pogo, you can easily invite others to a Pinboard to plan a trip together. So you can all add stuff, see what's on the agenda, and vote for your favourites.


— ABOUT POGO

Pogo was started with the mission to help fellow travel lovers make the most of every moment they get away. 

From our experience — and by talking to lots of people in the travel community — we realised that although travelling is great, sometimes stuff can get in the way of having a good time.

The unnecessary hassle of organising a trip. The pains of deciding where to go and what to do. Stuff going wrong whilst you're away. 

We exist to help you escape this bad stuff. So you're free to have a more mindful, authentic and memorable trip.

Our mobile app provides a home for all of your travel plans. So you can get inspiration, organise a trip and protect yourself all in one place.
releaseNotes:
We’ve got a BIG update for you, the Pogo Community, that really hope you love:

- Book Hotels - We’ve implemented the ability to book hotels directly in Pogo. No need to leave the app.
- Hotel Liking - Hotel research has never been easier. Like a hotel? Simply swipe it to the right in the list or double tap a hotel in Map View.
- Offline Mode - Upon opening Pogo for the first time on this version, a copy of your Pinboards will be kept on your phone so you don’t need Wifi/Data to access all your Pinboards when travelling.
- Bug fixes - As usual we’ve also done some other bug fixes that have been kindly fed back to us from our users. Thank you all for you feedback, it helps a lot.

Please feel free to get in touch with us at hello@pogo.travel with your thoughts or feedback. We love hearing from you and we’re working hard on implementing all the features you guys are eager to have in Pogo.

Until next time,

The Pogo Team
reviews:
With the new app update I have lost my existing boards sadly. | I’ve tested out a couple of different trip planning apps and I really like the idea of Pogo the best so far, but I’ve been playing around with it for about 10 min and have had to close it out and reopen at least 5 times because it freezes. Has a lot of potential, but definitely needs work! Hope it improves quickly! | I love and miss the layout and design of pluto i was obsessed! But pogo is good as well! I love the detail and i love planning trips with this app! | The idea is there and I love the search and find option but the app is slow and anytime I click to view a category the app freezes or restarts. You’d think that exiting the app would fix that problem, but it’s just rinse and repeat and still freezes when trying to view the categories. Which really makes it more hassle than what it’s worth. | THE REBRAND IS SO BAD, I’m devastated. Pluto was one of my favorite apps and I can’t stand using the new version. The old branding was unique, beautiful and had character, not to mention the usability and functionality was also amazing. Was this rebrand tested with literally any users?? It could not have gotten positive responses. | Sorry, but the new branding is horrendous. I LOVED the old Pluto, and had it proudly on my home screen. The new logo, name, everything is so awful I’m tempted to delete the app altogether. I know rebranding takes time, effort, and money, but this was not the way to go, in my honest opinion. It feels like a cheap imitation of a popular social app, instead of embracing the unique beauty that was the old app. | I am not sure how this app received so many great reviews. It was very difficult to navigate. the flow didn’t make sense. I just was not impressed overall. | Tbh I never write reviews especially for an APP 💀BUT I’m planning a road trip soon and super exited so I wanted something to help keep me organized ✨it’s actually pretty good and cute and neat it’s like Pinterest in a way . I’m not a bot either :) thanks Pluto ! | The aesthetic of this app is incredible. 

One HUGE thing I wish it had is an actual
itinerary in date/time order. You can save everything in this app but it won’t show you a timeline like other travel apps do. 
Add that and a widget for your home screen, and I wouldn’t need any other app for travel. 

Unfortunately right now it doesn’t work 100% alone for me, I still use TripIt for the itinerary timeline feature. | I was looking for an app that would allow me to collaborate trip ideas with my friends. With very few reviews, I was uncertain, but decided to give Pluto a try and I’m so glad I did! 
So far the user experience is top notch. The app is running very smoothly, no lags or glitches. It’s very intuitive and user-friendly, and in minutes I was easily able to navigate myself around, start a trip and invite my friend to collaborate. 
A few suggestions:
When initially walking through the first steps, I would like to be able to pick a region to travel, not just a specific state or city. For instance, I wanted to be able to say Pacific Northwest, but that wasn’t an option. Also, I would like to be able to create my own categories within the trip. 

Solid five stars for usability and of course that it’s free. | i’ve been on the hunt for a travel/itinerary app that was easy on the eyes and incredibly user friendly! | I normally look at Pinterest or YouTube to look up things to do. I love that they already have popular things to try. | Awesome app for planning our holiday! there were lots of things I look for - but until now, I haven’t seen them all in one place. 
The app is very easy to use. You can also save ideas and places to eat. 
And also it served you up inspiration from the app’s recommendations. Top marks! | This app is off to a great start, they definitely have more to add, but I’m enjoying the flexibility and functionality they have now. It’s allowed me to share the plan with my friends and family going on a trip together. Also it allowed us to collaborate on the plan so that everyone has input on what we are doing on the trip so no one feels left out. | The app crashes as soon as you open it

title: Tripadvisor: Plan & Book Trips
description:
** Be one of the first to try the beta version of our newly-launched AI itinerary builder, offering personalized recs powered by traveler tips and reviews. **

As a travel guidance company, Tripadvisor brings people, passions and places together. We aim to help make you a better traveler, from travel planning, to booking, to taking a trip. The app lets you get the most out of your trip—whether you’re planning or on-the-go. Discover where to stay, what to do and where to eat based on guidance from millions of travelers who have been there before. Find deals on hotels, book experiences, reserve tables at great restaurants and discover great places nearby. No matter what type of trip you’re looking to take, the Tripadvisor app makes planning it easy and also lets you guide others on their way.

GET TRAVEL GUIDANCE
• Find millions of reviews about hotels, restaurants, tours, attractions and other experiences from travelers like you
• Read articles and guides to discover new ways to experience a destination with tips from travel experts
• Discover great deals on top-rated hotels, tours, activities, experiences and other things to do
• Find great places to eat nearby and make restaurant reservations

ORGANIZE YOUR TRIP IN ONE PLACE
• Use the updated Trips planning tool to save hotels, restaurants, and things to do
• Get personalized recs with AI itineraries powered by reviews (beta)
• See your saves on your custom map
• Share and collab with your travel buds
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours, attractions, experiences and other things to do

GUIDE OTHER TRAVELERS
• Submit your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited to guide fellow travelers
• Post and answer questions from like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
releaseNotes:
Improvements to the Trip planning product which allow travelers to:

 - Receive a custom AI itinerary backed by traveler reviews
 - View saves in an organized list within the saves tab
 - Build an itinerary by adding saves and organizing them by day
 - View saves plotted on a map

title: Roadtrippers - Trip Planner
description:
DISCOVER THE OPEN ROAD AND THE GREAT OUTDOORS WITH EASE
Roadtrippers, the #1 road trip planning app, now includes the patent-pending AI-powered trip wizard: Roadtrippers Autopilot™.  Whether you’re RVing on your annual campground trip, or planning a weekend trip at a boutique hotel, Roadtrippers Autopilot™ uses the knowledge of over 38 million trips to help get you there. And, with the newly added features from Campendium, Roadtrippers will be your go-to app for planning epic road trips and finding the perfect camping spots. 

ENHANCED CAMPING AND RV FEATURES
∙ Campground Reviews and Insights: Dive into over 150,000 campground reviews, offering perspectives for RVers and campers alike. Discover the best spots, from swanky RV parks to serene, free remote destinations.
∙ Comprehensive Map Overlays: Find the perfect campgrounds with ease using overlays for public land, cell coverage, and wildfire smoke, ensuring you’re always informed and prepared.
∙ Advanced Filtering Options: Tailor your search with new filtering capabilities, including cell service and elevation, to find your ideal campsite every time.

EXPLORE AND PLAN WITH EASE
∙ Epic Routes and Places: Uncover millions of unique places, from quirky roadside attractions to breathtaking national parks. Get inspired by pre-made trip guides for once-in-a-lifetime routes.
∙ Customizable Planning: Start with up to three stops or upgrade to add up to 150 stops per trip with our Premium membership. Enjoy RV-friendly GPS navigation, offline maps, trip collaboration, and more.
∙ Seamless Syncing and Navigation: Your saved trips and favorite places sync across devices. Hit the road with confidence using CarPlay for easy navigation.

JOIN THE ROADTRIPPERS COMMUNITY
Merging the spirit of Campendium with Roadtrippers, we invite you to embark on road trips and camping adventures that you’ll cherish forever. Whether you’re mapping out a weekend getaway or a cross-country journey, Roadtrippers is here to guide you every mile and every campsite along the way.

Download Roadtrippers today and transform your travel dreams into reality. Your next epic adventure awaits!

Terms of use: https://roadtrippers.com/tos
Privacy policy: https://roadtrippers.com/privacy-policy
releaseNotes:
Roadtrippers is excited to introduce their brand-new, AI-powered trip planning tool: Roadtrippers Autopilot™, just in time for all your summer road tripping plans!
Whether you’re RVing on your annual campground trip, or planning a weekend trip at a boutique hotel, Roadtrippers Autopilot™ uses the knowledge of over 38 million trips to help get you there.
Get started with a free trial, or sign in with your Premium account, and check out Autopilot today!
Happy travels :)
reviews:
I have no clue what this site offers | I paid for the package that allows me to plan 3 trips with 20 stops each. When I was planning my trip,  I put in more then 20 stops, because I was trying to see what all my options were in terms of activities, restaurants, and hotels. I meant to remove some of the stops, but before I could, without warning, the app locked my trip and is demanding more money for me to unlock it. I spent a lot of time planning my trip.  I booked my hotels, now I can’t go back and see what I did unless I pay more money! That’s so mean. I now have to plan everything out again, because I refuse to pay a ransom for my trip. I was having so much fun before this happened and I was going to recommend this app to everyone, but this experience took the wind out my sails. If I were you, I’d try and find another company, because I feel this company is a bit deceptive and unethical to lockdown my hard work without warning or a grace period….at least on my first trip so I could figure out how they’re system worked. Such a shame. | Trick you into membership and offer nothing unless it is premium.  You have to scroll in super close to see any attraction and can not see large overview of the area on the map.  Makes it impossible to discover something new.  Total waste of my money for a basic membership. | I’ve had trips planned and had access. Even if an email was sent, I should always have access to my previous trips while paying to use the app.  Prices increased , and trips are now limited as well as stops. I no longer can access my past trips that I’ve paid for and created. Currently, prices keep increasing you now you have to purchase plans. I will no longer use this app. You should have access to your past planned trip! Greed!! I no longer recommend based on continuous price increases for the same access that I use to have. | This app auto renewed at $36 but all the features that were once available have been removed. Even though I paid $36, it  requires  an up charge to actually create a road trip.  Google maps is much better and free.  I’ve been a subscriber for several years and every year the app has less and less features and costs more.  I’d never recommend it. It is worthless.  I can’t even access my previous trips.  What  is the point of charging me a subscription?  I feel completely ripped off. | Really hard to use and lots of spam. Even after unsubscribing | I love Roadtrippers. I use it to plan and route all my road trips. It’s so easy to add n take away waypoints to plan accordingly. It shows highlights and shows off the beaten path places within your distance you tell it. Shows mileage, hours, and even estimated gas cost which is pretty close. | Took us to places that were so fun and all the choices it gave!! Love this app | Little to no Help available. App navigation is a nightmare! | What a huge disappointment!  We have recommended this app to many friends and used it for numerous trips since 2021.  We ultimately subscribed in 2022 at $29 per year for the unlimited stops and completed one cross country road trip in excess of 10K miles.  The features to find interesting stops were what sold us on renewing again in 2023.  We completed another major Northeast road trip last summer and when we were notified the price was increasing to $35.99 a year we felt it was still worth it for the memories we were creating.  Now when I went in to share a previous trip with a friend I find that all my past road-trips are locked and to view them I have to pay more money.  The new tiers reduce the number of stops per trip to barely what was allowed with the previous free version (20 stops vs 15 stops).  They say they notified people of the change, but I cannot find an email alerting to the drastic reduction in capabilities for a significantly higher membership subscription.  The FAQ page states no refunds are available so I guess I am stuck for another year with a useless subscription (I have fixed my automatic renewal).  I do feel the company was not straightforward with warning existing customers with the severity of impact that was coming (losing access to all previous trips, reduction of waypoints per trip, etc).  This was really masked when they gave you the same capabilities for the remaining subscription period. Very poor customer service and loyalty to existing paying customers! They way to fix this is to restore access to previous trip that were purchased under previous plans and give an additional transition period for previous paying customers.  When we discussed our journeys with friends and mutual road-trip enthusiasts, we always provided raving reviews about this app.  Instead of having an ambassador for their company, they have now created someone who will trumpet their deceptive business practices! | Please help me cancel my subscription. I am not using this. It did not work the way I thought it would. | Love this app - the camera quality is amazing. Use this everyday | This app was great in 2018, I did the week trial a couple weeks ago and within an hour I quickly realized that the app was much different and far less helpful than it once was. Ultimately used google for everything I needed.  Now being a few days beyond the week trial period I’ve thrown money away because they’d rather have a bad review than issue a refund from a polite email. Too bad. | I am having so much trouble figuring this app out! | I used to absolutely love this app, used it on a few trips from CA to TX. But like all good things, now they want to charge you an arm and a leg to use it and there is no monthly option! I’m not paying $80/year for a 7 day trip. Might be worth it for anyone taking 4+ trips a year but why in the world can’t it offer a monthly option? Won’t even let me look at my old trips now without paying and no free options at all any more. 👎🏼 | I’ve used this app for over a year and i was pretty satisfied with it To be honest.
Then when i got requested to renew my plan (which i was about to) i noticed that not only the prices went significantly up but also the features included shrunk and i would need to get the most expensive plan in order to get back access to my older trips.
This is disappointing and made me not renew my plan yet.
Pretty bad move guys! | Not only did this app give us bad information during our cross-country move, they will renew your subscription without any warning whatsoever. Basically, they think their customers are suckers and treat you as such. It wasn’t worth the price I paid a year ago when I actually tried to use it, and it certainly isn’t worth the price to have them sneak the charge through without giving you the opportunity to opt out. If your business model is to rely on people to forget about their renewals rather than to provide a product or service that people WANT to continue paying for, then your business is a failure. | I expected Roadtrippers to be a source of information about places we plan to visit on an upcoming roadtrip but instead of being an interactive guide I can only set a trip place A to Place B and a map is shown between those two places. We are planning more of a wander to get from A to B looking for interesting spots to visit on the way, restaurants, local interest, but this doesn’t seem to be what Roadtrippers is about. Glad I only paid the introductory price. | Fine | The app is amazing ive been using it for 3 years now, recently the pricing structure changed since i only do 1 roadtrip yearly it didnt make sense for me to pay for the premium tier, so now i have a trip already planned that i spent 10s of hours putting together which i cannot view anymore unless i upgrade to premium.

I understand when services beed to go up but this is not the way to it. I did reach out to customer support to atleast be able to view my trip that i already created so i can copy it down or something which they refused, 

unbelievable! | I had used this app before and signed up for the trial to test it out again. Meh. Frustrated that the expensive annual subscription went through a week later with no courtesy reminder or anything. I know this is how they get your money, but it’s really soured me on the app. I’d be much more happy to give them my money if it was a monthly subscription so there was a lower buy-in for short trips. | I absolutely LOVE this app (and the desktop website). I could go on and on.l about it. I’ve used it to plan out three mega road trips for me and my boys and without RoadTrippers, my drive would have been boring and predictable.

If I had just used Google maps I would’ve stopped at a theme park, a zoo, maybe an overlook. Instead we found an insane and unknown rock formation, the actual grave of Dr. Pepper, a tiny military museum in a tiny town, a parrot sanctuary and a trail of cherry blossoms in peak bloom.

I love that you can collaborate with others that aren’t premium members. I love adding stops along my trips and having the driving/mileage info for each stop. I love seeing reviews and photos within the app so I don’t have to go googling. I love it all.

I got my mom onto the app and now she has used it twice as well to plan a regular road trip and an RV road trip. Apparently, the app shows where RV hookups are and is a dream for traveling with an RV.

Never going anywhere without checking this app first!! | Don't try to use this while you're driving you'll get a wreck | The features of the service were nice and very helpful for planning a trip, the real problem is the ridiculous subscription plans. When they first switched to a subscription based model it wasn’t great but it is a helpful app and supporting the developers is total fine, so we were fine with it. Recently they’ve updated the plans again without notice, and has locked us out of almost all of our trips that we had already planned (with no way of accessing them other than to buy a new subscription model). Finally just switched to google maps because it’s free and can save our trips without fear of no being able to access them. | You have to pay and you can only pay annually. | Stop the spam!!!! | Stopped along my route at a wayside rest area.  Without touching the phone, it then rerouted us back 14 miles onto a route that was about 100 miles longer.  Sorry I ever subscribed | Seems fairly straightforward and intuitive. Still early but I like it. | I’ve had this app on my iPhone (fairly new iPhone) for about an hour and it’s already crashed a dozen times. Every time I try to put in a destination it locks up. Add RV info it locks, try to open up to see what the annual fee is and it locks up. Every time I have to completely close it down and start over. I tried reloading the app and it does the same thing. I’m going to play with it a little more but if this is how it works I certainly won’t be buying the upgrade or recommend it to anyone
Update: after removing the app and reinstalling it, it’s just as bad as before. | Luckily I caught it before our trip, but this app completely messed up our trip from California to Vancouver. In fact, don't bother with this app if you're going to Canada at all. I spent, not hours, but days meticulously planning a 3 week roadtrip. Only to realize that this app's routes become incomprehensible north of Seattle. | Really enjoying the app so far. But noticed that there’s no option to select French cuisine for travel. Also, for hotel stays, would be great if we can search by hotel brands. | Unable to choose from different routes. Like the ability to find hotels and campsites. | I entered my trip destination and get a blue line indicating the route but it covers over the interstate designation. Major interstate highways are marked and coveted over but no other roads or highways are indicated. When the route has a change from interstate to state, county, other, roads theres no designation as to what road it is. I tried zooming but that was no help. Since I'm not provided a navigational list this app is really of no help to properly get me safely to my destination. So tell me whats the big deal with this app? | You make it impossible to stop renewal you only want to keep my money. The only way I can find to stop the renewal is to cancel what I have paid for. Not good | gotta get a subscription for more than one place on the route bruh | Turn by turn directions are inconsistent and  not enough lead time to make turns.   Does not appear to be Apple phone compatible | I find it difficult to use! | This was acceptable at $30/mth for access to 3 different apps, but when you only camp 6 times a year for it to double its cost for the same functionality, then tier off the value of the app with functions that brought you to the app in the first place is just price gouging. | This is a really good app. Definitely recommend it. Mostly an easy way to put a trip together, plan stops, construct a map. I would give it 5 stars except for a few very frustrating things that drag this app down. And could easily be fixed. I do understand that maybe it’s user error, but … When you are on a trip, you open the trip and it goes to your current location in Map View. However, when you open the List View for that trip, why doesn’t it go to your current location instead of starting from day one and you have to scroll all the way down until you find what you’re looking for. The way dates are managed is a complete nightmare. Changing the dates of an entire trip is such a hassle. And you cannot plan a trip without dates as once you add your first date, the app puts every single waypoint on a separate date!! Who thought that was a good idea?! You can add things that are not on the map already, but you can only add an address, you cannot label the address as to what it is. There are a lot of things that are not included on the map that I would like to add to my trips. And label with a name. This app is not a standalone app. You need other sources to complete the picture. Especially because there is a blue line indicating your route that completely covers up the highway numbers. Highway numbers are essential to trip planning. Also, can you update the gas pricing? It’s no where near accurate. And organize the trips into past and upcoming/future? | G Maps and this nav system come up with  same routes which is not conducive for RVs.  The previous togo rv nav system was way better | Not easy to start navigation - ridiculously hard to do. | Interesting app. Paid the $60 fee and used it for a single road trip. Was pretty useful at setting up driving routes and ranges, similar to the old AAA TripTik. Found some good restaurants and museums along the way. 

But it has mediocre UI/UX. It dumps a bunch of OTHER people’s road adventures into the place where you store yours. Whenever you open it, you have to go digging for the trip(s) you’re working on because Roadtrippers figures you more likely want to see what others have done in an area you aren’t even visiting and that’s more important than your own trip! 

Think about asking a friend to hand you your hammer and instead they hand you random other tools in your box until eventually your hammer shows up. And they repeat that over and over. Wouldn’t be relying on that friend for help, even worse if I were paying them. And that’s how I feel about the experience of Roadtrippers- $60 a year to have it throwing up random adventures from other people when I bought it to focus on my own trip(s) is absurd. I can find plenty of these types of stories in more detail on YouRube or other websites- I’m paying for this subscription for a “professional” tool that focuses on MY road trips. Far too much noise and clunky navigation. 

The reason it went from a 3-star experience to a 1-star rating: apparently it’s rigged to make it impossible or near impossible to turn off the subscription. You follow a link from the app to log into their website, go to “manage subscription” or “turn off auto renewal,” and it takes you to yet again ANOTHER website for a company called “Stripe.” And does “Stripe” let you manage your subscription or turn off auto renewal? NOPE. Stripe wants you to put in your email and they claim they will “send a link” so you can log in. And the link is good for 30 minutes. BUT- the link never arrives. Tried it twice. So, Roadpass/tripper and Stripe have apparently designed a rat trap where they can claim to let you turn off auto renewal, but there is no way to do so. 

Come the end of my subscription and if they try charging again, it’ll be an instant chargeback with my bank. These sorts of schemes need to be called out for the fraud they are. And Apple may need to be advised this is going on behind the scenes, even though it’s a useful app, the trickery in preventing cancellation is abhorrent. | I was on auto renew. The price last year was 29.99 for unlimited plans with unlimited stops. It renewed for 35.99. Five more dollars, OK. But for three trips with 20 stops each. All the trios except for one have a lock sign on them, so the app isn’t even registering that I am a paying customer. There was no notice or email that the plan was changing. And of course no refunds. Will NOT be renewing | Used this app for the first time and it DID NOT take us to our Destination. Don’t trust it now and won’t use it again. Good thing my Trailer is on the small side or I would have had issues. | Killer app just learn how to used this app and it is worth every penny | This is annoying. I have logged out and logged back into my account but cannot see the trip I created on my desktop computer through the phone app. The phone app is not recognizing my user name or email and will not allow me to update it. Spent $60 on the annual membership for the premium package. | roadtrippers and campendium are supposed to be merged, but there is no campendium info here. | Very hard to understand what you actually have access to. Tried to sign up for all 4 apps but found out I only got Roadtrippers not Togo and Campendium like I wanted
Dallas Willard | Seems like developers might have forgotten about this project? I put in a 1,200 mile road trip and it couldn’t find a single gas station, a single hotel, almost anything really. It found 3 major historic land marks that almost everyone in the world has heard of… so whats the point of this app then? And you want people to pay for something as well? It’s scary to see junk like this being advertised. Seriously, I feel like i’m living in the movie idiocracy sometimes. | Wow, I couldn’t even figure out how to use this app before I ran out of free tries and they wanted me to pay for the upgrade. Why do they assume you want to plan a trip starting from your house? I wanted to find out what things there were to do once I leave Austin on my way to Marfa in a couple of months. It kept putting my current location there and wouldn’t let me search between two points any other way. That’s how I lost all my free whatever they called them. Boo for this app. They don’t even explain how to use it properly! Nowhere at all do they explain me what I need to do. Going to delete it from my device!

title: Booking.com: Hotels & Travel
description:
Save on your next trip with the Booking.com app! Find great hotel or apartment deals and book in just a few minutes. You can also book flights, rental cars, and more through the app.

- Book your whole trip in one app (accommodations, flights, car rentals, taxis and attractions)
- Stay flexible with free cancellation (available at most properties)
- 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
- No booking or credit card fees
- Chat directly with your property in the app
- Enjoy mobile-only discounts by booking in the app
- Use filters to easily find the perfect place out of millions of available accommodations 
- Get paperless confirmation of your reservation 
- Manage your bookings on the go, making changes whenever and wherever you want
- Discover local attractions and make the most of your trip
- Share your experience and get local advice on our Travel Communities forums

Access millions of accommodations
From cozy country homes to funky city apartments, find the perfect place out of millions of available accommodations. Our app offers hotels, apartments, bed and breakfasts and more.

Quickly find the perfect place to stay
Filter hotels by price, review score, WiFi quality, and other things important to you. Search cheap hotels by city, attraction, landmark, or hotel name. Special requests? Pet-friendly hotels? We have filters for everything. You can also compare your favorite accommodation options side by side to ensure you get the best price and quality.

Deals for any budget
Discover daily accommodation deals and save on your next hotel, apartment, or villa booking.
Get exclusive mobile-only discounts of 10% or more on select properties when you book in the app. Find your ideal accommodation at an ideal price.

Stay flexible with free cancellation
Change of plans? Not a problem. You can cancel for free at most hotels, apartments and other properties on Booking.com. And the app makes things even easier — it only takes a few taps to cancel, and you’re free to find a place that better suits your needs.

Last-minute travel
Heading somewhere in a hurry? With the app, you can quickly book hotels at the last minute (as well as far in advance). Finding a place in short order has never been easier. Our app allows you to search for properties nearby, fill in a few details, and secure your reservation. You can also change, cancel, or make additional reservations on the go.

Jet off with the perfect flight
Book domestic or international flights on the go with ease. The app allows you to search thousands of airfare deals per day. Plane tickets available for all major airlines and destinations.

Hit the road with car rentals
Car hire has recently been added to the app. Whether you just need a ride to explore your destination, or you’re going on an epic road trip, the Booking.com app can help. Rent a car from all the major companies and hit the road!

Reserve taxis with ease
Book in advance for a seamless connection from the airport to your destination. You can also book taxis to and from other pick-up points, such as hotels and local attractions.

Find and book a great experience
Whether you’re looking for attraction or museum tickets, boat tours and walking tours, you can book experiences online in minutes, with free cancellation on many options. 

Get and share tips with other travelers
Connect with fellow travelers, share your experiences, and get local advice on the best accommodations, attractions, and more. Discover new experiences and plan your trip with our app.
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Booking.com! This update contains several bug fixes and performance improvements. Enjoy the latest and greatest version of our app.
reviews:

I also loved the room, very clean and there is no noise! | Fast and easy, and always they have a great deal | read the subject line again. | We had a great time in the apartment.

Great location | Quick & Easy!!! | If there was a 0 star rating BDC has rightfully earned it… actually, it would be a negative star rating… no question, & I’m not exaggerating, the worst customer service I’ve experienced on any level! It’s comical | About 18 months ago, I used the app almost daily for two months while traveling in Europe. I found it clean, responsive and very helpful.

Lately, I’ve been doing some traveling around the United States. I don’t know what Booking.com thinks they are doing, but I am seriously considering switching to, another service. I’ve had problems confirming with accommodations over the app. I received an email asking me to evaluate a hotel that I had not yet stayed at leading me to believe that I had booked the wrong night. In response I rebooked for the correct night and after I was finished booking the app informed me that, I had already booked for that night but since the booking was nonrefundable, I was stuck.

They are also not at all transparent about additional fees until you are just about to confirm the reservation. I don’t get it. They know what the fees are. Why can’t they just put them upfront so you can fully evaluate an accommodation?

All in all I am very disappointed in the direction Booking.com has taken over the last 18 months. | One of the easiest user friendly apps! Love it! | The app switch the dates I need and booked for the wrong day, once I realized what happened I canceled immediately. However I was still charged. The “ customer service for this app”  lied and said the tried to contact the property, I know because I contacted the property! They, booking.com charged my card and is trying to keep my money! I have reported them and will continue to as fraud. | Wonderful app and very responsive! | Booking.com is easy to use and has so far been great. | D ce nu pot Descarcă aplicația fără payment request?? Știu ca aplicația e gratuită | Me and my husband needed a room for one night booked this  one and was not disappointed at all staff was amazing answer any question we had bed was amazingly comfy and did  not feel like going out to eat so we ordered pizza that was delivered to the hotel | Easy to navigate the web sight. 
Great discount. | It was easy to book and had the best deals for my trip to Cancun! | I booked a flight for an employee but the employee’s email has changed and when I go to call to update it I can’t get help without the email. So the phone message system sends me to online support which sends me a generic message telling me to call so I call again and get the computer asking for the info I can’t get and I’ve searched and gone in circles for 2 hours. I’ve tried every phone number and every booking registration number available to enter and nothing will work. 
I booked the flight and paid for it and have no problem accessing my email and account but I cannot access the information or get a hold of someone to help and they won’t help on their message system. 
They really don’t want to help you and I will never book through them again. | Terrible customer service it isn’t the easiest to get in touch with them! 
I booked a hotel room and had to cancel it so when I called it took multiple attempts to get in touch with anyone and when I did they stated that they would contact the hotel to cancel and get a refund but I had already contacted the hotel and received an email stating that I was not charged by the hotel so here I am weeks later still trying to get a refund that booking has charged me because they say they need something from the hotel stating I would not be charged which I have already received this agreement!
Second I booked a rental car as well when I arrived at the site they said they did not have a car for me and stated that they called booking. Use a different site or call directly. | When it works, the service is great. In a latest update my account was logged out and the password reset feature doesn’t work. It won’t send an email link and over 10+ emails from Booking they cannot fix this. | Booking.com is The Best travel-planning site. I rely on this app for all my travels, local and abroad, and have never been disappointed. So easy to use and the information is accurate and comprehensive. Because there is a kitchen and kitchen utensils as necessary. 
you can cook anything you want, everything is there.
I highly recommend this place. 😻😻😻 | Worst site. Was charged in error. 
Was booked at a place that was non existent. 
Place I tried to book used this site incorrectly so they cancelled my booking | My husband booked our flights in February 26  for a trip with friends in April. We got a confirmation email reference number flight information and they charged our card. 
When it came time to check in, the airline said “we can’t find your reservation please call.”
So we called. It was canceled for non payment. Booking didn’t pay them. The airline canceled on February 29th. The airline suggested we call booking. When we called them we were told. “No it’s good. Let me look into this” after a brief hold. “Yes it was canceled on February 29th.” Booking took our money for the flight, Knew they didn’t pay the airline, knew it had been cancelled, but didn’t bother to notify the consumer or refund our money. 
All they were willing to do was say “sorry about that we can rebook you will have to pay the difference or we can just refund you.”
When we said that was unacceptable this was their mess up. “We can file a report someone can get back to you in 12-48 hours.”
When we were scheduled to leave in 72. 
Last minute tickets were $1600 more than what we had originally paid. 
Don’t use this service. | We had a wonderful time. Everything was perfect and Chis was an awesome host! We definitely will stay again. | Our stay in Lisbon could not have been better. Nathalie was so very gracious. She kept in contact with us, recommended sires to visit, places to eat and even made reservations for us. The apartment was very well supplied with everything we needed. It was just like home. Plenty of towels, washer/dryer. The full kitchen was well stocked with utensils, Dishes, spices, etc. the location was perfect for getting inexpensive Ubers or walking to several sites. I can’t express enough how wonderful our stay here was. Thank you Nathalie for making our trip of a lifetime to Lisbon truly special. | The interior pictures are accurate. The rooms are clean and do not smell. Cable tv with Samsung tvs work pretty good and A/C units work great. The customer service and care is pretty great. 
The exterior however poses some serious needed situational awareness due to the fact that it is not the best neighborhood. As i am military i could also say there are suspicions characters walking around. The main door to your room is extremely difficult to close and lock. No microwaves in the room. They currently are requiring a CASH 60$ security deposit which you get back at the end of your stay. Bring your own because their towels are small. | This app is great. I use it every time. It’s very safe and super convenient and easy to navigate. | 👍 | Very cute and cozy place!! | Whenever I need a flight or hotel room in a certain area I always use this platform first. I’m always surprised at how low the prices are. I love using Booking! | Really awesome app that makes booking hotels a breeze. | I had about $80 to use in rewards. I needed to use them today but they expired a few days ago. They didn’t say anything about rewards ever expiring. It’s probably in some disclaimer in barely readable type. I’m so annoyed and am deleting the app. Bye, bye, Booking.com. | Perfect | افضل تطبيق | Very comfortable, clean and great location. | Thanks | can I not just explore using the map but have to enter a location??? It's just super annoying

title: GetYourGuide: Travel & Tickets
description:
Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app — we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 75,000 experiences

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier — experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours — explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later — save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation — whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets — Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service — Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and in the app across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation — Don’t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee you'll find something unforgettable to do — make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we’re doing
Leave us a review if you’re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact
releaseNotes:
We update our app every few weeks to ensure that searching for activities feels like being upgraded to first class. Here's a quick overview of what the app team has been up to:

Bugs? Bashed
Crashes? Banished
Design? Beautified

Has our hard work paid off? Tell us what you think by leaving a review.

Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our help page for further assistance: getyourguide.com/contact
reviews:

I tried to get a refund from the host of the experience but they told me to contact “GET YOUR GUIDE” for a refund. I contacted them immediately and told them what happened and they didn’t care they all just wanted to keep the $222 I had spent on something I didn’t even get to do. I wouldn’t have drove and hour and 30 min just to say I wanted a refund. I actually wanted to do it but I wasn’t able to. Get your guide and the experience host just wanted to keep the money. Case in point, I booked a day trip from Amsterdam to Brussels. Flew from Boston to Amsterdam for 1 week The trip to Brussels was going to be the highlight of my week.

Top notch, totally recommend to make your trip easy and meaningful. | Very frustrating to be solicited to sign up and be told a promo code would be sent and it isn’t sent by email. title: Skyscanner – travel deals
description:
Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy.
No matter where you are – search for flights, hotels and car rental deals to anywhere in the world, on the move. Save time and money by comparing and booking from your favorite travel brands like Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, and American Airlines all in one place, too. There are no booking fees or hidden charges – just the best prices. Here’s how to use our app: 

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where? Perfect. Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap “Everywhere” in our search bar to find cheap flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next vacation.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your vacation. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right place
Thought we were just about cheap flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book cheap deals from thousands of hotels, resorts, apartments, motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute deal for your next vacation. 

Rent a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car rental, and we’ll show you cheap prices and deals. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back.

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel brands in one place – Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, American Airlines, JetBlue, Frontier Airlines, Delta, Ctrip, Expedia, Kiwi.com, Trip.com, Agoda and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travelers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book? No problem. We have a “saved” feature where you can “heart” flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and get booking. 

Why Skyscanner?
●	The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
●	The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
●	Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
●	Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”

Let’s get social
●	Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner 
●	Instagram: @skyscanner 
●	Twitter: @skyscanner
●	LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/
●	Website: www.skyscanner.net
releaseNotes: This update includes a filter to search the cheapest month to fly. If you don’t know which month to take your trip, you can easily find the cheapest month to fly to a certain destination. Just tap “Search Anytime” when selecting your dates and we’ll show you the cheapest price available for flights in each month over the next year. Up, up, and away!
