I would also like to edit an attraction by clicking it and assigning times by the minute. | 感謝設計這個軟體！唯一美中不足的地方是不知道為什麼每次電腦網頁版的起始日期總是比app版的日期提前一天呢？（是因為系統自動調整為台灣時區嗎？） | I’ve been using Google Trips and it did a lot of things well, but it’s itinerary mapping features are lacking and this app has been very useful in completing the job Google left undone. There is room for improvement here but in general very useful. | 如果附近景點能以（假如有前一筆資料的話）上一筆資料的附近景點做搜索的話就會更好了。往往使用者可能在旅程前就規劃！ | Easy to use! Thanks for the help in planning our family reunion!! | This was the best app to help with planning my vacation! I tell everyone to get it now! | Really good interface, nice functionality. | Super easy to arrange your travel schedule with your friends or family even your enemy! Lol nice app!! | As an avid traveler, I am VERY impressed with all this app has to offer and the hours it will save me with all of its amazing features! | Edit: My travel partner contacted the app developers and got an almost-immediate response.  They fixed the invite so that we were able to share the trip and though currently only the primary trip planner can make changes, that fix is coming. I'm excited to see what can be remedied. 

Well, I like the idea and the format, but there were a couple issues.  First I successfully was invited by a friend but when I attempted to invite her on the trip I had already set up, she never got the invite. Also, in an attempt to circumvent that I was going to add all of my itinerary to her trip but the app states I don't have permission to edit while not allowing her the option to grant permission. :-/ | Good app | It's super convenient to combine all the info together and google map. I love it's flexibility, can work offline and super easy to share with others. | Overall this app is excellent for creating a trip itinerary--using the app is fairly intuitive, and only takes a little while (10 min for me?) to figure out what you really need to start planning your trip. I especially appreciate the integration with Google maps (I think that's what it uses), and how you can save specific addresses (even residential ones) with nicknames (aliases). The developers have a good product with great potential :)

There are only two issues preventing me from giving the app 5 stars:
1) The travel time estimation feature for public transit in Japan (the area for which I am planning) doesn't work. As of this writing, the app only estimates driving time between locations (and sometimes walking times...but that's not exactly realistic when I need to go 30-40 km as quickly as possible). If this feature worked, it would help me greatly in realistically planning how many places I can actually visit in a day. 
2) The pop-up notification asking me to turn on location services comes up too often. Every single time I want to search or add a destination, it reminds me to turn location on. I prefer having it off, because having all the "nearby places" listed is distracting (and irrelevant right now, since I'm in a different country than the trip I'm planning for). Having the pop-up appear only when the app is opened would make for a much smoother, less annoying user experience. 

Aside from those two areas for improvement, I am really impressed with this app and thankful to the creators! | 還算好用的app，但有一些小功能不是那麼順手。 | I never could get this app to work. Very complicated and not at all useful. | 非常好用的規劃軟體，很適合 | Really useful!! | Overall it's a good app, user friendly.
One way it can be better is by letting us to add some notes into it rather than just adding location of here and there..
looking forward for improvements..
=] | This app is so cool. It really helpful for me, and help to efficiently manage my trip a lot. Even a short trip, I could be easy to handle it and change my schedule. Just a very easy step, I can set up my trip schedule, and search new hot spot.

title: exping-Trip Planner,Travel Map
description:
Exping is the ultimate map-marking tool designed for creators. Whether you're traveling, working, hiking, or embarking on exciting road trips, Exping is your all-in-one solution for location-based needs. Capture, annotate, and share your favorite places on the map while meeting various map creation requirements. Unleash your creativity and embark on a journey of exploration and experience.

- FEATURES - 

[MARK PLACES] 
Effortlessly mark any location on the map. Simply search or long-press to drop a pin, and customize it by adding emojis or images. Make your mark memorable by including personalized notes and vibrant tags. Gain multidimensional insights through visual reviews with radar charts, giving your map a dynamic and engaging touch.

[ROUTE PLANNING] 
Plan multiple routes within a single map. Seamlessly switch between different modes of transportation and view distances and travel times between any two places. Take control of your journeys and navigate with confidence using our intuitive route planning tools.

[SHARE IN POSTER] 
Share your maps, routes, and cherished locations using our diverse selection of poster templates. Tailor the dimensions, add stickers, and choose the perfect background to create visually stunning representations of your adventures. Inspire others and make an impact with your shared maps.

[QUICK LINK] 
Access essential information with ease. Add links, phone numbers, emails, and text for any location. Streamline your navigation experience with one-click actions, allowing you to quickly dial phone numbers, launch apps, or copy text. Enjoy seamless connectivity and efficient access to important details.

[GROUPING] 
Organize and manage your locations and routes. Create multiple groups within a single map to classify and customize your content. Dive into thematic mapping and create maps that tell captivating stories. Experience rich thematic content creation and take your map customization to new heights.

[INSIGHT] 
Gain valuable insights into your shared or public maps. Dive into "data overviews" to understand engagement patterns, explore "browsing trends" to identify popular destinations, analyze "traffic sources," and visualize "user distribution." Unlock the power of data-driven decision-making and optimize your map experiences.

[MAP COLLABORATION] 
Collaborate in real-time with friends on map creation. Experience the thrill of synchronized editing and real-time location sharing among multiple friends. Unleash your collective creativity and create maps that inspire, connect, and foster collaboration. Create memorable shared experiences and let your maps shine.

Feel free to share any ideas or suggestions with us.

- CONTACT US -

Instagram: @Exping.World
Twitter: @ExpingWorld
Mail: hello@exping.world 
RED BOOK: Exping World

Privacy Policy：https://support.exping.world/privacy 
Terms of Service：https://support.exping.world/terms 
Services Agreement：https://support.exping.world/services-agreement
Terms of Use(EULA)：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
releaseNotes:
Spring is the season for travel. Come and invite your friends to join in creating maps together and enjoy the fun of co-creation.

ENHANCEMENTS
- Compatible with the map area
- Modifiable default unit of area
- Fixed known issues
reviews: If you’re outside of China, you ought to be aware of this. | 概念很好 但是手机操作太低效了。需要mac版 | The app will not send the verification code to either my phone number or email address despite several attempts. | 卡得我有点暴躁了 | I just curated map and send to my friends with the generated poster. It’s come with web link for sharing which quiet convinence. Wish to have path marking support soon. | It’s really interesting to mark the spots I’ve visited on the maps. Now I can share some nice routes to my friends via this app

title: VegasMate Travel Guide
description:
Vegas is full of choices - discover the best places to eat, drink and play with VegasMate.

VegasMate is the #1 trip planning tool for Las Vegas, NV.

FEATURES

- Plan an amazing trip:
  • Create an itinerary for your upcoming trip or just a list of places you may visit sometime
  • Add the most popular places… or a custom place you’ve added yourself
  • Attach files and links to your trip - your boarding pass or hotel confirmation is a tap away
  • Leave ratings on your favorite places
  • Track your wins and losses
  • Share your trips with others via iCloud or send a summary to social media
  • Integrates with Apple Health (HealthKit) to optionally show the number of steps taken on each trip - compete with your friends for fun and stay fit!

- Easy access to all of the info on hotel, restaurants, shows, clubs and pools on The Strip, Fremont Street and beyond

- Estimate the cost of taking a cab to your destination with CabCheck

- Hungry right now? Easily see which restaurants are open or closed at the moment with a quick annotation for places opening later today

- When available, we include restaurant menus and casino floor maps. No more searching through poorly designed casino Web sites to find them

- News articles from the local papers and some useful blogs, always up to date

- Thousands of photos to get you amped up while planning your trip

- An extensive set of widgets for recent news, photos, notable places and trip details like a countdown

- Filter news feed based on content filters (subscription required)

- Receive push notifications about important Vegas stories (subscription required)

- ... and a lot more

PRAISE FOR VEGASMATE 

• Five Hundy By Midnight Podcast - "VegasMate, VegasMate, it's really great!" 

• David Winograd, TUAW.com - "...the app saved lots of time, provided on the spot information, and the benefit of reading visitor reviews was terrific..." 

• Richard Abowitz, LA Times - "...like the best travel book a tourist can get..." 

Twitter: @vegasmate 
Email: support@vegasmate.com

If you choose to purchase a Content Subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Current price for the one year Content Subscription is $6.99/yr USD, and may vary from country to country. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

Privacy Policy: https://www.vegasmate.com/privacy.html#privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://www.vegasmate.com/privacy.html#terms-of-use
releaseNotes: This release syncs up with our first release for an upcoming spatial computing platform. We now fully support that platform and you can share your trips between all of your devices.
reviews:
Super easy to use, it is a definite must have for planning out any trips to Vegas. I never am able to do everything I want when I visit, and it’s nice to have past trips saved with stuff I have already researched. Also great you can add trips way out in the future. | Thai is a great tool for planning Vegas trips as well as finding places to go. Whenever we plan a trip we inevitably talk about places that we forget about once we're in the middle of it all. Pair this with Vegas Lists, another app that helps you save those places on your wish and to-do lists, and you've got a good way to have an even better time in Las Vegas. | Excellent for traveling to Vegas. My favorite part is the ability to find restaurants by location. It tells you what’s nearby, what’s open, and usually has a link to the menu. Been using this app for years and it has gotten better and better. | App stopped updating! | This does not help me sort my time I’m
Going to be on the ground | Awesome App!!

I use VegasMate to put together a list of places I want to visit in Vegas. The App gives great info regarding hours and menus for restaurants as well as great maps to know where you are going. 

The app creator, Hunter, has put together a great place to help people who love Las Vegas love it even more. Hunter is awesome. | Super helpful! Great tool!! | Ok. But where are many of the maps?! It's missing way too many maps. Like The Cosmopolitan, MGM, etc..... | This is the only app for Vegas that you need. I go to LV 2-3 times a year so I know if information is up to date, and this app is. For a Vegas greenhorn, you can read reviews and really get a feel for what you want to do, or where you'd like to stay, while avoiding the rip offs (like cabbies taking you through the tunnel to get to the south strip). Also functions great - never had a glitch in 2 years of using it. Download. You won't regret it. | The only Vegas guide you'll need. | A lot of info and features. Heard out this app on Vegas Gang & Five Hundy By Midnight podcasts | I download this app before every trip to Vegas, lots of great info to make getting around Vegas and planning your trip easier & more enjoyable | I love this app! I especially love the cab check feature!! Thanks Hunter! Keep up the great work!!! | Not written by the PR people, just others who have the app and use it. Very well done an updated every time I open it for new places to stay/play/eat | Time is precious when visiting Vegas - don’t waste it with at lame places - 

With Vegasmate on my phone, I can make plans on the fly and look like a Vegas expert to my friends. | I renewed this app since it worked so well last year.  Very disappointed that the dining section has so many old reviews that were worthless.  Also the distance did not work. Every restaurant was 0 feet away and within walking distance. | I get to the Permissions black screen and nothing else. Can't use app. Waste of time. | I have made 3 attempts to download this app and each other time I have reached a screen stating Permissions. It's a black screen and that's it. Freakin' frustrated! | So far works well !!! | It a good app for Vegas stuff, but the app is slow when scrolling. And why do I get ads? I paid for this app a while ago! | Useful features to help both with trip planning in advance of a trip and also help find things while in Vegas. | The best Las Vegas app, Has everything you need and more, I'm so glad I have this app ,It keeps me update on everything in Vegas as we all know it changes all the time, Thanks Again | I love this app. I have been using Vegas Mate for about 3 years and now can't really use anything else. much prefer the reviews of users to that of the hotels telling me how great  or bad the hotels/shows/restaurants with 0 PR BS.  Very stable and with a huge amount of info and pictures, I can't recommend this App enough. | How does this app have "only" a 4 star rating- it is totally 5 star all the way- I have this app in my iPhone - iPod touch- and iPad- and love it on all Apple devices. The constant updates that Hunter puts out makes this the most have Vegas app for any apple person! | This app is extremely useful for people visiting Vegas for the first time, and still useful on my 21st time! | Best. | Great concept, but missing a lot of information. The attractions section is sparse and the overall look is boring. Also more pictures would be helpful. | Do not waste your time | Joining the long list of Apps that want more $$$ from you after your purchased it. 

Also, annoyingly sets up an always-on geofence (constantly using GPS) even when the app is closed. | Paid for original version. Now they want you to pay again. Not worth it at all. Most content reviews are outdated | This app is always getting updated with the latest Vegas info which is amazing in a city that changes so much and so often. New versions seem to be well tested and customer service is great. You can tell there is a love of Vegas built into this app. I wish it existed for other cities. | Used to love this but crashes and never opens. Have reinstalled to no avail. | This app is fantastic! Even if you 'like', not "love" Vegas, you're going to enjoy this app! Restaurant menus and their hours, reviews of the hotel, rooms, amenities and all casinos makes this app a must have from newbies to Vegas experienced old timers! | Truly the most complete app about Vegas available and getting better all the time. Perfect for newbies and frequent visitors. Don't know how I ever got around Vegas without it. | Don't waste your time. Has a "subscription" service for updates. Give me a break. Can get this information from other places without the subscription and fake reviews on places. This is just a scam to get more money by the developers. | I have used VegasMate for years, this new update is the best ever. Even as a veteran Vegas visitor i find it indispensable in my trip preperation. | After hearing about this app on one of the Vegas podcasts I listen to. I didn't even wait to read reviews before purchasing it. 
The app has potential but it seems that all of the features I have looked at are at least 10 months old! The Vegas news is current, but reviews, pictures, shows, etc are all outdated. Even the recent update section is three months old. Please catch up!!! | This app provides little useful information and instead just continues to show the same web link for most requests.  Useless.  When updating the database as the app wants to do immediately, I believe this app is copying your contact information, since all the scant information is still both very general and as others have indicated, out of date. 

This is most likely a scam application. | Omg, this app could not be more worthless. When searching for rooms with this app, it quoted me rates such as "$900 average rate at tropicanA". Obviously that is totally wrong, as was every single hotel rate they quoted. They must be averaging all of the rates, including suites, which is worthless to me. Every hotel rate is going to look expensive if you lump in the fancy suite rates. Seriously, worthless app. Just google Las Vegas instead, or ask a friend whose been to vegas. Awful app! | Don't waste money or time on this. | I love this app! It's so helpful every time I am planing a Vegas trip and even better when you get there. It's always being updated so no information is out of date. Worth every cent you pay for it. | Lots of great info, even for a Vegas regular. Lots of updates too--always seems up to date with the ever changing/evolving Vegas scene. Recommended! | We use it every trip to Vegas | Vegas Mate is a fantastic Vegas app at a very reasonable price.  I use it every time I go to Vegas and also to help plan my trip there.  Keep up the good work!! | This app crashes constantly. Too difficult to use with the constant crashing. | Vegas Mate, Vegas Mate, it's really great! | Title says it... Maps news, reviews, lists this app has it all. | I've travelled to Vegas annually for a conference for several years and can't believe how much I used this app on my recent trip. Great info. You won't be disappointed. | This is a great app! I basically use it to brainstorm plans for upcoming trips. When I read or hear about a place, I look it up on Vegas Mate and dump it into my upcoming trip. Then when it comes to the planning stage, I sift through my brainstorming to see which things I want to make time for. The app also has lots of great articles, and I find it especially useful to be able to see restaurants' menus and hours. Thanks! | Vegas Mate has it all.  Hotel reviews, attraction info, restaurant menus with reviews, menus, and in many cases prices. Always very helpful.

title: Guru Maps Pro & GPS Tracker
description:
Discover detailed and user-friendly offline maps featuring millions of points of interest (POI). Record your GPS tracks and bookmark your favorite locations for easy access.

OFFLINE NAVIGATION
• Turn-by-turn driving guidance.
• Voice instructions available in nine languages during navigation.
• Routing options for driving, cycling, walking, or shortest distance.
• Automatic rerouting to keep you on track.
• Support for intermediate points on your route.

OFFLINE MAPS
• Highly-detailed maps encompassing the entire world.
• Utilizes open data from the OpenStreetMap project.
• One-time download for unrestricted offline use.
• Regular monthly updates for the latest fixes and additions.

GPS TRACKS
• Continuously record your trips, even when the app runs in the background.
• Real-time monitoring of speed, distance, time, and altitude directly on the map during your trip.
• Choose from seven solid track colors or altitude and speed gradients.

OFFLINE SEARCH
• Instant results as you type, ensuring fast searches.
• Multiple search options: address, object name, category, or GPS coordinates.
• Simultaneous search in multiple languages for added convenience.

BOOKMARKS
• Easily save favorite places on your map.
• Choose from a variety of map icons.

SYNCHRONIZATION
• Seamless data syncing across multiple devices.
• Data stored on a server for backup purposes.

IMPORT AND EXPORT
• Effortlessly export your tracks, bookmarks, or entire travel collection as KML or GPX files.
• Organized collections for simple access.
• Import offline maps from sqlitedb/mbtiles formats.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
• Support for .GeoJSON file format to display map overlays.
• One-finger zoom functionality.
• Built-in trip computer with speed and altitude.
• Tracking mode.
• Display of coordinates and map scale.
• Customizable object visibility.
• 11 different map language options.
• Adjustable label size.

ONLINE MAP SOURCES (thunderforest.com):
OpenCycleMap, Outdoors, Transport, Transport Dark, Landscape, Mobile Atlas, Neighbourhood, etc.

Link your Guru Maps Pro purchase to your Guru Maps account to enjoy Pro features on other platforms without additional purchases.
releaseNotes: This update adds the CarPlay Dashboard and rapid route building in CarPlay
reviews:
I've been using Guru Maps Pro for many years on my iOS and iPadOS devices to navigate my travels around the world. The OSM Maps are the best maps for offline (or online for that matter).  Guru's move to the macOS platform is a really nice addition - though I must admit I don't use it on my MacBook Air much as my iPadPro is much faster and I like the touch interface.  Overall, Guru is my go to offline/Navigation App. I do my long range travel planning in Furkot.com and Export my GPX data in Guru GPX format. Data management on Guru is straight forward and I haven't found any real limitations. With the Pro-version, I have 79GB of the worlds roads (maps) on my iPhone & iPadPro. Those maps update frequently at no additional cost. 

The only thing missing for me, feature wise, is Track Editing features. | After many km in the road with Guru( I’ve used other navigations apps before) this is THE best app. 
I get to see small backroads that I’ll never have found by myself. And I’m confident that I’ll not be taken to dead ends or anything impossible. 
Thanks a lot | Easy to import GPX files. I was able to navigate with Guru Maps Pro in the mountains of Ecuador. I use the app anyplace I might not have cellular service. 

I'm very happy that the app keeps improving and getting updated. A lot of features have been added over time. 

I use it less for recording, but the option is there.

A solid mapping and navigation tool. | Have tried them all, and this one is truly outstanding. | This program is by far the best program for navigation of offline mapping. Evgen is always improving the functions for faster access. Just added is Apple CarPlay which puts it above the competition. A few minor bugs are being worked on at the time of this review but believe me, they will probably be fixed before you download. I highly recommend this program for both vehicle and hiking. | the settings in the system settings app is gone. along with the “disallow cluster” settings. 
please bring it back!!! | 为啥账号不能互通会员？ | Best offline map app but please develop iWatch version. thanks you! | Would recommend. I use it for motorcycle trips where I am frequently out of cellular service. | I got this to use offline with only gps on trails where service doesn't exist. This has become so bloated with features that it has been less and less appealing and useful to me...now I have to provide an account to sync?! It's a shame since I've been using this for years and it's stable and polished... | Couldn't download any maps after 4th of July,now new update won't work on old IOS , disappointed, app served well for few years | So I caved in and created an Apple Sign in. However it will not sync my bookmarks from my iPhone (a running Guru Maps 4.10.2) that were synced to the cloud. So if you deleted your old version and sign in with this new version you lose your bookmarks!!

Please bring back an option for the old iCloud syncing!

Ver 5.0.1 iCloud Sync still hasn’t been added back (without having to sign in) for iOS devices. 

 Ver 5.0 Why can’t I still have access to my bookmarks I have previously synced with iCloud? Now I have to create an account in order to do this? No! This is not what I paid for. Please bring back the ability to sync via iCloud WITHOUT needing to have an account! Otherwise I would like a refund so I can go elsewhere. Thank you | I used this map program for years.
I love being able to track where I went and look at it later, and even save the data. We travel quite a bit, and use it on every trip, to help us get around, and to track our routes. Then it tells how far we traveled. Great for bike rides as well.
I started by using the Google maps while traveling, but have trouble getting it to fill in, and needed to find someplace with WiFi to fill in the details. Galileo let’s you download the maps you need and all the details are there.
I also really like being able to measure distance between two points on the map. I have organized a number of files that allows me to turn on and off points of interest, and past routs that I have traveled.
 Excellent map program, I’ll never travel without it. | I us the app in offline mode fishing in remote Canada. No fear of getting lost among the numerous islands and lookalike land features. | This app has exceptionally fast map redraw speed of its offline maps. Import of GPX files is easy and once they add Routing to Galileo (Guru) it will be a 5 Star App.

UPDATED:
Turn-by-turn was added and works flawlessly offline.  Did I mention the maps? They are the best map implementation of any mobile nav app - OSM or proprietary maps - and I've tried them all!

I travel the world and have the world's OSM maps on my phone - 69GB!!! With that much map data other nav apps crawl to a halt performance wise - not Guru. Of course most other map makers don't cover the whole world like OSM does. | 12/6/2021 the map needs some type of traffic notifications. Also, show map  in 3 D. 

12/4/2021 it would be nice if once a destination is calculated. The map would show several route alternatives. Presently, it only shows one. 11/24/2021 for the price one pays for the app. It should have better Lange guidance method. It should have a visual depiction of the lanes and what lane one should get in to exit 11/24/2021. For the price. It should have traffic notifications. | I downloaded the trial version and started downloading images while I had high speed internet. I just paid for the app, and ALL my images are gone, and I don’t have high speed internet now. How do I get my images from the original to the pro version? | Would not change a thing.
Make sure you save to the cloud! | Great app | I’ve had this app for several years and use it regularly to navigate where cell and WiFi are not readily available in places like Cuba, Ireland, hiking in the Great Smokey Mountains, etc.  

I especially like the ability to save locations in categories and control which POI’s are displayed on screen.  

Uses relatively small amount of storage for the detailed maps and routing. 

Does exactly as advertised! | Getting “error: 6  cannot resolve host name”. The default map is useless for navigation and points of interest. | This is a real navigator. You can daily trust and rely on. I use it on daily basis. One defect if you wanna call it a defect. Why Arabic language is not supported?  Really thanks for this amazing app. | Thanks for nothing. | This app represents separatists view on the borders, representing unrecognized, separatist territories as independent states.

This is purely russian view, as the rest of the world thinks that:

ABKHAZIA AND SAMACHABLO IS GEORGIA
CRIMEA IS UKRAINE
KARABAKH IS AZERBAIJAN

RUSSIA IS OCCUPANT!!! | I’ve used this while walking around London and while riding my motorcycle around the SW United States. Works well following saved tracks as on the COBDR or finding a route to a pub for a late lunch. | Please consider to add Arabic language in the next update | Holy crap again, did you see the response to my review? Shoulda woulda done this or that like its a problem with my phone not with the app! If the app is difficult to use it’s not the phone it’s the NAMELESS  PERSON WHO ANSWER THSES REVIEWS.Holy crap, have you seen SEPTEMBER 2 review, the developers answer to a complaint? ASK APPLE FOR A REFUNDI well heres my chance to get my monies back.upgraded to pro a long time ago, check in once in a while and its still not as practical nor  useful  to use as the Gmap. Whats the point of having tons of different maps if doing a simple “show me from here to here” takes longer than five minutes to figure out. | was a great app, but now you can’t import a gpx file anymore. App does not show on the share sheet. No answer from customer sipport/developer | Simply the best maps for hiking! Shows all the trails not just the official ones. The data is from open street map and Guru Maps adds a well polished interface. | I do winter hiking through the winter months, several times a week.  I go to places where it would be easy to get lost.  The app uses very little phone battery reserve and the combination of the comprehensive off line trail mapping with the satellite location feature is powerful in terms of knowing where I am located and what my options are for a great hike and getting back to the trailhead.  The “two-finger” distance measurement, while not crucial, is extremely useful and unique to navigation apps.

The documentation and organization feature of all past hikes is also extremely valuable in hike planning and sharing of its GPX record files.

I don’t leave home without Guru!!!
PapaJoe | Very helpful apps for record track as offline , | Love the features of the map and the ability to track the routes. As an avid rider I love seeing my stats for my run and this provides a great amount of detail. What’s lacking is the map seem to be pulled out of a paper map. The visual effect of google or apple maps is missing giving it an old feel to it. I have found myself more and more using rever for that reason alone as both apps do the same. However the graphic quality of rever is better. Would love to see better maps in the feature. Otherwise a great app. | This was my five star navigation app, then I upgraded to iOS 13 and can’t even load a gpx file into Guru now. Doesn’t show as a viable recipient of gpx files on the ‘share’ list. Help! | Dont know what happened to this App, used to work great now, worthless... unless its an address like restaurant or bar etc,,, wont allow you to navigate to the address. Sent 2 emails asking for support with no reply over a week ago. | Great until it simply stops tracking and doesn’t let you know it has. You could be going a long time without tracking as intended leaving big gaps in coverage. 

Very frustrating and damaging. 

Developers advised but offered no solution. | The first time I used this worthless app I put in a precise street address in Paris France. The app immediately put in a different address with the correct number but a different street. I tried to correct the error but it would not allow me to change the wrong address. What good is this app if it changes your address to another wrong address. What an expensive disappointment this is. One star rating because there is nothing lower. | Nice app.  Only wish it would work with apple CarPlay. | Very helpful to be able to navigate walking around Havana offline!! | I initially bought this for my Camino de Santiago walk but have been using it for every walk

Download the offline maps for the areas you will be...they enlarge up to incredible detail

What I love best is the GPS tracking of your walk.  You hit record at the beginning and turn it off when your done with your walk and you’ve got an accurate tracking of where you’ve walked with mileage, time walked, time idle and elevation changes 

It works completely without Wi-Fi or cell signal 

I can’t recommend it enough! | I based my entire website on this app. I love it. I’ve used it for years all ready. I recommend it | I’ve tried several map apps, and this is the best, no question. I just wish it would show as many local stores as Apple Maps in my area. | I have used it for several years. I live in the USA and travel a lot there and internationally, especially in China. Guru (Galileo) has never failed me.  I never use google, and rarely use apple maps.  My first look is always Guru. It even works to track your flight path when in airplane mode.  

I walk around foreign cities and countryside, never worried about network connection.  I tag my hotel, or friends home or bus/train station to maintain my orientation. If I find a great, tiny restaurant in an urban maze, tag it.  

Just download or update maps before you go and all is well. | Love this app, I first downloaded it because of work and then I moved away where services can be even worse. The great part about this app is you can pre download the map for the area and it works offline which is ideal especially if you’re not wanting to use data or unable to. Being able to pin things to find them again is great and the pins have different categories which is perfect for me. Hands down better then the other maps for these reasons. Google maps has some offline capabilities but it seems to not be as accurate. | A great app!! I suggest GPS filtering.  Evgen suggests accuracy filter 100 ft, distance threshold 20 ft.

The ascent and descent needs work. It needs filtering, because at present it adds in all the ups and downs of GPS data and gives you a figure that is at least double what it should be. | Have LOVED this app for years. The most recent update appears to have broken it. All maps deleted and no way to re-download them.

The maps are back! Hurray!!! So excited everything is working again because, as I said, I haves loved it for years. | I’ve used and loved this app for years. Normally I’d rate it 5 stars. However, the latest version started crashing instantly after I entered a search term. I’ve tried force closing and restarting my iPhone, but no luck. Please get this bug fixed! | App crashes when loading a map. Doesn’t last 10 seconds running. I want my money back | After some hours app is crashing and app can't use. IPhone 7 plus, ios 10.3.3 | Easy to learn/use. Great visuals. Really want to calculate routes in evening while online to use offline next day. Too bad. | I downloaded and paid for the app, downloaded all the states that I will be traveling and clicked the offline option.
I’m in my vehicle going to new locations constantly and you can Not put in an address even though you have the maps downloaded, you have to have internet so not offline at all unless you just want to watch yourself drive around real time which does nothing for me and probably most people.

title: Babbel - Language Learning
description:
Millions of people are learning languages with Babbel — the language app built by language experts. Why Babbel? Our short, interactive lessons rethink old-school language education to get you speaking a new language with confidence!


BABBEL WORKS:

• Efficacy backed by researchers at Yale University: 
100% of study participants improved their oral proficiency in 3 months*

• After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found:
96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary
73% of study participants became better speakers**

====================

Our language experts build every language course tailored to your native language. This way you learn Spanish and 13 more languages quickly and effectively.

TRY BABBEL – DOWNLOAD THE APP AND TAKE A FREE LESSON

====================

LEARN 14 LANGUAGES:

It's not just a Spanish learning app! Learn French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian, and English.

====================

Why are Americans learning languages with the Babbel language app?

SHORT, EFFECTIVE LESSONS
Easy to fit language lessons into your day

LESSONS FOR EVERY SITUATION
For travel, work, and more

LISTEN, SPEAK, WRITE
Well-rounded language practice

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Sophisticated speech-recognition technology

RETAIN WHAT YOU LEARN
Review feature that’s optimized to help you retain knowledge

LEARN GRAMMAR IN CONTEXT
Useful tips & tricks as you learn

OVER 5,000 LANGUAGE COURSES
Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

OFFLINE MODE
Download lessons and learn anywhere

====================

Read Babbel Magazine to get tips, tricks, and interesting facts about how to learn languages:
* Babbel Magazine: https://www.babbel.com/en/magazine

Follow us on social media for tips on language learning!
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/babbelusa
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Babbel.usa

====================

You will need a subscription in order to get access to the full learning materials for one language. Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is canceled, access to the app’s courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

You'll get access to all courses for the following durations:

1 month
3 months
6 months
12 months

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

CONTACT US:

Ideas, comments, or feedback? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com


START YOUR LANGUAGE LEARNING JOURNEY TODAY:

Learn Spanish (Latin American or Spain)
Learn French
Learn Italian
Learn English (American or British)
Learn German
Learn Russian
Learn Polish
Learn Portuguese
Learn Turkish
Learn Norwegian
Learn Danish
Learn Swedish
Learn Dutch
Learn Indonesian



*Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Van Deusen-Scholl, N., Lubrano, M.J. (both Yale University) & Sporn, Z. (Babbel), 2019. "Measuring Babbel’s Efficacy in Developing Oral Proficiency."

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Loewen, S., Isbell (both Michigan State University) & Sporn. Z (Babbel), 2018. “Learning Spanish with Babbel: Oral Proficiency Outcome in App-Based Foreign Language Learning”.
releaseNotes:
Tired of all the bad news out there? Well, here's some good news from the Babbel universe! We've removed more of the bugs you mentioned to us and upgraded your favourite courses. So, cheer app and go on, try our latest version!  

Questions? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com
reviews:
Much more depth and foundational support to get the grammar and other rules while learning. A good pick when you outgrow Duolingo. | Not as fun as Duo but more useful content! | I wish they had Easter Asian Language options - but great way to learn a new Language | Bisaya please | Absolutely amazing resource! | I had expected more conversational lessons. There is too much formal and writing lessons. 

I also have technical issues with seeing all answer options because I can’t scroll down to all answers. 

Disappointing. | This app has been very helpful in learning Scandinavian languages. But it has a glitch. It often opens to a white screen and the only resolution os to reinstall it. Not anymore. STILL IT SHUTS THE ENTIRE IPAD DOWN when I change to another language. Sending a screenshot makes no sense; the shot would be a black screen. Sometimes the ipad will restart, other times I need to restart it. I’d give this a five star for the teaching method, but the steps that were originally suggested  did not work. Log out, reinstall, fine for a  few weeks, but crashing again. I use the iPad keyboard that has the characters on it for the language, and I am learning, Danish, Norwegian, and Swedish.
Additionally, why is an icon on my home screen that talks about.             ”everyday conversations updated”, yet when I access it, I am not able to use it?!!! An error screen appears. There is plenty of material to learn. If the app doesn’t work, take it off! | Will charge you without warning!   I got many charges of about $100 every few months without email or warning.  This is an automatic charge they will it tell you about. | El interesante | Awesome app | I bought the lifetime subscription, but seeing the mistranslations on the very beginning lessons that are suppose to be the easiest is dishearting. 
I took screen shots but cant add them here. 
But they translate “¿Están casados?" to "Are you married?” And they translate “Ellas beben unos vasos de leche.” to “They are drinking some glasses of milk.” 
If there are mistakes in the easiest lessons how am I to be confident that the harder lessons are mistake free? | Functional wise, it’s perfect. I’ve used it on the computer, tablet, and phone. And while technically, it is better than Duolingo, for the money it’s not worth it. You’re better off to get the paid version of Duolingo. In my opinion, this program is a mix of time wasting absurdly easy tasks, mixed with things of impossible difficulty. Because they will ask you questions on things that contain words that they did not teach you out of nowhere.  Or they may show you something once and then just presume you to know it forever. There’s no study sheets on verb conjugations so that you can memorize them or anything of this nature that I’ve seen. It’s just simply not good. Not in my opinion. I think if you wanna learn a language, you’re better off to just do a hodgepodge of whatever free programs you can get like Duolingo and just look things up on the Internet yourself and just memorize stuff and then do a mixture of watching TV and movies and possibly talking to chat gpt, etc | It is not as advertised. In the ad and in the pictures it said nowhere about a subscription. Then once I had spent fifteen minutes doing the introduction, signing up and the first lesson, it suddenly says I need an expensive subscription to continue. I’m disappointed. For those who can afford it, it would be a great app, but not for me (a broke student). Hopefully we can get a free version with ads soon. | When doing the lessons and having only one answer below, it gives the answer away. Additionally, trying to figure out what the lesson entails is difficult at times without an explanation. Lastly, the student should be able to go back to beginning lessons and review and this is very difficult to do. I’ve been studying vocabulary on my own with much better success than what I’ve gained from Babbel. As a result I have been avoiding Babbel. | Auto renews without warning, only tells you when you’re charged.  And if you try to cancel the day you find out, they won’t let you until the next cycle.  

That’s the behavior of an app that doesn’t believe in its offering.  Bad form. | I’m only a few lessons in and it seems very spelling based. It shows you the words once or twice and then has you fill in the word with the letters. I was really loving it at first but I had to download a few other apps to get me through it. It may be teaching you one skill but throws a ton of vocab you’ve never seen before into the mix and it can get over whelming fast! | I will buy a lifetime subscription if you make that offer available on the mobile app | Don’t interrupt | I really recommend this to anyone who wants to learn a new language. I am currently learning German and it’s just 👌although one small problem… when I started my subscription I chose British English instead of American English as a joke but when I switch British to American It restarts me, really wish that it would keep my progress. But overall, 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 🤫🧏🏼🧏🏼‍♂️

Yes, I’m a gen Z person. | Hello, I am a learner on Babbel that is not satisfied with the production. I do not like how you have to pay for the second lesson. I like Duolingo much more. It is free to learn Spanish and more. It also has a variety of languages you can choose from. Like Klingon! I checked the languages and there wasn’t my language that I wanted to learn. You might think I am being dramatic, like of course not all language apps have Navajo and High Valariyin like Duolingo. Sorry if I spelled the last example wrong. But, I was actually looking for Irish, which is a common language spoke by millions of people. I really wanted to learn that language. It also has very little instructions on what to do when you want to review your speaking. You were supposed to hold down the microphone, and then you speak. I thought you click the microphone, and then say it. That are all my concerns. Sincerely, Ex-Learner. ❤️ | The “Review” sections don’t work in any of the lessons- really dissatisfied with this expensive app | Please offer this option | Great | If you really want to learn how to speak a language. This is your app | Before practicing daily, I didn’t fully notice how great this app is at teaching you! I might’ve done a few days in a row but then I would fall off for multiple days if not longer. 

Well I’ve done just a three week commitment of everyday practice, 15-30 minutes. It’s incredible how much I’ve retained. Specifically, I seasonally work with people who speak Spanish, and I’ve noticed a difference the past few days with my ability to communicate. Just simple phrases and sentences but things that previously left my brain so quickly are staying.. and with the way babble teaches tons of things at a time (almost sneakily!!), it feels almost like a snowball effect. 

I’m very excited to see where a few months of dedicated practice gets me! 

*Also, I love to get my Babbel practice in everyday on my lunch break - that’s how little it feels like work! | This app is good at teaching and it might be helpful for those who have some difficulty with learning | Hi! Just a quick review on this app here! I started learning German just about a week ago and WOW… I’m having so such fun!!! It’s easy to learn quick helpful reminders and techniques, while also letting you have free time on your hands practicing translating sentences. It’s also really fun and interesting to learn how to speak the language. I liked everything about this app overall and I definitely recommend going ahead and giving it a try!  However… the app only gets 4 stars because if you want to learn more, you normal have to wait 12 hours or get the subscription. I personally think if you plan on using a subscription, it should be used for bonuses in the app, instead of paying for more content. This is still a VERY wonderful app, so I will continue to support and I also ( once again ) definitely recommend! | this is perfect for those who sre just starting out, but once you get like half way through you’re gonna wanna start supplementing other sources like podcasts and books to continue learning | Finally, an app that works as advertised. Easy to follow along and understand. | Tfjjvib | There are many good things to say about the app, like many reviewers already pointed out. So I will focus on the things I don't like so much.
For one, it does not repeat spoken words, unless you force it to by tapping on it. Why not automatically repeat them a few times. Or at least give users the option in settings so that new words are spoken 3 times (or any number of times) maybe even with different voices in different speeds. 
Then it asks you to fill in blanks in such an obvious way by providing pictures with the possible answers that everyone can do it without thinking. 
There is just generally too much interaction involved. You can't do an exercise without constantly tapping your screen to continue. 
It also throws in lots of new words while training you a specific new word without explaining the others. Yes, they give you the English translation, but that's not helpful unless you constantly look at the screen. It is just too visual for me. 
In combination with my LEARN SPANISH podcast it is quite nice, despite all the things I mentioned above. Not cheap though. | Great app,  I used it to keep up on my French for quite awhile and also to start learning German.  Things are very intuitive and laid out well.  It made it very easy to learn writing/reading/speaking which is a hard combo to find.   

I didn’t renew my subscription the last time though because they only support 14 languages (mostly western) and I was getting into learning Korean which they don’t have.  

I’ll keep an eye on things though and will definitely be returning if they ever add support for more east-asian languages ^.^. | Per the fine print in the “terms and conditions”, your access auto-renews and if you are done dealing with this not very effective app, you’d better cancel this auto-renewal before your subscription expires because otherwise they will charge you for the renewal and run with your money. | I use this app on my phone.I can’t always see all the material on the questions. | Price is ok but hard to maintain consistent practice for reasons below. 

Gives you more sentences in the beginning and moves faster than Duolingo but makes you spell the new words out!! At the first part of the lesson there are no tips for spelling which is HARD when you’re trying to learn French.

Also introduces a lot of extra words to make sentences so prior knowledge is helpful to figure out the context. 

And the microphone is reeeaaalllyyy picky. Overall, more advanced than Duolingo but hardly close to user friendly for a quick lesson. | This is all I’ve ever wanted in regards to learning Spanish. I need something convenient since I’m always on the go. I also needed something fun and engaging, so that I can stay consistent. It also keeps track of how many days you practice in a row, so that you can uphold a streak and thus remain accountable. Love it! | I can’t use it it wants me to subscribe Fine I won’t use it but will a better app to use I canceled early so I wouldn’t have worry about renewal if I wasn’t using it. Now I don’t think I would use or recommend | A+++++++++ | I got this because I wanted to learn french but i don’t have the money to pay for it:( is there any way you could make a free version with ads or something? | The Babbel ads make it look like this app is great for quickly learning conversational language in preparation for a trip but I find it focuses too much on grammar and not on conversations. | Other then the fact that it doesn’t let you do some lessons it great but it is a bit confusing to work the app in the beginning | I love Babbel. Babbel, unlike all other language apps, is very comprehensive on grammar and provides many great resources that the other language learning apps do not!! | all of my "writing" sections in both reviews and lessons are autofilled. the "speaking" portion glitches constantly—i thought it was a result of my pronunciation but, after i speak, the app glitches and asks me to repeat myself again. i've liked using babbel for the past few months and am disappointed at the seemingly overnight change once i took advantage of the lifetime promo. | So it is ok but the thing is there is only like 5 languages | Purchased the app a while back. Was a little confused on what I purchased and contacted support. They reset my account without me asking and said they thought that was what I wanted. Then I said no and asked again. Next day I got an email the ticket was closed. 

Then I got a ticket asking me how the support was and I clicked bad and stated we never addressed my question and closed the ticket. 

I had paid for a year and since just moved on to a new app so it was a waste of money due to poor support. | So I speak a fair amount of French this app is not only confusing. It’s useless. Babbel is terrible. It doesn’t teach you anything about conversation that you will ever need. I am so upset that I actually paid for a year of it. Don’t waste your money take a class online or a tutor. | Very helpful | I can’t get customers service.  Please give me back my money | God is great 👌 | I so wish this app included some sort of search feature so one could go back and review a specific topic, like articles, for example.

title: Trip Planner, Travel – Plan&Go
description:
Planning a trip requires a lot of time and effort. You have to keep so many things in your head: itinerary, date and time, transfers from and to an airport, travel expenses, packing lists, address of the hotel, the sights you’d like to visit, the documents you have to carry with you… Sounds quite difficult, right?

No more worries! Plan&Go will help you organize your perfect trip in a few simple steps.

KEEP ALL YOUR DOCUMENTS IN ONE PLACE
Upload the documents you need for every trip right to the app, be it your passport, identity card, health insurance or driving license. Moreover, you can store all your tickets and hotel bookings.

CREATE PACKING LISTS FOR ANY TRIP
Have you ever forgotten your headphones, favorite t-shirt or, even worse, documents at home? Be sure that nothing will slip out of your mind any more: you can create any packing list you need. Whether you are traveling on business or planning vacation at the seaside, you can customize packing lists for any specific purpose.

TRACK YOUR TRAVEL EXPENSES
Unexpected expenses may arise while you are traveling. Plan&Go will help you track all your spendings so that you could allocate your travel budget wisely.

CREATE TRIP ITINERARY
All the tickets, transfers, car sharing services, sightseeing, meetings with friends or colleagues and other activities are stored in one place! No need to check your notes, calendar or daily planner. Just upload all the info in advance into the app, and you’ll always have it at hand.

PLAN A TRIP OF YOUR DREAM
If you are not going to travel right now, you can still create your perfect trip and organize the itinerary in advance or plan your honeymoon. Add the countries and cities you’ve dreamt of, check the monuments, museums, parks and restaurants at this destination, and just wait for the best time to start your adventure!

Get prepared for your next trip with Plan&Go!

Plan&Go Premium:

Plan&Go is completely free to download and try free for 3 days. Plan&Go Premium is a $29.99 USD/year or $4.99 USD/month subscription that provides access to creation of unlimited amount of trips and trip expences. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. This subscription auto-renews at the end of each year term at $29.99 or at the end of each month term at $4.99 for the monthly one. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://cutt.ly/5XYvRmT
Terms of Use: https://cutt.ly/VXYvUkZ
releaseNotes: General bug fixes
reviews: Using it for planning my trips. Works really nice and smoothly. Definitely recommend

title: Plan WeGo - Travel Planner
description:
Plan it.

Are you flying, road-tripping, biking, or hiking? With Plan WeGo, you can consolidate your confirmation emails and trip details in one convenient spot. Just forward your confirmation emails to Plan WeGo and they’ll be automatically added to your itinerary with all the details. You can easily add flights, lodging, rental cars, dining, activities, cruises, buses, or trains to your trip itinerary. It's all there, neatly organized for your travel-planning enjoyment.

Do it. 

Now the fun starts! Document your trip and showcase memories by adding photos, notes, and comments to what is already in your itinerary, and add hidden gems that you discover along the way. Add reviews to your plans to capture your memories and give others insights to wander more wisely. If you choose to share your itinerary while traveling, other community members can comment on your pictures, read your reviews, and travel along.  

Share it.

Sharing is caring when it comes to travel plans. We have lots of sharing options to choose from. Plan WeGo makes it a breeze to share with a co-planner who can edit the trip or share view-only with friends or family. Also, the public viewing option allows others to learn from your experience and get inspiration for their next adventure.  

Features:

- Create a trip itinerary by adding names, dates, and who is traveling.
- Add all the details for flights, lodging, rental car, dining, activities, boat, bus, or train. For example: departure time, arrival time, duration, contact information, and confirmation numbers.   
- Confirmation emails can be easily forwarded to your itinerary so you don’t need to manually enter the details.  
- You can easily plan a road trip, hike, or bike trip too.  Plan WeGo shows your route details.
- Let others know what you think and add reviews to any travel component.
- Share your photos and others will see them and be able to comment.
- Share on your terms.
           Share Public: Anyone with the app can view your trip and get inspired for their next adventure.
           Share with Co-planner: Travel buddies who you invite can fully edit and add to the trip.
           Share with Friends: Only designated friends can view and comment on your adventure.
           Share Details: Text individual parts of your itinerary to keep people in the loop as needed. 

Plan it. Do it. Share it. 
Download Plan WeGo now, and let the fun, inspiration, and connections flow with your new favorite travel planner!
releaseNotes:
- Simplified sharing a plan
- Update share link of premium plans
reviews: App is perfect for planning a trip with lots of people + lots of moving parts. Love the feature that allows you to text important itinerary details such as flights, without having to share the whole trip. | Loving this new app! Planning a big trip with friends and the co-plan option is allowing us to to consolidate all of our travel details and plan together in one shared spot! Look forward to adding photos and reviews on the road!

title: Cheap Flight Finder & Tickets
description:
What are the secrets to booking cheap flights? The real secret to booking cheap flights is geographic pricing. 

Download it now to learn more.

777 airlines worldwide send us last-minute flight deals. Find, compare, and book cheap flights faster than ever before – all from one beautiful app. Download the best flight search and booking app now!

シ CHEAPEST, QUICKEST & BEST

Need to find cheap flights on the go? Save money and time with our fast & user-friendly app. Search and compare 777 airlines all over the world from wherever you are to find the perfect flights at the lowest fares.

シ BEST FLIGHT SEARCH & BOOKING APP

We have won numerous awards as best flight comparison app and are recommended by the fine people at CNN, the New York Times, Mashable, TIME and the Daily Telegraph. With only one tap, you can see which ticket is the cheapest, quickest or best deal. All you have to do is choose and you are ready to travel the world!

シ WE DON’T CHARGE ANY FEES

We search across all airlines, major travel sites and 100 low-cost carriers worldwide, find the best flight tickets and direct you for free to the companies that sell them. It’s free! We are an indie app and dedicated to price transparency for all travelers.

シ 100% SECURE BOOKING


シ HERE’S WHY WE ARE #1 APP FOR BOOKING CHEAP FLIGHTS:

– Book directly from your device
– Beautiful and easy to use – finding flights doesn’t have to be tricky and dull
– Not ready to book? Save your results for later, or share them via email or text

– Find the cheapest travel dates to fly and cheapest airports for your trips! 
– Filter tickets quickly and easily by stops, departure or arrival time, airlines, airport, ticket type, and travel site
– Price calendar helps you find the best fares for your budget by showing the average prices on different dates in an interactive calendar

As a result, we find you the very best possible flight deals, thanks to our hardworking robots. Award winner – our app has been featured on CNN, the New York Times, Mashable, TIME and the Daily Telegraph.

Download the best flight search and booking app now! It's fast, user-friendly & free

I found this in BBB.ORG:
Pattern of Complaint
On September 7, 2017, BBB staff contacted FareDepot.com concerning a pattern in complaints filed with our office.  Specifically, consumers alleged the business failed to provide timely refunds or no refunds on cancelled bookings, failed to honor the original booking price, or the price increased after booking, and failed to provide effective and courteous customer service. FareDepot's customer service manager responded to our concerns stating they were addressing these issues and working to resolve them.  He stated that when a refund "is under process by the Airline or the bank the transfer of funds is not in our control" and that they are working on a different method to satisfy "the customer as soon as possible."  In regards to pricing changes, he claimed that some changes were due to consumers not providing the necessary documents required to complete transactions and that prices changed consistently in this industry; sometimes multiple times throughout the day.  Lastly, FareDepot claimed that some difficulty in obtaining customer service was due to a misunderstanding of their customer service hours.  They are currently adding business hours of 9am to 9pm (EST) through various media channels to make this well known.

BBB would like to acknowledge the recent efforts of the business to resolve outstanding complaint matters and will continue to monitor complaints to discern if the fundamental issues of the pattern of complaints are resolved.  We will periodically update this information based on our findings. | It has been great.

title: Hilton Honors: Book Hotels
description:
The Hilton Honors app has everything you need for the perfect vacation. Book a hotel, earn rewards, plan your trip, and so much more — plus, it's free.

Top app features:
- View and manage your reservations in one place
- Check in before you arrive and go straight to your room (skip the front desk)
- Choose your room prior to your stay
- Unlock your door with your phone using Digital Key
- Book your next trip and find hotel deals

Member benefits:
- Get the lowest price at over 7,000 hotels when you book direct
- Earn Points with every stay and redeem them for free nights and perks with our partners
- Enjoy free WiFi, late checkout, and no charge for a second guest
- Achieve Elite member status and get perks like free upgrades, free continental breakfast or a Daily Food & Beverage Credit, and more

Our brands:
Canopy by Hilton
Conrad Hotels & Resorts
Curio Collection by Hilton
DoubleTree by Hilton
Embassy Suites by Hilton
Hampton by Hilton
Hilton Garden Inn
Hilton Grand Vacations
Hilton Hotels & Resorts
Home2 Suites by Hilton
Homewood Suites by Hilton
LXR Hotels & Resorts
Motto by Hilton
Signia Hilton
Tapestry Collection by Hilton
Tempo by Hilton
Tru by Hilton
Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts

Hilton is an incredible brand but their point system needs a major upgrade. I’m missing 4 stays in the past two years. | I stay at a Hilton property at least one night a month. That’s at least 12 nights a year. This year they downgraded my status from gold to silver. …not really happy about that. THEN the app asked me to turn on “allow tracking across apps” to they can “share” my information to their partners. Yeah, sharing is not caring. It’s selling my information to the highest bidders. No thank you. 

When my car was stolen from in front of the Hilton Garden Inn, in Memphis (Cordova), TN, I got no support from Hilton. Not even an “our sympathy”. | Been using this app for 2 years now and I moved over from Marriott. They do honor their listed room rate and give you the local taxes down to the penny however once you check in they are going to overcharge you. Only thing missing, is a safe, but its Vegas.  Lol. | Hilton always makes it so easy to travel. title: Southwest Airlines
description:
Book a flight in just a few easy steps 
Check in, change or cancel your flights. Plus, add extras like EarlyBird Check-In®. 

Super-Fast Shopping & Booking
Book a trip in just a few quick taps. Use Face ID® to make booking even faster! You can also store your credit cards.

Everything you need to Travel
Get the information you need right at your fingertips on the home screen - gate information, boarding position, flight status, and more. 

Boarding Pass on the Go
Get mobile boarding passes for all passengers on your trip 24 hours in advance. Southwest passes have rich color and bold font, which makes seeing your Gate and Boarding Position very clear. Find the details you need quickly: Flight Number, Confirmation Number, Boarding Time, Tier Status, and TSA Pre-Check. Don’t forget to add your Mobile Boarding Passes to Apple Wallet!

Apple Pay®
Apple Pay® is now available as a payment option in the iOS app! This is an additional option to our other available payment methods - PayPal® or Credit/Debit Cards.

Travel Funds
You can now use flight credits, Southwest LUV Vouchers, and gift cards when changing your flight in the app. Your unused Southwest® flight credit(s) will show  in ‘My Account’,  within ‘travel funds’ section.

Inflight Entertainment
Use the app to take you to our Inflight Entertainment Portal1 where you can watch free live TV2, listen to free music from iHeartRadio2, access free on-demand TV episodes, and view free movies. 
 
1Available only on WiFi-enabled aircraft. Limited time offer. Where available. 2Due to licensing restrictions, on WiFi-enabled international flights free live TV and iHeartRadio may not be available for the full duration of flight.

Live Chat 
Contact our Customer Representatives through Live Chat by scrolling down to Contact Us in the navigation drawer and then tap on “Chat.”

Airport Pickup and Drop-off
Thanks to our partnership with Lyft®, you can now use the app to help you request a Lyft®! You’ll know key information like estimated time of arrival and estimated price before booking. More of a rental car person? You can do that in the app, too.

Cars, Hotels, and Vacations
Use our app to quickly book all of your travel needs. 

Earn Rewards when you Travel
Sign up for Rapid Rewards® and earn points on your flights. Did you forget to add your Rapid Rewards® number during booking? – No worries, add it after booking your flight and earn points. You can then use those points to purchase more flights!
releaseNotes: We've made improvements and fixed bugs for a smoother ride.

title: Marriott Bonvoy: Book Hotels
description:
Book direct and enjoy exclusive offers with Marriott Bonvoy® to take the stress out of travel and find the best hotel deals.

Search hotels, resorts, and luxury destinations across 8,000+ hotels, 130+ countries, and over 30 brands. Join for free and earn rewards when you book with Marriott Bonvoy. 

Unlock extraordinary hotel deals, flexible trip planning, and travel ideas with the Marriott Bonvoy app!

BEST RATE GUARANTEE:
There are few guarantees in life. But our Best Rate Guarantee is one of the best. It ensures you’ll always get the best rate when booking directly with Marriott. 

SEARCH HOTELS, BOOK STAYS, AND EARN REWARDS:
Search hotels and book your travel all within the app. Earn and redeem points for your stays booked directly with Marriott and reward yourself with a vacation.

FLEXIBLE CANCELLATIONS:
Need a last-minute hotel change? That’s why we offer flexible cancellation options to reassure you when booking your next stay with us. Use the app to adjust travel plans with ease. 

CHECK-IN TO YOUR HOTEL ON THE GO:
Check-in to your hotel from anywhere with Mobile Check-in. Let us know when you will arrive, and you'll get a notification when your room is ready.


MANAGE YOUR MARRIOTT BONVOY ACCOUNT:
Check your point balance, view your stay history, folio, and more.

ENJOY EXCLUSIVE MARRIOTT BONVOY HOTEL OFFERS:
・Get rewarded with instant benefits and exclusive perks for Marriott Bonvoy members.
・Marriott Bonvoy also offers free Wi-Fi for Bonvoy members at most hotels.
・Not a member yet? Download the app and join for free.

ORDER FOOD AND DRINKS AHEAD OF TIME:
Order ahead while you’re out exploring. Browse and order food and drinks from your hotel’s menu at participating properties, and it will be ready when you return.

CONTACTLESS CHECK-IN WITH ACCESS VIA MOBILE HOTEL KEY:
・Never worry about losing your key card again. Use your mobile device to open your hotel room and easily access any hotel amenity, like the parking garage, fitness center lounge, and pool.
・With Mobile Key you can get to your room faster. Once opted in, we’ll send you a notification to your phone or Apple Watch when your room is ready.

CONVENIENT WAYS TO CHAT DURING YOUR STAY:
・Mobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel. Available just before, during, and even after your stay, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities, and more while on-the-go.
・Need something? Mobile Requests give you a list of amenities to choose from to customize your stay, or even ask for something you forgot, like a comb or toothpaste.


Marriott Bonvoy Hotel Brands: 

Use the Marriott Bonvoy app to book hotel stays with any of our 30+ brands, including AC Hotels by Marriott®, Aloft® Hotels, Autograph Collection® Hotels, Bulgari®, City Express, Courtyard®, Delta Hotels®, Design HotelsTM, EDITION®, Element®, Fairfield Inn & Suites®, Four Points® by Sheraton, Gaylord Hotels®, JW Marriott®, Le Méridien®, Moxy® Hotels, Marriott Executive Apartments®, Marriott Hotels®, Marriott Vacation Club®, Protea Hotels®, Renaissance® Hotels, Residence Inn®, Sheraton®, SpringHill Suites®, St. Regis®, The Luxury Collection®, The Ritz-Carlton®, TownePlace Suites®, Tribute Portfolio®, W® Hotels and Westin® Hotels & Resorts

We are constantly improving our app to offer you a frictionless trip planning and travel experience. Thank you for trusting the Marriott Bonvoy® App for your travel!

title: Google Maps
description:
Navigate your world faster and easier with Google Maps. Over 220 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of businesses and places on the map. Get real-time GPS navigation, traffic, and transit info, and find what you need by getting the latest information on businesses, including grocery stores, pharmacies and other important places.

Get where you need to go efficiently:
• Find the best route with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents, and road closure

Find important businesses:
• Know what’s open in your area and their latest business hours
• Find local restaurants offering delivery and takeout
• Create lists of your important places 

Get there faster with real-time updates
• Beat traffic with real-time ETAs and traffic conditions
• Catch your bus, train, or ride-share with real-time transit info
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents, and road closure
• With Live View in Google Maps, see the way you need to go with arrows and directions placed right on top of your world. There’s no second guessing or missing another turn.

More experiences on Google Maps
• Offline maps to search and navigate without an internet connection
• Street View and indoor imagery for restaurants, shops, museums and more
• Indoor maps to quickly find your way inside big places like airports, malls and stadiums

Some features not available in all countries

Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Google Maps! This release brings bug fixes that improve our product to help you discover new places and navigate to them.

Flaw is clearly visible when on express lanes combined with normal lanes. Suggest dangerous lane changes which make zero sense. Sometimes suggest dangerous turn with heavy traffic, usually sit and wait for 10 minutes until someone gives way for you. Apple Maps is way better as a software. Google is finished? | For like the last month Google Maps has been running like it’s in offline mode (different voice, less guidance, no street names) even though it isn’t in offline mode. I’ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling, signing out and back in, checking all of my cellular/wifi settings and Google Maps settings, but I can’t see why it’s suddenly different. I’ve started using Apple Maps again for new destinations, it’s too stressful trying to navigate a new place and not being able to hear the street names and more detailed directions. I hope there is a fix for this. | I used to work at Google, during which I used Google Maps exclusively thinking maybe I could help improve it. Recently I switched to Apple Maps, and I can’t believe how much better it is. Every PM, SWE, UX on the Maps team should use Apple Maps for driving directions and compare.

I mainly used the Google Maps app for driving. I’m in the San Diego / Los Angeles area, but the experience is consistent in all of California and when I’ve visited out of state. 

Voice guidance is often late. I might be driving 65 MPH in the left lane and hear “in half a mile, take the exit on the right.”

I often struggle to figure out where I’m supposed to turn when I hear “in one thousand feet, use the left two lanes to turn left on <street>”. Many streets are poorly marked and it can also be hard to see their names at night or in poor weather. Apple Maps says “go past this light, and turn left at the next light”.

Apple Maps in general gives more timely and human directions. I was stunned when I first heard it say “turn right into the parking lot”. I didn’t realize that was possible, having used Google Maps for years.

Sometimes Google Maps stops naming roads. “In a quarter mile, turn left”. Or “in half a mile, take the interchange on the right.” I believe this happens because of IP geolocation—if I use a WiFi that a family member has used via a VPN from Russia, Google marks my account as being in Russia, and somehow this affects voice guidance. I know this because it also affected my internal permissions when I worked at Google. It’s gone on for years. Directions this bad are dangerous.
