title: Packing list by Time2Pack
description:
Tired of packing stress and travel problems? Say bye to forgotten things and lost bookings with Time2Pack! We'll kickstart your journey with a smile. Here's why you'll love us:

• Personalized Packing Lists
Get ready like a pro for any trip! Make lists for beach trips, work travels, or even when you want to bring everything. Plus, our lists are editable, so you can add your custom items.

• Weather-Ready Packing
Check the weather anytime, anywhere, and pack accordingly. No need for heavy coats in warm places!

• Easy Packing & Unpacking
Feeling stressed about packing? Time2Pack makes it easy! Tick items off your list as you pack. We can even help with the trip back!

• Safe Document Storage
Keep important papers safe in our app, even without Wi-Fi.

• Remember Your Trips
Look back on your adventures easily! Share photos and memories with friends.

Ready for a smoother, funnier, and worry-free trip? Get Time2Pack now and travel like a pro, all while keeping a smile on your face! Let's pack!
releaseNotes: We missed a small bug in the previous version, so here we are with an improvement.
reviews:
This app became a game-changer for me. I used to struggle with packing, but this app has made it so easy now! It helps me make lists, check the weather, and store travel docs (I always have a lot of tickets as I prefer to book everything in advance). 
The best part was having all my docs at the airport without Wi-Fi, I could not even imagine that travelling could be so easy!

title: Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker
description:
The world's best flight tracker app - #1 Travel app in over 150 countries.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a live flight tracker and see planes around the world move in real-time on a detailed map. Or point your device at a plane to find out where it’s going and what kind of aircraft it is. Download for free today and discover why millions are already tracking flights and checking flight status with Flightradar24.

• Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time
• Identify flights overhead & see flight information—including a photo of the actual aircraft—by simply pointing your device at the sky 
• See what the pilot of an aircraft sees in 3D 
• Tap on a plane for flight details such as route, estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, aircraft type, speed, altitude, high-resolution photos of the actual aircraft & more.
• See historical data & watch playback of past flights
• Tap on an airport icon for arrival & departure boards, flight status, aircraft on the ground, current delay stats, & detailed weather conditions
• Search and bookmark individual flights using flight number, airport, or airline
• Filter flights by airline, aircraft, altitude, speed, & more
• NEW - view aircraft in 3D with hundreds of new aircraft and airline liveries added.
 
Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are two upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
SILVER

• 90 days of flight history
• More aircraft details, like serial number & age
• More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
• Filters and alerts to find and track flights
• Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
GOLD
 
• All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
• 365 days of flight history
• Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
• Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky
• Air traffic control boundaries that show which controllers are responsible for a flight
• Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions during flight, when available
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS

Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 35,000 ground stations to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration (MLAT), we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. Coverage is subject to change at any time.

CONNECT WITH FLIGHTRADAR24


We love getting feedback on FR24. Since we’re unable to respond directly to reviews, you can contact us directly and we’ll be happy to assist.
• Email (support@fr24.com)
• X (@Flightradar24)
• Facebook (@Flightradar24)
• YouTube (@Flightradar24DotCom)


DISCLAIMER


The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement.

Terms of Service: https://www.flightradar24.com/terms-and-conditions
releaseNotes:
We regularly update Flightradar24 in order to bring you the best flight tracking experience. In this latest update you'll find:
 • Live Activities are here! Follow a flight’s live progress on the lock screen and Dynamic Island (if available). See flight and aircraft details and live updates on the flight’s arrival time and status.
 • Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Enjoy using Flightradar24? Rate the app and leave a review!

Also I would like to be able to filter out the non-passenger flights. | Kind of weird story but I’ve been really scared recently that an astroid will come hit earth, (okay, actually mortified) and this all has helped a lot with my fear. Whenever I hear planes and get anxious that it’s something else, I just check this app and it makes me feel so much better knowing that I’m safe. On a side note, my dad also loves this app. He and I have genuine conversations all the time about what planes are going where and how we didn’t know about certain routes and airports. We both really enjoy the app, especially since it’s free and anyone can download it easily! Your friends will like it. I like it too. | It works pretty good, I like it | The best app to track planes for a plane lover like me!!!!!!!!! | I love looking at the sky and seeing an airplane and getting to see the plane it is what airline operates it I will sometimes look up my friends flight and showing it to them this has inspired my interest in flying and I am just 11 and I love this app | Sluts | Love planes and this is a very accurate app for flights! | I love aviation and this is the PERFECT game for me | This app is amazing and I would consider giving it a five star but one time there was a plane right over us but it would render even though we lived at the same place were it was going to. But even though that plane didn’t appear on radar I can’t believe how many other planes It knows are near us. Probably someone and many others put years of work and much more Into this app, bravo. title: Blink Travel
description:
Blink Travel is your best way to inspire and plan your journey: a one-finger visual discovery of attractions, food, and experiences.

Each Blink Travel guide includes:
- Most instagrammable places
- Top attractions
- Food, art, and district tips
- A beautiful interactive map
- Step-by-step itineraries

What you get:
  - The best attractions to visit
  - The best local activities and authentic things to do
  - Selection of typical food of the area and associated restaurant 
  - Step-by-step guided itineraries
  - Exclusive and secret things to do for your journey 

It's your best tool to:
- Plan your trip to a new destination
- Help you discover the best restaurants for each typical dish
- Meet and chat with locals and travelers in your destinations

Destination available in Blink:
Amsterdam, Assisi, Bali, Barcelona, Berlin, Bologna, Cairo, Cape Town, Capri, Chicago, Châteaux of the Loire Valley, Cinque Terre, Croatia, Emilia, Ferrara, Florence, Formentera, Genoa, Graz, Hamburg, Helsinki, Hong Kong, Ibiza, Jamaica, Jerusalem, Kyoto, Lake Garda, Lake of Como, Lisbon, London, Los Angeles, Lucca, Madagascar, Madeira, Madrid, Marrakech, Matera, Miami, Milan, Moscow, Munich, Mykonos, Naples, Nepal, New York, Norway, Paris, Perù, Philippines, Pisa, Prague, Portugal, Ravenna, Rhodes, Rome, Salento, San Francisco, San Sebastián, Santorini, Sardinia, Sicily, Siena, Singapore, Stockholm, Sydney, Thailand, Tokyo, Trieste, Turin, Vancouver, Venice, Verona, Vietnam, Zanzibar

And we're opening new destinations every month.

Every week we have multiple free access guides, that help new users to try Blink for free.
A subscription is required to access city and destination guides.

Blink Traveller Subscription:
After subscribing you get 3 days of a free trial, and then a purchase will be applied to your App Store account on confirmation. The subscription grants access to all destinations currently available and future releases during the subscription period. The subscription will automatically renew unless canceled​ within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.  ​For more information, see our privacy policy and terms and conditions.

Terms: https://www.blinktravel.guide/terms
Privacy: https://www.blinktravel.guide/privacy

title: Transit • Subway & Bus Times
description:
Transit is your real-time urban travel companion. Open the app to instantly see accurate next departure times, track buses and trains near you on the map, and see upcoming transit schedules. Use the trip planner to quickly compare trips - including options like bus and bike, or metro and subway. Get alerted about service disruptions and delays for your favorite lines, and save frequently used locations for trip directions in a tap. 

HERE’S WHAT THEY’RE SAYING
"Gives you the best route to where you want to go" - New York Times
“You won't realize how much time you can save planning until you use this app” - LA Times
“Killer app” - Wall Street Journal
"MBTA has a favorite transit app — and it's called Transit" - Boston Globe
“A one-stop-shop” - Washington Post

AND HERE’S THE WORD FROM PUBLIC TRANSIT RIDERS
“Your app was the deciding factor in selling my car.”
“Blows Google Maps out of the water.”
“The head of our local transit agency recommended this app over the one her agency created.”

 6 GREAT THINGS ABOUT TRANSIT:

1) THE BEST REAL-TIME DATA
The app uses the best transit agency data sources like MTA Bus Time, MTA Train Time, NJ Transit MyBus, SF MUNI Next Bus, CTA Bus Tracker, WMATA Next Arrivals, SEPTA Real-Time and many more. We combine that data with our fancy ETA prediction engine so that you get the most accurate real-time info possible for all transit modes -  including buses, subways, trains, streetcars, metros, ferries, ridehail and more. Prefer to travel on two wheels? With GPS, you can see live bikeshare and scooter locations right on the map. 

2) TRAVEL OFFLINE
Bus schedules, stop locations, subway maps and even our trip planner are available offline.

3) POWERFUL TRIP PLANNING
See fast and easy trips combining buses, subways and trains – the app even suggests routes that combine multiple options in one trip like bus + bike or scooter + metro. You’ll find great trip plans that you never even considered! Don’t like to walk a lot or use a certain mode or transit agency? Personalize your travel in the settings.  

4) GO: OUR STEP-BY-STEP NAVIGATOR*
Receive departure alarms to catch your bus or train, and get alerted when it’s time to get off or transfer. When using GO, you’ll also crowdsource more accurate info and real-time ETAs for other passengers– and rack up points and thank yous for being the most helpful rider on your line.  

5) User Reports
See what other riders have to say! With millions of users contributing, you’ll get helpful info on crowding levels, on-time performance, the closest subway exits, and more.

6) Easy Payments
Pay your transit fare and buy bikeshare passes directly in the app in over 75 cities. 

*continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

300+ CITIES INCLUDING:

Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Buffalo, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Hartford, Honolulu, Houston, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Louisville, Madison, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Nashville, New Orleans, New York City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Providence, Portland, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, St. Louis, Tampa, Washington D.C.

1000+ PUBLIC TRANSIT AGENCIES INCLUDING:

AC Transit, Atlanta Streetcar (MARTA), Bee-Line, Big Blue Bus, Caltrain, Cap Metro, CATS, CDTA, CTA, CT Transit, DART, DC Metro (WMATA), DDOT, GCRTA, HART, Houston Metro, KCATA, King County Metro Transit, LA DOT, LA Metro,LBT, LIRR, Lynx, MCTS, MDOT MTA, Metra, Metrolink, MetroNorth, Miami Dade Transit, MTA BUS, NCTD, New Jersey Transit (NJT), NFTA, NICE, NYC MTA Subway, OCTA, PACE, PRT, Ride-On, RTD, SEPTA, SF BART, SF Muni, Sound Transit, SORTA (Metro), St. Louis Metro, TANK, TheBus, Tri-Met, UTA, Valley Metro, Via

SEE ALL SUPPORTED CITIES & COUNTRIES: TRANSITAPP.COM/REGION

**Questions or feedback? Browse our help pages: help.transitapp.com, email us: info@transitapp.com, or find us on X: @transitapp**
releaseNotes:
The eclipse has passed. The sun has incinerated the last remaining snowflakes of Canada’s winter. Which means Montreal’s super cyclists have escaped from their exercise-bike-equipped basements and taken back the smooth tarmac of Circuit Gilles Villeneuve from the F1 racecars. Sometimes we ride down on our fixed gear bikes to watch the roadies pedal in circles for hours and hours in their skintight suits, like they’re training to be the prettiest horse at the Kentucky Derby.

Back home at Transit HQ, we’ve made the usual spring cleaning adjustments, and more:

- We’ve added bikeshare fare info to the app (in select cities, more to come) so you can see how much a ride on those metal tanks will run you
- New iOS emojis have been christened and added to our GO nickname generator
- Real-time data for nearby lines should now load a picosecond or two faster (by prioritizing downloads for visible lines first, and then downloading real-time for ones further away as you scroll down the list of lines)
- Other bug fixes and aerodynamic improvements

Rate us five stars to put Sriracha in the roadies’ bike bottles for extra motivation.

title: Trip.com: Book Flights, Hotels
description:
Trip.com is a ONE-STOP travel platform where you can access everything you need for great trips with loads of TRAVEL DEALS!

Get Trip.com NOW to get a perfect trip!

#Detailed Features List:

BOOK HOTELS AND FIND GREAT DEALS ON AMAZING STAYS!
On Trip.com, you can browse stays to suit your tastes from a total selection of more than 1.4 million options worldwide. Whether you're in the mood for a money-saving apartment stay or a luxury 5-star hotel, a cozy holiday inn or a fun-filled resort, it's easy to find the right accommodation.

BOOK FLIGHTS SEAMLESSLY WITH NO BOOKING FEES!
Flights to around 5,000 cities worldwide are available in the Trip.com app. Pick your preferred class – or even book a chartered flight! The Trip.com app lets you filter by price, flight duration, travel time, airline, or number of stops. Pick a multi-city itinerary, and you can even fly into one city and out of another. With Trip.com it's easy to find your perfect flight.

BOOK TRAINS ACROSS THE WORLD, EASILY!
On the Trip.com app, you can now book trains for mainland China, Taiwan, Korea, UK, Italy, Spain, France, and Germany. We connect directly with train information centers for updated schedule information and prices. Our app lets you search quickly through available fares, saving you time and money.

RENT CARS AT THOUSANDS OF DESTINATIONS WORLDWIDE!
Rent cars on Trip.com and choose from all makes and models. With Trip.com, there's no need to drive the same car twice. Don't worry if your plans change, most cars can be booked flexibly with free cancellation.

BOOK TOURS AND TICKETS ON TRIP.COM AND SEE THE BEST OF YOUR DESTINATION!
From a trip to the Great Wall to a one-day Dubai stopover. Visit Disneyland, get skip-the-line passes for the Louvre, or take off in a hot air balloon. Whatever experiences a destination has to offer, you can find out what's happening and book your tickets, all on Trip.com.

BOOK AIRPORT TRANSFERS EASILY.
When you book airport transfers with Trip.com, your driver will be kept up-to-date with your flight schedule, so you can travel worry-free even in the case of flight delays. Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before your scheduled pick-up time.

TRIP.COM: YOUR PERSONAL TRIP ADVISOR.
Trip.com is more than just a travel app where you can plan and book your next trip - it's a global community of travelers. You can share Trip Moments with like-minded adventurers, and get inspired by others in return. You can also find exciting travel lists and gourmet recommendations showing the best of everything from food to local activities.

Get Trip.com NOW to experience the seamless one-stop booking process and let your next adventure begin!

#More about the Trip.com app:

TRUSTED GLOBAL SERVICE:
- 20 different languages with payment available in 31 currencies
- 24/7 global call center with rapid response time
- 24/7 global SOS emergency response and Natural Disaster Relief Fund
- Trip.com service guarantee

Book with Trip.com NOW for great deals and service.

Have a good trip!
releaseNotes:
We've been working hard to improve the Trip.com app, to make sure you have the best trip possible. Here's what's new:

【IT Trains】
Most tickets on the official Trenitalia and Italo websites can be booked on Trip.com. These tickets cover more than 90% of routes within Italy, as well as cross-border routes between Italy and France, Switzerland, and other destinations. Enjoy the convenience of real-time train info and e-tickets, and book in advance to save on fares. Plus, when you book trains in our app, you won't have to pay any booking fees.

【Trip Map】
Finding your way between airports, hotels, stations, and attractions too chaotic? Make Trip.com your travel assistant. Trip Map is a DIY feature you can use to visually display travel routes. Just tap to view your personal map, distances, and itinerary times, and even optimize your route.

We hope you love our new app version. If you need help or have any feedback, feel free to contact our online customer support or leave an app review.

Have a great trip!

The Trip.com Team

title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable.

Pick from a wide range of products that the Uber app has to offer including: 
- UberX: Affordable rides, all to yourself
- Uber Green: Eco-Friendly
- UberXL: Affordable rides for groups up to 6
- Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom
- Comfort Electric: Premium zero-emission cars
- Uber Pet: Affordable rides for you and your pet
- Black: Luxury rides with professional drivers
- Taxi: You now have the option to request a cab or a taxi on demand using Uber in select cities
- 2-wheels: Find a scooter to start riding roday 

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival.

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.

- UberX Share: UberX Share connects you to other riders headed in the same direction. 
- Group Rides: Share the journey with friends.
- Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride. 

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 6% Uber Cash back on eligible rides and a $5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. 

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS AND HAVE THEM DELIVERED TO YOU
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. You can have a rental car delivered to your door at the time and location of your choice with Valet, currently available in select cities.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favorite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience and pet supplies and get them all delivered. 

Uber Connect: an easy, same-day, no-contact delivery solution that allows people to send items whether it’s a care package for a loved one or an item you sold online.

Transit: Say goodbye to complicated time schedules, hectic transfers, and unexpected waits while reducing your trip’s emissions.

Uber Charter: Book high-capacity group rides in vehicles seating 14-55 passengers, such as limo buses, luxury vans, and coach buses.

2-Wheels: Did you know you can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app?

Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber Hourly: Keep a car and driver with you for hours. 

Uber Car Seat: Uber Car Seat provides one forward-facing car seat for a child who is at least 2 years old, 22 pounds, and 31 inches tall.

Get Started Now! Download the Uber app and create an account today. Uber is available in the following cities: Boston, DC, LA, New York, San Francisco, Vegas, Orlando, Chicago and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber.
releaseNotes:
We update the Uber app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve localization across the app
- Various bug fixes & improvements
  
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber engine running.
Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.

title: OpenTable
description:
The OpenTable app is your one-stop-shop for everything dining. Download today so you can:
Find more ways to dine with tables, takeout and experiences
Scan restaurant menus, photos, and millions of verified diner reviews from over 50,000+ restaurants worldwide
Find the best of your city (or plan your next trip!) with our editorial guides
Streamline your booking experience with new features such as direct messaging with restaurants and hot table alerts
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using OpenTable! 
In addition to bug fixes and performance improvements, our latest update includes the ability to use the OpenTable widget to see bookable restaurants and upcoming reservations directly from your iOS home screen.
reviews:
Easy to use. | Sang is the most courteous and professional server we have ever had.  She goes out of her way to support customers and she always treats her runners and hostesses with dignity and positivity like they are part of her team.  This is probably why we see them happy to run around to compliment her service and support.  We also notice that she always provides round trip service to all the tables in her section.  Her hands are never empty.  Her attitude must be a reflection of the management and how they treat their servers and staff. | It's our favorite for special occasions.  We drive 2 hours to get there. Out of all the Japanese steakhouses, we like Brandon the best and also Kobe is the best place we have found compared to other Japanese restaurants that are available | Beep bop boob I’m here | Not sure what happened to the iOS app but mine stopped working and just goes into a “oops” and refresh loop.  I’m on the latest iOS and latest update of the app.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled it and still not working.  Tried to report the issue but can’t seem to do that either.  I have to use web browser to make reservations and it keeps trying to open/relaunch the app on my phone. | Sitting single ladies in the back away from other guests is not a good way to develop clientele. The food and drink were good and prepared uniquely and well but were a bit overpriced. The banquette seat was too low for the table. The applied decorations are several steps below the exquisitely original, restored finishers. Too many staff not properly dressed/trained for the advertised experience. | The sign in process for this app is really frustrating. 
First, you have to provide your phone number, then they send you a verification code. Once you  do that, then you also have to sign in through your email, which they send you another verification code for, but you can’t cut and paste it.

It’s like the mobile experience was total after thought. | Best tuna tartare in town | Love using the Open Table app. It’s very informative and greatly helps pick restaurants that you can enjoy. 
Thank you ! | Easy to access. Easy to use. The reservations are honored | Love it. | Go-to app for fine dining experiences | Craftway in Plano has amazing food and the staff is really friendly. They portray professionalism on so many levels if you haven’t eaten there, you should. It’s a great place for happy hours and other occasions this year we celebrated on the patio with the staff for the solar eclipse. It was really amazing and we really enjoyed it. It’s one of my favorite places to be I can’t express enough how great the food is. | Open table has changed the way you sign in.  You no longer need a password but it wipes your account clean.  I have had them for yrs and now my points are gone and they indicate they can’t find my email account that was tied to the at which is the same account they responded to me via email.  

I had accumulated over 5000 and now they are gone. | Amazing food, This restaurant has a great vibe, really great service. The staff is super friendly and very knowledgeable. The  best restaurant in Fort myers and the surrounding area hands down. | I’ve been trying to login for days. It keeps telling me to check my email for a code but the email never comes. I had to call the restaurant to make the reservation because the app is useless. | I have never had an issue with Open Table at an established restaurant. I’ve used it in other states as well. 
Wish Kitchen Social would join! | 4/20/2024 on vacation got food poisoning At Lombardo’s that we paid dearly for and this makes for a great trip kids throwing up, you throwing up, everyone pooping to death thanks to this place Lombardo’s!  A man reaps what he sows, read the Bible! This place should be checked out for poisoning people! This is a safety hazard to guest tourists and the community! | We had a great time! The wings and margs we delicious. Great happy hour too! | Easy app | Jesus <this app | Had to go through 3 rounds of verification to log in today. Hope this doesn’t continue. | Terrible verification authentication to book a reservation at a restaurant.  It’s easier to call the restaurant and book. | The system doesn’t allow you to add notifications and does not show up in the Apple notifications options. Sadly sticking to Resy to go on waiting list until it’s resolved. | You state you give points for my last 4 meals and you are not giving my points | It’s been awhile, but Morristown’s Restaurant Week got us back to Freddie’s Friday night. Because I waited too long to reserve, we took an early 5:30 seating. We were guided to a sectioned area of 5 tables where my wife and I were seated at a 4 person table. Very comfortable. And to our surprise, next tabled was shared by Freddie himself entertaining two old friends. 
And it got even better after that because we ordered our dinner. Took advantage of the MRW special. From beginning to end, it was delicious. Presentation was beautiful. Service was perfect. We’ll be back soon.
 And BTW, Freddie asked us if we knew any $$$ people who may want to invest in his heart’s desire, a fish restaurant. Well…if it ends up like Morristown’s Freddie’s, are you in?😉 | Open table has been my go-to app for dinner reservations for a decade. Otherwise, I get the impression that this business favors the restaurants over the consumers. | Why does it ask me to log in from the app every time on my phone? | This app for some reason doesn’t let me make reservations. I make reservations and it doesn’t allow it to send to the restaurant I’ve tried multiple times and only once it worked.Fix the issue please! | After enjoying excellent cocktails starting the best calamari anywhere, the manager came out to apologize because the chef and he decided that the dish I ordered was not up to par tonight. He suggested I order something else and he would comp my entree. I ordered the lamb chops and they were fantastic. I’ve never had that happen before. I’ll be back. | Just as the TITLE indicates, Easy & Convenient! | As a non-tech person, I appreciate how easy Open Table is to navigate, as well as how it remembers me from reservation to reservation.  Going out is a rare treat for my friends & I; knowing we are expected takes stress & waiting out of the picture.  Thanks! | The chat bot couldn’t answer my question, but never gave me contact information for support. I also could not find this info on line. Finally, it appears that there is No way to change a password | Was very disappointed at last visit for dinner. 
No meat… no steaks or fish were available. 
also, really miss their tri-tip steak salad which is no longer available. | Love to use this site to make reservations, it’s easy and I’ve never had a problem. | I have lived in this neighborhood for over 20 years.first place I think of. Food is delicious as is staff. | Impossible to cash in rewards points.  Tried to get in touch with a human to discuss problem, good luck with that.  Resy is going to kill OpenTable (more restaurants are going to Resy from OpenTable). | Just open the APP and scroll to what sounds interesting…discover new places that welcome you. And if you already have a favorite, almost all are using Open Table. Love it! | Reservations are a snap, plus if you repeat a location, your notes are saved. Even changing reservations or canceling is easy. Don’t know what I did without it! | I love booking via open table. We always get a special seating attention when we reserve via openable. | The app won’t let me proceed unless I write a review, which is annoying | This is is super accessible, accurate and easy to use. Will definitely continue using!! | When I go to get code I get kicked out of the app. Not user friendly! | Why do I have to pay round table to make a reservation then have to call the resturant to make a cancelation. Shouldn’t the cancellation be done through round table? | This is a very good site. Easy to make reservations and get confirmation 
Excellent | Good service and nice atmosphere.  But the tuna in the salad wasn’t fresh.  Very disappointing. | Once I set the date, time, and cuisine, it only gives me a few moments to scroll through the requested list before it resets and gives me a list of all cuisines and I have to redo the whole filter. | Open table has decided they need to make more money from your data. Going forward they will require your first name and picture made public whether you like it or not!  I deleted all my reviews and will never leave another. | I made a reservation and they changed the time to I couldn’t make. It was a special event I had planned and there wasn’t even a comment or an explanation given. I just woke up and they moved my reservation without any other time available now. Disappointing.

title: Tours & Travel - Multidaze
description:
Planning your trip is simpler than ever. 

With Tours & Travel you will get:

- +5,000 FREE Travel Guides
- Street Maps
- Public Transportation Maps
- Daily itineraries for top destinations worldwide

title: Waze Navigation & Live Traffic
description:
Waze is a community driven navigation app that helps millions of users get to where they’re going through real-time road alerts and an up-to-the-moment map. Thanks to our network of drivers, Waze saves you time by instantly alerting you to traffic, construction, crashes, police and more. From traffic-avoiding reroutes, real-time safety updates and low gas price alerts, Waze is a community of drivers helping other drivers.

With Waze you…

Get there faster: traffic-avoiding route updates
Avoid tickets: know where police, speedcams and redlight cams are located
More accurate ETAs: based on live traffic, construction, weather and more
Community-based navigation: real-time updates from other drivers
Save money: find the cheapest gas along your route
Avoid tolls: see toll pricing when you choose a route
Use Apple CarPlay: sync Waze to your car’s built-in display
Live Speedometer: get alerts when you’re speeding and avoid costly tickets
Customize your drive: get directions from your favorite celebs and characters
No app switching: use your favorite audio apps right from Waze

Drive safer and smarter, with Waze!

You can manage your in-app Waze Privacy Settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

Waze directions are not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles.
releaseNotes:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed a bug so you can still see your route even if you lose internet connection.
reviews:
Been using for years and still annoying trying to do what should be basic stuff | Loved Waze UNTIL I didn’t. It took me to a mountaintop in the Smokey’s to ‘save time’. It didn’t tell me I’d be on the highest mountain. Deathly afraid of heights. We were scared barely made it down. Then, took us down a road that was closed. Literally, a piece of the road was cut out. It was dark, scary, barely saw that the road was cut out. Tank was on E. I hate Waze I still have nightmares so do the kids. | Hgg | I want to use this app but I don’t know if enough people even use it still | Recently HOV lane has been added to my navigation when driving. Vehicle type is set to private, electric vehicle is turned off and no HOV/passes are selected to be removed. | I love the app. Was a long time Google Maps guy and reluctant to make the switch. After a week or two of use, I couldn’t believe I didn’t switch sooner. I also like how you don’t have to have an address plugged in and still able to get all the traffic alerts. | Reporting:
A recent update removed the option to report animals on the side of the road, and roadkill. This was definitely useful and I hope they bring it back!!

User interface:
They also recently changed the layout of different report options and while I understand they’re trying to make things easier to report while driving, I had gotten used to where the buttons were so I used to not need to look at my phone to report something. But now it feels like it requires more of my attention since the buttons are all in different places. Would’ve preferred smaller changes over a longer period of time.

ETA/Best routes:
I feel like recently my ETAs have been less and less accurate and I don’t know why. I have ‘personalized ETA’ switched on and it used to be very very accurate. It has been taking me on routes that end up adding time to my drive as well.

All in all, I am NOT happy with recent updates. I used to love this app and would use it for my everyday commutes to avoid any unexpected traffic, but now Apple Maps seems to be a better option. Hope they fix things soon! | This app does not know how to give you directions to the left side of the street. it’s so weird that the only directions I can give you is going around the block when you can just turn left. | This last update screwed up my shared voices. Now I get a default voice and not my downloaded voice when I start my drive. Some of us like to listen to other voices and not the default ones. This is what made Waze the best Traffic/GPS. Now you are taking it away? Allow us to use our downloaded/custom voices! I submitted 3 tickets and no one has responded. | Changes my mood with every wake, sometimes my car icon, please fix otherwise great | regular user here. It never works when I try to set it to go home; it always freezes the screen, and it's necessary to close the app. This issue started after the last update. I've been a loyal Waze driver for more than 14 years, and this has never happened before. I drive 200 miles a day, and I hope you guys get it fixed soon. | Tells us to go one way when the other way is 20 minites quicker. DO NOT LISTEN TO WAZE | The voice stop working on the app. Can you fix the bug. Other than that the app is great | My family and I love Waze!  We all have it on our phones.  I love all the new voice options.  Makes drives more enjoyable.  
I do, however, wish there was a way to disable when on AppleCarPlay.  When I am just running to the store and not using the app at all, I don’t need a notification where the railroad tracks are. | I can’t sign in with Google or any of my emails. Please fix I want to use your app | I keep having to restart my phone and open the app again……  it keeps saying I’m invisible and won’t let me report things….. the only way to fix it is to restart my phone and then it works for a little bit. Otherwise love the app! | Несколько дней назад при начале поездки перестали использоваться кастомная озвучка | No widget, most recent update deleted my self recorded directional voices,  when I use the app in some remote areas as I head to clients it is woefully inaccurate ( Google maps and Apple Maps are now both better). Waze is now almost at delete from my phone status after YEARS of preferring it. Developers giving it a slow death. | I’ve used Waze for years, both in the U.S. and in Europe. I don’t want a sound, just a voice alert. I wish the developers would allow you to choose what sound you want but no, you’re stuck with the default sound which is annoying. Still glad to have this app and though its mapping system isn’t perfect it still is better than Google. | This app needs a disclaimer - “DOES NOT WORK IN BOSTON”.  That is all. | Just get it so good for my kids and me | Removed ability to see multiple routes after you start the drive. Big L, loss of main operability and benefit of driving in congested areas | Excellent with route information and great at routing around slow downs. But why can’t a program with access to this much map information deal with time zones when it comes to computing ETA’s. | Longtime user of Waze who recorded custom voices for each set of instructions and alerts. While I enjoy the app, I can’t tell you how much disappointment the most recent update brought by using bell dings replacing the alerts previously provided by voice. | This is one of the best apps i have used | I can no longer find this voice 😡 | The new update has overridden my custom voice direction settings with your default voice. What’s the point of that option if your system is just going to cancel it out? | Waze should do better design the app to better serve EV car users. | I’m going back to the house to go to the gym with the girls for the night so I’ll let you know if you want to come over and help me with the stuff I need to do for you and me and I will be there in a few minutes if you want to come over and help me with the stuff I need to do for you and me and I will be there in a few minutes if you want to come over and help me with the stuff I need to get you done | *** UPDATE*** Finally figured out how to keep this app from restarting itself and draining my battery. 
I deleted the app! 
The last straw was close the app. The time highlights blue again. The app is open. Closed the app. Time highlights blue again. Five times in a row then I deleted Waze. 
NO MORE PROBLEMS.
I don’t need Waze tracking my path from my kitchen to my bathroom. Why does the app keep restarting itself? When I shut off Waze through CarPlay it continues to run. Close the app on my phone it continues to run. Wondering why my battery is dying? Waze started up again. When it use it’s ok. To get it to stop sucking up battery I nearly have to restart my phone. Fix it so it shuts down when desired. | App is fantastic but gets two stars for one reason alone- STOP changing my route without asking! I purposely choose the toll free routes so I don’t spend an extra $8 driving to and from work everyday, and the app switches back to it without asking! Unless you’re going to start paying my tolls for me, this needs to stop. | I use this app a lot to get places. The only problem is you have to be careful especially when driving in the country. A lot of the areas I go to involve going through dirt roads and sometimes it misleads you or makes you go longer alternate routes. The only other problem I’ve had is that it won’t delete my history. I tell it to remove old drives from history and it won’t do it. I have to literally uninstall the app and reinstall it to clear it. | For no reason.  SMDH. | i really wish you can add what apple maps has. | Just noticed today (4/18/24) that the alert for “Hazard Ahead” is no longer a woman’s voice but a soft ding. Sounds like my vehicle is alerting me to something seriously wrong. When in fact it’s the new alert that there’s a car on the side of the road. After eight or so years of using Waze and being accustomed to certain alert sounds,  is you’ve changed it so much I don’t know what it means until I take my eyes OFF the road to read the silent alert. It’s pretty irritating.

title: Travelzoo Hotel & Travel Deals
description:
Find a great deal -- wherever you are, wherever you go -- with the free Travelzoo® app for your iPhone or iPod touch. Use the app to plan your flight and book your hotel, then once you’re on vacation, use it to find a deal for dinner, a spa day or fun activity. Join 30 million people worldwide and discover the latest travel, entertainment and local deals uncovered by our global team of Deal Experts.
 
With the Travelzoo iPhone app you can:
- Browse and purchase exclusive travel, entertainment, dining and spa deals directly on your phone, and save up to 65%
- View and redeem your vouchers on your phone
- Discover deals near you for hotels, restaurants, spas and events, mapped to your location
- View the latest Top 20® -- Travelzoo’s weekly best-of-the-best list of travel, entertainment and local deals
 
The reviews are in:
- 5 stars from our subscribers
- "App of the Week" by The Guardian, The Sunday Times and the Sunday Mirror
- "Top pick" by Travel + Leisure
- "...help(ed) take the stress out of a vacation" - SmartMoney
  
Get exclusive deals in these international app editions:
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Canada
- Spain
- France
- Germany
- Australia
- Japan
- Hong Kong
- China
 
Feedback
- We welcome your input. For any issues found or improvement requests, email suggestions@travelzoo.com.
 
In Asia Pacific, the Travelzoo business is operated by Travelzoo (Asia) Ltd. and Travelzoo Japan K.K. under a license agreement with Travelzoo Inc.

title: Township
description:
Township is a unique blend of city building and farming! 

Build your dream town! Harvest crops, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with distant islands. Open restaurants, cinemas and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world. 
Are you ready to build your dream? Let’s get started! 

Township features: 
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town 
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories 
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill 
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
● Exotic goods brought from the islands
● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals 
● Famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more! 
● Play with your Facebook and Game Center friends or make new friends in the game community! 

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's "Restrictions" menu. 

*You need an internet connection to play the game and enable social interaction, competitions, and other features.* 

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile 
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile 

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to township@playrix.com or check our Web Support Portal: https://playrix.helpshift.com/webchat/a/township/?p=web&contact=1 

Privacy Policy: 
https://playrix.com/en/privacy/index.html
Terms of Service:
https://playrix.com/en/terms/index.html
releaseNotes:
Get ready for a new update!
It's getting hot in Township!

Two adventures with Richard!
* Magic is in the air! Help Richard find Ellen in a magical wonderland. Complete tasks and get the characters through all the perils to win an impressive reward!
* Join Richard and a smart speaker for a top secret investigation! Your mission is to find and apprehend a trespasser at a secret scientific base. Solve the mystery of the base to win a great reward at the end of the event!

Season Adventures
* Travel to an ancient world! Spruce up your town with bright thematic skins and dress your chickens in chitons to feel like you're in ancient Greece!
* Buckle up for Spy Games! The Stealth Aircraft skin and Secret Agent cow outfit will help you set the stage.

Also
* Plant the new Lavender crop!
* Build a Bridal Shop for all the brides in your town!
* Enjoy a new town expansion.
