I also enjoyed the fact that you didn’t need to keep spending money, it takes longer, but still possible. HOWEVER, when I went to open the app yesterday, it would no longer load on my device. Instead, I received a message that my device was no longer supported with the new app release. As a result, I lost EVERYTHING, my progress, my rewards, and right before I was about to earn the 2nd phase of the Camping Event decoration. Really disappointed in this development team for not letting people know that certain device compatibility would no longer be available with the newest app release. If I had known, I would have synced the game to my social account to save it. I also reached out to their support team and have not received a response. | The game is so fun! Nice job creating it. 
                       The only thing I like to do at night. | Love this game but I’m very impatient so building this seems to take a bit long for me. | lol | At first it’s relaxing. You feel like you’re accomplishing some little goals and building your town. Before you know it you have to have ridiculous amounts of numerous items that your barn can’t hold. So then it takes forever to make progress. Not fun anymore. Boo. | Love township! | This game is kinda fun but I like robux betteRRr because thê ADDS area fake and Roblox is Nop a play to win | Its so relaxing and there’s no ads | I love this game it is so good ! I love it so much it is awesome! | Another micro purchase game where after the first few levels, everything you need to continue the game (without waiting days and days to get materials through random chance) must be purchased through real cash. It also is NOTHING like the AD that they posted that made me interested in the game. 

These type of developers are the worst off their kind. I wouldn’t be surprised if these are the same developers for Airport City. Another game you should avoid at all costs - unless you enjoy spending lots of money to play a game on your phone. | Iam having fun with daydreaming about real life was so real | I saw this app in a ad and it is not like the ad at all so just keep in mind that.
Other than that it’s a great game! | The game is not as advertised 
This is like FarmVille but a little bit more boring.
I was hoping for the advertise game where the character walks around collecting stuff then expanding, disappointed | This game can be frustrating! Does anyone else feel like Deja Vu. Like I swear I worked my town and I am doing it all over again while time is running out? Then I never finish my airplane or train because what says it takes 1 hour turns into all day to make.  How can this be right?
The only thing I like is you actually earn dollars I stead of other games where you earn them twice a year.  I do like that, but seriously if I work my town, let it save and if it says 1 hour dont make it run 4..  very frustrated!! | Got based on ad, I have yet to see anything like the ad. Stupid game click bait type company. | This game is really easy and fun | I really like this game but there are a lot of ads and I don’t like when you come back in to the game after a while and gives you so many games to go play it is really annoying after a while | I’m sick of the updates | I wish I could skip or fast-forward the regatta recap each week, it takes too long | The game it self is fine. Like any other farming game but the ad for it is fake, false and not like the game at all. In the beginning the game is fun but once you go on you have to spend actual money or hope you find the things you need for quests or to upgrade houses/farm things it gets to get old real fast. Since they updated it, it's also full of ads. Not worth playing | Building your town is fun | Ok people I have had this game for over a year and so today I had 96$ (aka) township money and so I spent it all on the 200$ grand prize at the mine and guess what just guess what I got nothing because I had 6 more tasks to go and so the reason why I am mad is because you would need around 200$ to get 200$ and so now I have nothing so please do not get this game I used to love it and play every day and I am now at level 40 but now I am going to delete it but for the people that is reading my report, I hope this gives you an idea of what this game is and so thank you for your time. Goodbye AND VOTE FOR TRUMP PLEASE WE NEEEEEED HIM BACK OR ELSE WE ALL WILL BE BANKRUPT

title: Fly Delta
description:
Welcome to Fly Delta, Delta’s award winning iOS app. With our dynamic Today screen which provides quick access to your boarding pass and other important day-of-travel information, Fly Delta makes travel easier than ever before.

• Enroll in Delta's SkyMiles® program and earn miles every time you travel
• Find, compare and book Domestic and International flights
• Book SkyMiles award tickets
• Purchase Delta Comfort+™ seats and Trip Extras, including in-flight Wi-Fi, Priority Boarding and more
• Reserve Preferred Seats like bulkhead and aisle
• Rebook cancelled flights or missed connections
• Manage your trips, profile and customize your travel preferences
• Check your SkyMiles account balance and current Medallion® status
• Check in, view your boarding pass and add it to Apple Wallet
• Pay for checked bags and track their location
• Check the latest flight status and receive flight and gate change notifications
• Save a photo to remember your parking spot
• Check your status on the upgrade or standby list
• View or change your seat
• Locate Delta Sky Club® lounges
• View interactive airport maps, public transportation details and weather information
• Get detailed info about our fleet and partners
• Map flights en route with an interactive flight tracker
• “Today” gathers everything you need for your day of travel into one convenient place
• “Notifications” ensures you always have the latest flight updates, gate changes and more
• View countdown to departure and arrival along with gate and baggage carousel information on Apple Watch

The Fly Delta app for iPhone and delta.com are always free to use on Delta’s Wi-Fi-enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.

When downloading the Fly Delta app, you agree that your personal data will be processed in accordance with Delta’s Privacy Policy which can be accessed via the link below or on our website at delta.com.
releaseNotes:
•	Copying your SkyMiles and Confirmation number is easier than ever - just look for the copy icon.
•	Expanded support for pre-select menus to partner airlines.
•	Continued enhancements to streamline the check-in process.
•	Minor enhancements & bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.
reviews:
Wasn’t a connection issue because it worked fine on Safari…but never loses the check in or itinerary on either trip which rendered the app nearly useless… | App is just ok.  Nothing great!  But you better not lose your account credentials.  The forgot ID and forgot passwords links never work.  You never receive a response from the host to reset.  If you lose your credentials you will have to setup a new account with a new email. | Please bring back flight times on main page of flight information. It’s annoying to have to click to know when the flight leaves as some people may also want to consider that when booking…not just price and travel time | I am unable to add my flights to my calendar from the app unless I give the app full access to my calendar.  Delta does not need to know when my next dental cleaning appointment is in order to add flights to my IPhone calendar.  So then I looked at the data the app gathers and it’s an abusive data grab.  Health and wellness information is gathered from your phone by the Fly Delta app and is tied to you. The list of data they gather and match to you is extensive but the health data is the best example of what appears to be Delta’s attempt to mine your data because it’s valuable.  In now going yo have to figure out how to delete this app from my phone and still get what I need done when I travel. | The Best | App kicks me offline after airplane mode and will not let me reinstall or open | I have always enjoyed playing Delta and I’ve had very few problems with them. However, they have the worst Internet service of any airline I have ever flown on virtually useless other than getting your email. Sorry that’s the way I feel. | I am currently sitting at my gate (fully checked in and through security), but the app still says that I am unable to check in. Luckily I have paper boarding passes, because the app is unable to show my boarding pass at all.

Additionally, my earlier flight had a gate and seat change that the app did not show, which led to confusion during boarding. | This app and the Delta mobile experience is objectively terrible. I conducted a heuristic evaluation of this app one year ago for UX design school assignment and compared it to JetBlue, Hopper, and Kayak, which offer much better experiences for flight booking and management. Delta is still bottom of the barrel. Mobile web checkin is so problematic and the app isn’t much better. It is basic UI/UX design and engineering. Why can’t you get it right, Delta?? | I checked In online and my boarding pass was stored on the app.  I was first in line to board FIRST CLASS.  
The boarding pass vanished!  People behind me were in a long line to board. 
The app demanded my password and fingerprint ID.  
My password is stored, not memorized so I was not able to log on.  
The desk agent had to print a boarding pass and I was last to board.
This was embarrassing, frustrating and stressful. | Why have an app if it’s so nonfunctional that you still have to do everything through a web browser? | Since the last IOS update, the app doesn’t bother to show flight times when attempting to book a flight. Have to either click on details, or break out the PC. Tried deleting and restoring, powering off the phone, airplane mode…

Trash. | I have had an account with Delta for 3 years. Got kicked out and had to re login. They tell me my information is wrong (it isn’t) and I have to do forget password/username. I do that and never get an email. FRUSTRATING. Haven’t had this problem with United! | Main cabin seat selection merely a game for delta employees to play with passengers. The app has a diagram of a plane with seat which are not selectable and the information not real time and likely made up! I suspect Delta is overbooking their planes. | Kept sending me multiple updates about my seat being chosen and my boarding pass being ready but everytime I went to go confirm my boarding pass it would say there was an error. Totally disliked this app | Delta is my favorite, and preferred, airline carrier, to the point that I work towards status every year. Their app is my least favorite of the major carriers. It is incredibly slow, glitch, and not as functional as its competitors. | Can't even get it to work. I tried contacting customer support to add games but instead they made me book a flight to Dallas, Texas. Now I'm in the middle of nowhere, everyone's looking at me funny because I'm wearing a rainbow shirt, and I can't even play Kirby Tilt 'n Tumble. Waste of time. | The flights are on time by and large, the staffs are great as well as their customer service. You don’t see that in other airlines. | Delta is what the other airlines wish they were. They are competent professionals in their line of work. Consistently knowledgeable and helpful.They always know the mission. The other side of that is what American Airlines provides. When I have to fly American Airlines, it always feels like everything they do was designed, and organized by incompetent toddlers. They do NOT know the mission. It’s not the employees fault, they are people trying to make a living and have not been given the proper training or pay for their positions. I would definitely blame upper level management. DELTA- is the Chic-Fila of the skies- minus the chicken. Thank you for holding up your end of the bargain. | Only allows you to add the outbound flight to your calendar. Add an easy way to add the return flight to my calendar. Your stupid today view doesn’t show arrivals times. It doesn’t show when I’ll arrive at my destination. For some reason using the app makes me phone brightness go way up. When it’s dark this feature is BLINDING! Give me a warning or something. Or in dark mode delay it. YIKeS! Ouch! | Most of the domestic flights have been great to us but when we have international flights more expensive in the front that’s when we have few things can be better but that’s okay. I have to write u and U have to read millions of our reviews and work with us. All
In all is a great service and greater airline. ✈️✈️ | I get that the electronic boarding pass reads easier when the screen is brighter, but I shouldn’t have to be blinded every time I load the app within 24 hours of a flight. It’s bad enough that I don’t open the app on the day of a flight until I absolutely need the boarding pass. | Much easier to manage than before 💯 | I always feel confident when I book. A flight with Delta. Thanks for the consistency and high standards.
Aaron | Would like to give a shout out to Angel who was the flight attendant in first class from SLC to Fresno on Sunday 04-14.    Very personable.  Said each persons name.  Went and got the biscotti cookies from coach when a passenger asked for them.  Got me a couple extra packs of gummies.  Said good bye to all when we left.   Helped put luggage in closets that did not fit.  I could go on and on but just know she was super during a turbulent flight.  

Also the pilots kept us well informed of turbulence and the impact it would have on beverage service so the flight attendants could be buckled in.   Eliminates some of the complaining.   

Great crew making for pleasant flight 👏 | Apparently I’m the only one incompetent of making this app work. But it will not let me login! Then, when I go to reset my password, it won’t let me. I keep clicking submit over and over again and it won’t work. | Thanks to this app, making checking in or any changes to my itinerary possible in a breeze! | Used to be a easy fast app to switch seats, I travel a lot and now it literally takes about 50-60 seconds to load the seat map. Poor experience! Everything else seems fine. | I specifically reserved the two seats with window/aisle.  Why do I now have seats in the center of the plane? | I will avoid Delta’s new flights as much as possible now.  I am a female, 5’3”, weigh 118 and could barely get to the window seat even with no one else seated in my row.  Uncomfortable red-eye flight.  No room for legs even for me.

Also, the flight attendants on my earlier flight were average at best. | I wish there was a section where I could look for last-minute flight and travel deals through the app versus having to go online and look that route. As a loyal customer, I wish this was an opportunity. | App is ridiculously slow to update. Checked 3 times on my connecting airport for the new gate. Every other web operation I did was quick. Not Delta. Caused me a needless walk of a literal mile out of my way. Don’t trust the app. Check the board. 

Also frustrating check in. Why do I have to confirm the info already stored in sky miles MULTIPLE times when I am logged in???

Typical of the overall delta experience of the absolute minimum service possible and where we can, we’ll charge you more for the privilege of the frustration | Att: Customer service Supervisor! 

Please send a message to the supervisor of our AMAZING inflight flight attendant on your international flight! 
We had the absolute best experience as a first time customer on your airline on our international flight from Germany 🇩🇪 back to USA 🇺🇸 Atlanta based flight crew. The crew member Especially “David Diver” & Iris was Extremely helpful ! Completely impressed with this crew member! Wow! Exceeded all expectations! We felt we were given First Class service in coach! We had previously flown on Lufthansa & the food & services were below par your food & services far above the rest! Wonderful experience! Pure joy & loved this crew :) A million times thank you! Please share our comments with Flight attendant David Diver! His caring attitude towards passengers brilliantly demonstrates how important hospitality is! Grateful for everything! 
Thank you:) 
Sincerely, 
Cheri Robell & Bri | Delta never disappoints. Great service. | Over the course of nearly 15 years I’ve brought my business to Delta, buoyed by the perceived rewards and customer service that being a SkyMiles member brings. I recently had to cancel a ticket I had recently purchased, only to be charged 200.00, and lose 20,000 skymiles. And for what? To cancel a flight that was a month away, that creates no actual inconvenience for Delta, the computer age and the internet have made airport booking easier than addition on a calculator. I called hoping to find some reason, some rationale, thinking the thousands and thousands of dollars spent over the years, the years of SkyMiles loyalty would matter. Instead I get the same, familiar script. My mistake of picking the wrong day, for a flight a month away, was going to penalize me $400. Thanks to this, I have no reason whatsoever to opt for Delta in the future. At a time when it’s difficult to make ends meet, and prices seemingly increase daily, how on earth do you justify these kinds of penalties? Shame on you... Joe Holt | Delta change the seats. We had booked out over a month in advance. Claiming that when the aircraft changes the computer switched everybody seats. Even though this was an identical aircraft. So the agent moved us to a more preferable location and that is not the seats we got when we got to the airport. Very disappointed in this policy.also on the flight from the United States to Japan. Service of beverages was minimal at best. I don’t think I would choose to fly Delta again overseas. | Always an excellent flight | App for iPhone:
The info is not updated automatically. I need to kill the app and relaunch to see any updated info such as gate or seat numbers. | I travel most every week and will always choose Delta. I get to where I need to go one time and always fly with the best Delta employees | The application is very slow and not user-friendly. It's difficult to find key data and it doesn't even show the baggage claim number like the United app does. The whole app needs to be sped up and easier to see all of the key information. | Excellent.   Like it very much | Seems to be the easiest and most functionalmkf all the airline apps 🤷‍♂️ | We use Delta Airlines exclusively! I have been flying Delta Airlines from Detroit to Houston mostly! With a Cancer diagnosis and treatments for not only myself but our Daughter. We fly from Detroit Michigan to MD Anderson frequently for treatment and diagnostics. The entire Delta Airlines crew from customer service, to airport staff, and especially the Airplane crew have always gone above and beyond for us. Outstanding job to all! 

Mrs. Avra 
Michigan | Had to repeat often when we thought we were already checked in | For every flight, staff take great care of passenger who needs wheelchair for distances and must check folded scooter and walker. They offer assistance at every step including bringing carryon from wheelchair at plane door to passenger’s seat and making sure airport wheelchair arrives at connections. They make disabled person and companion feel safe and free of worry that things will go wrong. | Super easy and fast. Recommend!! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 | Last time I flew Delta I was harassed by a gate agent and I only received $55 voucher which may as well have been nothing. | Dear delta airlines I’m sure there are many people who write reviews expressing there thanks I truly hope so. I do not fly very much and would like to express my personal thanks,  so I’m taking this time to write something nice for someone to feel my genuine appreciation for what you all do for a career.🙂 I’m sure everything will go according to plan an would like to say thanks ahead of time for everyone’s hard work and and attention required in doing so. Dear delta airlines you rock and this is me saying thanks for a great ride and see you again on the  20th for my return trip 🙂 | Easy to use except for getting birthdate. Should be easier to get to | It is very frustrating that you can be confirmed on a flight and seats are available but you can’t select one.  I booked a flight yesterday for a flight today and it wouldn’t allow me to do so and I had to wait 45 minutes in line to get a seat assignment and although comfort showed to be available I couldnt upgrade.  That flight due to weather missed connection and I am starting all over with now having two more flights tomorrow with no seat assignment. It adds undue stress to travelers especially when you can see the available seats. You can do better.

title: Travel Town - Merge Adventure
description:
Explore Travel Town, where you can combine everything into better and more useful items while you travel the world!

Reveal secrets as you discover yourself and help the friendly people of Travel Town!


TRAVEL TOWN FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects through hundreds of levels!
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 2 of a kind evolve them into more superior items!
• Fulfil the missions of the townsfolk to unlock more amazing items!

== Meet New Villagers ==
• Discover 55 villagers who live in Travel Town, and help them restore their seaside town!
• Match objects to upgrade them and unlock more and more items to support you on your journey!

== Town Building ==
• A storm has ravaged Travel Town - Collect coins and bring the town back to its former beauty!
• Discover and upgrade dozens of houses and improve the town beyond your wildest dreams!

Follow Travel Town on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: facebook.com/TravelTownGame/
Instagram: instagram.com/traveltowngame/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html

Questions about the game? Contact us in the game by clicking on Settings > Contact Us
Our support is also ready and waiting at:  https://support.traveltowngame.com/
releaseNotes:
Welcome to the latest update of Travel Town!
We’ve been busy improving the game and addressing bugs for you. 
Enjoy!
reviews:
I like the challenge of the various producers as you progress during the game. You have orders to fill. There are various ways to produce the order requirements, including automatic producers. Automatic producers release items, into adjoining cells, every few minutes and don’t require energy. The only thing is some of the producers used earlier in the game, are never used again. So they just sit on your board or take up space in your limited storage. I would have given a higher rating but the Daily Challenge is impossible to complete if you’re employed or have a life. | I like this game, I just wish they would bring back the delete button for the bubbles, it’s annoying that they’re just floating around taking up space. | I quite enjoy this app and spend hours at a time | i was really excited i played it for a few days to complete and offer and i reached over $140 to cash out and now it tells me i have to get 15 clicks in a referral link, invite 6 friends, complete 6 games, and now get up to $220. | Absolutely love this game | The amount of clicks doesn’t match the number of energy decrease. Please fix | Ok so I love this game and don’t mind spending more here or there to buy diamond to keep playing 
However, the first 2 purchases were ok but my last 2 they keep charging incorrect price for things. I just bought a 80 pack of diamonds which is 1.99$ and they charged $6.49 which is absurd. And the previous time before this I bought the 5.99 pack and they charged me $10.82!!!! Very disappointing and such a scam, I will absolutely not spend a dime more on this game. | My game will load to 97% and then it will stop loading. I’ve reinstalled it restarted and restarted my device and it still will not load. | The tutorial was making me tap the bucket to add it to my board but my board is full but bc the tutorial was making me doing a specific task it won’t let me tap anything outside of that bucket. This is horrible pls normalize a skip tutorial button on every game 👎🏻 | It’s a really fun game but getting energy takes so long. You have the option to purchase diamonds and energy, which I don’t do since the value for your money isn’t good at all. Once you get to higher levels it can take multiple days just to complete half an order. I’ve been trying to get to a sandwich sticker for one half of an order and I’m on day 3 and I’m now finally getting close! That’s with winning energy, completing daily challenges, trading diamonds for energy, and honestly I’m kinda addicted to the game now lol so my energy doesn’t just sit there so I’m using all I get. If I had spent money on packages for energy and diamonds to try to get this sandwich sticker I probably could have bought quite a few real sandwiches by now. Why would it take a minimum of $10-$15 dollars to get enough energy to get half of an order in higher levels!? Yall think we’re millionaires don’t yall! | It’s unplayable without spending money for more energy. | I like this game, it’s entertaining.. but the daily challenges are ridiculous.. what do you mean I have to make 15.5k coins a day? It’s impossible considering you can only receive 4 orders at once and there’s no “reward boost” in some sense.. I think you should reduce the challenges goals for the players to be able to complete most of them. | Very Fun and satisfying game | Yet another, it’s fun at the beginning but now you need to spend money in order to have energy to continue, or wait 5-6 hours to play again. Don’t waste your time. | It’s a good game but when it was full I couldn’t get out of it anymore, is that a bug? | Only bad thing is u can’t stop playing lol! | I love this game!!! | I’ve only just gotten to level 30 and have been playing this game for 3 months. You really can’t  get much done without buying energy because it’s so difficult. | I’ve played this game for about 2 years. It’s a great game, and super fun to play. However, with the recent updates, it looks more like a kids game. The changes in some of the graphics make this game look like it’s for toddlers. It’s made me want to limit my game play, and I would prefer it to look the way it did before. | Used to be a lot of fun. And probably still would be, IF I COULD PLAY IT!! For about the last two months it won’t load. It gets to 36% and that’s it. And I updated it, still won’t load. | One of the better merge games for the simple fact that you just have to merge two things which makes merging flow faster, especially when you have to merge the more complicated stuff. | This is a great game to play. I find myself it’s been an hours on it. I also find myself spending a lot of money on this game in order to achieve and complete some of the tasks that you have, but what I come across is that you don’t get any of the cars that you need to complete decks and it’s very discouraging, especially since I spend a lot of money playing this game. | Stupidly addicting game! I honestly don’t even know why it’s so fun but there’s a certain thrill when you complete a high dollar order! Daily challenges could be easier to hit without spending money and it’d be nice if more than two trades a day. And possibly a way to trade gold cards. | This game is truly designed to make people want to spend money to complete challenges. If this is problematic for you, I suggest to never start playing this game. It’s also designed to motivate you to get on your phone often since certain ‘free producers’ will ‘unlock’ after certain intervals. Even while doing stuff like this I rarely was able to complete daily challenges. This creates a habit of hopping on your phone more throughout the day, and an intentional ‘just a few minutes to use up my free producers’ can turn into a landslide of time if that ends up unlocking energy points for you to use. Time better spent with family and friends. The creators have mastered the art of dangling a carrot from a stick in front of someone. If none of this makes sense. It absolutely will after you’ve played a few weeks. | This game is very flawed and unfinished. It’s as if they spent their entire time on the look of it and only 10% on the actual game itself. 

5 stars for having great fun graphics and being an enjoyable game. But the cons outweigh the pro resulting in the 2 stars.

I feel as if the game’s real objective is for me to spend money. Which to be fair, most games are. BUT this game in particular makes obvious to where you can’t enjoy the game without spending money. When you play you’ll know exactly what I mean. 
The amount of plays & gems they give are unrealistic and if you want to continue to play, you HAVE to spend money because there isn’t any other way to gain more. Similar games at least let us watch ads to get more ! Or gain virtual coins to buy gems. 
Compared to other similar games, this had the best graphics but I deleted it because realistically, you can only play for about 5 minutes because im not spending money on games. & Even if you did, it’s still only another 5 minutes of play time. | I like this game. Reasonably challenging and fun to play. However, you collect card packs to win prizes. The game won’t let you collect all the cards unless you pay. It won’t even let you complete half the packs. It just gives you the same cards over and over. | I love this game, I’ve been playing for years.  There is a BUT, but you will spend money if you want to finish the events. This game has started fights with my spouse because of the amount of money I have spent on this game. And the crazy thing even when I spend the money , I still don’t finish the event.  If they can fix the money trap  it would be great game. But that’s how they make their money . I had  to delete the game to save my marriage. Lol | This game is so cute to play. Honestly you play and just get into such a innocent game you just relax playing it. I use it as a way to just tune out for the few minutes and get me back together lol and go on to the next responsibility I have to do. | The game was fun at first…, but now it has too much going on. It takes way too long to get coins, make builds, and move to the next level—it forces you to buy coins and diamonds to get anywhere. Accessible at first, then definitely aims for you to make purchases! Don’t play!! | The game was very fun and addicting. Now we have to spend a lot of money to achieve a goal. I don’t understand when you need to complete a certain order with the rare items they never come out. It’s starting to seem like a scam. Not enough energy and it doesn’t refill fast. May be deleting soon. | This game was so fun at first... When things didn't take over a million energy's to complete. There's absolutely no way at this point to successfully accomplish anything without spending actual money... Which unfortunately I've done way too many times. It's kind of crappy that when you wait out the time to gain the free energy it only gives you 100 and stops, I feel the higher you get in the game that number should go higher too considering 100 energy's doesn't get you far at all- it's literally gone in 15 seconds. Then you have to wait hours to get it back to 100. There should be more opportunities to watch videos for free items and turns as well. I'm not saying it should be EASY, I just think it wouldn't be so discouraging if it were EASIER.
I've also played the little games to try to win free stuff on the Facebook page everyday and haven't been successful with that either. | I really only see one major flaw with this game being one I play for much longer: trading cards is too difficult. Most of the other games I play with trading between friends makes it easier in that I don’t have to go to a third party (Facebook) to find people looking for cards. 

Collections for friends should be accessible to view and gift from their profiles. I suggest looking at other games which have done this well. 

Also being able to form clubs to have a side quest/game/card request would be great, but not as necessary as the first suggestion.

Thanks for a cute and fun story, with gameplay that is interesting! | I really like this game. It keeps me entertained  the only thing that bothers me is you run out of energy fast. When you’re higher in level you almost have to spend real money to progress  other than that it’s great. | Graphics that weren’t broken were updated to straight cartoon goofiness. Bugs too many to describe have popped up, and now my game won’t even launch all the way. You’ve lost an avid fan. | GOT TOLD I WILL GET 750$ GIFT GARD FOR SHEIN IF I PLAYED TIL LEVEL 14 ITS A LIE DONT DO IT
YALL | If you find a site saying you can get free Pokécoins (pokemons go currency) by playing this game til level 10…. It is a scam. There is no content locker, support leads you in circles. Its a scam. Mediocre matching game. | My board was full and it told me to add another bucket onto it, i cant because the board is full. tried resetting and reinstalling the app but nothing has worked and im still stuck at the pop-up forcing me to add a bucket to the board. (edit): A skip button popped up and it doesn't do anything. | I really enjoyed it. It is very easy to play and you don’t actually have to buy anything to keep progressing. | Compelling game, but it takes too long to load and often shuts down in the middle of play. Frustrating! | I’m going back in a | I have to have my | Great visuals and quality but you can’t play this game for longer than 5 minutes or progress at a decent rate because of the limitations on energy. Actually so frustrating that this is just a cash grab and way to force people to watch ads to do anything in the game. I would be willing to watch ads if it was clear that the game was developed for enjoyment but it clearly is designed for the owners to just give player 2 minutes of play for them to get you to watch 8 ads. Just disappointed that we can’t just have a freaking game anymore. | I can’t stand how we can’t trade gold cards or trade more than 2 cards a day. This is why I’m kind of playing less😞! | The game doesn’t even load all the way up anymore | I downloaded because of the fetch app (I needed to earn points) but now I forgot about the fetch app and just look this game up everyday. | This game is so addicting! I can sit and play it for hours ! | Get ready for endless pop ups to wade through before you even begin game play. Then get ready for endless disappointment as you realize the only way to achieve things requires buying more gems. This game is a money pit and became more annoying than enjoyable before I deleted it. | This game doesn’t allow to trade with other players to send more than 2 sends a day.  There is no special gold cards trades.  So it’s hard to obtain gold cards or trade with other people.  I am about to give up on this game. | Love the energy boosts | Addicted to this game

title: United Airlines
description:
Meet the United app 
 
From planning, to booking, to day of travel, we’ve got you covered.  

On our app you can: 
• look for flights across our global network and book them easily for yourself, or your friends and family
• check in for your flight and get your boarding pass before you get to the airport
• change seats, or flights, if something better becomes available
• make sure you’re prepared for your trip with our Travel-Ready Center
• add your bags, drop them at bag drop shortcut, and track them along your journey
• use our built-in terminal guide to find your gate and navigate the airport with ease
• watch movies, play games, and pay for inflight snacks and drinks while you’re in the air
• enroll in MileagePlus or manage your MileagePlus account and use your miles to book award travel in our app
• talk, text or video chat with an agent if you have any questions about your trip
• figure out your next move if your flight is delayed or cancelled
releaseNotes: We continue to make enhancements to help make the app easier to use and provide more consistency.
reviews:
The United app is not as simple and user friendly as others.  Go see Alaska Airlines app for a good example of an easy to use and good layout for an airline app. | My seat was moved last minute and I paid for premium and I am now not sitting with my husband ! | Trying to make money off a seat selection by separating families, horrible business practice | Why so many issues? | I love how seamless it makes flying. Very intuitive and helpful in unexpected but appreciated ways. | United needs to update their software system to include hyphenated last names!! | I spend more time on the tarmac than in the air whe I fly United. They are never on time and they are always sorry about being late. Stop apologizing and be on time for once! | Great way to check in! Easy to check in 2 people | The app won’t let me edit my frequent flyer mileage number therefore I am not receiving credit for my trip! | Thanks for upgrade to first class | No help,mercy,or apologies for destroying a vacation and dumping you off far from home!
They also continue to torture you by randomly changing times and seat assignments .
I’ve flown FBO and air cargo better than this airline.
I have 186 million views of my reviews on Google .
Hope they enjoy what I will be writing while I am trapped at this hellscape of an airport! | I have never been on a United flight that hasn't been enjoyable. The staff is courteous, kind and super attentive. I travel with my 23 year old daughter with Downs Syndrome and I can't say enough about the genuine concern that United employees have shown her. Thank you so much for making a travel experience that can be stressful so worry free. | Very efficient. Easy to use. | Go do I purchase a seat for $129 and it changes when I get to the airport | United explorer holder disappointed about seating row 47 | Very boring and very unhelpful user interface | Been trying for three hours to check in and your impossible app keeps me going around and never finishes the process.  I’ve scanned my passport 10 times and keeps sending me back to the first screen | My family will NEVER be doing this again!!   So yes I fly to economy.  Yes a lot of airlines charge for a checked bag, but NOT for a CARRY ON!  They won’t even let you download your boarding pass to your phone unless you have paid for a carry-on or checked bag because all they allow you to bring a purse.  Who travels with just a purse??? unless you’re going and coming home the same day which is highly unlikely if you’re flying over a five hour period.  I had to play a feed to make sure I didn’t have a middle seat going there or coming home and could not pay them in one fee and then had to pay $40 in two separate transactions equaling $80 to check a bag. If I wanted to carry on my bag, it would be $99. so my flight ended up being about $200 more than the price listed. if I knew this was the case I would’ve paid an extra hundred dollars to fly with an airline who takes care of all their passengers and I am simply able to download to my phone a boarding pass, let alone not have to pay for a carry-on. so I had to give them my credit card number not once not twice but the six different times and this was over the phone. needless to say, I will not be going through this headache again the agent I spoke with name was ICE she of course, said she understood all this and agreed on most of it. | As a 150+ day per year traveler, I need to be able to change my reservations more frequently than I care to think about. United new app with some of the terminal specific updates is really helpful when I need to squeeze 26 hours in a day. | United knocked it out of the park with their app. It’s easy to navigate, easy to use, doesn’t have overly complicated security access, and have every possible link and tidbit of information a traveler might need. | The flight was delayed from ATL but was able to arrive in Denver on time. The flight had no gate ready and sat on the ramp for 40 min. Causing us to miss or connection. | I have to wait a long time to check in, navigate the pages, etc. a good 20 seconds or more. | Changing the UI to hide flight credits and make people manually enter information the app already has available/used to autodisplay is…a choice. | My check-In process was excellent.  My passport was successfully scanned and documents approved within minutes. | Please indicate in the app to people using a ride share service that drop off is on the fifth level. I had one of your premiere members scream at me over level six rather than level five. | App was draining my battery despite disabling cellular/background refresh. App was NOT in use for travel related activities. Deleted app and battery drain/use is back to normal. | UA51 on 4/22 Flight was delayed for 4hrs causing our following train connection arrangement and travel inconveniences. | Boarding passes should be listed on the Home Screen for each flight. Trying to find them is a nightmare. | I have been on a few flights since getting this app and it has not added my mileage since the first flight.  
Also, I went to look for a receipt for baggage and it is telling me the 1st bag was free each way, so I cannot get a receipt whatsoever. 

I am very disappointed as I may have to pay back my company for the baggage, and I should have many more miles than what is shown.

Very poor coding on this app. | UA has the best airline app of all airlines for employees flying non-Rev!  It is the easiest to navigate and link your mileage number.  It is also the most dependable! | Normally the app is great. I rely on it for everything I need and it anticipates what I need. My only suggestion would be to not move around the things that we might look for like baggage tracking. However I think I hit a bad bug this morning. 

I had a flight yesterday and checked in via the app. That flight went as expected. I also had a flight today and checked in yesterday before I had completed the trip I was already on.   This morning, I went to check the status of today’s flight and it (and two more future flights) were missing. I was able to log in on the web site to get my information and add it back to the app but my confidence in the app has been shook. 

I tried restarting the app several times but have not tried rebooting my phone yet or uninstalling/reinstalling the app. My iOS is up to date. | Excellent flight and excellent experience over 40 years of flying with United.
Thank you so much! I’m so impressed! | my app has stopped opening on my macbook even after the updates | App won’t let me edit spelling of my name. Can’t speak to a human for assistance. I spelling h discrepancy causes delays at airport | All day I was not able to check into my flight. For a major airline to be down all day is 3rd world. From a million miler. | Shame as it was a descent app but developers appear to have dropped support for iPhone 8+ which is limited to iOS 16.7.7. Trying to keep older phones out of landfills. Be nice is they still supported older iOS like all other developers. | United treated my luggage very poorly.  Worse I’ve ever seen.  Damaged my luggage.  The flight to Destination had no tv nor any internet.  Very bad experience. | The on line version and iPhone app both make make it very difficult to get a mobile boarding pass. | Are all United app updates mission critical to patch flaws or new must have features?  Probably not.  But we are forced to update almost every week before we can “use” the app to book a flight.  Imagine you need to have new tires or seat belts or an oil change every time you drive your car.  If they can’t get it right the first dozen times there is clearly something broken like your BA planes! | I felt like the airlines has deceptive practices. There are many underlying fees and everything is extra. I had to check a bag and pay for it. I brought a carrying so I won’t have to check a bag but apparently the r only ticket I bought requires any carry on be checked. | Stopped working a while ago. Tried reinstalling, updating iOS, but nothing works. Been like this for several versions of the app already | It would be nice if you could select checked bags and select “military on orders” without having to pay $40, since it shows bags should be free. | I’m traveling with my elderly parents and my father who was just diagnosed with Parkinson’s. I called to ask if we would need to check in our carry on since they were basic economy. We do not want to check in luggage. Rachel was so wonderful in getting my parents closer to the front of the plane. And helped me understand we do not need to check anything in and are each allowed a carry on and a personal. It’s so nice to be able to call and speak to a human and get such wonderful service. My family and I love United Airlines and we don’t fly any other airline!!! You’ve always taken great care of us and we thank you for that!! Keep doing what you do and give Rachel an award!! We give her 10 out of 10 for her communication and patience!!! 
Thank you! | Worst app, user unfriendly. United needs to look at American Airlines app. AA app has lots of info, you can share your trip, and doesn’t keep asking the same questions. Do better United. | I went to check in for my flight and discovered I was not allowed a carry on bag. This was NOT mentioned while I was booking the flight. You need some transparency a little earlier on. It took me all morning on the chat to find out that even my mileage plus account was meaningless. Do better United. | This app is garbage. No synchronization across the app. Clunky interface. Slow. Doesn’t provide notifications for flight updates. Frustrating to get to the correct page in the app. | On line check ins have always stressed me. United’s check in leads me step by step with clear instructions. Yippee, I can do it and get home. Not bad for an elderly traveler. 😊 | Every chance you get you hit me with another charge.    I’m sick of it. | Flight request was amazing. They were very polite and courteous as  as made sure all my needs were met. | You need to add terminal A or C this could cause some issues for flyers

title: Weather - The Weather Channel
description:
The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster**. In addition to our daily forecasts, hourly details and 24-Hour Future Radar, you also can personalize your weather preferences from skin health to air quality index forecast and more.  

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Track air quality and wildfires in your area. Severe weather is increasing across the nation - our severe weather alerts have you covered.

Plan up to 15 days in advance with forecasts from the World’s Most Accurate Weather Forecaster, so you can plan ahead with confidence**. Manage personal weather alerts, so you receive notifications that are important to you.

Download The Weather Channel to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.

The Weather Channel Features:

Today’s Weather Forecast:

- New personalized weather tracking for wherever you are including, uv index, pollen count, humidity & more
-  15-minute forecast for rain intensity up to 7 hours in the future & radar on your homescreen
- Check weather forecasts up to two weeks in advance!
- Prepare for severe storms & hurricane season
- New Air Quality Index forecast

Widget & Homescreen Features:
- Our smart widget offers more weather in detail at a glance and one-tap access to the forecast
- Check your local radar, get severe weather alerts in your area, and check the forecast for the next three hours on your homescreen

Additional Features:
- Detailed information on sunset times and allergy & flu forecasts
- Keep informed with the latest weather news
- Stay prepared during extreme weather events, hurricanes, and earthquakes with live breaking news alerts
---
Upgrade to The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience available. Exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced 72-Hour Future Radar
- and more!

You can cancel The Weather Channel subscription anytime through your iTunes account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Privacy & Feedback
•Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy
•Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html
•If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at iphonesupport@weather.com

**The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster. ForecastWatch, Global and Regional Weather Forecast Accuracy Overview, 2017-2022, https://forecastwatch.com/AccuracyOverview2017-2022, commissioned by IBM.

*The World's Leading Weather Provider: According to Comscore, The Weather Company, parent of The Weather Channel, is the largest provider of weather forecasts worldwide based on total monthly unique visitors in 2020. Comscore Media Metrix®, Worldwide Rollup Media Trend, News/Information – Weather category incl. [P] Weather Company, The and [M] Weather Channel, The, Jan-Dec. 2020 avg.

The Weather Channel app had an average of over 35 million combined smartphone monthly active users worldwide from March through October 2021 according to internal analytics. Over 2M total 5-star ratings out of over 3.0 million total reviews since January 2018 according to Apple’s App Store Connect.

The Weather Channel® is a registered trademark of The Weather Company, LLC 2024
releaseNotes:
We've heard your feedback and added new features including a new Activities Forecast. The Activities Forecast tells you when conditions are ideal to get outside and do what you love. Activities supported for this update include Running, Cycling, Tennis/Pickleball, Golf, Camping, Hiking, and Gardening. Check back soon for more updates.

Our new design is loaded with insights and features that connect the dots between wellness and weather:
-Help protect your skin health
-Monitor air quality and breathing conditions
-Track pollen, manage your allergies
-Prepare for flu season

Plus, now the app can be personalized
-Prioritize the weather data most helpful to you
-Save and name all your favorite locations
-See more editorial content that inspires you

Of course, you’ll still have quick access to daily forecasts, hourly details and 24-Hour Future Radar.

What in the weather are you waiting for?
Be a force of nature.
reviews:
I’ve tried nearly every other weather app, and this one is by far superior. All the info is there is an aesthetic, condensed view.

However, I would say 9/10 times, when I open the app, it is the laggiest app ever and crashes my entire phone. This is the reason why I’ve tried nearly every other weather app. But all the others are missing some piece of information, where this one has it all. 

Not sure if it’s because I have an older iPhone (SE first Gen) so it can’t handle the app, or what it is, but I keep putting up with it because this is the only app with all the info I want. | No portrait mode on the newest version, the layout is also terrible. Uninstalled already!! Hate it now as most longtime fans! Won’t install back until the iPad version feature the portrait mode | settings are worthless.  I pay a premium price to be notified of stupid weather that is supposed to be “OFF” ?!?!  How dumb am I !?!?  My notification settings are presently set for weather related warnings in my area ONLY !  Instead, I get onscreen prompts to look at weather channel reporting I could give 2 shts about.  I am positive this is intentional on the part of the weather channel because if it wasn’t for those who paid to have this app, none of these shtass stories would be seen by anyone. !!  And yes I have reviewed my notification settings !! | I do not like the new look. The radar screen takes 80% of the space. Looking for another app | Poorly designed app with conflicting colors, small fonts which leads to eye strain. Info is scattered thru out the app. There is no watch app. Subscription has been canceled. | Weather alerts are useful, but the gloom and doom junk science alerts that get delivered multiple times each day have become pathetic and are pure rubbish. | Unreliable does not even load in time to look at the weather and is very much inaccurate. Will tell you 0% chance of rain when other apps say 30 or 50%. | I am so tired of The Weather Channel pushing climate change in their stories. Please stick to reporting the weather and not push an agenda. | I want to first start off by saying the weather channel widget is arguably the best in its class as far as weather goes.  Being able to glance at my phone to see if rain or snow is on the way is really nice, however…with this new display that was released you can barely see the rain on the daily/hourly forecast and I keep mistaking the sun displayed as lightning, please fix this. | The app is horribly riddled with ads to try and force you to pay for premium. You can’t even look at anything at all without ads constantly popping up. | Simply unusable. Confusing interface. Hire new designers please. | The base layout of the screen, which I haven't discovered a way to modify, is absurd. Radar takes up roughly 2/3 of the screen, with the information you're most likely wanting to peruse squeezed into the remaining 1/3. Accuweather is much better in this respect (and many others, for that matter.) | App won’t even open on latest version for iPhone.  Is been sporadic for over a year, but now won’t open at all | On days where a weather event is showing in my zip code, can you suppress the ads (like Temu, etc.) that take time to load and may cause a delay in getting emergency data in a timely fashion? For those of us that depend on your tool and live in areas affected by tornados, seconds matter. | I love the Weather App.
It has all
The weather, interesting quick to read articles and lots of other information!  
Thanks! | Why do you block the UI thread when opening the app to update the data? It makes me want to throw my phone through the wall. Do it in a background thread and show the user a progress bar on an indefinite loading spinner. Anything other than freezing the UI to refresh data! | The update is only in landscape? The radar map takes up 2/3 of the screen. Full screen pop up ads. Small font. Clumsy navigation in the smaller 1/3 of the screen. Time to find another weather app. | I have had The Weather Channel app since it first came out. I used to love this app. Loved it. Now, you have updated the interface, and that really is horrendous!! I am a Premium member that pays you money. Have an option to revert back or change the interface the way it was, because the new one is long on a design that is the worst possible choice you could have made. The old interface was really nearly perfect. Why mess with something that just pisses off your member, like me? I will not renew your subscription, and I’ll find another app that has an interface that I can stomach. Yours is so horrendous, I should give you negative 5 stars. That’s - 5. | It makes me aware of what I should wear | April 24, 2024…what in the name of common sense have to done to the weather channel app? I open it up on my iPad to find I have to give you all this personal information just to watch the last eat news videos. And even when I “think” I’ve done it…NOPE the videos won’t play.  This is the absolute WORST “update to an app I have ever seen.  I absolutely hate this app now. Have enjoyed just watching the news updates while eating my breakfast.  Well thank you for ruining that.  Why can’t you people just leave well enough alone?! Huh? Just leave things alone. I hate this app now.  Maybe I can just watch them on my phone…but I’m sure you’ll find a way to ruin that as well. | The widget I use from the app changed its font to something way smaller. The app doesn’t load as fast as it used to. Why the changes? It made it worse | The weather app is my daily planner! Thanks !It is a great comfort to be able to plan your day because the Weather Channel influences your mood for the day 
. | Great | This app is loaded with unnecessary features that slows it down. It takes forever to load and you constantly see ads. Terrible | What happened to portrait? I used this app for years, but I could not turn it from landscape, so I looked for another app. Bye now | I hate the new layout. Quit changing things just for the sake of chang! | I liked the app before it was updated.  I find it much harder to read now…both daily and hourly are way too weird to read! | Please delete the last update. This app Went from amazing to horrible in one day. New update is terrible, can’t even see daily night-day weather without selecting through individually. Checking weather for 5 days takes 5 minutes instead of 30 seconds before the last update.  Look at weather bug, Literally one click and you can see the 10 day for both daytime and night.  Weather channel now takes 30 clicks to see the same info, that’s horrible. | As is typical for app updates, this one has made the Weather app worse. In my case, I can’t even open it. I’ve had the app for years, but it won’t let me log in. When tried to reset password, I never received an email needed to reset. Time to find a new app foe weather forecasts | The new design is awful | Still doesn’t show places you try to save. Incredibly annoying as the older version worked fine for this. | Locations I have saved won’t load. When I tried to add them, says already added. Need to fix the bugs. New look is ok. | Reeeelllllyyyy accurate weather | This update is terrible. So difficult to use. If you simply want to quickly get your forecast, good luck. You have to weed through. Used to have it all there at a glance. Now it’s all spread out unnecessarily. Too bight needs a dark mode. Font is far too thin and difficult to see. Notifications average over 12 a day when all I’m experiencing is clouds and my notifications are set to local only. I’m a premium subscriber and I will not be renewing. Look to the Clime app if you’d like to see a functional “weather” app. This one is garbage. Then they went ahead and ruined the iPad app and stuck it in landscape only mode. Did you not test market this poor decisions. So disappointed | Slow to load. Notification excessive. But good layout. 

This app needs work. | This app went from being great to being horrible in a matter of six months. And I’m sure it is so you will pay for that properly works. Horrible,horrible app! | The best weather app but I would prefer WeatherBug and fox weather but  I use 3 weather apps but this has to be the best weather channel to use it tells you when there’s a severe weather alert like severe thunderstorms and tornadoes and when there lightning | Very accurate | This used to be a great app but not after this update. DELETE! | I used to love this app until they updated it. It doesn’t update the correct time of day and is so much harder to navigate. I use my iPhone’s app now for the weather. There’s also a bunch of ads I get now. | This new update is a mess. Stuck on the sign up pages and all my widgets are broke.  Uninstalled and reinstalled and still not working. | Suddenly this app only displays in landscape mode, so I stopped using it.  This app was once my favorite% | Before I posted this review, I scrolled down through the other, more recent reviews. And review after review, without exception, they are one or two stars. I’d give this ZERO STARS if I could. It is absolutely NOT helpful, OR accurate beyond 1-2 hours. And even at that - you’re pretty much on your own. I DO find it very interesting that regardless of all the mostly 1, maybe 2 star reviews, your app average continues to hover around 4.7. So either y’all are paying Apple off, or they let you “grow your own” with the averages. It is utterly amazing to me that people would PAY for your crappy app. Now, it USED to be pretty good. But anymore? Oh HECK no - no way would I pay for this garbage. | Now you can’t even read the alerts till 20 min later. Nothing works. And it’s 95% WRONG | The new version is one of the worst apps I have.  On the hourly forecast, the times are all wrong, there’s no times past 11am. It goes 11am then 12am, which is incorrect. Furthermore, the layout is bad, nothing flows. It seems like they just wanted to put as many ads as possible everywhere and really screwed up the app. I used to rely on this app daily for years. I’m so disappointed. I wish TWC would bring back the old version. | I’ve generally enjoyed this app (as a premium subscriber) for years. I find it’s better than the native iPhone weather app with more detailed forecasts, radar, and alerts. And the recent redesign is really great. However, a MAJOR flaw is that it doesn’t respect audio settings. My phone can be muted, or the volume at the lowest setting, and anything with audio in this app comes on at full blast. This is especially annoying when I accidentally tap a video. Imagine being in a meeting at work, trying to quickly assess if I’ll need an umbrella on my commute home, and then my phone starts blaring a video (often with background music) at full blast. Fix this, and it’s a five star app. | I’m a Premium subscriber. This used to be my ‘go to’ app for checking the weather, but I probably won’t be renewing my subscription. The new, updated app has too much filler and not enough actual weather reporting. The weather video clips used to have a great team of knowledgeable, friendly meteorologists. They are gone now, replaced with much less informative videos with text box overlays and loud music. Overall, the new version of the app is visually more cluttered, with a lot of filler content. I’m guessing these changes were done to cut costs, but unfortunately what was cut is what made this a great app. | New format is awful. | Since updating the app on 4/23/24, none of the locations I saved show up anywhere. I have to search for every location I want to see instead of being able to choose from my saved locations. There is also not a single day overview like there was before. The only option is hourly or weekly. I liked the single day overview as that gave me an overall view of what to expect without having to read descriptions or go through hour by hour. Not at all impressed with the new update. | The new design is terrible. I would rather see the forecast in a larger format than have the radar map taking up most of the screen. Does the person who designed this app even use it?

title: Sam's Club
description:
Sam’s Club 
Enjoy all your membership perks with the Sam’s Club app.

Save time and shop easier every day with the Sam’s Club app. Make the most of your membership with these best-loved exclusives, including free Pickup, Scan & Go, Pharmacy and Free Shipping for Plus members. Save even more with Instant Savings and track your Plus Cash Rewards. Use the tabs at the bottom to find Home, Scan & Go, Account and more.

Scan & Go™ Checkout
Now you can pay for gas with the Scan & Go™ feature to save time at the pump. In the club, shop contact free and skip the checkout line. Just shop, scan and pay, all in the app.

Pickup
Shop in the app, then schedule a free Pickup time that works best for you. We’ll have your order ready when you arrive.

Your Lists 
Start your cart and easily reorder your favorite products, directly in the app.

Pharmacy 
Transfer prescriptions, request refills and manage prescriptions for the whole family for maximum convenience.

Membership Card
Quickly find your membership card in your account and access other membership details.
 
Shipping
Shop and ship directly to your home or workplace – Plus members get free shipping. 

Download the app and get the most from the club today.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
reviews:
Costco u can return up to 10 years if it brakes while sams club only 90 days! | Having kids and being able to scan pay on my phone. Back in the car and back home. Works great for my life style. | Awesome | Life is hard enough without the lives we stand in!!! Scan-n-Go eliminates one of them! | This still hasn’t been fixed after adding items to scan and go you can’t check out because the checkout button doesn’t work. Not sure if it’s because the phone gets locked, not keeping the phone open the whole time, but have to force close the app and reopen it to check out. Already deleted and reinstalled same thing. | I love my Sam’s in Bossier City.  The only complaint I have is, there is no manual wheelchairs in the store. Only motorized ones.  I have a special needs daughter that can’t walk very far.  The last wheelchair that was there, was so worn out, it wasn’t safe.
I would love to see some new ones in the store.

Thank you,
Deborah Garrison | We enjoy the value @ Sam’s Club on things we use frequently.  Bathroom tissue, paper towels, laundry detergent. | Please I beg you please don’t ever stop this self checkout app. It’s every. Keep making it better.  Now that you all decided to employee less employees (ridiculous) the checkout lanes are out the door. Just horrible and those self checkout machines are a joke! | I went to Sam’s Club in Winston Salem on Summit Boulevard yesterday to look at the 6’ x 4’ garden shed. A really helpful employee wearing a Vietnam veteran hat showed me the one that was put together that was outside and walked me through the process of purchasing the shed.

He was extremely polite, helpful, and I appreciate his help. It was just what I needed. | I love being able to order items I need when I need them. | Once you put in a credit card, the app does not let you delete it. | Awesome checkout system thank you so much. Blessings everyone you already have.🌹💕🌹👑 | Had a hard time getting items to load in store | We have ordered everything from an air compressor to coffee, soap and various household items and have never been disappointed. Deliveries have been as scheduled and often before the original delivery date. | What does Sam's Club, a shopping site need with my health and fitness information or my search history? If you use this you are giving them permission to take absolutely everything off your phone including private contact data! People, wake up and start looking at the privacy is for these apps. It's right here on this page! The only way for them to stop stealing our data is for us to stand up and stop using their freaking apps! I don't care if it makes your life easier. You are making it harder for everyone else to stand up. Stand up and say no! Your convenience is not worth the entire user bases data. Every person who uses this app is being incredibly selfish. And you should check your other apps also. | Every time you place an order, you have to add a pick up person when I constantly use the same person they constantly make you put in your four digit code on your credit card. title: Disneyland®
description:
Download the official app for the Disneyland® Resort! Enhance your next visit with an enchanting mobile experience. Buy your tickets, use the complimentary Disney Genie service planning tool, browse maps, locate Disney Characters appearing throughout the parks and much more!

Make your theme park visit easier and more fun by taking advantage of our complimentary new Disney Genie service, which grants you a personalized itinerary that seamlessly maps out your special day with updates that continue during your visit.
Create your very own personal Tip Board to track estimated wait times for your favorite experiences and more.
Quickly access current estimated wait times and forecasted wait times for attractions, check park hours, find Character Greetings, view showtimes and more.
Buy park tickets* and make park reservations with the app and show your barcode at the gate for admission when you first get to the park! No e-tickets to print out.
Order Ahead and Save Time: Enjoy mobile food and beverage ordering at select dining locations.
Make Dining Plans: Browse restaurant menus and make dining reservations right on your device. Then, conveniently check in for your reservation via the app at participating locations. No reservation? You can add your party to the mobile walk-up list at select restaurants (subject to availability).
View Disney PhotoPass® photos: Enjoy unlimited digital downloads of your photos taken on select days by our professionally trained Disney PhotoPass photographers at magical must have iconic locations and select attractions when you purchase Disney PhotoPass+ or Disney Genie+ service. Don’t forget to ask your Disney PhotoPass photographers for Magic Shots to add those extra shots only available from Disney PhotoPass® service. †
Save time at the Hotels of the Disneyland Resort: Manage your hotel reservations, start your check-in process, get reservation updates and more!
Exploring Made Easy: Find what you’re looking for quickly with GPS-enabled maps that show your location and the attractions, restaurants, shops and more near you.
A Must-Have for Magic Key holders: Link your Magic Key pass to access your discounts at select dining and merchandise locations. Show your Magic Key pass via the Disneyland app when you arrive!
 Locate Favorite Characters: You’ll magically know when and where Disney Characters are appearing in the parks.
The Details You Need: See park hours, schedules, accessibility information and descriptions for attractions, dining and more.

*U.S. and Japan residents only.

**Legacy Passholders: Don’t forget to bring your Passport and valid photo ID!

You’ll still need to show a valid Annual Passport card for Passholder discounts and more.

†Disney PhotoPass is subject to the Disney PhotoPass terms and expiration policy.

Note: Some app features require location data or for you to register by providing your full name, country, birthdate and email address in order to use them. If Bluetooth is enabled on your device, this app will also collect your precise location information through beacon technology in order to improve your in-park experience, such as wait times. Optional planning tools may also ask you about your travel party or allow you to save a credit card to your profile for online purchases.

This app provides you with the option to receive push notifications for information relating to your visit to a Park or stay at a Disney Resort hotel.

Features include the ability to make purchases and require a Wi-Fi or mobile carrier data connection. Must be 18 years or older to make purchases.

Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/
Privacy Policy: https://disneyprivacycenter.com/
Your US State Privacy Rights:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-us-state-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information: https://privacy.twdc.com/dnssmpi
releaseNotes: In this release we fixed bugs and improved overall app performance.

title: Vrbo Vacation Rentals
description:
Stay with Vrbo to get more stays. Introducing One Key, the first loyalty program from any major vacation rentals platform. One Key is a loyalty program that rewards you no matter how you travel. You’ll earn rewards across Vrbo, Expedia, and Hotels.com, and you can redeem those rewards the next time you book an eligible vacation home, flight, a hotel, car rentals, and more. 
Whether you’re looking for an A-frame, a beach house, or a condo, it’s on Vrbo. Find the place for you and your people. 

• EARN OneKeyCash™ and use it across Vrbo, Expedia, and Hotels.com 
• SEARCH for unique places to stay in 190+ countries 
• PLAN and collaborate with your people using Trip Boards and group chat
• BOOK securely from your phone or tablet
• TRAVEL anywhere and share trip details with your group


With the Vrbo app, you can:

EARN
• One Key is the first loyalty program from a major vacation rentals platform.
• Book and earn rewards on vacation rentals.
• Use OneKeyCash across Expedia, Vrbo, and Hotels.com. 

SEARCH
• Browse private vacation homes complete with pools, backyards, and more. 
• Find unique vacation homes not listed on other platforms. 
• Filter by preference: price, location, amenities, and more.
• See property photos and reviews at a glance.
• Have questions about a property? Get quick answers from our virtual assistant. 
 
PLAN
•  Tap the heart icon to save and compare your favorites easily. 
•  Invite friends and family to join your Trip Board.
•  Leave comments and vote for your favorite properties.
•  Keep your trip conversations in one place and chat with your group in real-time from anywhere. 
 
BOOK
• Have questions? Message the owner or manager to ask about the property.
• Book and pay securely on the Vrbo app with your credit card.

TRAVEL
• Quickly access important booking details like check-in instructions, WiFi passwords, and arrival information, even when offline.
• Share important trip details with your people by adding them to your trip.
• Access your conversations and message homeowners from your device anytime

Find the perfect vacation rentals with Vrbo.

Note: currency is displayed as USD in the property listings unless otherwise noted. Please visit www.vrbo.com/mobile for more information about the Vrbo app.
releaseNotes: We continue to update our app to help you find your perfect vacation home.
reviews:

Awful communications and he only responded to my messages when VRBO contacted him first. VRBO customer service did absolutely nothing to help, and the company itself will not watch out for the interest of the renter, only the owner. Furthermore, VRBO allows the owner to charge whatever fees they want. As a single renter, I was charged with an “additional occupant” fee. Although it was successfully refunded, there is no indication the host was reprimanded or corrected. As long as VRBO gets their money, they don’t care what happens to you. | The host communicated very well before and after our arrival and Wi-Fi and TV functioned perfectly. We enjoyed our stay there.

We have a family tradition of coming to the ocean every year for the past 5+ years and this has definitely been the best one yet! We really appreciated how the hosts honored your privacy and exceedingly helped all your needs! Amazing hosts!!! The fire wood was stocked for the house, the propane tanks were filled, and they provided everything you could possibly need even chairs for the beach and sand toys for the kids. The view was amazing all around, looked like you were staring at a moving painting all day and the beach was so easy to get to. This year we celebrated our parents 40th anniversary and this house couldn’t have been more perfect! It fit everyone so well and had plenty of space, it was roomy yet cozy and I just can’t get over the view and the amazing hosts! In the past we’ve been to houses that were dirty, or the hosts kept calling every 5 minutes for something as small as leaving a pair of shoes on the outside rug or even catching them walking past the house everyday just to make sure we weren’t throwing parties which made us feel extremely uncomfortable! Our family ranges from our parents (in their 60s) and kids as young as 1 year old all we want to do is to be able to reunite and spend quality time by a campfire while watching an amazing view so the constant stares is definitely a big no from us. This house was very clean, stocked, well organized, and had plenty of toys for the kids. We LOVED that the hosts were just so amazing and nice and just overall the best hosts we have ever had! Would recommend this house to everyone! The experience was really great and the views were beyond words. I will definitely look up the Mod Pod again on another trip! | We really enjoyed our time at this cabin. It was our first time with Vrbo so I hoped for a good experience and it fit the bill. Only complaints, cleaning fee is pretty high, for the level of cleanliness we experienced. Blood clot on the bathroom trim, right by the toilet was an eye sore. Few places with some buildup that needs to be worked on. Smell of mold was very strong. Decorative pillows left on bed and around had some questionable stains, def could use a bath. Also it would be nice if we could fill up the hot tub while we are there, it got pretty low and maybe access to some cleaning chemicals for those families with lil kids who enjoy being in the hot tub. Other then that, wonderful place, loved it! | We just spent a long weekend at Bearadise Condo in Gatlinburg TN.  It was a very peaceful relaxing mini vacation.  The condo is decorated very nicely. The owner is very friendly and super quick in responding to any questions which was much appreciated.
