But that is the only courtesy I owe them. My time is more valuable than theirs- at that point I call my bank and allow them to get my money back for services not rendered. | Cabin was in perfect location, secluded but still close to everything. Cabin was very clean and perfect. Great value for price. Would definitely stay here again. | We had a nice time. Comfortable beds, very nice and well stocked kitchen. The outside patio area with beach view is great.  Best for travelers with a car. Nice pool downstairs. No complaints- recommended. | The website doesn’t have any way to contact regarding security deposit. I left the rental in perfect shape it’s over one week and I still don’t have my $1500.00 deposit back. | The location was perfect, the view was awesome and our host Karen and Mark were very helpful and friendly. Could not ask for a better more quiet place. | It was a great experience. You did an outstanding job on decorations .  You
Had everything we needed. Thanks for sharing your beautiful home with us. | Very comfortable & spacious accommodations. Loved the pool! Very clean. Great host! | Thank you so much for the quick and easy response turnaround time and navigate abilities on your website and app. Bravo. | Our stay at the Island Inn was perfect.  Walking distance to multiple restaurants. Steps to the sand and great ocean views from our room.  Pool was warm on our cooler first days and throughout our entire stay.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  We will be returning to this resort. | Everything was perfect for my stay. It beautiful and close to the beach. It was also quiet and peaceful. The bed was so comfortable. I slept great for my work trip.

title: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts
description:
AccuWeather’s trusted free weather forecast app is at your fingertips

Internationally recognized by the World Meteorological Organization with awards making AccuWeather one of the best weather apps:
“Best User Interface and Data Representation”
“Best Weather Warnings”
“Best Design and Presentation of Information, User-Friendliness; Access and Customization” 


Weather Forecasts You Can Depend On

-  Live weather forecasts - including MinuteCast® forecasts for Minute by Minute® precipitation updates
-  Local weather - including severe weather alerts, temperature, precipitation, and allergy outlooks for your day 
-  WinterCast™: winter weather forecasts - giving you advanced warnings of snowfall probabilities and accumulation
-  Daily forecasts - include rain probability, cloud coverage, wind, live radar, air quality index, snowfall, and even UV index
-  Advanced weather radar - gives you up to the minute views of storm tracking, snow, rain, ice, temperature changes, and much more
-  RealFeel® & RealFeel Shade Temperature™ technology - helping you get a better sense of how the weather actually feels

Live weather with Weather Alerts

The AccuWeather forecasting and severe weather alerts you know and trust. From local weather updates to WinterCast snow alerts, get the weather forecast you can rely on. With in-depth weather news, forecast updates, free weather alerts, plus today’s forecast and much more. Find out what makes AccuWeather the best as a trusted, free weather app. It’s the weather tracker you need!

Advanced Weather Radar
Setting the standard for free weather radar:
-  The accurate weather radar you know from AccuWeather
-  Weather watches and warnings for your local area
-  RealVue™ and Enhanced RealVue™ satellite imagery looking at weather patterns from space
-  Weather radar views for water vapor, rainfall, sustained winds, and even storm surges
-  Timely tropical storm radar tracking to see where and when storms might hit
-  Current conditions maps shows temperature and RealFeel in and around your area
-  5-day precipitation outlook to see what rain, snow, and ice could be in your area
-  24-hour snowfall forecast shows detailed maps with snow accumulation and winter weather
-  Temperature contour maps show how the temperature will change over the next day

For over 10 years, the AccuWeather app has brought you the weather

Whether you're on the East Coast, Pacific Northwest, Southern Coast, or West Coast this free weather app can show you snow, wind, cold, rain and more! Stay prepared with our local weather and live forecasts. From extreme humidity, severe storms, allergy info, air quality index, snow storms, and ice alerts, get live updates that matter to you. Local weather forecasts are the AccuWeather specialty. 

Our weather tracker & live radar gives you Superior Accuracy™

Severe weather warnings, today’s temperature, free weather radar maps & more!

-  Get local forecasts and personalize the app depending on where you are in the world
-  Go beyond today’s weather and look 45 days ahead to ensure that you’re prepared for any weather
-  Try the MinuteCast feature for the most up to date live Minute by Minute weather forecast
-  Weather alerts, storm alerts, and more! Get trending videos from AccuWeather’s dedicated news team
-  Weather forecasting your way - a weather tracker that can filter and customize according to your preferences

Download the AccuWeather app today for free and enjoy award-winning Superior Accuracy in weather forecasting on your iPhone, Apple Watch, or other Apple device. More than just a daily forecast, try the best weather app and get more from your forecast.
releaseNotes: In our effort to become your ideal weather app, we fixed a few bugs and optimized performance to give you an even more seamless experience.
reviews:

I can only see hourly. That’s not helpful | Difficult to use | App has a bug, for most of 2024 so far, that never returns locations in the search. So for local weather app works fine enough. Too many ads. | All pages have error codes saying access denied, please fix this error. | In the Widget can you add what is the HIGH and what is the Low? I see only the temperature , city, state, real feeling | Finally deleting after using it for years. Impossible to search for cities and doesn’t auto update your location. | THE ENTIRE WEATHER TEAM IS GREAT AND THERE PREDICTIONS REGARDING THE WEATHER ARE ALWAYS TO THE POINT AND CORRECT, I WOULD RECOMMEND THE WEATHER CHANNEL TO ANYONE WHO ENJOYS BEING WELL INFORMED ABOUT WEATHER PREDICTIONS .
THAT IS AS HONEST THAT I CAN BE. | Imagine opening the app to learn that tomorrow there’s a 95% chance of rain. Now open 3 other apps (national weather service, local news weather and Apple weather. Guess what? Zero percent chance of rain from all three. But here’s the ticker, Accuweather will change the chances as things start to go sour for their failed services. The temperature is actually more on the mark than weather channel but I'll have to go back to weather channel because this free app isn't user friendly for everyone little disappointed ... | Paid version is not add free. | I just want the weather for the next day but I have to search to find the basics - temp rain. Make  it streamlined | This app used to be great but over time it’s gone downhill. It takes forever to load and is always glitchy. This app WAS fine, now it is aggrevating. I reloaded and still not good. Take advertising banner off app. Soo we can see full information.

It gives detailed information…especially regarding rain (radar, time of rain in my area, which is Plano, TX). It’s very helpful in planning my day!! :-) | I don’t know who is naive enough to trust this app. They tell you to remove then reinstall but it still doesn’t work, now the hourly page won’t update! title: Grubhub: Food Delivery
description:
When in doubt, go for takeout—Grubhub has it all! Order food delivery from thousands of restaurants, including local spots and national chains, and get groceries delivered too. Prefer pickup? No problem. Know the fees upfront and track orders from Grubhub delivery partners in real time—the only surprise is just how easy takeout can be. 

ORDER FROM THOUSANDS OF RESTAURANTS
With Grubhub, you can order takeout from your favorite local restaurants and everyone’s favorite chains. There are so many good eats out there, but you obviously deserve the best. Grubhub makes it easier to choose your next meal with restaurant ratings and reviews. French fries, pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donuts—it’s all here, whenever a craving strikes. 

GET GROCERIES DELIVERED TOO
Think beyond your breakfast, lunch, and dinner orders. Grubhub offers the ultimate convenience with grocery delivery, in addition to restaurant takeout. Order milk, bread, snacks, and frozen foods, as well as household essentials like paper towels and laundry detergent, from local convenience stores.  

EXPECT TO SEE THE FEES UPFRONT
Grubhub gives it to you straight. See the delivery fee upfront, before you start crafting the perfect food order. Pay your way with credit cards, Grubhub gift cards, or Venmo.

SKIP DELIVERY FEES
The key is Grubhub+. Sign up for unlimited $0 delivery fees on eligible orders, and enjoy exclusive offers and rewards as a Grubhub+ member.* Try Grubhub+ free for 30 days, then level up for just $9.99/month. The truth is, food tastes even better when you spend less on delivery. See details below.

TRACK DELIVERY IN REAL TIME
Grubhub puts your delivery on the map. Track eligible orders in real time, from the restaurant to your front door, and know the moment your bacon-egg-and-cheese arrives. Every delivery is a special delivery with Grubhub. 

COUNT ON THE GRUBHUB GUARANTEE
Get your food delivered on time and at the lowest price. Guaranteed, or we’ll make it right. See details: grubhub.com/guarantee

YOU DO YOU AND GRUBHUB DELIVERS
Grubhub serves up a personalized app experience, so you can reorder that feast you’re still thinking about from two months ago. Order sauce on the side, go for extra pickles, lose the onions—Grubhub gets you. Are you a regular? Get rewarded when you come back for more at the same restaurants. You can also plan ahead by pre-ordering food for pickup or delivery. 

ORDER FROM NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Sometimes you need a sure thing, and that’s why Grubhub partners with national restaurants to offer the takeout food you know and love. Get delivery from Applebee’s, Arby’s, Buffalo Wild Wings, Burger King, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, Denny’s, Dunkin’, Five Guys, IHOP, McDonald’s, KFC, Panda Express, Panera, Papa John’s, Popeyes, Shake Shack, Subway, Taco Bell, Wendy’s, White Castle, and more.

GET SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT
Burning questions? Delivery crisis? Grubhub customer support is here for you 24/7. 

*$0 delivery fees only apply to eligible delivery orders from Grubhub+ merchants that meet the subtotal minimum (before tax, tip, and fees) on the applicable menu page or otherwise indicated on the Grubhub platform. Grubhub+ is an automatically renewing membership service requiring recurring payments. After your free trial ends, your free trial will convert to a paid Grubhub+ membership and Grubhub will automatically charge you each month at the then-current rate (currently $9.99) plus tax until you cancel. See terms: https://lp.grubhub.com/legal/plus/
releaseNotes: This update has it all: performance improvements, bug fixes, pizzas (well you can order them at least), and more. Don't believe it? Update and see.
reviews:

However, at checkout, rather than a $37.00 discount, a whopping $10.00 was taken off of my total order. 
I am not counting taxes, service fees or tips. Upon checkout, it clearly stated "Promotion $10.00." When one orders more than $125 worth of food, it is very disappointing to be surprised with a misleading promotion. 
I guess it's back to Door Dash for me. | Have tried numerous times by calling and emailing to delete and cancel my account. Was told account was deleted and they have no information however they continue to TAKE My MONEY!! Have never even used their service !!! Total disgrace and no customer service person has helped. | Fantastic food!! | After multiple attempts at receiving a refund and not getting one for the same order delivered to the old address twice! I have made a third to finally get my meal! Drivers (not all) do better, Grubhub start reprimanding those that do this! | We ordered $52 worth of food. Was left Dramamine from 7-11. Called the driver, was sent to VM twice. 50% UPCHARGE OF THE TWO SANDWICHES | I've been using other competing apps and never encountered such an issue. I initially chose this app because my colleagues gifted me a card. Contacting customer service yielded vague explanations and no clear timeline for resolution. Considering becoming a Grubhub Plus member due to the card's substantial value, but now reconsidering that decision. | I received the wrong order and the only fix was to refund me. I was on a timeframe for my lunch and due to this I was unable to eat. This is ridiculous and I wonder how many times this happens in a given day. I should receive a partial refund and have an order expedited to me asap. I can’t understand how this is any kind of a good business model. Won’t be using ever again since I cannot trust that I will actually get a meal. | This is the third time I’ve placed an order and when I went to pick it up, the restaurant had no record of the order having been placed even though the app lists it as “in the works”

Look, Grubhub, if I wanted to wait on site for them to prepare my food, I wouldn’t have bothered using your app. And moving forward, I don’t plan to use an app that only works about 20% anyway. | I preorder in advance and later I received a call telling me they do not have idli, so I asked if they could do anything about it. They said they could not update the order and instead told me to cancel and reorder again. I told them that if I cancelled I would not reorder again, so if they could change it to something else I would be ok as long as the price was close, the employee was not helpful but in the end the proposal was accepted.

 This feature should be in the restaurant and other providers app so that they can cancel the product that is not on their menu and update the order price accordingly. This ruins preorder since later you can get an out of stock call and now you’re plans are changed, which happens but with an app and such a big infrastructure supporting it behind, an easy product update for the order with a click saves time and money to everyone involved. The restaurant does not loose the order, the user does not loose their time and grub gets another user engaged.

I know there are more steps involved than just allowing restaurants to change the orders but there must be a way. | Seriously tho. How hard is it to pick up pizza drive it somewhere and drop it off? This is the second time people couldn't pick something up drive it somewhere and drop it off is this really that hard really? | 5 failed deliveries in a row. I never received the first four deliveries, one is still pending my refund. 5th and final order was Pollo Loco, 3 minutes away. Driver took my food at 5:25pm and went on another delivery first. I received the food late and it was placed on its side on my porch. Cold soggy nachos and cold everything else. $50 completely wasted. The $7.00 voucher from the previous canceled orders covered the driver’s tip only. Fool me 5 times… never ever ever again Grubhub. | The worst experience today with customer support. There is some kind of UI glitch in grubhub app system. I ordered two items and it lets you add an item “BUT” instead of adding one item it repeats everything with addon as a whole new order. I ordered and it gave me confirmation on the app for the order being prepared and delivered. But coming back home I see two separate orders and charged my account twice- first order with 2items and second order with same 2 items and addon item repeated. Customer support dint even help me with refund or care to create a “ticket” raising glitch concerns. If the glitch is with grubhub and restaurant delivers you wont get refund. Complete ridiculous instance with no help and refund being an elite member. When I have the confirmation on the app why will I go and check my email back and forth, that is ridiculous. What is the use of an App if I had to check my emails for confirmation of orders. What is the use of even having membership with having no help. What will I do with your apology?Grubhub #badcustomerservice #nocustomerservice #dontorder #uiglitch | Would be better if customers were allowed to make changes, like no onions, etc. | I ordered a large delivery order from a restaurant.  Grub hub cancelled it one hour after ordering saying that the restaurant had closed.   I called the restaurant and not only was it open, they had the order made and waiting.   I ended up driving there to pick it up.   

Grub hub refunded the order but had no explanation for why they would have cancelled.  If they were going to cancel the order they should have done it immediately instead of waiting an hour. | I have 2 delivery apps. I’ve been using Grubhub more recently until now. I rarely have an issue. And customer service was fair. Ordered from Jack In The Box. Received alert my order is on the way. No other deliveries delays. My driver stopped mid way. I texted them if everything was okay. No response. I clicked on request about delivery delay. My order arrived just before being considered late. Noticed my drink did not have seal. All other bags had seals. So I requested “help” again. The drink was the only issue. Customer support said I had an unusually high request for refunds, discounts, and requests and can only give me a $5 credit. Great. But the “unusually high requests, refunds” comment was not justified. I sent request to delete my account. I canceled Grubhub + membership. 

Next time, just lead with $5 credit. And end it there. Now you have one less customer and revenue. | I only use this garbage app bc it’s free with a credit card. Overpriced food, overpriced service fees, free delivery only with a large purchase. Delayed food every time. Like a hour or more. No customer service Not worth it even when it’s free to me. | We ordered some IHOP pancakes through Grubhub.  IHOP is 2.5 miles away from our house.  Our ordered was placed at 11:04 am, around 11:40 am we get a notification that our order was delivered.  No picture of the delivery and our ring cameras never saw anyone delivering our food.  I walk outside and I look for our food out front and also the back of our house.  Nothing! I notify Grubhub and they ask me all kinds of questions.  They offer to re-order my food. I tell the lady, I agree but only if they make us fresh food and not deliver us the food they forgot on the first try. She assured me the food would be a new order and fresh.  Grubhub places a new order and we receive the “new” order just shy of 1 pm. This was supposed to be our breakfast! We get the order and it’s the original order! The receipt shows that the order was received by IHOP at 11:04 am and it stayed there for hours! Keep in mind we live 2.5 miles away from IHOP!! 

I submitted a guarantee for late delivery and I got a notification that my order was not eligible! If two hours late is not eligible for late delivery, what is? A day or two days? 

We have deleted this app and will use other services.  Thanks but no thanks. There are many delivery apps way better than Grubhub. Well be back to using DoorDash. 

Bye Grubhub. | Fees are out of control. So ok when it works it’s great but for what you charge none of this should be happening . | I made an order around 2 PM and the food was supposed to arrive between 2:30 PM and 2:45 PM after waiting till 245 extremely hungry and waiting for my food. Not the best way to start the day. | Grubhub doesn’t know how to treat customers! It’s a good service a little pricey, but if you want to eat if you’re drunk, they come to you with your food. | After having 2 problematic orders and 2 customer service agents who didn’t listen and definitely didn’t care, I deleted the app and will not place an order with Grubhub again. They outsource their customer service, so it’s one empty apology after another. They’ll apologize for apologizing, just so they don’t have to listen to anything you say. You can be as polite and patient with them as you like but make no mistake- your delivery issues are not their problem. | Before I could see my balance and now I can’t. | Always on time Always to perfection | Ruchvj | Convenience over quality. For that I would like to be able to give to only if I’m really satisfied | Es demasiado en impuestos lo que cobran esta aplicación es ridículo | Restaurant told driver they didn’t see my order, so they canceled it. 3-4 days for my refund. Ok cool. But why can’t you just re-order my food if YOUR SYSTEM made the error.

title: American Airlines
description:
With the American Airlines app, you’re covered with the information you need exactly when you need it. Curious about traffic to the airport? Need a mobile boarding pass? Wondering where the closest Admirals Club® lounge is? All of this info and more is available at your fingertips.

- Lock Screen widgets: See your next trip's details right from the Lock Screen with our new dynamic widgets.

- Dynamic home screen: Knows where you are in your travel journey and gives you easy access to the right tools at the right time.

- Mobile boarding pass: Check in for your trip and retrieve your mobile boarding pass. No need to print, and it’s updated along the way.

- Flight updates: Get the latest flight updates by simply retrieving your trip and allowing American Airlines to send notifications to your mobile device. 

- Interactive terminal maps: Navigating airports is a breeze with our interactive terminal maps. Find the closest Admirals Club® lounge or get directions to your connecting gate. 

- AAdvantage® account details: Review all the details of your AAdvantage® account right from the app. Not an AAdvantage® member? Sign up today.

- Upgrade your seat: Request upgrades with ease. Want to see where you are on the list? The app displays the upgrade standby list within 4 hours of your scheduled departure. 

- Seat selection: Choose or change your seat within the app. Just pick the one you’d like and change it on the spot. 

- Track your bag: Know exactly where your bag is from the time it leaves your hands to when you extend the handle at your destination. 

- Save your trip: Your recently viewed trips are automatically saved in the app so you can easily grab the details for your next flight in seconds.

- Quick interactions: The American app utilizes Haptic Touch and is Apple watch compatible, giving you quick access to the most important info. 

- Wi-Fi access in the air: Don’t forget, on flights with Wi-Fi you can use the American app and aa.com at no cost. 

There’s a new group of flyers out there – The World’s Greatest Flyers. They know that having the right travel tools makes for a great experience.

The sky’s the limit with the American Airlines sticker pack! Let friends and family know that you’re traveling, headed to the Admirals Club® lounge to take it easy before taking off, snapping photos at 30,000 feet or that you’ve arrived.

Contact Us: 800-222-2377
releaseNotes: We're continuing to improve your app experience with bug fixes and performance improvements.
reviews:

title: Costco
description:
It's easy to save time and money while on the go, with the Costco Mobile App! We've improved our mobile app, to make it easier for members to access the incredible values found only at Costco.

DIGITAL MEMBERSHIP CARD: Access your membership card from the home page of the app. Use your membership card to enter the warehouse and at checkout.
 
SHOP: Browse Costco.com’s unique and expanded selection, which offers thousands of items not found at your local warehouse. Enjoy having items delivered straight to your door!
 
SAVINGS: Conveniently receive the latest Warehouse Savings right on your own device.

GAS PRICES: Just tap the locator pin on the map to view current gas prices.
 
PHOTOS: Order metal prints, acrylic prints or photo mugs directly from the app.  Have them delivered to your door or pick them up at select Costco locations.

SPECIAL EVENTS: View the Special Events happening at your local Costco and set reminders for upcoming events.

PHARMACY: Order prescription refills & check status on prescriptions. Get refill reminders, track your medications, manage family accounts, transfer prescriptions, and find a Costco pharmacy.
 
TRAVEL: Shop Costco Travel for great deals on vacation packages, hotels, cruises, rental cars, theme parks and more!
 
BUSINESS CENTER: Stock up on everything from Restaurant Supplies to Office Essentials, and keep your business running smoothly and efficiently.
 
SHOPPING LIST: Keep track of the items you want to pick up on your next trip to Costco.
 
WAREHOUSE INFO: See details about your nearest Costco warehouse, including regular and holiday hours, services provided, driving directions and gas prices.
 
FEEDBACK: Visit our app feedback page and help provide important feedback for Costco, because your opinion matters!
releaseNotes: In this release, we enhanced the startup experience. We also made bug fixes and other improvements behind the scenes.
reviews:
App doesn’t show all items in warehouse in different categories like other wholesale clubs | Just get Sams club membership and learn from them on how to make shopping experience easier. | I hate how this app turns up my screen brightness all the way on the account screen. It’s not even for scanning - I just wanted to see membership info. | Can you guys add a bar code as well on the app? So we can use the app also in other countries.
Right now its impossible to use it in Mexico because they have the system on Bar Code reader, and US app uses QR code. Thanks | Your app is not user friendly to see if you have items in stock or price check., | I would like to be able to order grocery products on standard shipping rather than having to use the two day delivery. | The app has always been a clunky experience that seems to be 5-10 years behind other modern apps. The latest update inexplicably removed the ability to share/copy a link to a product, now you can only share to social media. Whoever is in charge of this app development needs to be fired. | My husband and I enjoy going to costco since we can find things easily with affordable price. | Useless.  App doesn’t even open. | The app developers need to update the app. If it’s asking for a zip code - have the numerical value populate not the entire keyboard. The verify your account never works. Thought this would be a good subscription to have but the app leaves everything to be desired. | Need to be cognizant of the tabs across the top, and the fact that they show out of stock items as a default.  Can be tricky to navigate, so the interface takes some getting used to.  Ultimately gets the job done though! | The app more often than not fails to launch after the first time. If it does manage to successfully launch, it sometimes crashes or causes the phone to overheat. This started after the major update a few months ago. I can’t even use the app to show my digital membership card which is all I ever really used it for. They need to fix this app or support Apple Wallet for their membership. This has been going on for months. | I have found the app easy to navigate and the information is very helpful. | Costco next can’t check out. | To be sent an email or phone call of GOLD COINS being available for purchase. | Very easy to navigate, makes shopping for home supplies more convenient | Costco forces you to update their app before using. Once you do this, there’s now a digital membership card that can only be used in one device! Most of us go between two or more devices, like a phone and tablet. Now the customer must choose, with no warning and no work-around. This is one of the most digital user unfriendly stores. Makes me rethink my membership. | Can’t order what I see in store. | Very annoying app. 
App keeps loading stuff from the web. Why can’t the monthly deals be seen more easily? You have to scroll around now looking. 

Why can you add to your list from the deals? Shopping in the app is frustrating. | Love everything about Costco from the clothes to the food to the service. You never can go wrong with Costco. | Not enough results related to search.  For example, shrubs returned one result which did not include boxwoods.   However a search for boxwood came up with the correct result.   Makes it hard to consider other alternatives. | I love Costco but their app is probably the worst shopping app I have every used. The only thing it is useful for is your digital membership card. | Most unusable app. No in store inventory. | Every time I order something through Costco online, the product is delivered in a timely manner, and great quality. | I would give Costco five stars except for their packaging. Most of it is impossible to recycle, and is often excessively excessive! as a corporation, I wish they would do more to go zero, or very low, waste. I find I am shopping less and less at Costco because of the packaging. Also, do I really need so many avocados? | 1.  Can not select more than 1 filter item at a time. Once touched, the filter closes and must be reopened to enter another filter item. Good apps allow selecting multiple features, then applies with a confirmation button. 

2. Why can’t I see what is available to buy in store. It appears that way but when entered into the shopping cart shows it as needed to be delivered to the store for pickup. 

There’s more but Im too frustrated to keep writing. | I mean it’s Costco.  
It’s Awesome, and I don’t even eat the samples. 
Or return things.  

Food court should host weddings as far as I’m concerned. 👰👰.  Love the joint. | It took a major part of my day but my order was finally accepted. | Quick and easy. | Easy to use! | With this version when I tap share it only allows me to share to Facebook, Pinterest, and Twitter. 
It should be like the iOS native share sheet that allows AirDrop, Messages, and copying. 
Please fix. | Works well enough but there are glitches often where I have to reload the page. | Better | The online order works fine | I can’t believe I’d say it, but Sam’s has a better app. Costco needs to bring a similar feature like Scan & Go with Sam’s. I’m starting to shop less at Costco because of how long the lines get. Someone is going to get hurt one day, and all of it can be prevented by allowing for faster checkout. 
The app as it stands now is just a basic one. It’s basically a web page with touch interface. | Would be nice if it had Sam’s Club ability to scan and go right on your phone to pay and check out so that all you need to do at the door is show electronic receipt otherwise not very helpful just ok. | Search feature no longer works. It just reloads the home screen. Products do exist but you have to hunt them down in their category. I’ll pay more and just order on Amazon. | The app doesn’t let me add my membership or my last name to be able to confirm it. It freezes and it doesn’t let me do anything! | We travel a lot & preferred to see the warehouses pop up on the menu so we can tell which one is the closest in the direction we’re going. Now we just get a list at startup & it wants you to set your home store! I don’t want to change my home store while I’m traveling. Please change it back or give us the option to see the map. | Thanks | Why can’t I minimize the app during checkout to go look for credit card or shop card info and come back to the same screen! I add a shop card , and go to look for another one and when back on the app the previously entered card is gone and I’m back to the cart and have to click checkout again! Frustrating beyond belief! | If you have sensitive eyes, you need to be careful when accessing the account page/tab in the app. The app will force the brightness of your screen to the max level, literally blinding you!! Why!!! Almost felt like I tried to stare directly into high beams to burn my corneas. The app DOES NOT respect your phones display setting, please be careful!! I don't understand why Apple allows apps to bypass user defined settings like this! | Costco works with budget car rental and give veterans with service dogs a hard time and wanting to see forms (that I thought was illegal). Costco travel does not care | When trying to check out, I only see an error page now! | STOP telling me about your stupid app “tour”. Who cares. | Easy to navigate and make purchases. | The best and most reliable products at the lowest prices. | Can yall do something right and just put the warehouse savings somewhere actually visible. Why do I have to go through king tuts labrynth to find that. 

The 2016 app was 10000% better. Fix that. | If you want to read reviews, you can’t get past the first page due to the way the app is setup. You can’t scroll down far enough due to, ‘check availability’ feature getting in the way. | Love ordering on line or in store always great service

title: Lime - #RideGreen
description:
You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter! 

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice 
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/ 

Step 2 
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements

title: onX Hunt: GPS Hunting Maps
description:
Home to the most trusted and accurate satellite and topo maps, onX Hunt is a fully-functioning GPS navigation app on your phone. View private and public property land ownership data, landowner names, and property lines on your custom maps. Easily view hunting units, roads and trails, U.S. topographic maps, and more. 

New features including Aerial imagery, In-Dash Navigation with Apple CarPlay, and Trail Camera Integration ensure onX is your go-to tool for this hunting season and beyond. Our new Two-State Premium Membership allows you to have full access to all onX features in two states, ideal for hunters who cross state lines.

▶ FREE TRIAL:

While the onX Hunt App and many of its features are free, you’ll start a free Premium State Membership trial when you install the App. This allows you to try a full-featured Premium State Membership for seven days.

▶ FREE HUNTING APP FEATURES:

• NO ADS
• Satellite Maps and 24K Topographical Maps with GPS Navigation
• Local weather conditions, forecasts, wind speeds, and wind direction
• Aerial / Topo Hybrid overlay to see contours with satellite imagery
• Hunting Zones, Areas, or Game Management Units (GMU) for game species in all 50 states
• New Compass Mode with Rangefinder: find orientation and distance from map points
• Mark Waypoints with custom icons for camps, vehicles, and more
• Measure distances with the Line Tool
• Measure food plot acreage with the Shape Tool
• Track the distance, coordinates, duration, and speed of your hunt with Tracker

▶ OFFLINE GPS FUNCTIONALITY:

The onX Hunt App turns your phone into an outdoor handheld GPS navigator using the built-in GPS to display your location on the map. Cellular coverage is NOT needed as tile-saving technology allows you to save basemaps and layers for offline navigation.

▶ DESKTOP MAPS: Memberships also include access to our online Web Hunting Map (www.onxmaps.com/web).

• Scout from the comfort of your home
• Sync markups and tracks between devices
• Print unlimited free maps

▶ PREMIUM SINGLE-STATE MEMBERSHIP:

With a Premium State Membership, you gain access to our proprietary hunting GPS maps developed by our GIS team. This membership costs $34.99/year. Get all the great features of the free onX Hunt App PLUS the additional benefits of:

• Public land like Forest Service, Bureau of Land Management (BLM maps), Wildlife Management Areas, county and state land hunting maps, Timber Lands, and more
• 3D maps on phone and desktop
• Optimal Wind and Wind Calendar for stand locations and hunt planning
• Landowner names with property line maps and land boundaries finder in available counties (U.S. only)
• Search by landowner name or hunting property landowner boundaries
• Save private or public hunting land maps for offline use
• GMU or Hunting Units for multiple species
• Possible Access Lands, Walk-In Areas, Block Management Areas, and private lands open to the public
• The largest database of nationwide roads and trails ever built
* Private land ownership maps may not be available for all counties (U.S. only)

▶ PREMIUM TWO-STATE MEMBERSHIP:

With a Premium Two-State Membership, you get all the benefits of our Premium Single-State Membership, but for two states. A Premium Two-State Membership costs $49.99/year and gets you all the great features of the free onX Hunt App PLUS the additional benefits listed above.

▶ ELITE NATIONWIDE MEMBERSHIP:

The best tool for the best hunters. With an Elite Membership, you get a complete, purpose-built solution for dedicated hunters and the game they pursue, including:
• Proprietary maps for all 50 states
• Advanced Tools: TerrainX 3D, Recent Imagery, Route Builder
• Elite-exclusive pro deals and expert resources

Easily scout, plan, and master your hunts for any species in any state for one membership price. Available for $99.99/year or $14.99/month.

▶ TERMS OF USE:

https://www.onxmaps.com/tou

▶ FEEDBACK:

Have a problem or want to request new features? Contact us at support@onxmaps.com
releaseNotes: We improved user experience with a few bug fixes as well as preparing the app for future feature updates.
reviews:
Been a member for a few years worked good. Then after membership renewed the last time it keep asking me to upgrade my membership. I would hit upgrade and it would say i was already a elite member. Yea i know….. refreshed my account and still didnt work. Delete app reinstall app sign in. Refresh purchase and it worked for about a day. Was out hunting trying to figure out where i was where i need to go and what property i was on (cause one boring property didn’t have permission and was close  to line to get to spot.) well app decided not to work again. No clue where exactly the line was. There i was trying to refresh membership. Didn’t get it to work. What a joke when ur out hunting. Had a gut full.  Wast of $100. | I absolutely love On X! I use it to find trail heads and backroads daily. | We bought our property in October of 2022 and now a year and a half later it still doesn’t show us as owners. Makes me skeptical of the other properties I’m looking at. Also the imagery is behind most other apps that I use. Many of the other features are easy to use and very helpful. | Been meaning to get ON-X for a few years now and I am really liking this and using it

I use this app in Florida,Minnesota and Idaho. | Love I can download maps for when I have no service | Terrain, map overlays, property owners, GPS coordinates, elevation, the whole kitten kaboodle. I use it for backcountry driving, hiking, finding camping spots and land watching. | Every two minutes I’m having to click out of an ad, a real pain that makes a slow app even slower. | I use both versions all the time and they are outstanding. However, recently the app has been very unreliable. It crashes constantly, and after I just bought the iPhone 15, the app doesn’t even load. When I open the app, it stays on the initial screen that’s red with the OnX logo. I’ve restarted my phone, my software is up to date and I’ve deleted and reinstalled the app several times. I’d love some help from OnX support on this issue but they’re hard to get a hold of… | OnX is the best app for hunting I have ever used and I have used just about all of them. Their support links are outstanding as well as the educational zoom links to answer any other issues or questions. Great program. I have 3 generations of hunters that use OnX app, exclusively!! | Would nice to have a map option that looks like google earth. Sometimes hard to see environment with the available map layouts. | Greatest mapping for hunting and great support team, I would like to see waypoints being live to see movement and interactions with other OnX members to view their movements on your own device and theirs , this would be awesome during deer drives to actually see drivers in motion and safer, I’m sure this will be available in the future | Been like this for awhile. | The support is easy to contact and work with. The easy button. | Beware of the sneaky charges they’ll place on your account! I was charged $99.99 for a FREE 1 week trial of the Elite membership. I’ve never ever used the app before this and now the customer service team is backpedaling saying that they cannot issue me a refund and Apple Support told me that I need to contact them for a refund. It’s a whole mess so just be careful because they will charge you even though you didn’t sign up! | Awesome maps. Awesome response from you guys!! Couldn’t be happier | This app is a game changer for those of us that hunt public ground.  It’s real easy to lose track of where public and private meet when your tracking/stalking that deer or turkey.  This app will show that even without cell service.  Plus being able to map out a track in a new area is handy, especially a new area where you’ll be going in the dark.  We was stalking turkey today and kept getting further and further in the woods, but I knew there was private land close to us.  It was nice to know we wasn’t trespassing.  Thanks OnX. | The satellite map used by onX is very dated. It is years old; at least 3 years old in Missouri. Makes it difficult to hunt, scout, and know areas when the map is so old. Would be much better if the satellite imaging and map were up to date more-so. | OnX Has been the most up to date and feature-rich app I’ve used for knowing I’m on the land parcel I should be on and helping me to get in, to my chosen destination, and back out without any confusion. Great and prompt customer service.
Ken | Really helps with boundaries and private land! | Folders not working on iPhone 14 for over a year now | I really wish the people that made these apps would have a real people that you could talk to about your problem but nope. Contact support sure I tried all I get is a freaking computer. Put a phone number on your stuff… please!! | After an update now I can no longer view the property boundaries and basic info. They real you in and then take away what you use it for and place behind a pay wall. I’m fine with adding feature and charging for them. But it gets old when you take away feature that were free to begin with. | It’s a great app when it works but I’ve already lost all my information three times because the app won’t open even though my phone is currently up to date on software updates and so is the app I’m disappointed in the app because of that but other then that it’s great for saving spots I’ve been using this app for 4 years now but it always seems to bug out making me look at other hunting apps | I’ve had an elite member ship for 3 months then out of knowhere I’m back to basic. My app is fully up to date and can’t even load. It stays on the orange screen that you get before it loads in no matter how good my service or wifi is and customer service has so far been a waste of time. | This app is fantastic! I won’t go in the woods or mountains without it…… on-x Hunt is constantly updating and improving the app to give us the best product available. It’s very time consuming to delete old points from past forestry projects. Downloaded to see property lines. Was offered a 7 day free trial. Sign up and $20.51 immediately comes out of my account. 7 days later another $29.99 comes out. $50 and I STILL CANT SEE PROPERTY LINES. Do not download. Now using On X, there is no comparison.  People that are using Google are using a bare bone app with limited tools.   “On X” provides property line in bright colors for both private and public land where Motion X used a fine gray line that was extremely difficult to see. title: JetBlue - Book & manage trips
description:
Take JetBlue everywhere you go! Download our award-winning app to book, manage and check in for your trips, access boarding passes and more. 
 
Day of travel – Your day of travel is a breeze with key info, including your boarding pass, right on the home screen.  
 
Manage trips – Update your seat selection, add extras or make changes to your itinerary with just a few taps. 
 
Boarding pass – Check in and get to your gate quickly without the hassle of printing a boarding pass – one less thing to carry on! 
 
My trips – Add your upcoming and past itineraries to access everything you need to know. 
 
Book flights – Search and book your next trip with ease. 
 
Chat with us – Get your questions answered quickly and connect with a JetBlue crewmember through live chat.  
 
Travel Tools – Add hotels, vacation rentals, car rentals and extras with Paisly or schedule a shuttle to the airport.  
 
Inflight experience – View all of our snacks, drinks and entertainment options. 
 
My TrueBlue – Enroll or sign in to TrueBlue to keep track of your TrueBlue points, view your Travel Bank balance (if you have one), request points for past trips and enjoy a more personalized experience. 
 
& More – Access our flight tracker, airport maps and other content.
releaseNotes: • More mojo.

When booking travel for a family, one sometimes need to switch between accounts. title: Spirit Airlines
description:
Our newly redesigned app has been enhanced to provide a more dynamic relevant experience where you can stay informed and use more self-serve capabilities. Its only the beginning, more to come! 

Ready for More Go? With the Spirit Airlines app, easily manage all your trips in one place. Book your next getaway, check-in for your flight, get your boarding pass, and receive flight status updates when you actually need them. Travel faster and lighter than ever before with your new travel app companion. 

My Trips
- Get the information you need right at your fingertips with all your upcoming trips in one place. Quickly see your flight status, gate/terminal, seat assignment, and much more!  
- Get notified when it’s time to check-in so you’re ready to go the next day 
- Access your boarding pass and move hassle-free through the airport
- Need to make a change? Quickly update your seats, add bags or options to your trip

Book Flights
- Find and quickly book your next getaway with ease 

Flight Status
- Stay up-to-date with the latest flight notifications informing you of any impacting changes
- Easily check flight statuses so you know when your family and friends are arriving 

My Account 
- Sign up for Free Spirit® to start earning points immediately and use for award travel
- View your member number, tier status and track your point balance
- See points required to achieve next tier status
- Personalize your profile with your own avatar
releaseNotes:
Continued to improve our app and fixed user reported issues.

Please contact us at https://www.spirit.com/s/contact-us with feedback or questions.

After I submitted payment, I discovered significant discrepancies in the charges, including unexpected fees for cancellation, phone assistance, and rebooking. Not only was I misled about the total cost, but I also realized I was charged for services I did not agree to or receive. This lack of transparency and poor communication left me feeling frustrated and deceived. I expect better service and honesty from an airline, and this experience fell far short of my expectations.

title: Frontier Airlines
description:
Book flights & check-in with the Frontier app to save time and money!

Travel is easier than ever before with the Frontier Airlines mobile app.
- Book your next trip, search flights, and explore our route map and destinations
- View and manage upcoming trips
- Upgrade your seat to UpFront Plus, Premium or Preferred, or select a standard seat
- Add a carry-on bag, checked bag, bundle, priority boarding or other options
- Check flight status, including departure time, arrival time and gate information
- Save time at the airport with fast checked bag drop or by going straight to the gate without checked bags
- Join Frontier Miles to earn travel miles and elite status points
- Use your Frontier Miles to book award travel
- Join Discount Den to get our lowest fares and exclusive savings and offers, including Kids Fly Free (restrictions apply)
releaseNotes: Bug fixes, miscellaneous updates, and improvements.
reviews:
Buyer beware. Their flights often show to be less money until you go to check in. This is where the charges begin.  I understand airlines have to make money but charging $4.39 for a can of soda and or a cup of coffee is beyond ridiculous. Plus the baggage checks and other things they expect you to purchase it is very easy to spend just as much or more money as you would with a different airline. 
Furthermore, the seats do not move or recline. I will say that the staff on the airplane were great. 
I have photos. I will be sending to their customer service department as well. Very first trip with a new suitcase and it has black marks and scuff marks all over it as well as being torn on one side in a hole punctured the other side. Not what I expected for the money that I spent. | So as usual, I selected to not pay for saving because we generally always end up setting together and per frontier policy. They say that they do everything they can to accommodate and seat the party together, which was clearly not the case because when I checked in this morning, they had me and my wife sitting at Rose apart yet I could choose to pay to sit next to her so the seat was open, so they literally force you to pay for seating which I think it’s pretty crooked considering the level of danger with flying I mean who would want to be sitting next to their wife as they fall into the ocean. As far as companies are concerned, you guys are coldhearted and evil. | This app and website was nearly impossible to use!  It took hours of my time over three days! Just so very ridiculous.  I wish I had a better option to travel to Orlando from MI. | The only way you can check in with this airline is through their app, which does not find your flight, then sends you to an online chat that sends you to a new link to check in. However that link then gets hung up just before you get to the page where you get your boarding pass. Absolute garbage airline. Will never fly again. | So quick and easy | Hello
I found it quite frustrating booking today. Purchasing bags was confusing and I had to start over to correct the errors. It seems extra carryon bags kept being added to my total. I am familiar with booking tickets on line with other airline with much more ease.
Julianne Poland | Very easy to book. | It has been a good  and affordable price | Hi Frontier. I don’t want to be forced to download your poor-performing app for your poor-performing services. Always late no gates … awwful! | Not being able to access your boarding pass defeats the purpose of having an app. | Have been very pleased with the service and selection of flights. | Love travel with Frontier, low rates and good services. | I have the newest iPhone, and the app can’t even open. title: ParkMobile: Park. Pay. Go.
description:
Join millions of users who trust ParkMobile to revolutionize the way they park and reserve spots in advance. Our app offers the convenience of seamless mobile payments for street, lot, or garage parking, making your parking experience effortless and stress-free. ParkMobile is more than just a parking app; it's about providing a holistic experience, ensuring your journey to sporting events, concerts, or any occasion is smooth and enjoyable.

Reserve Your Parking Spot Ahead of Time:

Planning to attend a major event? ParkMobile has you covered. Easily reserve parking near top venues, arenas, and stadiums across the country, including NFL, NBA, or hockey games, concerts and shows, and sports events of all kinds. From State Farm Arena to Capital One Arena, Progressive Field, Prudential Center, Ford Field, Spectrum Center, Straz Center, PPL Center, SAP Center, KIA Center, T Mobile Arena, Honda Center, Nationwide Arena, Galen Center, Shrine Auditorium, and many more, you can reserve your spot in advance. Say goodbye to last-minute parking stress—secure your space now!

Explore City Parking:

ParkMobile operates in over 500 cities, ensuring that finding a parking spot near you is always a breeze. Whether you're in major hubs like Los Angeles, Miami, Washington, DC, Atlanta, Boston, or Chicago, or in cities like Cleveland, New Orleans, San Francisco, Dallas, St. Louis, Las Vegas, or Philadelphia, ParkMobile provides comprehensive coverage for your city parking needs. Discover the ease of navigating urban spaces with ParkMobile.

Effortless Parking on the Job with ParkMobile for Business:

For businesses, ParkMobile for Business streamlines fleet and business parking expenses. Create an admin account and set up your company profile effortlessly. Manage multiple vehicles and drivers with ease. Choose between the ParkMobile wallet or your business credit card for flexible payments for your drivers. Drivers can seamlessly switch to their business accounts when parking for work, using the ParkMobile app just like they normally would.

Download the ParkMobile app today and join millions of satisfied customers who have made parking stress-free. Whether you're interested in city parking, event reservations, or both, ParkMobile is the smarter way to park. Reserve your spot and enjoy a seamless parking experience today.
releaseNotes: General product enhancements and bug fixes

title: Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages
description:
Learning a language can be an experience that transforms your life. Over 25 years of language learning experience has taught Rosetta Stone one thing: everyone has the ability to learn to read, write, and speak a language with confidence. Try the Rosetta Stone app yourself for free. 

Many online language learning apps will promise that you can learn a language in just a few minutes a day. However, there is a significant difference between memorizing vocabulary lists and speaking a language with confidence. Learning a language is about more than just the words. One of the mistakes new language learners make is treating language as an object or an end goal instead of as an experience.

Ditch the books, translator, and dictionary, and surround yourself with a language whenever, wherever with the Rosetta Stone mobile app. 



What are people saying about Rosetta Stone:
• CNN Underscored - "There’s a good reason why the language learning app Rosetta Stone is the gros chien (that is, the big dog) of the apps we tested"
• Mashable - "one of the OG language-learning services, known for its deep dive into accent pronunciation"
• Popular Science - "super-smooth and intuitive, and the lessons neither feel too short so as to be forgettable nor too long so as to be a chore"
• PC Mag - "reliable, accurate, and thorough"



Rosetta Stone has taught millions of people new languages, and you’re next. From day one, you’ll: 
• Stay focused with a personalized language learning plan based on your motivation. 
• Learn a language intuitively using our proven immersion method. 
• Perfect your pronunciation with instantaneous feedback. 
• Download lessons to do everything offline.  
• Access different kinds of exercises with our Extended Learning features. 
• Sync progress across all your devices. 
• And never see an ad, ever. 



For the first time, we’re offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you’d like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe. 


Choose from 24 languages: 
Arabic, Chinese (Mandarin), Dutch, English (American or British), Filipino (Tagalog), French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian (Farsi), Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Latin American or Spain), Swedish, Turkish, or Vietnamese. 



Select a subscription: 
We offer 3 and 12-month subscriptions—as well as a Lifetime option. 



Subscription Details:
• Get full access to all lessons, stories, and audio companion when you subscribe to Rosetta Stone. 
• Payment will be charged to your Apple ID. 
• Your account will be auto-renewed 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• Manage or cancel your subscription from your App Store User Settings at any time after purchasing. Payment will be taken until the end of the current period.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.



Enterprise and Education Learners
• Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners.
• Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners.


For questions or assistance, please visit http://support.rosettastone.com

reviews:
Excelente aplicación | I have no idea why nobody fixes this annoyance. | I swear most of these 5 star reviews are fake, go to Amazon and this program has extremely bad reviews and it’s all because the speech recognition is trash! I’ve traveled to 2 Spanish speaking countries and am getting better! Do the lessons and don’t be afraid to use what you have when you can! Practicing with fluent Spanish speakers is so helpful. On web it’s pretty solid. | The best app for learning a new language fun fast and easy | Es una aplicación increíble!!! gracias a esta he podido aprender francés y mejorar mi pronunciación a pesar de ser gratuita. La recomiendo mucho✔️✨❤️ | Love it! Makes learning fun | Is helping with my German | I’m a huge language nerd and have been studying with Rosetta Stone for a few weeks now. It’s a certain kind of learning style, one that is considered the most effective: emersion. There is no literal English translation, only pictures to explain what a certain word or phrase means. This is how infants and young children learn their first language, and is the scientifically proven best way to learn a new language. So if you want to learn quickly in the way that will stick best in your brain, I would download Rosetta Stone. I’ve also tried out other language apps, such as Duolingo, which is good, but doesn’t teach the language in full (depending on the language). But I would highly suggest Rosetta Stone. The only thing I would say is that the emersion process is really fast! I would just slow down the course a little to let the words and grammar sink in better. But other than that, it’s amazing. Thank y’all so much!❤️ | Using Rosetta Stone in addition to living in a Spanish speaking culture and taking in person lessons.  It’s a great help | Why do you have to pay !!!!!!!!!!!!! | I honestly love this app it can teach you almost any language. I rate this infinity out of 10. | I like the use of a lot of similar pictures for learning. | It works! Its fast! Its easy! | This is just SO good first it has lots of content and corses but duo is better still but no heat :P | I love Rosetta Stone and I love to learn Italian. | I was born in Costa Rica and when we travel there, I want my children to be able to speak to their relatives. This app is helping a lot. The only thing is that the microphone connection is poor. But other than that, this app is a lot of help.

                              Thank you! | Amazing app, I was learning Japanese on Duolingo and got nowhere. But now I’m using Rosetta Stone and can speak to my parents in Japanese , not like they understand it, this app is actually incredible. | I’m an intermediate Spanish speaker and Rosetta Stone is a better app experience than the other popular apps, which I’ve tried. I also think the content and structure of Rosetta Stone are better. | The speech recognition is very shaky. Sometimes- it works just fine. Right now, I’m trying to complete lessons for a college class and I can’t complete the lesson because of poor quality. I’ve tried using headphones on the computer, with my phone, with my computer microphone, and with my phones microphone. No matter what I do the 10 minute speaking lesson is taking 20+ minutes. Aside from speech recognition the app and website are great. | Rosetta Stone has made learning Italian so easy and fun! Lessons are quick and combine pictures for easy learning. | I love how it shows pictures without a translation. Feeling like a newborn figuring it out on my own. | Thank you thank you for helping kids that speak different languages learn new ones yes, so fun learning Portuguese | I have always wanted to learn Italian. I studied it as a child and got to an intermediate level. Now as an adult, I wanted to improve my speaking and after several attempts with other apps throughout the years, I didn’t feel any improvement. I have been learning with Rosetta Stone at the intermediate level for 4 weeks and I have learn so much! I feel that the sentences stay in my memory and  I don’t need to stop and think how to say this or that because phrases just come out of my mouth! Plus it is so much fun!! | Learning so much. The best place to learn! | For a very long time I’ve said I want to become fluent in another language. I’m so glad that I don’t have to be limited to only English anymore. This is only the beginning. | I like it and i know to say girl in Japanese | Listening randomly stops working so cannot get pronunciation unit complete | It doesn’t translate to you. So off of pictures you have to figure out what is being said. There’s no way you can learn that way. | Love this one | My microphone has 0 issues with anything other than Rosetta Stone. 

I have a 12 pro max and am yelling Spanish at the phone and it’s not picking it up. It acts like it can’t hear me. It’s extremely frustrating. | I am really enjoying learning Italian with this app, I would recommend this to people who would like to learn another language. | The instructions are so confusing. The app won’t advance if you can’t figure out the instructions to one part! The microphone doesn’t record.  I had to scream my replied into the microphone. I am out 199 and very disappointed! | I very much enjoy learning español with this program. I like that it jumps right into the lesson with pictures. I didn’t realize how much I was absorbing until like my 3rd day. I was like wow, I’m really starting to put small sentences together. The only thing that bothers me is the mic. I have a iPhone 14 Pro Max and the room is completely quiet but the app constantly says my mic is having poor connection and that get kind of frustrating. But other than that I love it. | Unbelievable waste of money, no explanations of concepts or vocabulary whatsoever. How can you learn a language without simple vocabulary or grammar in the lessons? | I just love how fast that I am learning! | I am trying to learn Turkish because my family speaks and I have learned so much in the past week I am speaking full dented already you don’t have to pay anything you just get the app and get started. There are many languages including a planner, timing and it even has a choice for you to speak into the mic or choose cards. This has helped me so much a fan now my mom is so proud of me and is now considering sending me to turkey to my family!!!! Thank you so much whoever created this app you have made my life so much easier and my experience with this app is just so good I could go on and on all day saying good things about this app. Also fun fact I’ve been using this app since I was 8 and I am way older now but I have stopped for a while Becuase I got bored but now that I am older I can’t wait to speak Turkish to family and I am so happy teşekkürler!! It means thank you in Turkish! 😉 | I signed up to learn French after a year of using DuoLingo. With Rosetta, I signed up as a complete beginner. Sheesh, it’s a good thing I had already been learning for a year now because their beginner course is not beginner at all. They jump right in with no explanation of anything. If I didn’t already have a little backround, I would be so lost. At least with DuoLing, they explains grammar structure as you learn it. So far, Rosetta does not. Not a fan so far but I’ll continue using here and there to see if I like it. Thankfully, I have a free membership through work or else this first impression would absolutely run me off. | They kinda just throw you right in but I enjoy it I’m also quick to get frustrated but it takes time can’t learn overnight but overall it’s great and I’m kinda hooked | I haves used Duolingo for two years. It’s not perfect, but ok. Tried Rosetta Stone. Lessons are worthless. No help no explanations - fail over and over again until it decides you pass. title: Alaska Airlines
description:
Travel light at each stage of your journey with our companion mobile app. Explore options, book trips, check in, and move hassle-free through airports. Find all the flight information that matters to you, as you need it. 

Features of our travel app:

• Book a flight using your percentage off code. You can use your miles too!
• Make sure to sign into your account; for easy access to all of your upcoming trips, view your balance, track your miles towards elite status, add credit cards and billing address
• Pre-order your Fruit & Cheese plate in Main Cabin and First Class (there's other goodies to choose from too)
• Add your Mileage Plan or TSA precheck numbers to your flight. How? Tap on your name on your flight or during check-in
• Never miss an important push notifications with Message center. Where you can find messages about flight delays, gate changes, and more
• Cancel your flight easily by tapping the 3 dots on the trip list
• Purchase a seat upgrade using Apple Pay (before check-in only)
• Check-in up to 24 hours before your flight
• Add your boarding pass, Mileage Plan and Lounge card to Apple Wallet for easy access
• Share your boarding pass, and flight details with family and friends
• Keep an eye on First Class and Standby wait lists
• Change to an earlier or later flight starting at 24 hours before your flight
• Add flight details to your iPhone’s calendar
• Track flights taken by friends and family
• Look up schedules

You can find additional information about the Alaska Air travel app by visiting alaskaair.com/mobile.

Thanks for sending us feedback at iphoneapp@alaskaair.com. We are listening, and welcome your suggestions.
releaseNotes:
For this release we’ve fixed a few UI issues and squashed a few more bugs.

Thanks for flying with us, and thanks for your help finding bugs. Please keep sending us feedback—we're always listening.
reviews:
The app is fine but the bad news is that you’ve already failed if you have to fly on this garbage airline. I don’t remember the last flight I had with Alaska where my flight was not cancelled and seats downgraded but I was still charged more money. | For clarity I fly Alaskan Airlines because I live in Alaska and you have the best flight schedule. Delta is by far the best American airline. I take Delta every chance I get. Alaska Airlines recently went to a no paper ticket boarding pass system. I do not like it. To be honest how do you expect elderly passengers to travel??? Or how about people with disabilities??? Or people that recognize that these digital devices are addictive and who want to go back to a flip phone? The new boarding pass system is not welcomed by all. | Why did it say to see a gate agent when I checked in when I picked my seat when I booked it then after I checked in it gave me the seat very confusing | Why save a credit card if your app continues to remove ot and make you add it every time - also it’s 2024 - start using Apple Pay! | The crew were so attentive to passengers needs, and the flight was smooth.
I like the head rests and small shelf to hold cell phones while charging.

At the top of my list to fly on ALASKA.
🙌 Danielle | Muy buen servicio y fácil documentación | I go to the app and there is no gate number.   No boarding time.   This app need more info | Went through the full booking and then the transaction failed on your end. Had to start over and my guess is the app thought the seats i selected during the failed transaction were taken. doubtful in the 3 min it took to go through the process again. | It is annoying that we are not able to add boarding pass to wallet | The apple wallet feature doesn’t work. It is not possible to add separe add for each person in the group. | Very pleased with the thoughtfulness and professionalism of staff and app usage and will highly recommend to friends and family in the future.  I look forward to future trips with Alaska Airlines. Thank you! | Not everyone can navigate today’s computerized world. A few of us were born in the late 1900’s. Several tries to set up had me frustrated. | Need to improve app | Your app was extremely easy to follow and do. Thank you for such good service ‼️🤙🏽😃 | The app doesn’t allow me to input my mileage number. | The Alaska website is very easy to use and it’s also very competent in that you can do all the things you need to do to schedule, purchase, and change travel plans. | App won’t allow me to add boarding pass to wallet. 😣 | Alaska Air app is easy to use, responsive and accessible. All I need for travel at my fingertips. | The best yet | If I have a flight first book the first thing that should show up on my app is the flight information.

If I have multiple flights, the first thing that should show on my screen is all my flights booked in the future-  all future flights. 

Connecting to the WiFi is not simple and unclear how to buy it prior to the flight.  The app is below average | Won’t let me sign in to my account or reset my password. The link it sends to me when I reset my password is an endless loop to the same link. Complete garbage | This airline is so great and then something goes wrong and it’s an hour or more to get someone on the phone. The message says we’ll call you back. So you don’t have to wait. Still waiting after multiple attempts to get a callback! That’s a drag. Work keeps me very busy and this extra time eats into what little free time I have. | While flying out of Orlando to Seattle I made an error on checking in bags.  I had three free bags and accidentally put the extra three on one ticket.  Which cost 345 when I went to customer service to fix they told me that well now I know better the. They charged me for a seventh bag that I didn’t have.  I then called customer service and asked for them to help and was told they couldn’t help me until I arrived in Seattle..  I called again and asked that the charges be changed and that I should only be charged 135.  I was rebated the 45 for the bag I didn’t have but I guess Alaska Air is so bad off that doing right by a long time customer and card holder wasn’t worth it. So much for customer service and support | Add passes to Apple Wallet broken and requires deleting and reinstalling the app | So easy to use and understand! | It works as well as your door plugs | Unable to pay for bags on the website. | Crew did not check that all electrical units working on plane until everyone is loaded  and ready to go they realized, so they gave us sit in a hot plane for over an hour then make us get off.. | The last couple times I flew I cannot get my TSA on my boarding pass. I am still in the process of trying to get that done on the computer. | Usually a solid app, but lately add to wallet is broken | Is it time to check in for my flight yet? I don’t know because the Trips view doesn’t show my trips and I have to force-quit the app and swipe down to force it to reload.

When it’s past time to check in the flight page doesn’t give me the option. Even when I have a message saying it’s time. Even when I’ve force-quit the app.

Oh, my partner checked me in, but Alaska didn’t pull my Known Traveller Number from my profile so I don’t have TSA Pre-Check.

After several more attempts I can finally re-check myself in and have a TSA Pre-Check boarding pass, but I can’t add it to Wallet. No amount of force-quit fixes this, but I can share the boarding pass into a new message and load the boarding pass into Wallet that way. | I took so long to pack my bags I barely made my flight. | Using this app made me feel more secure that everything was fine with my reservation to go home. Paid for meals & luggage as well. | Not intuitive, have to go online / web browser to access discount codes, other features, cant use hyphen in last names, authenticator doesnt work all the time perfectly, customer service isnt good. | No other airline I’ve flown requires me to download their app to check in. Not a great customer experience. | No stop overs. Pleasant flight attendants.
No delays too! Thank you! | Last two trips will not load into apple wallet. | We find that service is always the best, flights are on time and planes clean and comfortable! | do you benchmark against any of your competitors? | I’m in my 60s and not thrilled to need an app to do what I for so long did competently without a cell phone. Still, if I have to be enslaved by technology, at least it’s easy to use and pretty self explanatory. | Very disappointed that I paid for a lounge plus membership in January 2024,  and now it is not showing in the Alaska App and I can’t access the lounge on my trip. | I want to thank Judy from Boise for helping me book a flight to attend my father’s funeral. Dad dies yesterday and the funeral is on May 2, 2024. 

I was having difficulty finding something affordable but Judy helped me use my frequent flyer miles. She was very kind and that took one burden from my shoulders. 

It’s a wonderful company that hires such caring employees. 

Mariane Heisler | I like flying Alaska Airlines. Don’t get my wrong. I love their points system and most of the time they are on time. However, I have not seen any significant improvements or updates to the app since I started flying with Alaska Airlines in 2012. It uses the same analogy date system instead of making it digitized so you can easily scroll up and down to select travel dates. Instead you have to click for each month.  The app does not save your recent searched cities to make it easy when booking flights. You cannot switch between cities using a simple arrow when comparing departure and return flights. Adding boarding passes to Apple wallet should be one click instead of having to add multiple passes or connecting flights individually. I will be happy to see new changes to this app at least once in a while not the same app over a decade. Developers of this app need to take a look at other airlines apps and also keep up with technology. | Love Alaska Airlines! | I love the interface and information presented. However, after checking in, I was not able to add my e-tickets for myself and my partner in Apple Wallet. Tried following instructions using different internet connection on iPhone but nothing worked. 

Please conduct usability/back end testing to fix this problem. Thx, Trevor | I can’t get a seat assignment. It’s ridiculous that the ticket has been paid for a month ago. | Surrender to the AI war now | App is slow and doesn’t save the seats I requested AND PAID EXTRA FOR! Also boarding pass does not load to Apple Wallet, like my other airline apps do. | I really appreciate Alaska going nonstop to Seattle from Charleston. Great airline. | Seamless

title: Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story
description:
Welcome to Gossip Harbor 
Follow Quinn Castillo as her picture perfect life on Brimwave Island crumbles around her. Divorce, sabotage and secrets. Help answer the question everyone's thinking: Who's trying to ruin her life? 
Merge flavorful dishes, restore and decorate Quinn's restaurant and watch the mystery unfold. 
But who can you trust in Brimwave? 

Whip Up Tasty Dishes
Serve coffee, sandwiches, seafood, and a range of other dishes, to your customers. The more you play, the more dishes you’ll find to add to your menu!

Restore the Restaurant
Rebuild and design the best beach restaurant around! Choose the flooring, wallpaper and furniture to restore restaurant to its former glory! 

Build Relationships
Converse with customers and hang out with old friends. Or explore the possibility of a new budding romance. 

Catch up on the Gossip
You'll renovate and merged to reveal clues, and uncover hidden secrets of the residents on Brimwave Island. And perhaps even unveil the Castillo's hidden secrets…

Enjoying Gossip Harbor? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/GossipHarbor

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to serviceMergemerge@gmail.com
We're here to help you! 

Privacy Policy: https://diary.cdn.mergesigma.com/resources/privacy/privacy_2.0.html
Terms of Service: https://diary.cdn.mergesigma.com/resources/privacy/user_license_2.0.html
releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT: Amala is invited to the Brimwave Jazz Soiree! But she needs help to look sharp for a night out with some cool cats. Let's help her out!
reviews:
I just LoVE It | I really enjoy this game but the preview and adds are very misleading | i saw an add for this thinking this was some brain rot game but it’s actually very entertaining. the story’s are cute and sweet and the game is very engaging definitely a 10 out of a 10 | This game is awesome 👏 I love it so much!! I love playing this game! | not like the ads they have for it or the pictures she show in the app store. completely different game | So yeah. Free Ipad game, and it’s not boring or irritating. Been pretty enjoyable so far. | It’s not what was advertised with the child and mom stuck in the cold. | Found this game through an ad. Game is nothing like the ad. Many of the items don’t take too long to merge to reach (for example Love and Pies which takes ages to merge orders). It barely gets three stars because if the storyline.
