NOT WHAT IT SHOWS, DO NOT GET THIS GAME. Did 5 stars for it to put it on the front. | This game is the best you get to do everything that was in the ad your going to love it thinking of downloading it you definitely should | This game is fun but it’s NOTHING like the ads!and there is WAY TO MUCH DRAMA so thanks,but NO | This is a fun game. Enjoyed the real life story line. People will identify with the characters or know someone who is like them | The game play is completely different than what the ad shows you. | I loved this game. I’d even spend money on it occasionally. Then I started noticing charges on my card I didn’t approve. Somehow these purchases were going through while I was sleep and never popped up on my side at all. Only saw the charges left. The rewards from the purchase wouldn’t be on the app either so idk where the money was going. I finally decided to just delete the game and report it to Apple | POTATO LIGHTBULB WITH A GUINEA PIG JUDGE. And we call that an attention-getter, kids. Now on to the review! 

This game is incredibley enjoyable and intriguing. The merge game is relaxing and fun and the story had me hooked from the start. It's almost like reading fan fiction (not sure why I think that; I just do). 

The graphics are GORGEOUS and there are SO MANY AREAS to unlock in the restaurant, I'm very excited to do so. 

You'll see reviews saying that you can't play for a long time because you run out of energy, which is true. I kind of like that as it moderates my screen time. Also it's free and there's no ads unless you willingly watch one for a prize so I see no reason to complain. 

The only thing negative I have to say (and not even really negative at that) is there are some more adult themes and also some LGBTQIA+ tones which I personally am not a fan of. But to each his own, I'm very satisfied with this game. 

Thank for taking the time to read and if you're considering downloading this game, let this be your sign to do so.

title: Alice's Dream ： Merge Games
description:
Summary
Alice as a child, she heard stories about adventures in Wonderland. Yet, she journeyed through time to a Fairyland she dreamed of. As Alice navigated Wonderland, she encountered residents and resolved their issues. Over time, Alice has come to know the truth about Wonderland's destruction.

What will she do when she encounters bizarre situations and new challenges?

Features
A vast worldview
The scenery ranges from fresh fields and mysterious woods to a royal palace. During Alice's adventures, players will see classic scenes from Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.

Delicate scenes
Speaking plants, giant mushrooms like wise men... The classic scenes have been redesigned and presented to the players in a brand-new way.

Merge and scene repair
Each item player merged can be used to repair scenes with the storyline of Wonderland's destruction and rebuilding. By merging items to a higher level, players gradually restore Wonderland to its former glory.

Order System and Magic Cuisine
The residents will provide Alice with magic cuisines as a thank-you gift for rebuilding their home. Besides being delicious, the cuisine has magical effects. According to original stories, Alice shrank to her original calf size after drinking liquid marked "DRINK ME.". A bite of bread could also cause her to grow as large as Mr. White Rabbit's house. Other effects require you to explore!

Download and explore the world of Merging and Fairy Tales now! This is the best merge game! Let's play wih your friends. Friends are waiting for you to match,morph,and merge! 

By downloading and using this app, you agree to the Terms of Use at 
https://sites.google.com/view/pipepuzzletermsofservice/home
https://sites.google.com/view/pipepuzzlesprivacypolicy
releaseNotes:
Welcome to "Alice's Dream: Merge Games", the new version has been released, come and experience it now!
·Fixed some bugs
·New activity updates

Some people don’t want to have to read all the chats. | Great graphics and endless fun for all ages | Nice | The cutest merge game ever 🥹🥹🥹🥹 the cute little baby tinker bell and everything about Alice in Wonderland 🥹🥰 soooo cute | I enjoy the game but it seems unless I purchase items I have to wait to play longer. title: Upside: Cash Back - Gas & Food
description:
Unlock Cash Back with the free Upside App!




Upside gets you cash back on daily essentials like gas, groceries, and dining. It's designed to reward you for simply being yourself, allowing you to indulge in more of what you love. With over 50,000 participating gas stations, grocery stores, and restaurants, cash back opportunities are always just around the corner. 




Users earn an average of 8% cash back on groceries and dining—that’s on TOP of your current credit card rewards - even on debit card purchases!




And yes — it’s real cash back. No confusing rewards, points, or credits. Just actual money you can transfer straight to your bank account or PayPal. You can also cash out your earnings as an e-gift card to retailers you love, like Amazon, Walmart, and so many more.
 


With Upside, you can earn up to 25¢/gal cash back on gas, up to 45% back at restaurants, and up to 30% back at grocery stores. These earnings add up quickly — frequent users earn an average of $340 per year just for adding Upside to their normal routine. 





HOW IT WORKS
(1) Claim your offer through the app
(2) Pay as usual with any credit or debit card
(3) Either Check In, or scan receipts
(4) Cash out whenever you want!




Here are a few places where you can earn cash back with Upside: 




GAS
Phillips 66, Shell, Valero, Circle K, Marathon, Chevron, Exxon, Mobil, TA, 7-Eleven, Love’s, BP, Casey’s, Sunoco, and more






RESTAURANTS
Papa John’s, Dairy Queen, Domino's, Marco's, Arby's, Checkers, KFC, Popeyes, Rally's
Taco Bell, Primanti Bros, Wendy’s, and more






GROCERY STORES
Cardenas, Carlie C's, Coborn's, Gelson's, Piggly Wiggly, Price Chopper, Save A Lot, Schnucks, Fresh Foods IGA, Geissler's, Acme, and more




Download Upside to earn cash back on your essentials.
releaseNotes: We’ve made improvements to Upside’s Pay with App feature for a more intuitive and seamless experience in more locations.
reviews:
This is honestly one of the best apps for saving money for essentials. | I have only been successful one time in earning any cashback in fact, it is costing me money because instead of entering my member number at various gas stations, I rely on the app. If it worked for me like it works for my friends, I would give it five stars. But for me, I only give it a one because I can’t give it a zero. | Real cash back, AWESOMEEEEE🤩 | Is the best | I drive about 1300 miles a week, so I use a lot of gas. However, in about 3 years of using the app I’ve only gotten $300 back. Also, for the last several months, I only seem to get a penny back per gallon. It’s not even worth the time. | Great | I absolutely love this money saving app and literally get paid to make everyday purchases. It’s great! | The only thing that I could say and it just happened I accidentally swiped the upload option. And I cannot find how to upload my receipt to claim my last offer. Gas and in-store merch. Other than this I am thoroughly enjoying. Who wouldn’t like extra cash on things that are necessities. If anyone knows how to remedy this please share. Thank you bunches. | I was going to rate it lower than 3 stars considering the whole point of this app is to cash in on the savings, however over 50% of my gas purchases using their qualifying stations, don’t get processed and they expire after the pending period. Haven’t used it for any other savings other than gas so I’ll give it 3stars for now | I’ve had upside for about 2 years and I loved it but this past month it’s not been working. It’ll say processing then expired and that’s on my last 6 transactions. Mind you I actually have used this app a lot so now I’m a little sad it stopped working. | We have used this app numerous times, especially on gas. We save money on fill ups. A few of our favorite restaurants are on this app, more savings. I noticed on your new commercial, you advertised groceries? I see no grocery stores on the app? That might be considered misleading, unless you only have groceries in certain areas. Otherwise, this actually pays out, I have cashed out & will continue to use this. I agree with one review, sometimes it doesn’t load your usage when fueling up, having to manually try to record the transaction. | Haven’t received any call back since last year. I only use on gas purchases. I only have one card on file and always get an expired response | I’ve cash out for $100 for less than a year!! | Some rewards apps make you have to jump through 100s of hoops and accumulate so many points before you can cash out. Not this app. I can cash out (at least $10) after 3-4 trips to the pump depending on if I decide to go out my way to participating locations (no sheetz). 

I’d say it’s worth it. You do have to give them your debit card number instead of uploading a photo of the receipt for some locations. | I uploaded upside for gas cash back, 1 In 10 transactions get approved, too much hassle to find the gas station that has an offer and then claim, and most times it’s not approved. Do t waste your time on this app | I always have issues with them expiring. Yes they’ll manually add it after like a week after it tries to get the information. In my opinion that’s too long. Wish I could just simply add the receipt every time to prevent any issues.. didn’t go through, and used a bonus? Good luck getting that fixed. Need the screenshot of it to show them. Otherwise you took a loss. I keep trying to find the good in the app but it always seems like a hassle. | I think Upside is amazing. You can get free money by just making the normal purchases that you will make anyways…… I think it is a must have app…… | I would give more stars, but upside claims to give cashback but there’s barely any qualified store or restaurant in my area. Even if there were. The cashback is even lower than 5% like they claim from their commercial. It’s pretty misleading. Stores you shop at? Barely any in site. Restaurant? Just on or two in my area qualified. Gas station? It’s just a few but it’s not even places that I go to. Wish they offer more for Pensacola, but unfortunately there’s not much to worth using this app. | This app is for real the real deal. I use it all the time and it literally pays to use it!!! | I am very excited to see the real cash rewards on gasoline purchases.  I’m really happy I’m able to get some money back into my checking account.  Gas/Diesel prices are sky rocketed.  Every cent counts.   Thank you | The app itself was great. I was able to get a little over 20 dollars cash back balance in the app in less than a month and a half. I went to use the app recently and was signed out. I changed my password & once I was able to log back in my balance was gone. 
Emailing the company was no help. All they did was repeatedly ask me to provide them with another email. I had no other to provide because I only use one email and reiterated this to them multiple times.
I lost the cash balance because they couldn’t find my account from their end. And they were very unprofessional, patronizing & not helpful with my issue. 
Basically saying sorry nothing we can do for you have a great day. | I use to use this app everyday for purchasing gas. All of a sudden once I built up a cash balance I was locked out of my account and haven’t been able to get help to recover my information. | I’ve been using upside for a few years now and I love it! It’s not just for gas, they also have several local restaurants and some grocery stores with cash back offers. | Enter the code “MP5VTZ” during signup for an extra 15¢/gal off👍 My family has been using this for a couple of months and it has been great. In the beginning with bonus discounts we were seeing around 60¢/gal off at some places, 20% off grocery, 40% off restaurants, just wild! Discounts seem to mostly go down after that though, and your offers will be different from your friends and family. We asked Upside support about this and they said your discounts depend on a wide range of factors that are always changing, both on your end and for each business. Time of day, how often you go, how much the business wants to discount, etc. I’ve noticed that some restaurants and grocery stores will have a limited number of offers that you can claim in a day as well, so keep an eye out for that. Upside support also clarified that active bonuses will show up on the current discounts you see, but will be applied to the next incoming transaction, which you might have already done, and it’s just taking days to process. So this can also be a little confusing but so far all of our transactions seem to have gone through no problem. Sometimes it just takes 2–5 days. My first gas experience needed a photo of the receipt, and needed me to type extra info about the station, but since then most places don’t require anything, apparently they match your card’s last digits with the business’ records to verify. Also your card info is submitted through Stripe which I already use and is very secure. Don’t expect transactions, cash back, and cash outs to happen quickly. Rather look at this as an occasional rebate where you get a nice chunk of cash you’ve built up, after you’ve waited to pass the $15 minimum of cashing out with no fee. So far for us it has been a great app that is helping us save money and also helping some of our local businesses receive more customers, which is great! 👍 | Veremos a ver que tal sale por lo tanto le dejaré una reseña de 3 estrellas en lo que veo si es verdad que cumple This free app gets you cash back on gas! Use promo code SABDIEL3534 | Upside is great especially when you get cheaper gas while earning cash back. Thanks Upside!! | The app is user friendly and hassle free. Who doesn’t love getting rewards for everyday purchases like gas and food. | There’s no way you can earn $5 by pumping gas especially with the prices and only pennies on the amount of gallons | It’s not much but every $ counts! And it is super easy to do. | Excellent App. I've already saved almost $300 | I purposefully go to businesses that use upside! Wonderful app easy to use. With this economy you need to save as much as you can. Thank you Upside! | What a plus when I discovered it today. I need to be more observant and use Upside more often | Great free app to save money and it’s all legit. | Good savings on gas for cash back and restaurants. Use it every time i get gas now | Thought I’d try it after seeing it would give me good gas rate; but it brought me to an Arco gas station that was closed down.  Found out from a local it’s been shut down for over a year!! | I’ve been using this app for a couple of years for fuel for my personal and business vehicles and I’ve saved a lot | I love the app | Awesome, no complaints | With gas prices forever on the rise cutting into our monthly budget significantly I really appreciate this Upside app to save on every gallon. | Update 4/22/24
Since it’s been over a year I thought I’d give it another try.

Same crappy service. I’m done won’t be back.

App was recommended by a trusted source. Regrettably the app relies on capturing your debit / credit card number to track purchases. Which would be fine if they would match it to the restaurant you ordered from. I grabbed a 7% off from Bueno Ye Sano. I ordered online and picked up. The receipt does not have the last 4 of my card. Which would be fine if the app didn’t count on matching the card number to my receipt. Try to get app customer service about this and they are non existent. The answer bot says it can’t answer questions. I’ve not had any issues with gas purchases and this was my first (and now only) restaurant. I traveled over 10 miles to save 7%. Which I will not get. That purchase was Saturday and it’s now almost 11pm on Monday. The worst part is that I have 2 good burrito bars in my town. Both less than a mile from me. | I click claim, then use my credit card and click I’ve paid.  I thought I was earning cash back, but I just realized my cash never shows up. It says it has expired (which it isn’t supposed to do.) I tried to contact Upside support, but you have to provide a date, a receipt and a store. I have about 10 of them, some as far back as December.

This is very disappointing! | I’ve submitted pictures of receipts and they are stuck in “progress” and later deleted. It’s a waste of time. I’m highly disappointed. | Used to receive rewards with no problem most of the time but now, likely most transaction now will expire and waste of time using this app. might as well use the apps they recommend not to use to earn rewards. | Upside logged me out of my account without my knowledge or consent.

So: questions for company:

I already know the answer to the last question: No. 

Or am I wrong?? Prove it. | It doesn’t cost anything besides a few moments of your time and I’ve collected about $80 | Delete and find a better app | This app is clearly a scam. I’ve tried to get gas back over five different times and it’s never giving me the money back for it so I don’t understand how other people are saying it does it for them maybe in certain areas and not certain areas but that’s not fair for everybody. This app really doesn’t make sense to me.scammers | This app is so easy to use. I literally get money back for doing what I have to do anyway…putting gas in my car. title: Yelp: Food, Delivery & Reviews
description:
Yelp has over 199 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp.com/support
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: Minor updates and improvements, making Yelp better for you one release at a time.

Paid over $200 for a pric fixe dinner tonight at Indian Accent in NYC. Such a totally underwhelming experience. I have dined there prior to the pandemic and couldn’t wait to go back! What happened Chef Vikas Khanna?
The amuse bouche soup was tepid and the flavors of the coconut milk clashed with a tart ingredient I couldn’t put my finger on
The first course appetizer chaat spheres were good but could have used a little more of the peas
The second course pav bhaji had red chili powder that was way too much and more importantly raw - I had to request butter (which they didn’t have) but were nice enough to provide yogurt to temper the taste of the raw chili prefer
The main course I ordered the Arbi with veg nihari- had some uncooked/ dry rice
I passed on dessert as I didn’t want to be disappointed further
Sad as I really looked forward to going back
Trying Gupshup on Saturday
Will try to get into Bungalow - cannot get reservations

For the amount I have spent at that store, the unapologetic and cavalier attitude from the owner - who I literally had to hound for a response - is clearly a statement about how he views his customers and the quality of work which is quite poor.

Excellent day. I've been turning my friends onto it daily to try it. You won't be sorry. The food is molta Bella 🇮🇹👍 | Yelp is probably a good app. I don’t think I take advantage of everything they have to offer.  Sometimes hard to navigate, at least for me. Mainly use it to find restaurants in foreign towns and cities. Pretty helpful in most cases. | Love this place the coil is amazing but today I had beef enchiladas, which were very tasty! Tina had chili Renos, which were awesome and there was so much food we took more than half home with us | Fun and friendly place for the whole family. I would recommend coming here on the weekends with friends and family. Don’t forget to check in on Yelp to get free tokens. Located inside Westminster Mall right next to JC Penny | Very friendly staff and delicious food, we have been looking for a great Mexican place to go as a family and I finally found the place! I 100% recommend this place! | Super place!? | I’ve avoided many mistakes by reading the reviews. | We went for happy hour. I got the Meat Lasagna and a glass of Cabernet. It was a nice and relaxing atmosphere and the staff was friendly. Will definitely go back. | Went to the Krystal for breakfast at my favorite store on South Broad Street and made a point to get there before 11 o’clock when they stop serving breakfast. There three egg breakfast platter is always good and filling. I have a watch that is extremely accurate, so I walk into the restaurant and waited for someone to come out front knowing that breakfast should still being served. When she stuck her head around the corner from the pick up window I gave her my order, she shrieked back at me that “breakfast is closed!” I replied that looking at my very accurate watch which read 10:55 and said “but it’s not eleven o’clock yet.” She shouted back that it was after 11 pointing at a display that I could not see. I said “Mame it’s five minutes ‘til by my watch” at which point the manager sticks his head around the corner and shouted “it’s five minutes past eleven and breakfast is closed” refusing to serve me my usual three egg platter that is always good and fresh. I showed him my watch showing 10:55, and he threatened to call the police. 
      I patronize that Krystal regularly and have found the service to be good,and I usually leave a generous tip to the same lady that has been there for years which I feel certain she appreciates. 
     I will go back to that Krystal, one of the Many Krystal Restaurant that I designed the drive up windows for over fifty years ago and which I have patronized ever since. If either of those rude, lying individuals is there, I will get their names, add them to my list of liars, and leave.  
     I will continue to write accurate reviews on all the Krystals I patronize, and maybe the service will be better, and they will stop lying about setting their clocks 10 minutes forward. If I were their supervisor, I would fire both of those lying individual on the spot. KRYSTAL, YOU CAN DO BETTER!!! 
   Signed. A disappointed patron of over 70 Years | Wanted to try a new place for anniversary dinner. I ordered surf and turf. Filet was just fine- nothing special about it. But I was served spoiled lobster tail. The odor was so intense I am not sure how their chef let it out of the kitchen. Yeah not the greatest experience for $250 price | I just finished a tour of seven countries in Europe . This hotel was my favorite . Excellent service . Very comfortable . The staff was very helpful and friendly . I will definitely be back with my family . Located in a safe area . We walked to the near mall and felt safe . | Good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good love? | Overpriced, average bbq and bad service. Bartender probably said 3 words to me while I was there and it wasn't crowded. | Bought a Nissan at Olympia Nissan with the help of Tira Morrow, sales.
Very professional and no pressure 
Very happy with the service at Olympia 
Joanne D | We stopped in for dinner and drinks and had a wonderful time great atmosphere.  The food was so good and the service was incredible.  A must try | I’ve recently started looking at yelp for reviews to help me find the best info on the places I want to be going to and I have not been let down so far amazing reviews and amazing people. Thank you.

title: PayByPhone Parking
description:
The PayByPhone app simplifies your journey. From registering and paying for your parking in seconds, to extending it without having to return to your vehicle, and reminders of when it ends, we know you have more to worry about than parking. The PayByPhone app can be used in over 1,000+ cities worldwide & is now available in 12 languages, making it easier than ever. As the highest rated parking app in the world, PayByPhone has helped over 72 million motorists pay for their parking simply and easily, so they can focus on what matters most to them.
For businesses signed up to PayByPhone Business, the app allows drivers to simply switch between business and personal payment cards on the PayByPhone app when they park, so no time-consuming monthly expense reports or saving receipts. Paying for parking with PayByPhone is more environmentally-friendly than paying with cash: there are fewer vehicles on the road adding to air pollution to collect cash from pay and display machines.
App features
- Start and extend parking session from your iPhone
- View your session with the Today View Widget
- Use Maps or Nearby feature to find out where you can use PayByPhone
-Opt into push and SMS notifications about your parking session expiration 
- View parking history
- Pin location of vehicle once parked to find it easily
- Get receipts emailed to you for convenient expense reconciliation
Flexible payment forms, including credit card, Apple Pay, and PayPal (depending on region) 


You can pay for parking with PayByPhone in USA, Canada, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, Italy, Monaco, and Switzerland
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using PayByPhone. We update our app regularly to make parking even easier. Each update includes reliability and performance improvements. We'll also let you know about important new features.

In this update:
- UI/UX improvement


Love PayByPhone? Rate our app! Your feedback helps make us better.
reviews:
I love this app!!
It is a seamless system for parking and I can add time from my phone! Love it! | The app makes paying for parking a breeze. I especially enjoy being able to pay from the train on days when I pull into the parking lot just as the train is arriving. | It was ridiculous the amount of steps, and codes to pay. verifying by email, then by phone . Takes too long to pay !!!!!!!! | There is no limit on length of parking here. Why is there a limit on this app? Are you trying to have it run out and then charge me. I will be away from my car longer than your app allows. This feels like a purposeful move on your part to cause me to pay a fine to you. | App doesn’t work! Did not extend parking. Got a ticket. You need to fix your bugs. | Where  in the app can I get fees that apply to Ft Lauderdale residents? | All good!! 😊 | No notification on Lock Screen about how much time left | I have a few license plates under my account and accidentally clicked the wrong license plate for three hour parking stay. Realized it only seconds after I started the parking and trying to switch license plate to the correct one - no options to do this. The virtual assistant did not help and basically told me to re- purchase the parking, no refund options. This is not a good practice. | Why is there a pop up ad for Wal-Mart?
You are making enough money from on this app I shouldn’t have you soliciting for Wal-Mart. | The app keeps glitching. It has caused me to get TWO tickets while trying to pay. | You already have my card info. Don’t make me get my card out!!! | Accept Amex | Why have the feature when they never work? | I repeat your app is garbage | $0.50 meter rate cost $1.20 with fees.
Carry quarters! | 15 minutes is supposed to be free. But this is still charging me. | It allows to park for 3 hours but can only get 1 hour | Borderline entrapment of forced parking ticket due to instability of payment processing. | Very impressed with the ease and functionality | Fast app! | This app is so easy to use. I appreciate how it interacts with my Apple Pay- making parking very simple

It’s the easiest of all the parking apps | Apple Pay doesn’t work | Miami price gouging paid 10$ for 2 hours next 2 $30 hours @ the Bay | Can’t always tell where I’m supposed to pay for parking when there is no meter, and the ap doesn’t always let you select a location… I got a $100 ticket because this ap wouldn’t let me put time on the meter 😡 | App crashed on a Friday night.  I was at a show that was going longer than I originally anticipated and wanted to add time to the parking.  The app kept spinning and a red banner came up saying the app was experiencing issues. I had to leave the show early in order to avoid a possible parking ticket. | Easy to used and manage thank you keep the good work 👍 | I love this app but the lot I use has a problem where many of the stalls do not appear on the app so parkers must pay by license plate instead of stall number and I don’t see a way to do that in the app. | It would helpful if you carry over your payments from one parking spot to another.  Although you can extend. You can’t get a return of time 
Some places you can only stay 2 hours. So you have to keep moving 

Parking is not visitor friendly. 
Some times it’s hard to get a signal and the app processes for a long time. 
Times that are free to park is not posted clearly

There are street sweeper times to watch out for and towing hours to watch out for 

It would be nice if you left before your time was up you could either use that money for the next spot or get a refund. It’s not like a parking meter and the next user can use the rest of your time. | App is so much better than the machine. | this is is so unreliable and somehow is completely imbedded into vancouver bc parking. twice in two days i have gotten tickets bc of app malfunction and guess what, conveniently there is no way to get help outside of waiting for a bot email. | I tried to extend time 4 times.  The app wouldn’t let it do hours. Only mins. It didn’t send me messages on time left 
It’s not as user friendly as I need | Quick and easy way to pay the meters. Wish more places would use this as the way to pay for parking. | I am paying for parking and should not have to scroll through offers! | This app used to be awful years ago- I used to pay and still get tickets.  No way to resolve so it got expensive!  BUT, they have worked out the bugs- hasn’t happened since 2020… I only use this feature because there’s no other option to park at my job. | Lots of issues. Never works well. Hate it. | Love being able to pay and extend my parking through the app. Love the reminders that my time is almost up!  Love not getting a parking ticket because I forget or can’t make it back to a meter in time. Love love love’ | What a horrid application. Had to download in order to pay for parking because the card stripe reader wasn’t working and it was a terrible experience. One use and I’m already receiving ads. Had to save a credit card with the app owner in order to pay for parking instead of being able to utilize Apple Pay, PayPal, etc. Stay far away. | Love this. It’s quick and easy to use. | My Dog loves your parking and convenience to pay online with his paw. | I am not sure what the purpose of multiple choice adverts. | Works better than every other parking payment app out there. Every time, no fuss, it simply does what you need. | I don't want to see ads and offers after I've paid for parking. I turned all the "Promotions and Privacy" off; why do I still see them? | Every couple weeks it declines all my payment methods and I have to Delete and reinstall the app every time | An awesome lil app with a sharp design that empowers and puts control into the hands of people who park. The app conveniently recalls previous parking data making the process faster and worry-free. The notifications keep car owners aware of the parking countdown while offering a link to extend parking seamlessly. After years of submitting to the Parking Demon, I’ve broken from the chains with the tech-leveraged magic of PayByPhone! | Parked at 4hours max spot. App only allowed to pay for 1 hour and then only extend by 30 minutes at a time. Sometimes extend failed as well, so had to keep retrying

UPDATE: Turns out that you can pay for 4 hours. There is a field where you can enter arbitrary number of minutes/hours to pay for, but it is not obvious at all. Numbers you are presented are just suggestions. Bumping to 3 stars. | Gadzooks this is klunky and awful.  This sort of app has no business not integrating with Apple Pay so that it’s all one tap that doesn’t need me to give a real credit card number to whoever runs this.  It certainly has no business using a wonky credit card camera scanner that forces you to use a tiny area of the screen and then omits digits every time.

Most restaurants have this working nicely without an app at all, just scan a QR code to pay, why does this even exist? | Makes parking so easy. Love the extend feature. | La
Aplicación se demora para cargar por debilidad en la señal
De Internet | There are 2 apps in Miami in which you’re allowed to park with. Parking mobile and PayByPhone. By mistake I hit the wrong app and paid a location in which my car wasn’t. The app transfers you to this stupid bot that will not give you a refund.

title: discovery+ | Stream TV Shows
description:
discovery+ is the streaming home of Food, Home, Travel, True Crime, Paranormal and so much more. Watch exciting, can’t miss Original series plus all your favorite shows from the best TV brands. There's something for everyone.

Here's what discovery+ offers you:
• Enjoy all your favorites from the best TV brands including: HGTV, Food Network, TLC, ID, DMAX, Magnolia, Animal Planet, Travel Channel, Discovery Channel and more. Channel availability varies by region.
• Live sport action*
• Must-see 90 Day Fiancé series and other incredible reality moments.
• Award-winning collection of the best natural history series and breath-taking documentaries.
• An ever-growing catalog of new TV series and episodes.
• Full access to watch anytime, anywhere across compatible devices. (Please visit our Help Center for list of compatible devices)**
• Browse or search with ease across the best in: True Crime, Paranormal & Unexplained, Relationships, Reality, Home, Sports*, Adventure & Exploration, Food, Documentaries, Lifestyle, Nature & Animals, Science & Technology, and Automotive.
• Cast from your mobile or tablet device to the big screen with Chromecast and Airplay.
• Download your discovery+ favorites so you can watch on-the-go (only available to Ad-Free subscribers in the US & Brazil).
• Jump back into your favorite show with Continue Watching or save an episode to watch later with My List.

Content, TV brands, functionality & features shown vary by region and may not be available in your country.


*Live sports only available in select countries.
**Internet required 


Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all regions. 


To learn more, visit our privacy notices here: https://corporate.discovery.com/discoveryplus/legal/privacy/


Cookies & Tracking Technologies Notice: corporate.discovery.com/discoveryplus/legal/cookies-and-tracking-technologies-notice/


For help in the U.S and Canada, please visit our Help Center:  help.discoveryplus.com
For help in all other regions, please visit our Help Center: https://support.discoveryplus.com/

For Terms of Use in Brazil, please visit: https://www.discoveryplus.com/br/contrato-de-assinatura
For Terms of Use in India, please visit: https://www.discoveryplus.in/terms-of-use
For Terms of Use in all other regions, please visit: https://corporate.discovery.com/discoveryplus/legal/terms-of-use
releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Love the app? Let us know!

Have a question? Visit https://help.discoveryplus.com/hc/en-us
reviews:
I was recently forced onto this ill conceived, slovenly app when MotorTrend+ shut down and moved everything to Discovery+.  Since that moment I have not been able to Chromecast any one of the shows I previously enjoyed.  It causes me to wonder what the + stands for.  Is the ‘+’ symbolizing the additional difficulty and needless complexity that has added to my life?  Is the ‘+’ a moniker to denote the extra helping of 1000 lb sisters or 90 day fiancé that I could now weave into my highly gasoline and motor oil based viewing diet?  I think not.  I’m sure there is an executive somewhere at Discovery that, in a fit of originality and to make a name for himself, decided that it was too much expense to keep a separate and functional application for the gearheads and that we would all be better off if we could toggle in between a good old fashioned engine swap and getting a polygamous baptism from a few episodes of Sister Wives.  Those of us familiar with the 80s blockbuster ‘Ghostbusters’ learned early on not to “cross your streams”.  Well, in this case, I am afraid combining these two apps has resulted in a chain reaction that has caused total protonic reversal.  In layman’s terms, “I’m out!”

And Sure!  I’d love to cancel.  The only problem is that I never actually signed up with Discovery+, so the mechanisms to stop this meaningless drivel from entering my home are and likely will remain a mystery.  Under traditional circumstances I would likely close with something to the effect of, “Shame on you, Discovery.”  However, I think the exploitation of a few morbidly obese women and the normalization of others on the fringe of society is enough proof to demonstrate that shame is no longer an effective deterrent.  So maybe just a generic “Way to go!  Good job!!” Will be sufficient to speed the Discovery channel along towards bankruptcy. | The app functions and has many features of other streaming apps. My one gripe is that the app doesn’t support a simplified log in when it is installed on multiple platforms. It still requires that you log in normally with your password when installed across multiple devices. The use of a QR code or other activation code when doing an install on another device (other streaming apps like YouTube, Prime Video, Paramount+, etc all do this and it makes life so much easier when installing on a Smart TV and logging in with screen-based keyboards). 

Otherwise, the app seems stable and I’ve had no problems this far. | They killed street outlaws and npk. Not worth paying anymore. | Has lots of stuff to watch. The adding of Motor Trend into the fold of the app is what’s keeping me on it. | Quit messing with us! If it’s on Discovery and is a original Discovery program put it on D+. Having to buy another app to just watch a couple shows I like but is NOT on D+ is ridiculous. | The app went from great to good.  The reason being is that a lot of seasons were removed from shows I watch like Monsters & Mysteries, etc. | I enjoy watching the paranormal shows. I am elderly and bed bound an I enjoy watching on my iPad. | I love the shows and like that I can watch them on my schedule. | I love the shows, love everything except one thing… I wish I could turn off auto play. If I fall asleep to Mike Rowe talking in how the universe works I hate waking up hours and episodes later. I wish I could turn off auto play but that’s still a small issue compared to how much I love it | They are not airing anymore street outlaw shows. Without that it’s not worth having for a couple shows like gold rush! | I LOVE this program. However, you haven’t updated Seaon 9 & 10. Why?  I have been waiting and waiting for you to update the show.  Please put them on? | Me encanta solo quisiera que tuviera el idioma  español | Over a year ago, I saw a Verizon ad about Discovery +. It caught my eye because I could see it on my iPhone, TV, computer, etc.. The more I read, the more interested I became. So I got my Discovery + added on my iPhone. I also saw the option for not having ads popping up. That was great! I have enjoyed Discovery + since then, everyday and night. I can put my earbuds in, enjoy it at night, not disturb my husband like TV could. I love the “No Ads” option! Now, if I don’t have my Discovery+, I am devastated. I am now thinking seriously about putting it on all our TVs. Much better option than cable to me. Do I recommend Discovery+? Absolutely! Every chance I get. It is the best and very reasonably priced!
         Happy User, Janice G.   N.Carolina | Funny | I’d like to see more crime and mystery shows or documentaries based on real life .. like newer missing people, unsolved or solved homicides,  shows about addiction and addicts… just real life struggles that everyday people go through… those are the best shows by far | .. | I love discovery + it has so many shows and things to do.  It is a great channel. Thank you . | On Roku, anytime I watch an episode it will revert back as unwatched or partially watched. Super annoying. I thought it was a bug, but it has been going on for months. Then I tried stopping the show at the end, letting the next show start (why does shows I do not have saved start here, that’s another issue I don’t like), rewinding, fast forwarding… nothing prevents it from showing episodes I have watched as not. | This app has to many problems and they don’t seem to fix them. I was watching moonshiners on my other iPad and my screen had purple showing up in different spots then the whole screen turned purple and I’ve thrived every thing even called the geek squad they looked at it and couldn’t get to go away and I couldn’t do any thing with it, so I had to buy a new iPad again then  with my new iPad after I got it all loaded I installed discovery+ again and with in two day the same thing happened again. I’ve lost two thousand dollars on two iPads plus my subscription paying for something I can’t even watch. I gonna cancel my subscription . | Hi discovery plus really love this app thank you for adding episodes from guy’s groceries games season 35 you do know you still missing part 1 of Antonia vs jet and part 2 Antonia vs jet as well. | Does not show you the program while you are fast forwarding or rewinding like all the others. Not even worth mentioning the rest, as I have sent them emails and they’ve done nothing to fix anything. | The River bank flows bro | Paying fora subscription I no longer can use on my iPad due to iOS 13 requirement. | If you are using a phone to stream to the tv or plug into the tv to play it will constantly stop working and say theres an error. Sometimes it will work fine for hours, sometimes it will mess up ever 30 seconds | I love watching Mythbusters, but I noticed that several episodes are missing, even whole seasons. Please check! | There is no Spanish at all. My wife loves all shows from TLC. She prefer Spanish speaking. Most streaming services have Spanish speaking. | One of my favorite parts of the day | Got this app to stream street outlaws NPK.  Waited long enough.  I’m out. | Worse streaming app ever. Nearly impossible to watch anything | Amazon Prime and Discovery both said that the series Expedition Deep Ocean was available when purchasing Discovery+.  We purchased this app based on that information. The Discovery App says that this series is not available.

Watch out for false promises - we have enough streaming apps. We will cancel this subscription. | Can always find something to watch! Also shark week central. | I’m an advent fan of the food network and HGTV, so when the discovery streaming app was launched, I was thrilled to take full advantage of streaming without ads. This streaming app has been live for 3 or 4 years and the kinks still haven’t been worked out!! 

I’ll start with the most aggravating thing I deal with is the need to log back into my account so many times! It doesn’t matter if I’ve been watching every day or hadn’t turned it on in weeks, I’m constantly having to log back in. What’s even more frustrating is when you have to log back in, there’s no ease of administration, like a QR code. The keyboard on the app is so joke, it’s so first generation streaming!! With Apple, Amazon or Netflix, they make it convenient to log back in when necessary, so please take a look at what your competitors are doing to provide the best user friendly log in possible. 

The app doesn’t use any AI to facilitate what you might like based on the content you’ve watched.

If you’re trying to find something you’ve been watching and can’t find it on the network, then you have to exit out of the network and do a search for all of the networks the app supports. 

The buffering has gotten better but it’s still too much. 

The app loses where you are in a show or it’ll go black with no reason. 

It’ll ask you if you want to skip the intro but not every time when you’ve been streaming the same show & come on, who wants to watch a 1 to 4 minute intro!!

Just please get it right developers and listen to your biggest fans. | This is for the Samsung tv app.   Stop with the logging out.  Do you have any idea how hard it is to use a remote to enter the login and password?  There is absolutely no reason to log me out on my TV.   Rather large and attached to the wall. | AUsome | This streaming service is my favorite with plenty to of good educational content! | Disappointed by not being able to update! Cancel my subscription! | I’m here for Mud Madness, that show is great!! | The app works fairly well, all that’s needed it to have the option to use full screen mode and when you move your phone it doesn’t stop every time. | I like this app because they had all the good ID crime stories. Now all they have is repeats. I see new shows in ID but Discovery+ don’t show them on the app! I’m paying $8.99 a month and I’m seriously sick of watching reruns . I love my crime stories.  So I may be looking for another app to watch. | Loved the app right up to this morning when I was prompted to update the app. Come to find out my old iPad will no longer support the latest update or iOS version. Not buying another device so I’m disappointed that I can no longer take my shows with me on the road. It says I can download the last version but its not offered anywhere that I can find, I can see the history but nothing available to download. | Why do I have shows put back on My List, that your company took off, without any seasons or episodes to watch? They all say “episodes currently unavailable!” What’s the point of putting them back on My List, if there ISN’T ANYTHING TO WATCH? I e-mailed your company, but as usual, the problem WAS NEVER CORRECTED! Please add the seasons/episodes back so that I am able to watch them again!!!!!

*******IF YOU ACTUALLY READ WHAT I WROTE, I TOLD YOU THAT I ALREADY DID E-MAIL Discovery+ AND NOTHING WAS DONE!!!!******* | You should offer refunds for accidental subscriptions | Love not having to watch commercials | We love Expedition Bigfoot and enjoyed when you could view new episodes early!  Please do not cancel that show.  We want more!!! | I love this discover.
Why would you go up on your rates?
I’ve had Discovery + for a very long time.

When I started watching it. I paid more for no commercials.
Now here we are AGAIN more $$$ for no commercials!
So aggravating!!! | Discovery has the best of every world!  I’m a True crime junky and have been watching different shows on Discovery for years and there’s still so many more I have yet to tap in to.  Don’t know how I’d survive without it😉 | So good a lot of good shows | There is so many different types of shows that Discovery+ offers, that it was made for all of us I swear, but if not, it was definitely made for me lol! All of the interesting and quality shows that they offer, pretty much make it so that I could just live on Discovery+ all day and feel fulfilled. I know this sounds like they paid me for this or something but it’s just that honestly every type of show that I truly love is on this channel. Between mysteries of the abandoned,to all the house, hunter shows and unusual, Home things, to what on earth and the science shows about space… I’m so happy! Thank you Discovery plus! | Excellent app, all the shows you’ll ever need all in one place. Epic, love it | I hope Roadkill and Roadkill Garage keep going. I heard that Engine Masters has been cancelled, but I really liked that show too.

title: Clime: NOAA Weather Radar Live
description:
Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!
 
STAY INFORMED:
- Radar overlay shows the areas of rain, snow & mixed precipitation in high resolution and vivid colors right on the interactive map;
- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours; 
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover;
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm’s way.

KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need; 
- Receive push notifications whenever there’s a weather alert for the bookmarked location (tornadoes, hurricanes, freeze warnings, and more);
- Monitor important National Weather Service watches, warnings and alerts in the form of interactive polygons on the map. Tap one to see the full alert text.

VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast;
- Current, today’s min & max and "Feels Like" temperature;
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info;
- Chance of Precipitation;
- Sunrise & sunset time.

Coverage Info:

Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer’s website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps; wind map; snow depth forecast; hurricane, wildfire, lightning trackers; detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.
NWS watches, warnings: the US only. 
Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

Get Premium:
- Severe weather alerts for all saved locations
- Hurricane tracker
- Advanced precipitation forecast
- Lightning tracker
- Temperature map
- Rain alerts
- Air quality index
- Wildfire tracking
- RainScope
- Hourly forecast
- 14-day forecast
- Animated wind map
- Snow depth forecast 
- No ads

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Clime Weather Service, LLC is a part of the Apalon family of brands. See more at Apalon.com. 
Privacy Policy: https://climeradar.com/privacyPolicy
Terms: https://climeradar.com/terms
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
reviews:
Always inconsistent and wrong. Terrible app. | This app is great! I love the extra information you get from the $20 a year subscription and for $20 it was a great deal. The alerts I would get are super helpful as well since my regular weather app doesn’t do that.

But now I got an email notifying me that the subscription is raising from $19.99 to $69.99 which is absolutely ridiculous to have that kind of jump! I will definitely be unsubscribing now. I will miss the extra features but it is not worth $70 a year. | I’ve emailed 4 times over the last 2 months to support over app issues without a single (non-automated) response.   Widget is consistently not showing the correct location or weather.  When I open the app it shows the correct info.  You would assume opening the app would update the widget info, but it does not.  Also when using the app the data is very slow to load, even though my internet is 200mpbs+ and other data driven apps work great.  Would appreciate customer service especially to subscribers. | This was a great little app when I got it, for 10/year. Now 60/yr is laughable especially since it’s just repackaging NOAA data. | What a scam. Shows it is free and immediately is $7.99 after 7 days. | I NEED A SUBSCRIPTION FOR EVERYTHING! TO MANY ADDS | Comparing this weather app to others, it definitely did very well especially from an accuracy point of view, but it’s definitely not worth the increase from $20 a year to $70 a year. The widget constantly gets stuck in the past or old locations. I mean, whenever I go to work it thinks I’m in France! And no, I don’t commute to France for work. I can’t get a quick glance at the forecast, the app itself hasn’t been all that accurate, and with the subscription fee jumping so much this simply isn’t worth it. title: Flighty – Live Flight Tracker
description:
"Truly phenomenal" NYTimes • iPhone App of The Year 2023 Finalist • Apple Design Award 2023 • Made for passengers first

LIMITED TIME: Pro is free on your 1st flight. No credit card. No trial.

▶ INDUSTRY-FIRST FEATURES
- 25-hour where's my plane
- private friends/family following
- pilot-grade FAA integration (direct data feed)
- delay forecast
- taxi times
- ground radar
- proximity radar

▶ FULLY AUTOMATED
- calendar sync
- TripIt sync
- email forwarding
- Flighty Friends: private sharing with friends

▶ PILOT-GRADE DATA
- live-streaming
- actual flight plans
- commercial data – same source used by your pilot
- FAA advisories, warnings, and delays
- your tail number with birthday and type
- pilot flight timetable
- proximity radar - see flights around you
- ground radar - radar even while taxiing

▶ PREDICT DELAYS
- Alerts for late or canceled inbound aircraft
- Alerts for airport weather or traffic
- Delay forecast

▶ ASSISTANTS
- Morning-Of Assistant - wake up informed
- Check In Assistant - your reservation number and check in link at the right time
- Connection Assistant - make tight connections a breeze

▶ WORLDWIDE + LIVE + UNLIMITED
- every airline
- every flight
- 24/7/365 live global coverage

▶ FLIGHTY FRIENDS
- Often sharing with Family and Friends? Invite them to see your flights and never manually share again!
- Picking someone up, excited for a friend to visit, meeting a colleague? Share your live flight status with one tap.

▶ WHATS FREE?
- no ads
- unlimited flights
- Flighty Friends
- live data
- weather
- actual flight route
- aircraft model and image
- personal flight log and map
- personal all-time and annual stats
- Apple Watch app
- iCloud backup & sync
- historical flight lookup limited to past 365 days (due to costs)
- lock screen widgets (limited refresh for costs)

▶ WHATS PRO?
- industry's fastest push alerts
- 25-hour where's my plane
- live inbound plane tracking
- live lock screen widgets
- pilot-grade FAA delay alerts
- unlimited past flight lookup
- delay predictions
- arrival forecast
- TripIt sync
- calendar sync
- email forwarding
- Apple Watch complications
- tail number
- taxi times
- and more

Pro is included on your first flight. No trial required.

flightyapp.com/privacy
flightyapp.com/terms
releaseNotes:
# Spring Cleaning and Prep For A Big Year

- Fix Apple Watch Face freezing on Friends' Flights
- Fix Lock Screen Widget lacking Friends' Flights
- Fix app performance for users with many past flights
- Exclude cargo planes from images
- Add big warning if iCloud Sync malfunctions
- Improve failed email import copy
- Enlarge paywall X tap area
- Refresh “Welcome Back” helper when you reinstall
- Fix diverted PRN flights
- Fix Brazil tail number format
developer: Global Flight, Airport, & Airline Status Tracker LLC
reviews:
I guess that is how useless it is. Get the app, go into it and then it does do anything or offer anything. | There is a 45 minute delay in my flight. 

The airline shows the delay. The airport shows the delay. Flightradar24 shows the delay.

Meanwhile Flighty, the paid service: ON TIME!

Great job guys. | An excellent app!  Keeps track and keeps you updated with all the latest updates and information on the flight.  I totally recommend it! | The iPhobne app has no troulbe loading the map under the flight path on airplane wifi. Yet the Mac app is unbelievably slow to load, and sometimes absolutely refuses to. It also won't load in the background, so if I want to see the map, I have to sit on the app for 5 - 10 minutes. This is with plenty fast airplane wifi where every other aspect of my system is working fine with said connection. | I have spent most of my airline career being frustrated when I’m the last to know about changes to a flight I’m the captain of. Why am I the last to know? Couldn’t someone tell me these things?

Flighty picks up where airline internal facing IT drops off. Really where airline general internal communication drops off.

What gate are we out of? It’s right there on the Lock Screen. Are we on time? Right there. Don’t even have to unlock the phone. And it all just appears automatically as it imports your schedule. 

Need to add a commute flight to it? Just yeet the confirmation email off to flighty and it’s in there. Doesn’t matter who the flight is on. 

Inbound flight status? Yep. You get all that. It just tells you. Don’t even have to ask. 

I can’t emphasize how much the “it just does it” factor weighs in here. You just point Flighty to your calendar and it just runs. You don’t have to add flights. It’s doing that in the background. 

Halfway to your walk to gate 97, they change it to gate 2? You get a notification. You don’t have to walk up to the gate like a stripy shouldered chump looking like you’ve never heard of a gate change before. 

Then there’s just the “cool” factor stuff. Map of your flights over the last year? How many miles youve flown? It’s in there. Not essential info, but neat. | As a former designer at Apple I am probably the pickiest person in the world when it comes to apps. Flighty is hands down the best flight tracker and probably one of my top five favorite apps in the entire App Store. It supports live activities on the Home Screen and shows a countdown to departure along with your gate on the Dynamic Island. The iPhone widget is lovely, as is the Apple Watch app. iMessage is well supported with a nice share UI for friends. If there’s a neat iOS feature it can use this app absolutely does. 

 Notifications are incredible. My flight was repeatedly delayed and I Flighty told me about it faster than Southwest’s text messages. 

 I don’t travel enough to make the annual membership worth it and love that they offer a weekly pay as you go plan. 

This app is clearly made with care and love. No other flight tracker comes close. I can’t say enough about how much I love this thing. Hats off to the team behind it, they’re truly stellar. | There’s an ongoing software issue with background refreshing on Apple Watch, where it won’t automatically sequence to the next flight in a multi-leg day, you have to open the app each time on the Apple Watch. 

I contacted support months ago and followed their advice with no success. There’s an obvious software glitch that they don’t seem too keen on fixing | There are few apps that I love, but this is one of them. It’s a well designed, impeccably executed product whose feature set is well considered and just make sense. And this app has been a lifesaver with respect to delays and cancellations countless times. I never take a flight that isn’t in flighty. And I hope I never have to 😍 | Latest version 3.4.3 is broke.  iCloud doesn't sync My Flights from iOS app to macOS app.  If it syncs, flights get put under Friends Flights.  When new flights are entered to My Flights on macOS, they get put under Friends Flights.  Brought up with developers, customer service acknowledged but no update to fix issue.  Pretty disappointing to pay almost $50 per year for the Pro version to see the app not work properly. | This app saves me all the time - Amazing!  Keep up the improvements 🙌🏼 | I would just like to say that it was a great pleasure to travel with Breeze Airlines again.
I can confirm that they have the best people in the industry that are willing to work for their customers.
From the start of booking your flight to the airport and to the plane their staff makes sure that you are the number 1 priority to them.
I would just Love to make a commercial for them to tell everyone about their superior service and their staff.
Keep up the great work Breeze Hierarchy as you are making a Good Company Go Great.
Rob Wells
Flt 137 13 C 
18 April 24
And Thanks again. | Absolutely no complaints, the features work flawlessly.  As someone who is terrified of flying I flew for the first time in 10 years using Flighty as backup.  The flight was delayed but I knew before anyone else at the terminal because I had live updates.

Can’t recommend more! | Really like the app as the No.1 app for flight. But I really hate when the Pro subscription Ad showing up every time I open the app. This is breaking all the good experiences of it | By far my favorite travel app (as someone who flies weekly) and one of the few apps I’m willing to pay for. Unfortunately I’ve had to disable notifications though. Like every app, Flighty has gone bananas with waaaaaaaay too many notifications (you’re flight is getting ready to take off, your flight is taking off, your flight took off, your flight is flying around in the sky, hey there are clouds around your flight, you’re going to land someday, you’re about to land, you've landed, you landed a while ago, you landed yesterday, etc). Yeah I exaggerate a little bit, but it’s not too far off. It would be refreshing for app designers (and email marketing “experts) to wake up to the fact that people HATE too many notifications. The more one gets something, the less value it has. How about offering notifications for just important items such as when something goes wrong (gate changes, significant delays, a wing falls off, etc), instead of EVERYTHING? 

Peace and love Flighty team ✌️ | This app revolutionized the way I travel. I can check my flight and flight options whenever my flight is delayed. It syncs beautifully with my calendar . Hope they create different friends flights profile in the future as right now I have all friends , family and work colleagues flights together . For “my flights” it works great. A sync with Apple Watch would be nice also.  These are just improvements details from a robust , reliable 5* app ! | I track a flight maybe 3-4 times a year. Every time I open the app it’s always “get the pro version” ad. Horrible experience. Will never purchase. | All of sudden in the last week I have not been able to add flights. Once I type the airport code it does not generate. When I hit next the previous flight I inputted only comes up. Please fix | One of the key things missing for me in this app is information on the planes altitude. I find this to be interesting and useful information that all other flight trackers (eg FlightAware and Flightradar24) have. 

It’s also a bit concerning that sensitive information like your booking code get shared when you share a flight with someone. There should definitely be an option for this. 

“Where’s my plane” is also pretty buggy often. Shows multiple conflicting flights, or no tail number ever available. It seems like you should be able to get more accurate data for this. 

Also, a promo code to discount the annual or lifetime purchase would help… 😃 | This app has a gorgeous UI.

Big concern/annoyance is that there isn't a way to share flights with others without sending sensitive information like the booking code.

About 20% of the time the "where's my plane" feature shows incorrect information. Surprising because if I research it on my own on other apps, the right information is available.

Also, there should be an Android version otherwise you can't collaborate on flights with non-iPhone friends. | The app opened one time and was extensively glitchy. As soon as I tried to view the first flight, the app crashed and would not open again. | $4.99 a month just to add older flights to fill out your passport is ridiculous. Sure there are other features but to use that as a lock out is ridiculous. Uninstalling and not trying a trial of the other features. | I generally love this app for its rich feature set, but today it failed me. My flight was delayed by an hour and 20 minutes, the announcement on the Delta app coming 45 minutes ago ands, but Flighty still shows it as departing on time. I knocked a star off for this. | “Very resourceful it keeps me informed and up to date of my upcoming flight, I love it.“ | I'm a product designer and no easy critic when it comes to the UI/UX of an app. This app is so well designed that it makes me want to travel more. I crave hearing the airplane chime when a flight is added and seeing my stats change for the year and seeing a new path added to my passport and....I could go on. Point is, it's my new favorite travel app and you should absolutely pay for pro and support these developers. Safe travels! | But Flighty has been a legitimate game changer. Sure, I could cobble together most of the functionality it has by having five different apps, but even then, Flighty is better and faster. It often has updates on things like gate changes and baggage carousels before the airline apps do, and it is just otherwise seamless to use. 

When I add flights to my calendar, they appear in Flighty within seconds. 

I’ve also added my wife, who travels for work a LOT, as a Friend on the app, so I can see when she takes off, when her flights are landing, etc. 

I find the premium features at $50 well worth it for the price of basically one airport meal. 

Anyway, obviously a fan. Highly recommend. | but extremely well designed | This is a great app if you have a specific flight number that you want to track. However, if you’re interested in just looking around at random flights, or looking at flights coming in and out of an airport, you’ll be sorely disappointed as you can’t do this. Wish it was at least an option, especially with the yearly fee being what it is. | Flight info is either updated once a minute with incredibly annoying alerts… or it's not updated at all. At this very moment I'm on a plane still sitting at the terminal that Flighty says is "taxing to runway". #sigh I don't see any value above what the airline apps already provide. I signed up for a subscription, but I'm letting it lapse; it's just not worth anything. You know what would make this app *great*? Highly detailed terminal maps. That’d move the needle for me. Otherwise, I don’t get it. | Best most accurate info and timely. Easy to use. I wouldn’t fly without it. | I am extremely picky with apps I use (I'm a software engineer by trade and a bit obsessive and critical with app design). This is a top 5 app I've ever used. Up there with the likes of Apollo for Reddit (RIP).

Amazing design, super useful features, and plenty of nifty trinkets and hidden features that you won't realize you'd want until you see it.

Super useful for tracking your flights, your friend's flights, updates while at the airport, and native-iOS integration with live widgets, dynamic island support, etc etc. The list goes on.

10/10 app. For real. | Trying the app out. Flight delay info is completely off. Airline app most accurate. Flight aware second best, flight tracker 3rd. Flighty info all over the place. | Best app in App Store | Love this app. Really helps @ | The app is very helpful, but I’ve never had airplane mode work.  Connect to free in-flight texting with iMessage on Southwest and it never goes into airplane mode.  In flight updates are therefore useless. | Very good and easy to use | Nothing seems to be left out of this app that an air traveler would want. Relatively easy to add flights. | 1.  This is my favorite travel app.  I pay because it’s good and I travel a lot.  

2. Recently when I send flights in via email it does not add to account.  After sending in a third time via email it seems to work.  This should be fixed.  

3. I’ve written to customer service about the above issue without response.  I had a database issue about a year ago and it took them a few weeks to respond.  By that time issue was resolved.  I’d suggest they respond to all customer service inquiries from paid customers within 48 hours.  

I’d give the app 5 stars.  It’s great.  But a few issues remain to be resolved. Overall you’ll enjoy the app very much. | They never answer customer questions. F&Q really doesn't have answers what you need to know. App works fine there are some glitches here and there but works good. However the customer support basically doesn't exist so there will be zero solutions to your problems. Not recommend to purchase the subscription, but keep it in free mode to use it otherwise you'll be frustrated with the unexplained problems. | This is really the best app for commercial flights, totaly awesome! | Works better at keeping me updated with my flights than the airline provided apps ! | I fly 150-200k miles per year; this is my all-time favorite app in this category | Great App ..I love the updates..very convenient | This is what happens when you pester customers! | I signed up for a premium family membership after seeing rave reviews. I’ve reported numerous data issues over the past month and none have been resolved. Every flight I’ve taken with LATAM is incorrect in some way, having never updated upon landing (only estimates show in the app). One even has the wrong aircraft information — I’ve reported this three times to no avail. Also, older flights from the 00s that I took on Continental are incorrectly showing as Copa Airlines. These issues need to be resolved, particularly regarding LATAM flights I took this month (Google/flightaware have correct info) or I will not be renewing my membership. | Look else where. Their costumer service is one of the worst I seen. | What an incredible app!  So easy to use and love the updates!  Recommend it highly!!!🤔🛫😲✈️🤗🛬 | I am shocked about how the app is so user friendly, displays a BUNCH of data but still is extremely aesthetically pleasing. I just simply love every aspect of the app and want to support it by purchasing pro. However, Im a person who likes one time payments instead of annoying subscriptions. When I wanted to subscribe to the life time option, I found it quite too expensive and the price point is quite an outlier to the rest of the plans. | I like the app but hate the relentless, merciless, constant bombardment every time I open the app on my Mac or iPhone to "upgrade to pro!" Who does that? It's in the way of me trying to check something. Contacting support about it several times they deny this practice and keep saying it on;y happens occasionally when it actually happens EVERY. SINGLE.TIME.YOU.OPEN.THE.APP!! | I first heard of this app in apple’s WWDC,It has a lot of unique features and everything you need to know about your flight. | good app but unusable without paying $50 per year

title: Enterprise Rent-A-Car
description:
Enterprise Rent-A-Car brand is part of the world’s largest car rental provider. With over 9,500 car rental locations around the world, it has never been easier to rent a car while on the go. The Enterprise car rental app is your free travel planner across the US, Canada, Europe, Latin America and more. Our award-winning customer service and variety of vehicle options from economy to luxury car rental will keep your travel worry-free. As a commitment to your safety, we follow an industry-leading procedure with our Complete Clean Pledge to clean and sanitize every rental car at Enterprise. The Enterprise car rental app allows you to easily find a rental car, view or modify upcoming reservations to extend your travel plans, get directions to your rental car branch or call roadside assistance for 24/7 help on the road. Stay signed into your Enterprise Plus account on the app to make reservations faster and earn points you can redeem for free rental days.

Make a car rental reservation:
• Find car rental locations near you for your upcoming travel
• Narrow your search with location and vehicle filters
• Book long term car rental for extended travel plans
• Save rental details to make future reservations even faster

Access all your car rental information in one place:
• Easily view the details and information of your rental car and trip
• Quickly reference pick-up or drop-off times for your car rental
• Get directions back to your rental car location

Manage your Enterprise Plus account:
• Earn points on every dollar spent
• View your reward points balance
• Update account details
• Redeem your reward points toward free rental days

Get help when you need it most:
• Call roadside assistance or our customer support for help
• Find car rental branch details including phone number, address and directions

Do you have a favorite Enterprise rental car location?
• Make a location your “favorite” in the app
• Quickly access information to reserve a rental car at your most visited location.

Are you ready for a road trip?
• Find the best road trip cars – choose from a wide selection of cars, trucks, SUV’s and
vans
• Reserve a vehicle at any destination with thousands of rental car locations
• Stay safe with our complete clean pledge. Every vehicle will be cleaned and sanitized.
• Never get stuck on the road with access to 24/7 roadside assistance

Enterprise is always there when you need us. Now with our rental car app we are making it even easier to experience all the benefits Enterprise has to offer from your mobile phone.


By clicking on "Install", you consent to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy including access to or storage of performance and usage device & app related data for analytic purposes by Enterprise Rent-A-Car or its third party providers.
releaseNotes:
"Thank you for using the Enterprise Rent-A-Car app! We update the app regularly so that you can get the most from your car rental experience.

Here's what we did for Enterprise Rent-A-Car version 7.15:
• Fixed bugs, improved the UI, and did some general cleaning up under the hood."
reviews:
I always rent with the Enterprise for the following reasons:
1. Service - Customer service and over all service at the location is impeccable.
2. Rates - Enterprise offers unbeatable rates
3. Choice - Enterprise have a wide range of cars available to choose from. | I never had a problem wouldn’t rent from anywhere else | Always helpful excellent app | I have been using the St. Louis enterprise airport location for three years now. They are fast, efficient, and always friendly. Absolutely love this location and highly recommended! | Every employee is always courteous and professional. title: Bird — Ride Electric
description:
Bird is the convenient, eco-friendly way to get around your city. Sign up to get access to electric vehicles in over 350 cities worldwide.

HOW IT WORKS:
* Download the app
* Sign up
* Choose your payment method (PayPal, credit card, etc.)
* Select and unlock your vehicle
* Ride electric!

The fun way to get to your destination
Head to work, run a few errands, or just go for a weekend ride. With the Bird app, get from point A to B safely and with style.

ECO-FRIENDLY MOBILITY
Our mission is to make cities more livable by reducing car usage and lowering carbon emissions.
Every ride with Bird makes you a part of that mission.

DISCOVER SPECIAL FEATURES AND OFFERS

–Get free rides
Share your code with a friend and you both get a free ride.

—Travel together
Riding with friends? The "group rides" feature lets you sign up for multiple e-vehicles through just one phone.

—More rides for less money
From daily to monthly rates, Bird has Ride Pass pricing plans that make sense for every rider.

—Safety
Do your part to keep your community running smoothly. Wear a helmet, use bike lanes, and make sure to park neatly and keep sidewalks clear.

Download now and ride electric.
