title: Mobile Passport Control
description:
Mobile Passport Control (MPC) is an official application created by U.S. Customs and Border Protection that streamlines your CBP processing experience at select U.S. entry locations. Simply fill out your traveler profile, answer CBP inspection-related questions, and proceed straight to the “Mobile Passport Control” lane at the airport or seaport. 

MPC is a voluntary program which can be used by U.S. Citizens, Canadian Citizen Visitors, Lawful Permanent Residents, and Visa Waiver Program Visitors at any of the supported airport and seaport locations found on our website: https://www.cbp.gov/travel/us-citizens/mobile-passport-control 

MPC provides a more efficient, secure in-person inspection process for the CBP Officer and the traveler, and shortens overall entry wait times. 


MPC can be used in 6 simple steps:

1. Create a traveler profile using biographic information from your passport; You can create a profile for all eligible members in a family group. Your profiles will be securely stored on your device completely free to be used for future travel.

2. Select your method of travel, select your port of entry and terminal (if applicable), answer CBP inspection-related questions, certify the truthfulness and accuracy of your answers, and, upon arriving at your selected port of entry, tap the “Submit Now” button.

3. Capture a clear and unobstructed photo of each traveler (including yourself) that you added to your submission.

4. Once your submission is processed, CBP will send a virtual receipt back to your device.

5. Proceed to the MPC designated lane upon arrival and be prepared to present your passport and other relevant travel documents. Please note: MPC does not replace your passport; your passport will need to be presented to the CBP Officer.

6. The CBP Officer will complete the inspection. If further information is required, the CBP Officer will let you know.
releaseNotes:
Additions
 - Added support for German and Italian localizations
 - Added a new release notes section to the What's new page
 
 Changes
 - Updated the verbiage on the receipt to indicate that the officer will capture an additional photo upon arrival
 - Reformatted the front of the receipt to include port and terminal in addition to group size
 
 Fixes
 - Fixed an issue where the document scanner would insert the wrong date if the device is using a different date format

title: FordPass™
description:
FordPass offers the ability to manage your vehicle right from your phone:

•	Send convenient remote commands – Lock, unlock, and start your vehicle using complimentary remote vehicle controls (1) – when equipped with FordPass® Connect (2)
•	Electric vehicle ownership support – Monitor charging progress and use Departure Times to pre-condition your battery and cabin (3) 
•	FordPass feature availability varies by vehicle and country. Images shown for illustrative purposes only

(1) Remote lock/unlock requires power door locks. Remote starting requires automatic transmission.
(2) FordPass Connect (optional on select vehicles), the FordPass App and complimentary Connected Service are required for remote features (see FordPass Terms for details). Connected service and features depend on compatible network availability. Evolving technology/cellular networks/vehicle capability may limit functionality and prevent operation of connected features. Connected service excludes Wi-Fi hotspot.
(3) Effectiveness of cabin conditioning may be reduced by extreme outside temperatures.

title: T Life (T-Mobile Tuesdays)
description:
Meet T Life, the new app that brings together your connected world—and the home of T-Mobile Tuesdays and Magenta Status.

Magenta Status:
Premium benefits. Brands you love. Get your VIP vibes.
-No hoops to jump through.  Status from day one.
-15% off all Hilton brands and an upgrade to Hilton Honors Silver.
- Hassle-free rental car returns with free refueling at Dollar Rental.
-25% off concert tickets nationwide
-And so much more.

T-Mobile Tuesdays:
Get free stuff and exclusive perks, just for being a customer.
-Now with even more thankings every Tuesday
- Score deals every Tuesday from popular brands for food, fashion, entertainment, and essentials.
- Enjoy weekly savings on fuel and earn cash back on dining.
- Save on hotels, car rentals, and amusement parks.
- Enter for a chance to win epic prizes.

T-Mobile Home Internet:
- Set up your Wi-Fi Gateway & manage remotely.
- View your network connection status, monitor signal strength, and if your connection needs a boost, find the ideal gateway location using the interactive placement assistant.
- Manage and monitor all your connected devices, including setting screen-time limits.

SyncUP KIDS™ Watch:
- See and set up step goals.
- See and edit virtual boundaries.
- Manage school mode.
- View location history.
releaseNotes: We’ve enhanced SyncUP KIDS™ features and expanded Home Internet hardware support

Finally I said, look I will settle for the current promotion the $200 as a prepaid visa for switching home internet carriers, I was told ooops sorry all promotions need to be taken advantage of with the first 30 days of establishing the line for service. I’d rather take the to court. In fact, this sounds like a potential class action suit.  I’m in California, you are in PR, we aren’t unique and if I was a gambler, I’d put money on hundreds of thousands customers all over the network who have these SHARED FRUSTRATIONS and Disappoints. T-Mobile, false advertising, elusive promotions. Shame on you T-Mobile! Doing this to little old ladies like me, shame on you 🥺 | When I first got unlimited T-Mobile 5G first month was amazing after that one tv constantly laggy. 1tablet and 1Tv dial up is faster. No thanks. | Good customer appreciate | App freezes right after I enter my credentials. | T-Life replaced the T-Mobile Tuesdays app, but it’s a big step down. TMT showed all the benefits right up front, everything was clear, and claiming a perk was two taps on the screen.

title: Rover—Dog Sitters & Walkers
description:
Rover is the #1 pet sitting and dog walking app. Get trusted pet care in your neighborhood.


The Rover app was created for dog people by The Dog PeopleTM. Through the app, get adorable photo updates, GPS tracking of your dog’s walk, an easy way to message sitters or manage your business, and a secure way to book and pay.


With over 200,000 pet sitters and dog walkers in the U.S. and Canada, Rover makes it easy to book pet care you can trust.


PEACE OF MIND

95% of reviewed services receive a perfect 5-star rating.

Every service booked on Rover is backed by the Rover Guarantee and 24/7 support.


FAST & EASY

Contact and message sitters and dog walkers, right from the app. Receive messages from sitters when you're on the go.

Hassle-free and secure payments, every time.

Get a map of your dog's walk, pee/poo and food/water alerts, and a personalized note from your sitter or dog walker.


FOR PET SITTERS AND DOG WALKERS, TOO

Send photos, videos, and messages to pet owners with just a few taps.

Get paid on the go—it’s simple and secure with the Rover app.

Seamlessly manage your business, even if you're at the dog park.

Enable push notifications to respond faster than ever to booking requests.

Create Rover Cards to seamlessly share information with your clients.


IN THE PRESS

Rover has appeared in:

The New York Times

The Today Show

The Wall Street Journal

USA Today

ABC News

And many more!


Note: Rover uses location information in the background for tracking active services. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: Rover is always working on performance improvements and bug fixes (nobody likes fleas) to keep your experience bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.
reviews:
Don’t do it. Find a different company to watch your animals. I’m sure some of the sitters are fine but the company itself is horrible. My sitter somehow accidentally changed the code on my lockbox after day 1. She couldn’t get into my apt to feed and take care of my animals - one being handicapped. The company wouldn’t provide or pay for a locksmith - that was up to me. I was in the ER as my dad had a massive brain bleed. I couldn’t just set that up during this emergency. Plus I didn’t know when the sitter could be there to arrange for a locksmith to meet her. Cats were neglected for days before someone could get to them. Read Reddit horror stories and you will see just how awful this company can be. This isn’t an attack on the sitters. The company I worked for when I was a pet sitter would have taken care of this 100% since it was a sitters mistake. Guessing this is what insurance is for. Find a better company, your pets deserve it. | We (family) enjoyed taking care of crispy. He is so sweet and always happy. We miss him. | This is only my second time writing a review for an app. I’ve been working with rover for 3 years and have good and bad to say about it. I’ve made some great clients that come back often. But per a client I just had I found out that they charge the owner a 10% fee to book. I thought this was absolutely ridiculous considering they charge per sitters 20%. I just had a 2 week booking for two dogs, that’s $700 for two weeks. I only received $560. $140 in rovers fees paid on my behalf and the $70 paid on the owners behalf. That in my opinion is greedy. if you’re going to make pet sitters pay a fee, the owners shouldn’t have to pay a fee too. The support on the app is awful. They also don’t filter out scam accounts. I’ve had people messaging me asking to have s** and others that asked questions like “do you have a boyfriend?” The accounts get reported, and I still receive messages from them. | I have really enjoyed using Rover to build my dog business. Rover has been really helpful at building more clients, and the app makes it really easy to schedule and get paid.

Something that would be helpful to me, and I think others, is being able to transfer the calendar to a another calendar. Make some way to transfer what’s on Rover to my everyday calendar. There have been times where I have dog schedules outside of Rover, get scheduled around Rover sitting dogs. It would be nice if I could just transfer all my dog sitting jobs to one calendar. 

Another nice thing, would be a way to get to know other local dog sitters. This way, if I can’t take care of a dog, I can recommend someone. I believe it is another way to show good customer service on our end. I don’t know if there is a way to get a local representative in charge of holding a get together or Rover sponsored dinner, but I was thinking somewhere along those lines. 

I still love Rover, and am thankful for all the support. | Since I moved to Florida, I’ve used Rover to find three dog walkers. Two were absolute hits. They were amazing. The one that was miss was the first one, the other two I love them. I don’t use anyone but them. I don’t like this app because of how pushy it is though, it’s so pushy. 
Once I book with the regular Dog Walker it takes me to another screen were it ask  “hey do you want to try one of these people out” and so many times I’ve accidentally hit contact sitter button. I am rebooking with my sitter, I am constantly rebooking with my sitter. Why are you showing me this screen? 
This app is not returning user-friendly. It’s more a once and done kind of friendly app. 

Had it not constantly been asking me to review them, where I can’t even click out of it, I wouldn’t have made a review.
But the app Forced me to click if I loved the app Yes or No, and the only way to get rid of it is to exit and clear the app. 

It works and it’s good but it’s pushy | Charlie is the best! Treats our boy like his own. Highly recommend! | Even better people working on it | The calendar it is not very convenient to use. It looks too busy. Too many things happening and not very efficient for blocking dates. | I love working for Rover and providing a safe haven and comfortable home for fur babies When they are away from their parents.  we have a good time we spend a lot of time outside we play we exercise. We cuddle and I make them feel as comfortable and at home as possible, so there's no anxieties about being separated from their parents, and I keep in touch with their parents all throughout the day via pics and videos to make sure that they have no  anxieties as well and can feel secure and enjoy their vacation. | Trying to find someone is impossible for same day because the person books out a day or more Or either that or they are too far. Both excuses the app uses.  Much better service with App 'WAG!'  It’s a great app. | Rover is very user friendly! I love how it gives tips, tricks, and reminders. It is very easy to communicate and send pictures of the animals through the app. Bookings have been very easy as well and I love how you can set your unavailable days. Overall great experience! | We are so glad we found Kana through Rover. Our dog clearly feels at home there, enjoys the other, selected smaller dogs boarding at the same time, the spacious (secure) yard, and Kana’s warm care. Follow instructions to reach their location near Chambers Bay. | I’ve used Rover for years both to find sitters for my dog and to care for dozens of dogs as a sitter.
It provides so many features that make it easy to communicate with pet parents, ensure prompt payments, and really makes being a pet sitter enjoyable without the parts that would otherwise be a hassle or stressful. I can communicate so easily with pet parents and it makes things easy, keeps them private, and I can’t imaging finding or being a sitter without it! | Beware!!!  Rover offers no protection to the people who pet sit through their app. I was injured by an animal during a visit and they do not offer any coverage for the injury. I have pay out of pocket! They only offer coverage for pet overs. I would not recommend this app. | Always professional and trustworthy.  Would always recommend. | Yet every time I click to enter the next section of information , be it on the app or website, everything gets deleted. I’ve entered and entered so many times. My first attempt I created an epic detailed description of my experience and as I clicked to goto the next section it deleted everything. It took me 15 mins to type that all out.. it sounds fun and like something I’d love to do, I love animals of all kinds. But i just can’t keep entering and never getting anywhere with this company. If they ever fix their glitchy technical issues then I’ll try again. For now I’ll have to be content with only my animals to play with and train. Luckily I just adopted two kittens so I’m good, but the extra cash while having fun would’ve been nice. | She watched my husky while I was out of town and made me feel really comfortable while having him there! Sent me lots of pictures and kept me up to date! Will definitely be using her to watch my pup again! | I think Rover is a great way to meet potential clients and find ones that are a good fit for the business I am looking to build. | Thanks Jillion for the amazing job you did watching our babies. We appreciate all the updates and pictures of them while we were away | I used a person from rover to fill in for me as a professional petsitter to cover for 4 visits so I could go to my sons graduation. She was so shady and unethical I couldn’t believe it. She cashed the check in Minnesota dated the date she was supposed to filling in for me!! She claimed the dog bit her ! She sent me two different pictures and told me in two different texts that the bite was in two different places the first place on her hand and the other was on her pelvic bone. What? The picture looked like a mosquito bite or like she pinched her skin. No dog bite I’ve ever seen!! I’ve had a couple myself . That was not a dog bite! Anyone can work for rover! Be sure to always check insurance and bonding insurance They do background check but that doesn’t really qualify them as a petsitter!! Read people’s reviews afrom rover!! They are bad . I would give negative stars if I could .  Use petsitters international. They provide training opportunities for petsitters! Be careful who you hire to care for your animals! | They take a huge chunk of your money, they get paid instantly and take weeks to pay you out. | I had a last minute change to my work schedule which required me to head out of town and no one to watch my pup, so I looked into some boarding options and “Rover” popped up!

Now my pup is able to remain in a familiar environment while someone comes by to check on her (let her out to do her business, feed, and small walk/play time). 

Ever since I’ve used River, even for a few days I’ve seen a dramatic change and benefit in my pups mental health! 

Super grateful for this quick and easy go-to resource! 😀 | Support didn’t care but “find someone else.” I found a company with a brick and mortar thanks to their advice. At a least a business won’t treat me like that. | Rover has made finding a sitter for our sweet Biskit so easy! | This is a fantastic platform to find awesome animal caregivers | Just watched a dog for 2 weeks, rover took 160$ from my pay check… crazy stupid.  If you wanna make easy money use a different app or have the customer pay you outside the app. Rover are thieves. | This app is a good idea on paper but the experience is lacking and the many of the sitters here have no experience actual experience with dogs and are flaky. Which is time consuming trying to find people when you’re on a time constraint. Support team responses remind me of chatGPT and ai bots. They don’t answer questions just send a bunch of gibberish. My issues were never resolved so I’m just leaving the app altogether. | Easy to use app | From the thousands of pet sitters on here and gaining more everyday. I feel the company would be just fine if they brought down the percentage they take out of hard working pay their pet sitters work for.

It should be brought down to 15% at least, ideally 10%

In a perfect world 3% | There was an issue with a dog sitter and when I presented it to Rover it was basically “take it up with the dog sitter.” Obviously you can imagine it didn’t go well. The sitter is allowed to continue to message rude messages and respond hatefully to their reviews (rover pushes you to review the sitter). I sent along the hateful messages to Rover directly. We will see if they do the right thing. | Melinda watched our dog & house and did a wonderful job.  We will definitely use Melinda again if she is available! | If you think about making extra money as a dog sitter this company will charger you $25 for a background check unbelievable people!!!  Like gig workers have extra money to give you guys for your hiring!!! | Don’t pay the fee for the background check.  Sure wish I hadn’t. | Won’t even let me make an account but after reading some bad reviews I guess they’re doing me a favor thanks anyway | I’m a happy Rover gal! I’ve been so lucky to be matched with the nicest people and their wonderful pets! | I’ve had 6 different dogsitters with Rover. Some were average, most were terrible. One of them left my oven on and took off before i came home. Another showed up 3.5 hours late. Another I found needles in my home afterwards. They all had great ratings and reviews which I’d imagine are fake. 

If you’re on a budget then use Rover. If you want good care then use anything else, anything. | The instructions on things are so unclear and trying to get ahold of an actual person who isn’t AI is nearly impossible. I finally did and was hung up on. I’ve been trying to become a pet sitter for almost a month and they wasted my time even though I went through this process a few years ago very easily. Not sure what’s going on now but things have gone downhill. | To be honest, if you’re planning to work with Rover, Do not do it! I just work a month with them taking care a doggy. The total amount was $240 with the fee it was around $220 and that’s it. But my 1099 came with $740, they do not have a phone number or chat where you can complain. I sent many email, and no answers! | Rover’s chat/communication options are horrible. My outside cameras caught one of their sitters tonight punching, kicking, and finally pinning my Boxer puppy to the ground once again to the side of the house once. I am devastated by the way that very innocent and sweet and happy natured dogs were treated today. I submitted a video via Rover support as it was the only option, and I was told that I should hear back from somebody within an hour and that was several hours ago. I do not trust Rover any longer and will be using Wag Walking going forward. | Aurelio & Alessandra are amazing. I have two beagles and one of them is super playful. They helped me to take care of them while we were traveling. They updated me 3 times a day with all details and lots of beautiful pictures, that I saved all of them on my phone. I would highly recommend them and definitely I’ll book them again, if they accept my playful doggies of course 😂 | She seemed like the perfect fit for my cat! Got details and photos every day! | Rover has been a good way of getting customers, not fan of the amount of money that’s considered as a fee, but what I don’t like is the 2 day processing time for the funds.. Cause one you don’t start your process until 2 days after the booking and I have to wait an extra day like what? With y’all taking money out of my bookings and having me to wait 3-4 business days is like ridiculous… | The app and service works great. However, when your service is concluded with a sitter the app requests a tip for the sitter. This is ridiculous because the sitter has already priced their service, and it’s already been paid for by the customer, in advance. 
Tip requests are out of control and it makes the customer feel shame if they don’t tip. I will avoid using Rover as much as I can because I don’t want to be put in the position to have to tip again. | The average pet sitter in my area is $30/hour. Rover uses an outdated algorithm to calculate how much dogsitter gets paid. Most dogwalking/dogsitting should be$15/hour or less but Rover rates are $60/hour.

In addition, the app doesn’t show the dog sitter’s availability or updates it regularly. So you as the owner have to constantly reach out to 20 sitters at a time so you can have options to see who can take care of your furbaby. 

If I could post when I need a sitter and have sitters reach out to me, that would be much easier then getting rejected constantly. That’s not the case for Rover. Rover makes it very difficult for dog owners looking for sitters. | Such a Wonderful App!
Yay for ROVER | This service is a lifesaver for people that like to travel and other options become unavailable. I’m using it for the second time in the near future, but so far so good. | I’ve found a really great care giver for my dogs, they are always happy to see her, she meets their needs and everybody has fun.
While the APP is well integrated into the process of finding care givers, scheduling and booking visits.
The option to repeat the schedule from the first day of a booking on subsequent days rarely works for me as the first day of my bookings is almost always different than other days.
It would be great if the option copy from the first day was changed to copy from the previous day. | The app is extremely buggy recently. It drains the battery to nothing every time I’m on a walk and I have the iPhone 14 Pro…also every time I get one message, the app shows 22 messages…so buggy 
Rover, please don’t lay off all your engineers yet, the app is almost unusable at this point!! | I love the easy app. I’ve been very happy with all the dog boarding and dog walkers. I would recommend to anyone. | Definitely a life saver!

title: Royal Caribbean International
description:
Explore cruises – from Europe to Alaska, the Caribbean to Asia – and book with just a few taps. Tackle all your travel planning, too. Find and book great deals on flights, explore transportation and lodging options, and plan your entire journey. 

Learn more about our brands, ships, and destinations by watching exciting videos. And learn about the benefits of our loyalty program, the Crown & Anchor® Society. Enroll with a simple tap or track your tier and benefits if you’re already a member. 

Vacation planning, redefined

Once you’re booked on a cruise, plan your entire vacation from the app. Reserve shore excursions for every port, purchase or upgrade beverage packages for endless toasts, and internet packages to stay connected while at sea, though the app is free to use on ship Wi-Fi. 

Put together the perfect spa day... or days... and make dining reservations at distinctive specialty restaurants. Explore other pre-cruise deals in the arcade, check out VIP Passes and make your cruise truly special with gifts and gear. And don’t forget to link reservations with your travel party so you can make plans together. 

Set sail like a pro

As your cruise approaches, use the app to check-in and qualify for the fastest boarding experience. Before you head to the terminal on boarding day, begin your mandatory safety briefing and access your set sail pass. 

To plan all the fun, find all the shows and activities in the Daily Planner and build your personalized calendar. We’ll even remind you with a notification when you have plans. 

Be sure to smile for the camera because you’ll be able to view, purchase and download your photos right from the app (on select ships). Find your way around with detailed deck 
maps and chat with your travel party through group or 1-on-1 chats. Track your onboard expenses in the app (or not... you’ll be on vacation, after all) and learn how to book your next cruise while onboard for the best deals.

After your cruise, you can continue to track your loyalty status and perks, keep up with the latest and greatest from our family of brands in the video library, and start planning and booking your next cruise. Because we know this won’t be your last! 

More than a cruise app

Make sure you turn on auto-updates, so you can keep up with all the ways we improve the app for all your travel needs. Features may vary from ship to ship. App is free to download and use. In-app purchases available. Once onboard, connect to your ship's guest Wi-Fi. No internet package required. 

We continue to develop and enhance the app and are looking for your ideas and feedback. Email AppFeedback@rccl.com and tell us what you’d like to see in the future.
releaseNotes: With this release, we added a guest wallet to manage payment methods. We also made feature enhancements, like pinch and zoom on deck maps, improved performance, and fixed bugs. Make sure you turn on auto-updates, so you can keep up with all the ways we improve the app.

title: Chevron
description:
Use the Chevron app to pay for gas or diesel from the comfort of your driver’s seat for a seamless and simple experience at the pump! Additional benefits are available by joining the Chevron Texaco Rewards program (http://www.chevrontexacorewards.com) in which members earn points on fuel and qualifying in-store purchases that can be redeemed for up to 50¢ off per gallon in rewards at participating stations. Use the station finder to find a participating Chevron station near you by filtering for “Chevron & Texaco Rewards.”

How to save on gas or diesel with the Chevron app:
• Sign up and join the Chevron Texaco Rewards program via the app.
• Fuel up using the app at the pump.
• Earn points on fuel and qualifying in-store purchases. Redeem rewards for up to 50¢ off per gallon at participating stations.

How to use the Chevron app:
• Before heading to the station, sign up to create a user account for mobile payments, and link an accepted payment method to your user account.
• At the station, use the app to reserve your pump and select the payment method from your driver’s seat.
• When prompted, fill up at the pump and go. Your receipt will be waiting for you in the app!

Easy ways to stay connected:
• Connect your phone to the car’s dashboard and open the app to find stations, redeem rewards, add a carwash, and pay for fuel. This feature is available for Apple CarPlaynusers. 
• Use your smartwatch to fuel up and redeem your reward points at participating Chevron stations that accept mobile payments.

Additional features to help keep you going:
• Find lower carbon intensity products like renewable diesel blends and compressed natural gas.
• Filter through station amenities such as Convenience Store, Restrooms, Full-Service Car Wash, Amazon Locker, EV Charging, and more.
• View in-app receipts for mobile payments.
• Get answers to frequently asked questions anytime and anywhere in the app with our digital chatbot, Mobi.
releaseNotes:
Great news! We made it even simpler for you to redeem your rewards for a seamless experience.

Update the app to the latest version so you can have the best experience!

title: Moovit: All Transit Options
description:
Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transit rides. 

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use dockless scooters, bikes, ride-sharing like Uber or Lyft, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Enter Moovit! Moovit provides riders with a one-stop-shop journey experience to help them get from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them. 

Moovit guides more than 930 million users in over 3400 cities throughout the world. Commuters will find updated bus and train times, transit maps, and, where available, real-time line arrivals. Locate nearby bus stops and train stations, travel with on-the-go live navigation guidance, receive get-off alerts when approaching your destination to ensure a smooth ride. That's why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year in 2017 by the App Store.

Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

► Digital payment. Purchase bus & train tickets and validate your digital pass with a tap (select cities). 

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction, and more so that you can plan ahead if your bus time or train time changed.

► Live Directions. Get step-by-step bus directions and other transit directions with live guidance from A-to-B: Know how long you need to walk to your station, view your line's arrival time, receive get-off alerts as you approach your destination, and more. 

► Visualize Your Stop. Use augmented reality to locate your bus or train stop with "Way Finder".

► User reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and schedules so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus time or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. Moovit will help you plan a trip that meets your transit-needs. Bike docking stations are updated in real-time. Bike trip plans are only available in supported metro areas.

► Maps view. Interested in seeing the whole picture? View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Moovit is the #1 urban mobility app in the world. We’re proud to collaborate with public transit agencies across the United States, including:
MTA
NJ Transit
MBTA
SEPTA
LA Metro
SFMTA Muni
BART
Caltrain
CTA
Metra
WMATA
MTA Maryland
TriMet
Sound Transit
SARTA
PARTA

You only need one app on your phone to navigate nearby buses and transit in the U.S. and across 112 other countries and in 45 languages. If you’d like to know bus times and train times all around the world or if you need to find out when the last bus leaves a certain bus stop Moovit has you covered. You ride, we guide!

Contact us: 
* https://support.moovitapp.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=175869
* https://www.facebook.com/moovit
* https://twitter.com/moovit

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en
releaseNotes:
New! Add an extra stop
Customize your trip by adding an additional stop to your route. Simply tap the + icon next to your destination.
New! Know ahead of time if your line arrival is being delayed due to traffic. Just look for the “traffic” icon near your line.

title: Lemon8 - Lifestyle Community
description:
Lemon8 is THE destination for sharing and exploring. On Lemon8, photo and video content are refreshing, diverse and informative. Whether you're a fashion enthusiast, beauty lover or looking for a food recipe, travel itinerary, there's something for everyone on Lemon8. All you have to do is browse, record and engage with what you like, and you'll find personalized content just for you. From a shopping haul experience or a book recommendation, Lemon8 has the contents that are guaranteed to make your time worthwhile.

[Find Your Community]
- Lemon8's customized content is specifically made for you. Our "For You" section recommends a personalized feed to you based on your interests. 
-Lemon8 is also a great place for you to express and engage in a free space with other like-minded creatives within the community.

[Create with Ease]
- Fed up of the faff of creating on one app, editing on another, posting on yet one more? With Lemon8, our in-app suite allows you to compose texts, edit photos and videos with ease.
- You'll find a whole library of intuitive templates, stickers, filters and fonts for your photos and videos.
- Say 'goodbye' to jumping between apps to make a single post and, say 'hello' to Lemon8!

[Explore and Discover]
- Use hashtags! Our hashtags not only help your posts get discovered, but also help you easily discover content you like.

[Contact Us]
- We want to build Lemon8 into the app you need and desire. Your suggestions make Lemon8 better.
- If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, contact us at any time using the following email: contact@lemon8-app.com

title: Sezzle - Buy Now, Pay Later
description:
Welcome to Sezzle, the ultimate buy now, pay later shopping app that empowers you to get what you love today and make easy, interest-free payments over six weeks. With Sezzle, you can effortlessly split your purchases into four payments¹, making shopping more accessible and managing your budget easier. Discover the smarter way to shop and stay ahead of your finances with Sezzle's pay in 4¹ product – no interest, no hidden fees, and no catch!


Why Sezzle?

BUY NOW PAY LATER
Instantly access thousands of retailers and enjoy the flexibility of paying over time.

PAY IN 4 EASY PAYMENTS¹
Make your purchase now and pay in four equal, interest-free installments over six weeks¹.

ZERO INTEREST & NO HIDDEN FEES
Experience transparent shopping with no surprises. Enjoy zero interest installments without the hidden fees.

SHOP SMARTER
Manage your spending and stay on top of your finances with our intuitive app. Sezzle makes it easier to buy what you need and budget your expenses.

INSTANT APPROVAL DECISION
No long forms to fill out; you’ll know if you’re approved instantly and can start shopping right away.


Features:

SEAMLESS EXPERIENCE
Use Sezzle at your favorite online stores—just select Sezzle at checkout.

FLEXIBLE RESCHEDULES
Life happens. We get it. Reschedule payments if you need extra time.

SECURE & RESPONSIBLE SPENDING
Sezzle promotes financial responsibility in all facets of the product. Shop confidently knowing you’re in control.

EXCLUSIVE DEALS & OFFERS
Access special promotions, discounts, and exclusive offers from our retail partners.

EASY SIGNUP
A quick, simple sign-up process. Get started with Sezzle and make your shopping experience smoother.


How It Works:

SHOP
Browse your favorite stores or discover new ones where Sezzle is accepted.

CHECKOUT
Choose Sezzle as your payment method at checkout.

SEZZLE IT
Your purchase is split into four payments¹, spread over six weeks.

ENJOY
Get your items now and pay over time without any interest.


Ready to revolutionize the way you shop? Download Sezzle today and experience the freedom of buying now and paying later, with the flexibility of pay in 4¹ easy installments. It's shopping made simple, smart, and stress-free.




¹Pay in 4 payment option is 0% Annual Percentage Rate (APR). 25% down payment then three payments of 25% every two weeks for 6 weeks.
releaseNotes: Cool new features, performance improvements and bug fixes to our app to provide you with a better shopping experience every time. Be sure to update or simply turn on automatic updates!
reviews:
My Sezzle card isn’t working and when I tried contacting support app crashes have tried over 20 times and every time it crashes have sent an email waiting on reply to get my account fixed | Sezzle USED TO BE GREAT, but with all their changes and them pushing their new Anywhere option they have become greedy with fees. It’s really sad to see companies become this way, they add a fee for every little thing now. Before if a payment failed on a card they would automatically use the backup card on file, now they let the failed payment sit there and charge you a $5 fee (even if you pay it immediately) then $2 for everyday it’s late! That’s insane! I have a credit card I can add immediate funds to that gives me points and helps build my credit so I use it for the initial payment most of the time and then my usual debit card for follow up payments so normally it was never an issue, now they make me feel like I’m someone that can’t manage my bills and so they need to “punish” me for it, like calm down Sezzle you are not a credit card company…although even they would give more grace. I’m so disappointed in this company, I’ll just stick to Klarna, at least they only added a $2 service fee I would much rather deal with. Do better Sezzle! | I guess someone else has used my number | So the only way you can use this stupid app at any store you would actually want to shop at is if you give these people $12 a month, no thanks I’ll just use affirm or PayPal. | It doesn’t work whenever I try to use it. It let me use it in store which is why I got it then when I went to do it it took it away. Every feature disappears | I love Sezzle because unlike other afterpay services like PayPal/ karma/afterpay/ affirm it lets you buy ammo and firearms. All of sudden I must be approved and even then I can’t make a purchase because I don’t want to pay an additional $18 a month to use Sezzle at any store. This app is not worth your time anymore. Corporations just can’t help their greed can they? I wish I could give them -1 stars. They said "as long as you make your payments on time or early your limit won't be reduced." Majority of my payments that I made with Sezzle were early payments and others on time!!!, somehow my limit was reduced significantly... That was extremely disappointing. Sezzle also came out with a premium subscription. That was a great way to use it in different ways and with different merchants it was an annual fee which lots of people loved... HOWEVER THEY TOOK AWAY THE PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION AND NOW I HAVE A MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION FEE INSTEAD OF JUST PAYING $80 A YEAR. THEY ARE FORCING THEIR CUSTOMERS TO PAY $17.99 A MONTH TO USE SEZZLE ANYWHERE.... ZIP has now become my new Sezzle because at least with Zip I don't have to pay a monthly fee to use it anywhere and my limit isn't reduced out of nowhere. | I use Sezzle for groceries mostly and Let me tell you that Sezzle has gotten me out of some rough times!! title: SAP Concur
description:
If you use Concur® Travel, Concur® Expense, or Concur® Invoice at work, then download this companion app to your iPhone or iPad to manage your travel and expenses when you’re on the go! 

With the SAP® Concur® mobile app, you can:
• Review and approve expense reports, invoices, and travel requests
• Snap a photo of your receipt and instantly add it to your expense report
• Book a flight or rail ticket, reserve hotel rooms, or rent a car 
• Update or add new attendees to meeting invites
• Get hotel suggestions based on your preferences
• Capture and track mileage automatically
• Integrate your itinerary with TripIt to get real-time travel alerts and updates

*This is a companion mobile app for existing users of SAP Concur solutions.*
releaseNotes:
REMOVALS
• End of support for iOS 15.
reviews:
Entered expense data into required fields. App then deletes that information and gives an error alert for not entering them. | I take images of receipts and they randomly disappear. | Every scanned receipt is taking 2-4 minutes to process.   Highly annoying and unacceptable in todays world | I’m just trying to photograph a receipt. The app spent 45 seconds spinning while “authenticating”, then another minute and 30 seconds spinning trying to load the expense list. I needed 15 seconds to photograph the receipt but was stuck waiting for the app for nearly 3 minutes. | Before the app was updated to this “new look” a user was able to store up to 4 locations in the “personal mileage” section. This made it much easier for drivers that frequent the same destinations not to have to type in the exact same addresses daily. 

Why it’s missing I don’t know, but it is an extremely frustrating loss to many of us daily travelers. | I shouldn’t have to type the “comment” or “business purpose”  2 or 3 times while proceeding into an expense report. It will ask for both while attaching a receipt then immediately on the next page I will have to re-type the same message in the same boxes even though I have clicked “save” before proceeding. Thank you | Review after 2 years of use: App locks up when you try to move an expense out of a report and into a new one. app does not allow for one way car rental. App & website consistently crash. If actually worked, it’d be a great app. | Twice now, in two days, my workflow has been interrupted by this app soliciting feedback. The only way to “opt out” of providing feedback is to say that you “love” the app. 

I don’t “love” ANY app. In fact I don’t “love” any inanimate thing, am I to assume SAP’s developers “love” inanimate objects? Does this extend to rubber dolls?

The app stinks, overall, it’s buggy and has a stone-age interface. 

But I’m forced to use it by my company. 

My company pays me to work for them, NOT to be an evaluator of SAP’s concur app. 

But every time the app asks for feedback I’ll be here, giving another 1-star review. 

SAP is a hot mess and so is their concur app. | Good Stuff! Easy to use. | Every time there’s an update they move everything around and I have to find out where everything is again. The last update deleted all my recent cities. 
The app also takes forever to load. 
Just make it simple so I can get my money back from the corporation I have to stroke everyday so I can eat. Make it simple and then STOP trying to make it “better”. | Not user friendly, slow | Someone submitted my March 2024 expense report for an audit. The report was sent back to me in order to itemize all hotel taxes and fees. title: Weather Radar - NOAA + Channel
description:
Weather Radar is the most accurate, reliable weather tracker and forecast app, allowing you to stay ahead of weather patterns in your area or anywhere across the nation. Whether you use weather radar for your daily planning or for safety measures, we have got you covered with reliable weather data packed in an accessible design. 

Rated the leading weather app in over 30 countries and with over 3.6M downloads worldwide to prove it, Weather Radar offers live updates 24/7 and exceptional weather forecasting.

WHAT MAKES IT THE #1 WEATHER FORECASTING APP?
• Detailed hourly forecasts over the next 10 days
• Live rain and snow doppler radars
• Future precipitation forecasts 
• Animated wind map with a 12 day wind forecast
• Weather warnings on maps & extreme weather alerts (storms, floods and tides) (US only)
• Hurricane tracker
• Lightning tracker
• Weather Charts with info across temperatures, precipitation, wind, pressure and UV index
• AQI (US and Canada)
• Home screen widget (iPhone only)
• Lock screen widgets with time to upcoming rain, rain gauge and more
• Watch extension


UNIQUE INTERFACE
Weather Radar combines all available weather information into an intuitive and accessible interface, making it easy to use for all ages.


DETAILED WEATHER INFO
Weather Radar provides you with accurate charts concerning the development of the most important key weather-related values in any location you wish and lets you zoom in to see how they could impact you. This gives you a clear view of temperature, precipitation, wind, pressure, and UV. These charts can run anywhere from hourly to 10 days in the future and can be combined to meet your needs. 


HURRICANE WARNINGS AND INFO
Stay on top of any hurricane’s development, its predicted path, directional changes, wind speed, wind quadrants and much more with visual images.


SUPPORTED COUNTRIES AND REGIONS


NORTH AMERICA: United States*, Canada, Mexico
EUROPE: France, United Kingdom, Germany, Spain, Portugal, Netherlands, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, Finland, Denmark
ASIA-PACIFIC: Mainland China, Japan, Hong Kong, Korea, Taiwan & Australia


*Frequent severe weather conditions coverage in Florida, Texas, Alabama, Oklahoma, Kansas, Louisiana, Arkansas, Georgia, Mississippi, North and South Carolina


WHY SUBSCRIBE TO PREMIUM?
We want to bring essential weather information to you for free. Are you in need of more in-depth data and a wider range of features? Say no more:


With a Premium Membership you'll get access to:
• Lightning tracker
• Wind map
• Extended rain and snow doppler radar
• Get Weather Reports for multiple locations
• Ad-free Experience


Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.




If you have any suggestions or are unable to find the answers to any of your questions our support team is ready and happy to help. Simply email support@impalastudios.com


Terms & Conditions: https://impalastudios.com/terms Privacy Policy: https://impalastudios.com/privacy
releaseNotes:
Stay informed about extreme weather conditions in your area. With this update, you'll receive an improved weather tracking experience as we fixed some crashes.

For questions and feedback, don't hesitate to email us at support@impalastudios.com.
reviews:
Excellent apps | I’ve read the contract and TOA. Bending Spoons wants $80 to send your information and behaviors to their (or all) third-party for their financial interests, not yours. Double dipping, price increased 190%. This is a popular app. It’s probably already been compromised. Bending Spoons will not tell you if your information or who has it, they don’t know for sure. That means they don’t have control over this app and your intimate information. Clime and Bending Spoons is an appropriate marketing communications name, not to be confused with NOAA. The original app I had 4 years ago was far better. This app has regressed too far. Apples built in app works fine, it’s secure. | Was using a couple of different apps to monitor some severe weather threats in my area, and this app’s radar was lagging way behind the others. A band of storms that had already gone through wasn’t supposed to hit my house for another 45 minutes according to this app. | The latest update has made the app essentially unusable for me. You cannot see the forecast in a single screen. You can’t even see the high and low temperature on a single screen. The charts have become unreadable. This is supposed to be NOAA, not WeatherBug. | There are so many pop-up banners on this site that I can’t see the radar map that is the whole reason I downloaded this app. Very disappointed. | Loving the bright colors | review Love it!! | Other radars showing light rain, past and present, as is correct.  This shows none.  .  .  . | No free features, totally subscription based. Delete immediately unless you want to pay.

title: Merge Mansion
description:
Welcome to Hopewell Bay! A crumbling old mansion needs some serious TLC… and there’s also a mystery to solve. Can you get to the bottom of what Grandma is hiding?

Unlock spaces and rooms in the garden and mansion, and uncover clues about the Boulton family’s many secrets. Meet fascinating characters, find new clues and complete tasks to unlock more of the story.

Relax into this cozy merge game and story packed with more twists and turns than Grandma’s knitting.

MATCH & MERGE
Merge matching items to create new ones and complete the tasks. Enjoy the satisfaction of restoring the mansion and let the story unfold.


RESTORE & DESIGN
Restore the mansion and grounds to their former glory, collect themed decorations and customize your cottage and garden.


INVESTIGATE & SOLVE
Uncover secret areas and collect clues to find out what Grandma is hiding. , and how far the roots of these secrets really reach…

EXCITING EVENTS
Play events to score points, claim gorgeous decorations, and win awesome prizes.

Hopewell Bay is the number one destination for a cozy getaway - and it never gets boring! Download Merge Mansion now and start your journey.

——————————

Did you get stuck or run into a problem? Visit our support page in the Merge Mansion app or send us a message at mergemansionsupport@metacoregames.com.
releaseNotes: Small fixes and improvements. Thank you for playing Merge Mansion.
reviews:
I tried game for a couple months, but I lost interest in it. Not very challenging. Had side events but used up same energy you need for main game.  Sorry but deleted this game. | Firstly, I love the girl who does your videos.  Frankly, she’s become the best part of the game.  I’ve played this game every day for over a year and currently at Heiki’s Sauna.  It seems that the deal has become to keep adding more producers and requiring higher level items so that you simply can”t have enough room for everything.  Additionally, some of the events (not the monthly ones) are pretty much impossible to complete.  I’ve spent so many coins to have more spaces having almost reached the max and paid real money for every monthly event until the rewards kept shrinking while the price remained the same. 
I really do like the game but have reached the end of my ability to justify playing it and refuse to spend another penny until it is worth it again.  Heiki’s Sauna has become my breaking point.  Give us more spaces or I’ll find a new game.  For those who haven’t yet gotten to this point I hope this serves as fair warning of what is to come.  Read the posts on Fandom; many players are frustrated.  I’m taking a break from the game. Please make changes so we can enjoy it again. | I Highly Recomend Merge Mansion!!!!!! | This is a great game to play ‘in between’ life’s responsibilities. 

However, please, please, please stop repeating challenges. Once I have gone fishing, I don’t want to do that anymore. Once I have done the topiary challenge, I don’t want to do that again. Multiple garage cleanups for the same items are also questionable.  

I’m still trying to complete the Conservatory while having moved on to other areas. | I’ve been working on a task (yes one task) for a month.   Finally the item was offered in the store for 8000 gems which would take two more years to get for free (waiting for piggy banks … 100 gems every 8 days.

Or……… $100 for one merge

Just sayin… metacore is not earning enough… prices going up…. Game rigged for maximum frustration to get more money.

I hope they tell us grandma’s story when they yank the game from the market and shutter their doors.

Good luck to all the workers in your future endeavors! | I like the game, but it is slow to progress because you have to merge too many items to get to the final one that gives you real points. 100 energy isn’t enough to get you very far, so you either have to wait for the game to automatically top up your energy to 100 again, which takes 90 mins, or use gems to buy more energy. You need gems to buy more of everything & they are hard to earn playing the game, just like energy points are hard to earn. So invariably if you want to progress before a side story expires & you haven’t finished it, you have to buy what you need from the store. You can easily spend a lot of money, even just buying grandma’s stash, which is all the gems you accrued playing the game. At just under $20 for the stash of gems that incidentally don’t last very long since items can cost between a few gems to several 100s or 1000s of gems to burst the bubble they’re in, you can imagine how much you end up spending to finish the game!  If money isn’t a concern for you, have fun coz it was fun while it lasted coz I enjoyed the social messages within the game, like making a better effort to recycling & up cycle etc. | Love the game but sometimes you wont be able to play because the game will say there’s no internet connection, even tho all of my other apps/games work perfectly fine.. so beware before you purchase anything. | I’ve been playing this game for well over a year and I do love it. However, there are a few things that I hate. First, I have still not gotten into the mansion. Second, there are WAYYYYY too many bubbles and stars that pop up all the time! Don’t get me wrong, I appreciate the extra coins and stars but maybe just give them in groups, instead of all over the board all the time, it’s extremely frustrating. 
For these reasons I have given a 4 star rating. | Absolutely love the story throughout the game , the areas to be repaired are very engaging and how the missions can be easily obtainable through variety of spawning items. Unfortunately though: (1) it is hard to synchronize the same account on different devices, (2) it is FULL of events that are nearly impossible to obtain in the amount of time given (unless you can spend two or three days straight mostly playing the game) and (3) if you are required to make two identical items and you accidentally merge them… you need to start over from scratch. | Need to know what to merge to get stuff. It gives you the same stuff over and over and doesn’t give you anything covered in spiderwebs. Don’t know why it has to be so hard. | Why is it gone now? At first I wasn’t sure about it but then definitely preferred it in some situations. Why get me hooked on something to just suddenly take it away? | I love this game and have been playing since it came out. The challenges to obtain the wood and the saw to get the wood is ridiculous. It takes days to obtain. I spend money all the time to have access ti the extra goals. Make t easier on us! Love playing yhis game. | You have to pay for almost everything and you have to wait several hours to tap the barrels etc to get the stuff you need to play, like bruh waste of time | This game is so fun lots to do only bad thing is uses lots of money just to play more
I wasted 354 dollars but it’s fun | This game is fun for wasting time; it does that well. However, it is now tedious to do anything when playing for free. I understand this is a company that wants to make money, but it should still be easy to play without that. Pokémon Go does this beautifully. You can tell that paying money would help you advance faster and get more done, but you can make good progress on your own. Now that I’m at Level 25, it feels like it takes me weeks to make any progress. 

My energy runs out quickly and it’s not enough to even help me complete tasks; the recharge rate is super long on things (like the cabinets); even when I use game coins to purchase boxes with additional items, it still costs energy (that’s super annoying); gems are hard and slow to obtain, and events are hard to enjoy. 

I feel that this game should make gameplay fun and attainable for both free and paying customers. I get that those who pay money get additional perks, and that’s fine with me. I don’t mind if I have to work for stuff, but it shouldn’t feel like a long drill. The game is for wasting time! It’s not supposed to be difficult. 

And what’s even sadder is that the developers probably don’t care. I scrolled through dozens of comments, many of which made the same complaints I’m making, and no one got a response. | …it’s SO frustrating.  You can tap a source 20 times, or so, then it’s a long wait for the producer to become active again.  When it FINALLY does become active, you can tap it like 4 times and it’s back in time out.  They often only give you ONE task at a time, and you spend more time waiting on producers than playing the game.  That’s pretty frustrating, and I get enough frustration in real life.  I guess they think we will pay $5 every 30 minutes to make the game playable, but that’s not gonna work for most of us.  I don’t mind spending a little money on a game, but seems they get greedy and think if you are willing to spend a little, then they will just keep throwing detours at you to make you spend more and more.  This COULD Ba fun game if they didn’t make it so difficult to finish tasks.  Giving more than one task at a time would also give options for other things to do when a producer goes dormant.  Another problem with this game is the inventory storage area.  Each spot purchased gets increasingly more expensive.  My next inventory spot is waiting for me to accumulate 18,000 coins to buy it.  Wow.  It’s crazy expensive and also takes away from the enjoyment of the game.  Identical items SHOULD be stackable, but they are not.  The game designers are causing players to lose enthusiasm over the game thru frustration. | Enough is enough! Tired of towels, buckets, wrenches etc and then running out of energy! Hmmpff! 😠 Can't seen to get ahead. | I want to like this game, but the refresh times are unreasonable, especially for how little play you get from a refresh. Too hard to get any items to do anything. | I enjoy this game but it takes too long move up. I’m getting tired of it | Let me just start of with saying I LOVE merge mansion, I am addicted! But I thought of some cool updates that could be added.
1. There should be a night mode for the mansion
We’ve never seen the mansion at night and yet we build so many lamps for each area.

2. There should be a skip task thing
Maybe it’s like a ticket or a special coin that you use to skip a task that you dont want to do

3. There should be a trade with friends thing
For example you search your friends in game id, friend them, and then trade! Maybe they have a really high level cleaning spawner and you have a high level tool spawner and you both need what each other’s got. This would also help add more people to the game since people would want to trade with their friends

It would be really cool to see these things be added if possible! Thank you! | Saw the ads thought it would be fun. WRONG.You  Run Out Of Energy TOO FAST and it takes TOO LONG to get Energy Back. I downloaded a different merge game it’s called “Love Paradise” it’s not a drama Mystery like this one BUT ON THAT GAME I CAN:
1. Replenish my energy by using my coins and gems OR by just watching an AD
2. It doesn’t take 30-40mins for my chests, boxes, reward chests etc to Refresh.
3. There’s no side missions that take away my energy.
Moral of the story. DELETING THIS GAME and going back to that one bc it’s not worth my time | I like this game and it’s fun to play, but I feel like every couple of months the developers get greedier and greedier. The rewards have become smaller (rarely get full 100 energy or more than a couple of purple stones anymore), and it takes forever to reach some of the goals because the producers do not produce what you need - even at the top level!

I have bought packages a couple of times but I’m getting very frustrated when I spend money and can still only play for about 3 minutes before all my energy is spent! I don’t even bother with most of the side games because they use all my regular energy and those rewards aren’t even worth it anymore (15 min hourglass doesn’t help when producers are taking 3+ hours to refresh). Just about ready to uninstall… | It's just another game of bait and switch with the advertising lures you in and then it's just another batch came where you have to spend money in order to get rewards | I love this game so much, my only note would be that I recently tried another merge game, and they had a feature where when an item reached its top level, it had a little crown in the corner, so I think something (like where the blue or green checkmarks are) to tell you an item is at its max level would be amazing! Otherwise I love the game!! | Alright, I have to walk away from this game.  Multiple times I’ve bought packages to be charged differently from what was stated and charged multiple times even days later.  I missed it at first but once I realized it, it’s amazing how frequently it happens.  Walk away, complete rip off. | If you don’t log in for a couple of weeks they go in without your knowledge or consent and delete items from your board. | I like how you use the items you merge. | I have been playing for well over a year now, I used to pay for extras here and there but have quit doing so. The developers have made this game impossible to complete events without paying and if they aren’t willing to give a little then neither am I. Purple energy regeneration is super slow and makes playing not even fun anymore. Start listening to your players and make some improvements and I might update to a 5 star review. | I just started to play and so far I like the game | So sick of having to go wait for it to load to 100 just to kick me out and have to repeat 37 times before I can even play. Kicks me out in the middle of merging. Too expensive!!!!!! | There should be no energy because it is really annoying to wait for more energy. | Side games(fishing and topiary) aren’t that interesting. | This is a great game but suddenly it won’t move to another area. If I’m on the main board , it won’t let me go to the task bar. Or if I’m on the task bar it won’t let me go back to the main area.  I have to close the game wait a while and reopen.  But wherever it opens that’s where I’m stuck. | I like this game, but it needs some improvements.

1). The inventory slots should hold multiple same items so that we have more storage space.   I find the inventory slots ridiculously hard to get and are expensive.

2).  The events don’t last long enough and one can not reach the end.  For example the pony event had 40 ish levels of rewards and I might have reached half.

3).  The timing out for items is to long to tap again.   It takes forever to reset them if you are working on a specific area and need lots of items from specific source like the toolbox or a specific plant.

I love the game but I do not want to spend a fortune on this.

Thank you for consideration.

JC | Been playing this game but I noticed recently that when you wait and merge your piggy banks for more gems and coins that if you add them all to your bank, the game won’t add all of them so I was super gypped on like 100 gems. | I’ve played this game daily for over a year, and STILL haven’t gotten into the house or beyond the plot point that Grandma got arrested (it’s in the game trailer, so it’s no surprise). I’ve completed SO MANY areas outside the house, but still can’t get inside or progress the story. I’m trying to get through the rock garden now. How much longer until I can get into the meat of the game? It feels like I’ve just been playing filler content for months | Ok game not enough energy and not everyone can pay for coins or gems overall 9.9/10!!!! | I really enjoy the game but there have been glitches… specifically items disappearing from your saved items!!! Two glove boxes and a high level vase - all no where to be found. Only other criticism is a lack of variety in the sub games… I mean how many times can I fish or create topiaries. Otherwise… really enjoying the game. | I really do like the game and play it daily. However as you advance into the house you really get delayed. They make it really hard to move forward with delayed items producing. You either have to spend money to open them sooner, be patient or use the resources you have saved. Then it’s one item at a time. You can’t work on other parts while waiting for the items to recharge. It’s so slow. | This game is fun to play but for the love of god please stop making us chase the same icon over and over and over and over. They use the same one all the time.  Say you need a wheelbarrrow then when you get to the wheelbarrow, it makes you use the same icon to get either another wheelbarrow or the next thing up!!! You get sick of playing. Mix it up more please. Then maybe I would play more. | I think you should do this because it is a really fun attractive game where you make matches and it’s just really fun | With the latest update I feel it’s harder to accomplish anything! | GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT | Why so many updates and events? | I’ve been playing this game since 2021 and have LOVED it! There aren’t any ads and aren’t that many pop ups like most games have — only thing I dislike is them changing the coins from their beautiful rusty bronze color to the gold color :( but 10/10 game | As I am only 11, you may not take this feedback as seriously as you would take an adult’s feedback, but I’m here to tell you this is a great game. The part I like most about it is that the game gives you a certain amount of ‘energy’ based on what you earn, and once you run out of energy, it gives you time to stop playing, and come back later. For me, I like how it’s kinda chill, and if I’m doing something low-key, I like to play this game. It also has some mysterious feel to it sometimes, which is also makes it really chill and fun at the same time. The game also barely has many ads! I was very surprised at first, because most games nowadays have ads almost EVERY second when your playing! Sure it has some ads like once or twice, but it’s only if you want to buy something using ads. I don’t want to give too much away, but let me tell you, the grandma has a secret! Play to find out! Overall, this is a great game, with great graphics, and especially NO ADS!! | Very hard to play and demanding. | I love it no adds so far but I hate running out of energy but does teach me not to be on my phone 24/7 | Seems like this game only wants money!  Only played a few months as I just needed a distraction to not think…but this game is rigged to only play if you pay.  Log in. 100 energy. But as of the new update. All the sources to get the items you need …example lvl 7 linen closet to get cleaning supplies.  Literally you can tap 10 times and wait 2 hours.   Won a few 2-4 hour rush times…..use those and might get 4-5 taps on linen closet that now takes 3 hours and 15 minutes.  So if I had purchased the rush time…instead of winning. Would have been a waste!  Regardless…100 energy didn’t last long. Now you have energy left over and waiting hours to log back on. Click 4-10 times and wait 3 more hours.  Seriously?   This is supposed to be a fun game?   Thinking of deleting in a few days…makes you frustrated instead of occupying your mind! | I’ve been playing for almost a year now, and I love the game. It’s addictive, the storyline is fun (I mean who doesn’t wanna know what Grandma is hiding lol) and there’s always neat story events to keep it interesting. However, I did notice something off. I haven’t played in a little while, which isn’t because of the game, but my life had a few changes that needed adjusting. I came back this morning to a gift of energy and an hourglass to skip time, but a LOT of my stuff was gone! I had quite a few items I wanted to hold on to so I can use them at the appropriate time, items I needed to complete tasks, gone. So I now have to fill up my board with those items all over again. I guess the developers thought I stopped because my board was full lol. But as long as I’ve been playing, that’s the only thing that bothered me. Overall a great game if you’re looking to pass the time.

title: Universal Orlando Resort
description:
Whether you’re planning a future visit or already in the middle of your adventure, the Universal Orlando Resort App is the ultimate must-have. Tap in to purchase tickets, access planning tools, unlock exclusive experiences, book delicious dining reservations, and even order your favorite foods on the go!

Get all of this and more in the palm of your hand with the Universal Orlando Resort App.

Access Your Universal Orlando Wallet: Link your tickets and add a payment method to ensure an even more seamless visit! For a contactless experience, you can access your tickets on the go and even assign specific tickets to people within your Travel Party.

Ordering Food is Deliciously Easy: With Mobile Food & Drink Ordering, you can order ahead at select locations. That means less time waiting in line and more time enjoying delicious delights!

Dine On Your Time: Make dining reservations at select locations throughout Universal Orlando Resort. From classic culinary favorites to show-stopping desserts, you’ll find something for everyone to enjoy.

Unlock Connected Gameplay: Are you ready to complete the challenge? Level up to Super-Villain stardom with connected gameplay at Illumination’s Villain-Con Minion Blast. Sync with your blaster to customize your experience, track your score, opt into special missions, and earn achievements!

Navigate Our Universe: From attraction wait times to nearby dining options and everything in between, you can find it all on our dynamic digital park map.

Plus, you can access additional features designed to ensure you have the smoothest visit possible. Virtual Assistant, Parking Reminders, Universal Pay, and more are available only in the Universal Orlando Resort App.

Privacy Information Center: www.UniversalOrlando.com/Privacy

Terms of Service: www.universalorlando.com/web/en/us/terms-of-service/terms-of-use

Your Privacy Choices: www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo

Privacy Policy: www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy

CA Notice: www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act
releaseNotes:
Get ready to amplify your experience at Universal Orlando Resort with our latest app update!

In addition to bug fixes and enhancements, this update puts even more information at your fingertips with the ability to view both park notifications and wait time alerts in one convenient location on the profile tab.

The map is only so so . | Everyone knows how hard it is nowadays to save anything in a savings account for a vacation… that’s on top of trying to save money for rainy days or your retirement.. let’s not forget to include the money for your child’s future education for those of you who have children..
But think about this and listen to my reason why I gave a poor rating.. it took me over two years to save what I could save to experience Orlando Floridas theme parks… all the amazing things that they advertise worldwide about Orlando, Florida, should become one of the most amazing experience that anyone should experience… normally it is.. unfortunately for me my 29 months of saving what I can to take my young one to whatever park she picked..
After spending all of the vacation money for this vacation was not too bad, except for one..(THE LIE) That a representative of universal studio was pretty slick… I’m not sure if they work on commission, but at the end of this supposedly great vacation a life experience that should never be forgotten.. didn’t and very well with the two of us..
When we were purchasing the ticket at the gate. I explain to this representative what we wanted to do…
For some reason, I trusted her that’s the way it should be in America trusting trusting each other.. I guess North Dakota it is like that.. becoming downtown it really is different😢😢..
We were supposed to experience three theme parks.. not looking at the tickets… we experience to great days.. but the last day was the day that didn’t end up great..
We could not enter the third park because we did not have the correct ticket..
I thought I bought three day pass ticket from park to park with the fourth day “”free”” trusting this person’s word… we were going to experience all three parks for the price that she gave me…
we were both so happy that we had enough money to pay for what we wanted to do.. after all, we didn’t plan this trip over two years ago..
But at the end we were only allowed into two parks..
Like I said, I trusted the ticket booth person and what she explained to me.. pay the price as she quoted me go from park to park and if I wanted to upgrade simply pay for Xpress Pass.. at the end, it didn’t matter… we could not enter the last part because it was not on the ticket…
We woke up early every single day to get the most out of what we paid.. but in the end we ended up, leaving disappointed basically a little hurt inside… if any of you can understand what I am trying to elaborate…
I am not the person who is going to be a “”Karen”” so we both left and waited for our plan to come and pick us up the next day…
Pay close attention to what these people say and charge you.. they well lie to you with no remorse.. 
they will easily take your money, and once it is theirs, they will not return it to you…
I wasn’t looking for a return, I only wanted to experience a vacation of a lifetime with my family..
 if I had lots of money, I wouldn’t even be sharing this sad experience with anyone who reads this…
I talk to one person about this at the park.. didn’t care at all what I was saying or trying to explain what happened… I simply said thank you and have a good day..
My advice… look at everything closely before you sign your credit card merchant receipt…
Even if they tell you that your tickets are good for all the parks.. don’t fall for the trap of that they are giving you something free… if you hear the word free, they will take your hard working money…😢 | Won’t allow me to enter my address | Disney is horrible.
