title: U-Haul
description:
Get Moving Faster with the U-Haul app. Wherever you’re headed, our app is designed for Moving Made Easier®. Get an instant quote, start or modify your reservation, track your orders, and so much more, all from your mobile device. It’s the fastest and most secure way to manage your move!

- Pick up and return your rental with just a few taps on your device, any time.
- Sign in with your custom profile to skip the counter and reserve in minutes.
- Get an instant quote, manage your order, and review your rental history.
- Use the live chat feature or email us for 24/7 support.
- View FAQs and resources to answer your questions. 
- Quickly find a U-Haul location near you with the products and services you need.
releaseNotes: We’ve unboxed important bug fixes and implemented essential security updates to ensure a smoother and safer app experience. Download the latest version of the U-Haul app and Make Moving Easier® today!
reviews:
Checking out or in with the app is not a quick process, but it’s an alternate method, and most times a better method, to waiting for a person to check a truck in or out. My biggest complaint is the notifications. I had been getting numerous irrelevant notifications from the app so I had turned off Lock Screen and banner, just leaving badges and Notification Center on. My last U-Haul rental was two months or more ago; and the time before that was almost 2 years ago. I don’t have any reservations pending and haven’t searched for any future dates or even opened the app in a couple of months. Well, today, in Notification Center it said “A Haul location is less than a mile. Tap to start pick-up”.  The location it was referring to was the one I last used 2 years ago. Again, I have no upcoming reservations, searched, active or cancelled, so I find that interruption annoying.  Other than NOT Allow Notifications from U-haul or deleting the app completely I don’t see how it can be stopped whenever I am stopped within a mile of that location. | I made an appointment after confirming it’ll only take an hour and a half if I had an early appointment to install a hitch. Which for the morning of May 7. I then received an email saying or take three hours. When I responded to the email, no response was given to me. When I again responded to the email again no response from U-Haul. Then when I called, they put me on hold and be one minute five minutes later I called back and they were very rude.if you make enough money with other people, you don’t have a good day | I went to the U-Haul moving and storage location on 594 Bearses Way, Hyannis, MA 02601 to get some information about whether or not they would store my travel trailer for a month or two depending on what my needs were at the time. I was well received by Corey Lewis the hitch professional at the counter who is extremely professional and courteous and kind I must say, he gave me the information and also printed it out for me so that it would be easier for me to make plans when I need to call and reserve a spot.
I think that Corey represents U-Haul in a very positive way and should be commended for his pleasant and positive attitude towards customers. Customer service to me is very important and I have always received good service at this location. 

As I was leaving I realize I had another question and there were two gentlemen out there one young man who had only been there two weeks and sorry to say I did not get his name, but I could not have received a more welcoming approach, even though he was in the middle of hitching up. He said he loved working at U-Haul. It was his best decision he had having come from construction work.
Then another gentleman came over and also offered assistance, and it was just regarding the electrical hitch that I have on my SUV that will be towing my travel trailer in the near future. He was also very kind and professional, and went inside to get a little object to, check the connections and make sure that everything was working properly.
This is why I always use U-Haul whether I am here on Cape Cod I and or down in Florida I have used them several times and will always use them in the future.

I also have to complement everyone that works there and keeps the store in such clean and neat order!
I look forward to doing business with U-Haul and the very near future sincerely, Conrad G | Best service and extremely professional.  Lucas was so good to us and we are so thankful! | Trying to create profile but keeps saying error to connect to server. It’s not on my side. So this is not helpful at all. | Normal corporate spending on not reviews, app is designed to check in trucks and cause confusion so you have to pay 20 for not properly returning truck. Have to take pictures and 10 step process just to return truck total scam | We just want to give you money.  Why do you make it so difficult? 
Please don’t make us wait 45 mins to talk to a person for something as easy as changing a password or deleting an email address.  Every single time I get the “Unable to send code” I wonder who gets a kickback when I have to call customer service. | The app would be convenient if it worked. The app refused to load during pickup and drop off so I still had to go inside to talk to a representative | Can’t get logged in due to repeated time outs. Terrible app. | Reviews really do matter and that’s my fault for not checking before using this one or really this company at all. Made a reservation the day BEFORE for a trailer and an appliance dolly. Not only did they not have a clue about my reservation when I walked in THEY DIDNT HAVE ALL OF IT. THE 2nd moron working the desk response was “well it’s been a busy day” really???? That’s what the reservation is for!  After the 1st moron thot it was funny she had to call what I can only guess was a manager to see if they could cancel my reservation, like I was still going to pay for a reservation they didn’t fulfill? This is my argument for paying people $15-$20 an hour. Total incompetence and lack of caring. Never mind that I had made accommodations for the afternoon to move stuff AND have other people help me move stuff. They just wasted multiple people’s time and money and probably being paid $15 an hour to sit there and be stupid. AI could replace these idiots no problem. Do your self a favor and read the reviews and don’t do business with this company and store. I’m realizing now you can rent trailers and dollys from a lot of other reputable places. | App and website both useless, app has two spots to check in online, neither of them load whatsoever, and it sends to a screen saying to call a number. When we call, we get told there’s no need to call and to use the app or check in in person. When we went in person, they told us to just check in in the app.

Website is no better and no page for online check in ever loads, on any phone or PC. | Downloaded the app for the “scan me” feature for tracking the boxes as I pack.  Nothing works and the app keeps crashing. The only feature that seems okay is the one asking me to purchase more supplies. I can’t imagine actually thinking I could rent a truck using this thing as I can’t get past the first page… | Words can’t express how disappointed I am with the app! | Useless app. Have an account I can use online but won’t even let me sign into the app. Tried resetting password and everything. Wish could give 0 stars. | I rented a 15 ft truck for today. Chris had it ready for me at 7 am. There was a minor issue and Chris quickly put me in another truck. I had no issues with the vehicle after that. Setting up the reservation and returning the truck all went smoothly. The truck was clean and had a full tank of gas when I picked it up. I made sure I returned it the same way. I will certainly use them again in the future. | The workers are very friendly and helpful, The app was useless in my experience. | Took a 15’ truck from Plano to Columbus, GA and more recently a 10’ truck to Birmingham,AL.  The service from origin was absolutely superb in EVERY respect.  Love working with those folks.  They understand customer service! | She was great system was down when I called she got back to me the minute it came back up and she was very helpful and knowledgeable. I’ll be back!! | They urge you to download the app because it’s “faster” and “more helpful” yet the app is SO slow and doesn’t load anything or often says “network connection lost”. | Bought U-Haul smart label and got email 
Printed on special paper to make into stickers 
Used the app to scan and it crashes every time
Wasted the money for the labels and printing paper 
Fix the app please | Renting from uhaul bunkbeds went well i have rented from them in past and had disagreements but this time everything went smoothly they have two new employees and when returning truck in Washington the girl was on it didn’t have to wait | If I could leave a negative review I would. I rented a truck for my step daughter to move. When time to return they wanted to be lazy and not finish the move, I called uhaul and said I would not pay for more than 1 day. I was assured my card would not be processed for anything more than the one day and that it would be on the card I had given them. It was completely out of my name. 3 days later my card is processed for 3 days and had a bunch more that I hadn’t originally ordered on it. Now I can’t get any help with this. It’s been weeks and the other card wasn’t even ran. This caused my bank account to be insufficient and cost me quite a bit of money. Horrible customer service when I cannot even get a call back | I can’t get the app to work. All search feature is good, but all the links are dead ends. Also many places could use more photos that one… other than that that’s all I know about them. 
Willing to edit once fixed | Extremely disappointed in UHaul.  My Dad had a 26 ft. Truck and Trailer and arrived from Oregon.  Had Moving.com set up to unload on 3/13. The Storage Unit was reserved ahead of time because the lady said they go fast this time of year. Arrived with the movers and was told there was no unit. We had a 10x 40 and they offered us a 10 x5.  Said a lady never moved out of the unit so we could not have it.  Did not get a free month storage as was promised .  Had to find a new place for storage and had to cancel and then find new movers and pay extra money due to short notice. So disappointed!!!    Larry Olson and Jacque | There were constant timeouts and dropped order items. I was using the app only for packing supplies. After fighting the app for 2 hours, I chose to pickup at store. (The app fails to mention that delivery to home next day would cost $36 on an $88 order- until entering all credit card details). I received notification from my credit card that I was charged for the proper amount. 
I didn’t receive notice that my order was ready. I tried to reach the store for 30 minutes. They were “helping other customers “ and to download the app. Yikes! Just a merry-go-round. | This app is terrible! They send you a verification code, and the minute you enter it it automatically gives you an error code that your time has lapsed. What a crock.
Guess that’s why I need to go to a different service provider | U-Haul is trying to get rid of as much human interaction as possible. The app does not work well. I kept getting confirmation codes that wouldn’t work. Checkout is a royal pain. If there weren’t a monopoly. I’d go elsewhere just to avoid the app. | I have had better luck talking to a person than dealing with the app. App did not recognize my reservation so had to use the website. Mobile pickup takes a long time to get through, returning took a long time as well.  With a person, I’m in and out within minutes.

Next time I’m using someone else. | I’ve been trying to check-out through the app and no matter what I do it shows every location in the state except the one I’m at, so I can’t even check out. Very inconvenient and frustrating. When I try to reset the password, it tells me no account exists under either my email or phone number, despite having logged in and received verification codes to both on the desktop site. 

Sure does make it hard to pick up a truck. | Wasted nearly two hours of my Saturday trying to use it to pick up and drop off my rental (had full cell service, so that wasn’t the issue). Maybe it was just unlucky timing, but strongly consider renting from a location when it is open and a human is there. | I was very impressed by the customer service on both ends. The girl that helped at Uhaul was terrific. Despite being on her own and swamped. 

Ishi and the other driver were great. Great customer service with a smile. Very friendly and quick. I’ve had a lot of movers. They were right up there with the best.

title: Hertz Rental Car, EV, SUV, Van
description:
Book a car rental with the new and improved Hertz Rent-a-Car iPhone App. Pick your rental car from our extensive selection, including economy cars, electric cars, SUVs, vans, and even sports cars! Explore all the options to your heart’s content in our new iOS App!

Whether you are traveling for business, or going on a family vacation, you can save time, get on the road faster, and unlock the power to reserve, modify, and review your reservations with a few swipes of your finger! Spend less time in lines so you can get to your destination quicker! Our free Hertz App has added flexibility, to make sure that your car rental experience is quick, easy, and always meets your needs!!
Download the Hertz® App to get immediate access to:
• Search for rental cars and Hertz locations in popular cities.
• Use the Map-view to browse rental car availability at multiple Hertz locations.
• Skip the hassle of other car rental apps with Hertz’s one-touch log-in and easy browsing experience.
• Rent a car with our easy checkout, you’ll be done in seconds.
• Enjoy effortless mobile navigation with menus.
• Pick up where you left off, by using your previous searches.
• Get access to exclusive offers and content with Hertz Gold Plus Rewards®.
• And much more…

What benefits do you get with the Hertz Gold Plus Rewards program?
• Earn Hertz Rewards points, unlock perks, and score exclusive benefits to earn free rental car days, free upgrades, and more.
• Sign up is 100% free, helping you start earning rewards faster.
• Enjoy a personalized in-app experience with your name, member number, status, and rewards points balance all in one convenient location.
• See upcoming reservations at log-in or access your complete Hertz car rental history to make new bookings and help you complete expense reports.
• Easily review or modify upcoming car rentals with a few swipes.
• Redeem, request, and exchange Hertz Rewards points to pay for your car rental directly from the app.
• Save, modify, and update your preferred payment method with ease - Store work and personal credit cards to make everything super easy!

Did You Know?

As a result of creating top-tier customer experiences, Hertz was honored with several loyalty awards in 2020 and 2021.

Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was voted 9-time winner for Best Car Rental Rewards Program in 2020 by FlyerTalk and 8-time winner for the Best Travel and Loyalty Program – Women’s Choice Award in 2021. Additionally, Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was awarded Platinum status for Customer Loyalty Innovation and Transformation, and Silver status for Technology and Trends by Loyalty360 in 2021.
Thank you for being the motivation for Hertz to achieve these great awards:

• Women’s Choice Award – Best Car Rental Loyalty Program
• Ethisphere Institute Award - World’s Most Ethical Company - 2020
• Recommend Readers’ Choice Award – Best Car Rental Company (9x Winner)
• FlyerTalk Awards – Best Car Rental Loyalty Program (8x Winner)
• AAA Discounts and Rewards – Outstanding AAA Partner of the Year (2x Winner)
• Trazee Awards – Favorite Car Rental Company
• Global Traveler Award – Best Car Rental Company (6x Winner)
• Bitacora Award – Best National Car Rental Company (7x Winner)
• Annual World Travel Awards – Favorite Car Rental Company
• And many more.

Learn More About Hertz Car Rental:
Hertz is much more than a car rental company. Our business prides itself on dedication to customers' changing needs by offering a wide variety of vehicles and services. We boast a rich history of significant first steps, ambitious ideas and innovation that has formed our company into the reputable brand it is today.

Discover why millions of customers every year choose Hertz to rent a car.
releaseNotes:
- Search in popular cities, and use the map view to browse the Hertz locations, showing availability in multiple locations
- New Shop & Book experience

title: The Dyrt: Tent & RV Camping
description:
Find and book your perfect campsite anywhere in the U.S. The Dyrt is home to an active community of over one million campers, and is the #1 camping app for iOS. Search 50,000+ campgrounds for tents, RVs, trailers, cabins, and glamping. Plan your perfect trip and reserve campsites near lakes, hiking trails, and more.

Plan better camping for less
• Filter campgrounds by distance, rating, type, and more.
• Check out photos and reviews provided by campers, for campers.
• Book your next camping trip with ease.

PRO Membership Benefits:
• Free Camping – 5,000+ drive-in-accessible free camping locations.
• Dyrt Alerts – Get reservations at sold out campgrounds.
• Discounts – 1,000+ Campgrounds with up to 40% off.
• Save – No extra booking fees when booking on The Dyrt.  
• Road Trip – Find the best campgrounds along your driving route.
• Maps – Find camping with BLM, USFS, and Cell Service maps.
• Offline Mode – Download all 50,000+ campgrounds and offline maps.

List your campground on The Dyrt
• Make more money on bookings. We never charge commission fees for Instant Bookable properties—you keep 100%.
• Advertise your property to The Dyrt’s 30 million annual visitors for free.

LEGAL
Terms of Use: https://thedyrt.com/about/tacos
Privacy Policy: https://thedyrt.com/about/privacy

One of the main steps to running a business is to be honest with your consumers. Chase fraud will track them down | Don’t waste your time these guys are scammers plain and simple | Very helpful trying to find places to camp and park | Looking for some remote camping spots in Northern California. Was filtering the results it shows only 2 desolate camping sites in all of California. Also when looking at a site the app will say “pet friendly” and “available” but when you go to the actual campground site it shows fully booked and pets not allowed. | This app is totally useless. I took a trip driving to 49 states and 49 capitals in almost 1yr time period and not once this app came in handy. Google map does better | I Paid for pro but I do not get the pro benefits and there is no way to contact the dyrt . Do not pay for pro | Don’t tell this app that your residence is on an oil derrick in the Gulf of Mexico.  If you do, you’ll get nothing from this app.  This developer seems to think you will only camp around where your residence is.  Complete morons.  

(I live in Dallas, but GPS/location service use by this app keeps me locked to camping around DFW…again complete morons) | I think you have a great service and an awesome app. But if every other screen is a full screen pop-up about signing up for the pro service then it negates my enjoyment of the app. Once a session should be plenty of alert, but having a continuous stream of reminders seems like an anti pattern. Unfortunately have to look elsewhere. | They will charge your card even if you cancel BEWARE!!!!!! | Within the last few updates they have changed the app to where you can no longer find free campsites without paying for their upgraded pro version. Ridiculous, this app used to be really useful, but they have become just plain greedy. Your better off using a free alternative. | When I first started using this app three years ago it was great for finding dispersed camping. now if you want to utilize any of the information on the app you have to upgrade to the pro and pay for it. Amazing how popularity make it so you change for it. | I downloaded the app and signed up for the free trial. I’m glad I did, because I could check camping spots in my area. Since I could barely find any, I cancelled my membership, because it really didn’t offer me options for places to go. It advertises a lot of free campsites, but you have to first check it they’re available in your state. | Super friendly.  A few hours before I arrived, I recevied a call from the owner asking what time I expected to get there.  She told me to call her when I got there, she meet me and escorted me to the site.  I was in site 142 - a pull through that was as nice a site as I have been in.  Perfectly level, just very nice.  She even came and checked on me before we left.  I will be back!

title: GasBuddy: Find & Pay for Gas
description:
Join the 90 million people already saving! Get the free GasBuddy card and never pay full price at the pump again. See how GasBuddy gives you more ways and more places to save on gas than any other app.
 
Pay at the pump
Get the free GasBuddy fuel card and save on every gallon, at any station. No hunting for deals. Just securely link your bank account, swipe, and save up to 25¢/gal. Manage your account right in the app. 
 
Find gas
Find the best prices with the gas map. Sort by price, location, and the important stuff like restrooms.

Track driving habits
Drive smarter with tips and tricks to use less gas.

Get gas rewards
Turn your daily purchases into free gas. Just shop in the app and start earning. 

Report gas prices 
Give fellow drivers a heads up on the latest deals. 

Log your fill ups
Track your gas use and export the log for reimbursement and taxes.

Stay safe
Be the first to know about important recalls for your car. 

Win gas
Complete challenges in the app to earn points. Use points to enter the daily prize draw for a $100 gas card. 

Disclaimer
GasBuddy uses gas price information provided by our users to bring drivers together to support the common goal of saving money on gas. Gas prices only for USA & Canada. Apple Inc. is not a sponsor of the prize draw.
releaseNotes: Continued bug fixes and performance improvements.
reviews:
I've been using gas buddy for a couple years now. One thing is for certain, the prices are too often bogus. Crossing town to save money is important these days. But people are gaming the system to screw others or draw you in to their station. The prevalence of this suggests gas buddy is not removing users who miss report gas prices. Not only are gas prices misreported; but, some stations don't even exist! I just went to a station claiming $4.15 for regular (updated over 8 hrs ago)....it's $5.15 - and has been all week. | Need ethanol free option. | We drive a lot and make cross country trips every year. Locating gas stations with Gas Buddy has easily saved us hundreds of dollars since we started using it. | Unable to change my profile user name info | I have been a member since long time… but from the last application update gas deal alert is not working. Every time after using a gasbuddy card I have to send an email to the customer service and request a refund. It’s really frustrating!!! I believe it’s a time to say goodbye… | I don’t understand how this card works or how to use it? | Can’t find what’s needed your help isn’t help can’t find login to my account. To difficult to report card lost | Love this app , I enjoy doing the challenges most especially since I like to cruise around a lot. I recommend this app and signing up. | They want too much information about you. Why? They don’t need your life information just to help you find a good price on gas. | This app is absolutely not dependable. Gas prices reported are not accurate and usually less than actual price. Perhaps retailers are setting up false lower prices. Whatever the issue you cannot depend on these prices anymore. | Been a member since 2016, used the GasBuddy card to get Deal Alerts up till now (2024) but since May only been getting 2 cents off per gallon vs the advertised deal alerts.  Customer service, once you realize you have to respond to the automated email, still takes a while and they automatically think you did it wrong. On 2nd fill up I took screenshots and kept receipt to show I did it correct, but they ignored it for what the system says(which is obvious wrong from the evidence shown.)  I’ll update review if fixed, or I will no longer use the service and leave this as is. | I wanted to use this app to be able to find a gas station with Vacuums in my area. It combines vacuums with compressed air so I ended up going to 3 different gas stations, none of which had a vacuum and only had compressed air. Good concept but those items definitely need to be separated. | The app has a few flaws as far as cheaters are concerned. There are some people that report prices within minutes of 5 to 8 locations in my town that will take me 10-14 minutes driving time. There is NO way they can do this. If the app is giving free gas and points then the app is being cheated. Further more I have found the not all (regular, mid-grade, premium) gas prices are correct due to people driving by checking all the boxes and not being at the pump and actually seeing the price. 
    Otherwise it is a great app, but the some of the users .&#%= | Always gives me the lowest price on gas nearby. Would love to see the Trip Calculator added to the app with details on as stations along your trip to wherever in the continental US. | You’ll save about $2.00 a year and pay $15 in surprise fees, do the math. | Good concept, but the execution leaves much to be desired. Must close and click many buttons in order to find gas.

Also, I’d like the app to allow me to save several favorite stations, not just one. | Gas buddy started out so useful, people being honest, trying to help each other out. But now it’s almost impossible to be able to trust the prices on here, even when you submit your own, the app will not give the price you submit, but it will “adjust” it assuming everyone has the “special discounted deal”at each station they stop at.
Plus I’m tired of giving so much time to helping this app and never getting back anything for it. | Been saving cents for awhile. It takes forever to get to $20 then find somewhere in the fine print money expires. The card works perfect and is great for a couple day delay on the debit from your bank account. Helps to keep track of spending if you use the app every time. But…can’t get a reward to save my life. 😔 | This used to be a great app but three weeks ago when they updated it,  it does not work and customer service is even worse because emails go unanswered. The app keeps showing wrong gas prices and when you try to update the gas prices it reverts back to the wrong price. Maybe you should invest a little bit more time into customer service and fix the app. | I’ve been a Gas Buddy member for many many years, and love reporting and researching prices. In general, the updates have been helpful, except for the latest Wendy’s ad. It’s messy and super slow to load, so when I click on the station below to update pricing, I almost always end up activating the Wendy’s ad, instead. Then, I have to close Safari and switch back to Gas Buddy. It’s SUPER annoying. | I installed the app a couple days ago for the sole purpose to find UNL88 (unleaded 88 or E15) fuel in my area since there’s only one Racetrack Gas Station where I can get it, but I moved from West Palm Beach to Lake Park and I gotta drive 10 miles to that gas station. 
I checked on the app and the racetrack it said had UNL88 doesn’t have it. I then drove to the one I always go and checked the app when I was close and that gas station never showed up. 
You guys need to correct this issue and it would help to have an option in the app to report these kind of situations, so you can add a gas station or update the information in your database. | GasBuddy is helpful in finding better prices, but I’ve consistently found that discounts promised on the app at gas stations that are not national or regional are not actually applied. I’ve received some “rewards” for submitting prices but these have been worthless. I don’t have an occasion to shop at blahblahblahboutique.com, so those gifts go unclaimed. A Master, Visa or Amazon gift card (or free gas?) would be more useful, at the risk of it being more likely to be redeemed. | This app is great to quickly find local gas prices. Gas Buddy, one suggestion is to add a gasoline category for 100% gas (no ethanol). Thanks! | There’s no economic reason for the fluctuation of prices here in California. Look up the eia. Gov for sources of our cleaner gas. Greed from the independent stations not the corporate entities have made a virtual inflated market where no price competition exists only price gouging. How else can you explain a $.40 to $1.00 jump within an hour. More and more this app is misleading and is useless when I look up a station, drive to it, and the price is off by $.30 or more. And I pay cash to get the lowest price.better business bureau needs to look into both the app and independent stations because consumers are paying too much for a gallon of gas, before our$.52 gas tax per gallon | 1/2 the time after activating offers, the gas buddy card doesn’t work at the activated gas station - so ridiculous!! | I have had great luck with this app, but it really needs to be available on CarPlay to be of utmost use. | Almost every gas station I’ve been too that has buddy shows me on their maps has been declining my gas buddy card. What’s the point of having this app & card if you can’t use it at the gas stations they recommend you to?!? | The pas several times I used the Gas Buddy card, the price I paid is higher than listed in the application | I’ve been a GB user for several years now. I use the GB card pretty much exclusively. The app used to have the discount button front and center. One of the last updates has moved the discount button down in the gas station section. Now you have select the gas station and click further into the particular station you’re at. You need to stop changing with the UI for no reason. Move the discount button back to the top and I’ll rate this 5 stars | This app has cost me more money in gas wasted driving to the cheapest gas per the app only to find out that the listed price was not only incorrect, but often times higher than the average price at other gas stations. | Very very slow. 

Costco gas prices not showing up. | Just delete the app they support CHIAN | Why can’t I activate my gas savings??? | I think it’s a great app, but they need to have an easier way if you lose your card to be able to cut your card off instead of jumping through multiple hoops, or have a way to contact somebody to talk to a representative to be able to disconnect your card or be able to send you a new one and alsoyou will have a gas buddy card link to Apple Pay or android pay would be nice as well. Update it some more. | PLEASE ADD DEF AT THE PUMP AS A FUEL TYPE OR AMENITY SO I CAN SORT LOCATIONS AND SAVE EVEN MORE MONEY

Otherwise I love this app and use it all the time.  For context, I average 50-60K miles a year on the road and I have saved a bunch of money using this app. | GasBuddy should change the name of their app to ad-buddy. What a waste of time. Instead of focusing on adding more ads, why don’t you focus on accurate gas prices?? | Your software indicates I have mail however when i try to read my mail the software indicates I have nothing. The ability to indicate gas price is not available. Even though I have highlighted several gas stations are my favorite I still have no way of using them. I have to find them in a highly crowded map. | Show me the largest worthless app, you get zero gas savings, they just want all your personal information | I used GasBuddy years ago for all of my gas purchases and saved a lot of money on gas. I just started working with DoorDash and I’m starting to work with Uber soon. It’s going to be a great way for me to save money for my business expenses! And find the best gas prices! | Have asked for a new card as my card does not work half of the time. Good discounts but can not access them due to a bad card read | Seem more and more I’m seeing prices not updated for days. I wouldn’t go far out of way chasing a price posted on this app. | All I want is ethanol free gas. No filter to look | I have used this app for years but it is basically useless now without a way to check gas station owners lying about gas prices | I have always liked GasBuddy, but recently, the app does not show an activate button. It will not allow me to activate any deals, then after the transaction, I get a notification that I could have saved more if I activated a deal. I have the latest version of the app, I have removed the app and reinstalled, signed out and in.. nothing has seemed to fix this issue. | I used to tell everyone to use this app but now I am upset with them. A gas station near me reopened after remodeling nearly 2 months ago and gas buddy will not list them. I have reported it to them many times snd they still refuse to add it back in the line-up. Now I have found another more trustworthy way of seeing prices near me. | Yeah so gas buddy is the only thing I’ve signed up for recently, and I’ve been getting spam calls NONSTOP. sometimes 40 in a day. Do not give the people your info unless you wanna switch phone numbers. | After paying for plus membership they never give me the discount I was supposed to get still waiting an nothing yet I send a email not reply back, costumer service horrible I just wish I get the money back | Only shows where to get premium. Only supports 91+ octane. It does actually tell you the octane rating of the pump. So it makes it really hard to fine 93 octane for my car. 91 causes pre-detonation. | I pay for a subscription. Why am I being limited on buying gas? | Favorites icon is too small. If you have fingers like a child it’s ok otherwise when you think your pressing it your actually pressing the large icon. Not sure why they make Favorites so small. 

Very handy to find best prices for gasoline. Uses user input for gas prices. Only issue I have is with every new version it seems like the ads get bigger and more frequent. Update 2/22/21: went to 1 star because when using favorites or find gas option the app no longer shows the price range from the lowest to highest for the stations being displayed. Now it shows symbols for no power, no diesel, and no gas. That’s really not very helpful 99% of the time. Bad update. Why is the Favorites icon made as small as possible?  If you have a normal size hand it’s typically to execute the Find Gas icon instead.

title: PhotoCircle
description:
PhotoCircle is the ultimate photo-sharing app for both individuals and businesses. With PhotoCircle, you can easily create private albums to share photos with your family, friends, and colleagues, all in one place. With millions of photos and videos being shared every week, PhotoCircle has rapidly become the trusted photo-sharing app for its ease of use and focus on privacy.

PhotoCircle provides a fun and secure way to share photos with loved ones. You can create circle albums for family events, trips, or just everyday moments. Capturing moments and bonding with friends has never been easier.

For businesses, PhotoCircle allows teams to collaborate on projects more efficiently, showcase their products in a more engaging way, and build stronger relationships with their customers. With our white-labeling feature, your brand will shine through every interaction. PhotoCircle is the perfect tool for businesses of all sizes.

Download PhotoCircle today and stay connected with those who matter most!

---

PhotoCircle+ consumer subscriptions are available for an advertisement-free experience. Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Apple iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. To manage your subscriptions after purchase, open the Apple App Store.

---

Terms of Use: https://www.photocircleapp.com/terms.html

Privacy Policy: https://www.photocircleapp.com/privacy.html
releaseNotes:
Improved share extension
Bug fixes
reviews:
Our team has been using it for a week now and it works great but would love a search bar | I really love that we can create separate trips and capture everyone’s moments together. | The ONLY thing lacking from this app is access from the web. It i as awesome for sharing photos within a group. | I have used this app since 2017. It makes it so simple to share photos from events, travel, and gatherings. PhotoCircle is easy to use, both to share photos and save photos. My family and friends are scattered throughout the world. The technology allows us share moments with one another PRIVATELY. | You are telling me my email
Address is INVALID!!!!!
WRONG!  Only one I have with
Apple phone & IPad🤣 | Great way to share with an immediate circle. | This is a great a bc I just had a StuCo trip and all parents & kids signed in and now there is like 800 pics for anyone to see | Love being able to share all your photos with a group of people traveling together! | Really beautiful | This is a great way to share photos with family; however, the ad said it allows only the people you invite. The only problem with that is the people you invite can invite anyone they want. You have not control over how the circles are shared. | Perfect if you’re not into social media but have family you want to stay connected with. | love the app but it would be cool if it had an option to turn all the photos into a slide show. | Our school uses this app to share photos taken throughout the year. It great for making yearbooks. All the photos are in one place and we don’t overload anyone’s phone with photos. | This app is great! However, it is missing a couple of features… you can’t mute a particular person. I get so many notifications that I don’t want to get from one person. You show also be able to mute a specific group, well you can’t do that. If that’s incorporated then it would make this app a 5 star review until then it’s not. Don’t get me wrong this app is amazing and for everything that it does and the ability to share with our loved ones and friends is a blessing! Please give us the ability to mute a group and individuals. | mannn i love this app sm. never ever deleting it.. if u run this app and u made it, cumere and lemme kiss u | Best in the world for clean, controlled social media. Would like to ask for a feature that allows users to pin specific circles to the top? thanks!! | Good communicator highlighting every phase of construction with his timely videos. Explains every phase of construction process n what to expect with the next phase | I love this app SO much there is no more to say download it!!!!! | I had a problem loading PhotoCircle after it had been working for a few weeks. The tech support person and I went back and forth for around 90 minutes. They figured out that my VPN, even though it was disabled, was blocking me from accessing the app. Thank you for sticking with me and I apologize for getting a little testy 😞 | As a Tour Manager I love using this app so my guest can share their photos together.
If there was a way to place a comment by the pictures it would make it perfect! | Ever sense I found out about this app I use
It for each play I’ve been in. It’s an easy way to share photos with everyone. It can have lots a people to going one section and add photos. The photos don’t distort at all. If you have an up coming activity I would use this app to share photos. | I LOVE THIS APP! it’s so easy to use and convenient, I would say that making it so the live photos stay as lives would make it even BETTERRRR!! | Has too many adds | Can no longer access any albums. App tries to open, screen goes gray, then the app closes. | This was a great site but the advertising wreck it. | Living over 200 miles while our new home is being built we are up to date thanks to our project manager Joe of the progress of the build 👍 | Too confusing to use | The ads make the platform almost unusable as a picture sharing platform.  Had the ads been embedded as they are when we first got on the platform I would never have chosen it. Rather a bait and switch to attract users as a private free platform and then monetize it. | I love how everything works out pretty smoothly | This is a joy! I love being able to see the grandchildren who don’t live close. 
Thanks | Photo circle used to be amazing. It was seamless, easy to use, etc. Since incorporating ads, it’s gone downhill.

I’m fine with ads but the way they incorporated it has made the app clunky and difficult to use. Oftentimes the ads will automatically take you to the App Store when you don’t even click on anything. 

Really terrible and disappointing. I’ve started looking for a new app. Don’t bother with this one. | Lit pictures of ur team! Highly recommend | My favorite app! | I wish your app could go into my contacts to add my friends to follow my PhotoCircle | Too many ads.   Ads keep playing after you have already scrolled past them, other than that not too bad. | Helps to document our journey🤙🏾 | I just read some reviews and my experience is that it opens quickly, the pictures are easy to see, and the advertising was not too intrusive. That said, after about three months, I did pay for it because I HATE ads. I figure if I pay for it, they may not add more advertising, and it will stay good for all. 

Wonderful way to share photos from multiple people - so far we’ve used it for: a vacation, funeral, other vacation, graduation, and a family party. 

To developers: Keep it simple to reduce bugginess. 
FREE VERSION TIP: people pay for data and a video ads could be reason they remove your app  
PAID VERSION IDEA:  If I could sort photos, and/or set a cover photo it would be even better
ALL VERSIONS: don’t sacrifice the great product you have now for some thing flashy and DEFINITELY don’t put more advertising! | Best app!!! Use this all the time. | App works good for showing customers photos of progression on the job | This app is such a great way when you have so many different people in different places and you can connect with your family and friends with photos and videos | I’m a photographer for my schools yearbook and I had been looking for an app like this—one where I can put all my pictures in one place and people can download the ones they want. It’s perfect and I love the commenting feature. The ads aren’t unbearable and are very scarce. Great app! | Love it and the updates | Too meany adds otherwise nice app | Share photos with family and enjoy each other’s experiences. Works well and are happy with it. | I love using the PhotoCircle app for organizing my photos and using for business purposes. | It’s a cool app, but the amount of advertisements can be excessive and it makes the user experience a lot worse | I wish there wasn’t so many adds and I don’t like that you can add the same photo twice 
Besides that I think it’s amazing and a great app | I found Photo Circle a little over 4.5 years ago when our first grandchild was born, & it's an AWESOME way for the family to share. Highly recommend! | I don’t ever get tired of these pictures of all of you. Jamerson is so  cute I just see him growing and see him doing new things in these pictures. Would like to see more of my sweet Abby also and mom and dad also.  Love you all Nanna | This app is fantastic! 
The most recent update (August 2023) now includes iPad support.  THANK YOU DEVELOPERS!

We can post photos/videos for everyone in our family to see, in one place. We set up "folders" for each family group to place current photos as well as look at older photos. 

 I don't mind seeing the ads (the developers need $ to keep this app active) but a few take way too long to get their points across, but still no huge deal to use the free plan.

title: My BMW
description:
With a modern design and intuitive user guidance features, the My BMW App is made to help you navigate a completely new mobility experience. Check the status of your BMW, use one of the many remote control features, plan trips in advance, book your next service appointment, or discover the world of BMW – all from the convenience of your smartphone.

The My BMW App at a glance:
•Immediate access to vehicle status and functions
•Smart e-mobility services
•Extensive navigation and map features for planning trips 
•Stories and news from the world of BMW
•Direct access to your BMW Service
•Use app in demo mode even without owning vehicle
•Regular updates and upgrades for all features

Discover what makes the My BMW App great:

CHECK YOUR VEHICLE STATUS 
“All Good” – The My BMW App provides you with an overview of crucial status information like your BMW’s drive-ready state, enabling you to:
•View your vehicle's location
•Check your current fuel level and range
•Check that doors and windows are locked
•Keep vehicle software up to date

OPERATE YOUR VEHICLE REMOTELY   
Use your BMW's features directly from your smartphone: 
•Plan and switch on air conditioning
•Lock and unlock doors, operate the horn and flashers
•Record images from the vehicle environment
•Set up your BMW Digital Key

PLAN DRIVES 
Find and send destinations, gas stations, charging stations, and parking areas directly to the navigation system
•Plan trips and keep an eye on current traffic
•Read detailed information on gas stations and charging stations
•Find parking spaces at your destination
•Consider charging times in load-optimized route planning

ENHANCED E-MOBILITY 
Smart e-mobility support for planning vehicle range and necessary charging:
•Plan electric range and necessary charging
•Find nearby charging stations
•View your charging history at any time

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF BMW
Stay up to date and find the right products for your BMW:
•Discover exclusive stories and news from BMW
•Receive messages in the Message Center
•Link directly to BMW Shop and BMW Financial Services

MANAGE REQUIRED SERVICES
The My BMW App is your direct line to your dealer if service is needed:
•Keep an eye on required services
•Book service appointments via the app

EXPERIENCE THE My BMW APP WITH DEMO MODE
Explore the benefits of the My BMW app even without owning a vehicle:
• Select an attractive BMW demo vehicle in the app garage
• Get to know the variety of app functions, e.g. for electric mobility
• Use of My BMW app to get you into the world of BMW

Download the My BMW App now and try out its many features.

The My BMW App is optimized for vehicles built from 2014 onwards. The availability of individual app features depends on your vehicle equipment and your ConnectedDrive contract. The availability of app features may vary between countries.
releaseNotes: We are continuously improving the user experience. This app-update includes bugfixes.
reviews:
App constantly quits/crashes when trying to do various tasks.  Who made this - KIA??   Get it together, BMW. | Before i got this I had to keep going outside to see when my charge will be done.  Now i get a notification on my phone that tells me to umplug | I took delivery of my 2024 BMW X3 M40i in Germany in Feb 2024. Upon delivery, I noticed that none of the myBMW apps were loaded… and wouldn’t load. So, at the suggestion of my salesperson, I drove down to Schaffhausen, Switzerland to see if my X3’s apps would automatically update, since there seems to be an issue with Germany’s/the EU’s data protection policies. Well, it worked. My apps and the Data Privacy option in the menu finally appeared, like out of nowhere. I was able to set everything up and actually use it. However, as soon as I re-entered Germany, my ability to use those features stopped. Features like being able to view what’s going on around my X3 via the cameras, the ability to send destinations to vehicle’s navigation system, the ability to plan climate control and remote start, the ability to lock/unlock, remote start on demand, honk the horn, turn in the headlights, etc. are all disabled now. Additionally, the built-in nav doesn’t provide any traffic updates. I’m sure that in the U.S. the features would work as advertised. However, I’m writing this review based on my experience here, not on what I believe would be my experience elsewhere.

UPDATE: All of the aforementioned features appear to be functioning now. It’s weird… and I can’t explain it. I’ve updated the star rating to five because it now works as intended. We’ll see if it continues to do so. | I really enjoyed purchasing my first BMW from Passport BMW . My sales person Jordan Riley was excellent with his service. The atmosphere made me want to purchase Two Cars. Thank you Passport BMW | For now on i will call to make a payment , i went to make a payment and it automatically charged me for the next month prior without my consent which is fraud. I called and they told me there was nothing they can do about it. So from now on i have to call to make a payment to record. It’s a shame because the app was a faster process but it’s not worth being charged double for no exact reason. | Electric vehicles have low ranges. I am afraid to go out of town in case I run out of charge. In 2 years I have logged 7522 miles. I drive my internal combustion engine. I was promised free charge for 2 years for Electrify America. Ever time I went to a charging station there were 4-5 cars ahead of me waiting for their turn. That’s a lot of wasted time. So I would return home to charge. I regret purchasing this BMW i4. | Great SUV the 4.0 is fast and gets good gas mileage.  The 4.0 runs very smooth and sounds great.  The interior is very nice and comfortable for drivee and passengers.  The interior has plenty of leg room and head space.  Like the entire inside look including dash and electronic shifter.   Sun roof is huge and extra rear sun roof above third row a great design.

Exterior is very nice look and has some nice design features.  My color is black Safire which looks great overall but has not warn well, many swirls in paint and some imperfections.  The paint job on my 2020 is not the best.  My other issue is no air ducks in third seat.  Only get those with addition of 5 zone A/C.

Overall great SUV and very happy with 20 plus miles per gallon. | Works ok mostly but can be buggy with incorrectly claiming charging cable is unlocked.
Also ,does not update status as it should (shows status from hours ago ) | My BMW App is very useful but, lately, I see a large grey band after the My Trips section and I have to scroll down for at least 60 seconds before I can see the Charging section ! I tried removing and reinstalling the App but the bug is still there. I hope BMW will fix this bug soon. | Not accurate time | Amazing | When I try to add my car, it won’t show up in the app even though it tells me it was  successfully added.
Makes the app useless. | App is great except it’s been saying I need to service my tires for 5 months now, I’ve gotten them serviced twice and I’ve taken it to two different locations to get it removed and none of them have been able to do it. Needs to be a notification that can just be cleared or overwritten | The app itself works fine I guess but the vehicle connection is very slow or non-existent.  Th location won’t update for days and it takes 30-60 seconds to send a command to the vehicle. I have an i4, and it’s important for me to be able to check whether the car is charging and even when not charging - to know how much juice is left in the battery. 
Unfortunately since April 6, 2024 this functionality is no longer working. The other BMW community members report the same problem. 
All other parts of the app seems to work normally. | After the last system update, the app is not updating correct information. Has become useless. | The charge level and any other charge related data stopped updating, everything else works. Buggy update for iX / EV owners. Not a very stable code base and or poor regression testing. The amount of forums about how to reset this and that on BMW apps and iDrive is just amazing. For a company of this caliber you have to get this under control | Can no longer see if my car is charging and inaccurate battery percentage as of Saturday night all electric BMW owners reporting the same issue in United States | For the past 48 hours the state of charge is not updating on the app screen, however the notifications are still working when charging starts and when target charge is achieved. | MyBMW app is a very useful especially for an EV to schedule charging time at home and departure time. However, it seems like the app does not receive updates from the car. For example, on my i5 the current state of charge of the vehicle is not updated on the app. I hope this can be fixed. | All worked well until Saturday night. Fuel level, range, and battery state of charge are frozen in the app. All other app functions work. | As of other companies have faster and efficient applications | …battery charging state and level reporting is broken in the app | The App worked fine until I accepted the most recent update. Now, the status of the charge for my electric car is chronically wrong.  The car says it is 100% charged, the Charging History thinks it’s 100% charged, the main app view thinks it’s 60% charged.  How they missed this bug I can’t imagine, but it’s pretty egregious. | Amazing app until recently an update broke the SOC update function. | For the past day or two the charging status won’t update on my i4 m50. Talked to a bunch of other owners and they are all having the same problem | I can’t stress enough how frustrating is software from BMW. As much as I love driving the car that much I hate the software.
Everything is half-done. You can request cameras to take photos but it you will spend forever to download them. You can schedule the departure and do a pre-conditioning but you can’t get the climatization work right now. Working with maps is a nightmare, planning a custom route is impossible. It is impossible to remotely close the sunroof or windows. You have camera in the car, you have seat sensors and yet you don’t allow the elementary functions in the app. The car color is off in 3d view. Financial information sometimes works sometimes doesn’t. The video recorder data cannot be accessed via the app. Useful information and controls require a few steps while other things are on the spot. For example trips summary exists but route is not available. Maybe I liked some place I want to check it out. | Been using this app for over a year. Worked until now . I pay for the upgrades and it stopped working a couple days ago. Won’t update the charging. Car works but definitely won’t buy another BMW as they have no support. Fix the bugs before you put out an update. | Since having my first BMW in 2008, I will not own no other brand. I am an owner and customer for life ❤️

Ms  Carolyn | The M2 is the best sport car I’ve owned-quick, responsive, and great breaks.  The bad news It’s been in for service for a week—electrical problems. The car has 2800 miles.   The dealership, Creavier was very responsive to try to fix the car.  I would recommend them if it broke again. | I recently purchased a 2016 750Li..My ignorance plus the incorrect info from the salesman at the BMW dealer led me to believe I’d be able to do many functions with this app. As it turns out,after paying 100 bucks,that the only remote function available to me was the ventilation function. No remote start,no remote climate controls etc..My model year doesn’t support these functions,which is fine,however,there should be different pricing for vehicles that don’t support all the functions.

App itself is rather slow,sending an unlock or lock command takes minutes. Other than that,app is ok. I wouldn’t have paid 100 bucks just to ventilate the car lol. | The charging experience with the app is really bad. Data is always unavailable, so can’t use the free charging, I have to pay by my own card otherwise it won’t work. This issue happens from time to time and is annoying. Also, for some reason when I search for a nearby charging station, it shows that I am in New York, which I am on a totally other side of the country. Just not a pleasant app to use. | So… with the new update I’m ready to give back my BMW car and its brand new 2024 . The new update doesn’t allow me to use Apple car play and I tried restarting the whole car system as well as connecting and disconnecting my Bluetooth from my phone . My bmw app doenst work anymore I can’t even heat up my car from my phone anymore it gives me error . Basically all the functions are now error . I really am ready to give back my car with the stupid BMW app update . PS: my car is new , my phone is iPhone 13 Pro so it’s not old and it’s fully up to date, and I’m tec savvy I tried everything . Hopefully they fix these issues . I also noticed that when you use another VPN the app doesn’t work either and I often use a VPN on my phone for work, and the app doesn’t work I have to disconnect from my VPN to access the app . Common BMW I expected better . | I recently purchased a 330i and received an alert that a firmware update was available. 

After seeing that the upload was completed as well as the firmware installation, I removed my key fob and cellphone. Later, however, I noticed in the MyBMW app showed that the installation didn’t occur. 

Customer service was able to detect that the firmware installation *was* successful and that the app was incorrect. 

Hopefully, we will see an update that resolves this issue—soon! | Great! | I used to be able to lock my car 640x remotely and check the vehicle status. With this new release all that was lost.
