I refreshed it 5 times and still shows at the gas station. | Very happy with all aspects of my dealings with BMW

title: SpotHero: #1 Rated Parking App
description:
Park smarter with the SpotHero iPhone app. SpotHero helps you get everywhere, easier by making it fast and convenient to find and reserve parking in major cities. Plus, when you book your parking spot in advance, you can save up to 50%.

SpotHero gives you access to thousands of garages, lots, and valets nationwide. Whether you’re commuting to work, heading to the airport, or exploring your city, we have a parking spot near you. Use the SpotHero parking app to reserve parking in New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Houston, Indianapolis, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Miami, New Orleans, Newark, Oakland, Philadelphia, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, St. Louis, and Washington, D.C.

How does it work? It’s easy. Just look, book, and park!

1. Look: Enter the dates and times you need parking. Then compare parking garages and rates near your destination.
2. Book: Pre-pay to reserve your spot.
3. Park: Follow the directions on your parking pass to your selected garage, park your car, and go! 

SpotHero is now integrated with Apple CarPlay. Drivers can use SpotHero with CarPlay to find, book and pay for off-street parking in over 300 cities across North America without touching a phone.

Parking for work? Create a business profile to separate business and personal parking expenses, then automatically send receipts to Concur, Expensify, Certify or Chrome River. Have a commuter benefits card? Use pre-tax dollars to pay for daily parking near your work. Need to book monthly parking? Tap the Monthly Parking tab on the search screen to get started and simplify your commute.

Have a question?
Call us at 312-566-7768 or email support@spothero.com. Our Customer Heroes are standing by ready to help every day from 6 a.m. – 11 p.m. CT.

Find us at:
SpotHero.com: https://spothero.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/spothero
Twitter: http://twitter.com/spothero
releaseNotes: Performance improvements and bug fixes.
reviews:
Booked a garage for 430 am as it was supposed to be open 24 hours. It was open 6 am to midnight. No answer at SpotHero at that time so I booked another garage. 
They did respond to my email later in the day and after speaking they issued a refund as a SpotHero credit, which was not made clear to me | Beyond saving money, I like the comfort and security of knowing I have a parking space, especially in unfamiliar locations. The app also shows you a picture of the parking facility and links you to directions. It’s very convenient. | We made a booking an hour ago at a garage in West Village, NYC. When we arrived with our car, we were surprised to see that it was a tiny covered lot with only about 20 spaces  and it was full.  We were annoyed at SpotHero to let us make a booking.   The attendant made up some story that “go around the corner to this garage and it will honor our spot hero booking.” we went around and this new garage had nothing to do with the parking lot earlier, but the attendant was nice enough to let us make a new spot hero booking on the fly so that we only had to pay $28 instead of his usual $40.   SpotHero app did not let me cancel the earlier booking nor gave a refund. My husband was saying that he has stopped using the app because this happened to him a couple of times already.  Very disappointing.  I’ve been using SpotHero for years now. Need to find a better app now. | Easy to have plans before going to my event. Much cheaper options than if I waited until I got to the parking lot | I just paid $10 more than the lot in the app. Worst of all they posted inaccurate info on the lot saying it was assisted when only true for part of the day not the whole reservation time. I will not be using again! | Please ensure the parking lot will take cars. On Friday we were told we could not park! My wife will call to get the refund. I had to find another parking lot. | I needed a refund and it was done automatically, very easily | I like spothero | Parking garage was easy and convenient to get into.  Vehicles were safe and secure.  However it took almost 45 min to exit due to all the traffic congestion after the Giants game.  I use Spot Hero all the time and will continue to do so! | So the actual price you pay through the app and what you could pay if you went directly to the parking lot is sometimes a win and sometimes a loss.  It used to be a win. For example, today I paid $18 plus a service fee and I’ve could’ve gone there and paid $14 and no service fee.  So in the future, I’m going to compare this to the pricing on other similar applications and for example at Yankee Stadium I now have a place that I can go to that’s five dollars and 75 cents cheaper than SpotHero. So as they say in baseball, some games, you win some games you lose, and some get rained out. | Extra excellent are your Super Agents (personnel) extremely cooperative, efficient and kind | Spot Hero app is wonderful every time I use it it’s easy and user friendly. I highly recommend it. | SpotHero is easy. Remembers me. Hastle Free!!! | I have always had a positive experience with the services provided | DO NOT USE THIS APP! There was no parking on arrival and they do not refund or give credit! It's a scam and they take your money. I booked a spot in NYC to arrive at 1:30pm for an event and leave at 8:30pm. When i reserved it, around 9:30am, they defaulted the start time to 8:30am and leave at 11:30pm. It was not possible to change it. This is a problem when you arrive at 1:20pm and the garage  say "we have no space!" It is not possible to cancel (as the parking time has started!)  or even get a refund. The parking attendant said never use Spot Hero! I tried calling (was a Sunday) no one picked up. My  husband parked somewhere else. I got a hold of customer service after a few days later and said they would credit me. I do not want to use them again and asked for my money back. They said I would be refunded in a few days. They haven't refunded me but sent an email instead saying they will credit me. It's been 10 days and still no credit. | Been using it regularly for a few years. The app and customer service have NEVER disappointed! Very reliable, and whenever there was an issue (like garage being full) the customer service has been excellent. | We wasted a half an hour following the instructions given by the website and by the representative, and there was no such garage. | Use spot hero and save yourself time money and the aggregation of trying to park, not to mention getting a parking ticket. | Great app with great parking deals.  Way cheaper then parking when you arrive. | Have used them twice to fly out of Hobby. Everything worked easily and like clockwork. Made my trip much more enjoyable. Very helpful and professional staff. | Photos of parking space not shown. I want to see where I will be parking. | Their review system isn’t giving them the feedback they need. When a parking garage oversells and turns you away, the reservation gets cancelled and you can’t review the garage for doing the bad thing. In my case, I made a reservation a week ahead of time because I knew it would be hard to park - and sure enough, the garage had already sold the last spots when I arrived and turned me away despite the prepaid reservation. The attendant said he’d been turning away people all week.

Yet the garage to this day is still on the app with a five star rating - because only people who actually got served get to rate the place, not the people they screwed. 

As a result, there’s no actual way to tell which garages are good and bad on the app, making the app useless.

Note that they always say in their responses here “you should have called or contacted us at the time.” I did. They left me on hold for over 20 minutes before I had to give up or I would have missed the event I booked the parking space for. They did eventually respond to email and refunded it but…and this is crucial…then I couldn’t leave the bad review for the garage because now it shows as “cancelled” in my app!

As a result, I don’t trust any of their reviews and can’t find good garages that won’t turn me away. | I’m very pleased with the parking that is so close to where I need to be.  Most of all the staff is awesome & very helpful . | I wasn’t able to get the QR code to work so I had to do a ticket which was half as cheap as their service.  When I called to get customer service, they had me email a copy of my ticket and receipt and I have not heard back since. They have ignored my follow up emails. I would not recommend or will I use again. | Gave a range instead of point and could not locate lot | I have had an excellent experience using my Spot HERO app. It is my go to app for parking. If there is ever an issue, the customer heroes are ready to help. | The parking attendant went out of his way to drive our car to the street. He was very amicable too. | This app would be amazing if they made 2 changes:

(1) require the same policies for all garages.  Having some lots allow extensions and others not, and then having it change without warning has been confusing at best,  absolutely infuriating at worst.  Also, having different policies and procedures makes the rate for user error considerably higher.  I’ve spent more money in fees and fines from these bizarre rules than I would if I had just paid for parking normally. 

(2) the customer support needs serious improvement.  Having the driver behind me get increasingly enraged when I was stuck in the garage unable to leave or backup when the app didn’t work was terrifying.  

Until these changes are made, I won’t be using this app. | Very convenient indoor parking in downtown Atlanta reasonable price easy to use your app on phone to book and get in and out | We use this garage for the times that we will
 be away for  4 to 6wks.  A few times i
didn’t book early enough and had to park elsewhere. They are always nice. The price is usually not the definitely lowest price but it seems to be one of them.. and I think it’s the best for the price | There is no address to say “751, 2nd Street NE”. Even the words LAZ parking is hardly visible. Please please write the address on the board in front of the garage. This will help people to avoid going in circles like I did. Thank you. By the way, the garage attendant was very helpful and respectful. | App very easy the use and gives plenty of options for the area your going to. | It’s a great service in NYC to reserve the parking in advance. So far I was extremely happy wherever I parked. | Twice through the app I have booked parking only to arrive and have the parking attendant tell me they are full. SpotHero does not allow a refund in those cases. Selling parking spaces you don’t have is quite simply a scam. Obviously some blame goes on the parking lot, but why doesn’t Spothero make it easier to cancel, or better yet don’t charge until you’re actually checked in at the space? Why? Because they profit. Shameless and criminal enterprise. | Gave parking as 2min walk , was 14min 
Was not able to extend one hr on app or by phone with customer service 
Would not use again | I was in Columbus Ohio and did not want to pay excessive parking fees or high Uber prices so I found this app. The first lot I used went very well, no issues. The second lot was difficult to identify but I followed the directions from the app and their were several lots near each other. I was not familiar with the area so I trusted the app that I was in the correct lot. I ended up with a parking ticket. The second day I parked in a lot and was able to find any way to identify I had paid and did not want to get another ticket so I paid again to have a ticket on my dash. I contacted customer service and it took over two weeks to get a response to both my ticket and double payment. They did refund my double payment but as a credit on the app. The ticket they stated was valid because I was unknowingly in the wrong lot. I tried calling the customer service line and was on hold for over an hour. I emailed again but have not received a response yet. I doubt I’ll be using this app and again for fear of getting a ticket so my credit is useless. I don’t recommend using this app. I should’ve paid more for security or taken an Uber. | Twice now I ve discovered that the lots charge less WITHOUT the app. That’s not good! | Best price for parking in cities so far to date and east cancellation if anything changes | This app has to many issues as a iPhone user. They have so many UI issues that for an avid user it still gets confusing trying to decipher what all of the options are. Too many options that get mumbled together and makes the app really difficult to read . When trying to make ANY modifications the app just gives you an error with no possibility to copy and look up online. Trying to call customer support on a non busy day/weekend, I tried every option on their phone like to get CONNECTED TO ANYONE AND NO LUCK, HAVE BEEN ON THE PHONE FOR HOURS AND NO ONE PICKS UP. What a joke for 24/7 365 support they definitely need to change that. And if it’s true they “they are too busy”, then that just shows you how many issues this app truly has with every user trying to contact them. I Travel often and this by far has had the worst experience with trying to do anything with this app. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! | 4th time repeat customer however, more overhead lighting needs to be added.  Very dark and sketchy especially on the first level.  Just a short walk to the stadium down 161.  Very reasonably priced. | Spot hero is so convenient and easy.  You get parking in a safe environment at excellent prices.  The only parking app you need is Spot Hero. | Easy in and out and great proximity to the Forum! Nice attendant! Great experience! | Best experience with parking app ever. Will use exclusively from this point forward | We drove into NYC for first time (after trains and busses in the past) and had a great experience with this app finding parking.  We reserved and bought the parking a week beforehand. At both locations (one uptown for a show, then one next to our hotel) it was simple and quick even if you  are a bit clueless. Tip them, plan ahead, money paid not too bad overall… in NYC!!! | Update: April 4. Received an email today that a credit has been issued for the problem listed below. I hope to use this credit in June. Updated stars to 3 for customer service taking care of it. If a positive experience in June, I will return to update further. Thank you…
—————-

I was booking a parking spot for June business trip. The app glitched and changed my date to today, before the current hour so I could not change the booking. Sent message to contact email, heard nothing. Cancelling the other dates needed. Very poor customer service, not to mention glitches that cause bookings that cannot be used. | Reserved a spot for $30 using the app well in advance of our event. A few weeks before the event, SpotHero refunded the $30 then charged us $50, without our permission. SCAMMERS!!!  We’re going to lodge a complaint with our state AG. | Absolutely awful customer service.  I booked a parking reservation which then would not let me enter the garage.  I asked for a refund and spothero claimed I tried to enter before my reservation started, which was not the case.  Stay away from these scammers | DO NOT PARK USING SPOT HERO. I made a reservation entering my vehicle information paid and parked. When I went to get my car the attendant charged me an additional $20 and spot hero did not stand behind their agreement on my reservation with them. SCAM discount site.
I have parked in multiple lots in the same general location and have never had this experience. I will never use SpotHero again, and I advise others the same. | Spot Hero would be very good if there was any support staff there! A garage refused to honor our reservation so I tried to contact Spot Hero both by calling and emailing. Nothing. Had to have credit card reverse transaction. | I like this app, but I like it less than I once did. Although prices have tended to be slightly higher than rival apps, many of those apps are unstable and a higher rate was worth it, given Spothero’s greater reliability. In the last several months however, the app has been kicking me out repeatedly, and forcing me to repeatedly sign back in - which is way annoying if you are entering a facility and have honking cars behind you waiting for you to sign in AGAIN so you can get to your bar code. I have noted online that many people are complaining about this. Please address this problem. I have loved the app, but now there is a situation where it is becoming similarly unstable as rival apps - at that slightly higher rate. Not a great combo. The interface remains superior to rivals in other ways, but the constant log in issue is maddening. I hope to see this improved soon, as otherwise it’s a great app.

title: Busuu: Language Learning
description:
Busuu helps you communicate with confidence from day one. Combine expertly designed language lessons with feedback and tips from our global community of native speakers and harness the power of learning together. 

Looking for the best way to learn a new language on your phone? You’ve just discovered it, with Busuu, a Chegg service – we’re the app that makes learning new languages easier, more fun and more effective for all.

Whether you’re learning to get confident having new conversations, for a higher grade, a career boost, or for mind-blowing travel experiences, Busuu’s got your back.

We’re already helping millions of people overcome their learning struggles, from lack of time and motivation to problems with grammar and vocab. We help our learners achieve their goals, one milestone at a time – and we want to do the same for you.

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW FOR FREE LANGUAGE LEARNING

================

How are we doing this? We’re glad you asked. Whether you’re learning on your iPad or iPhone, Busuu helps you…

– Learn up to 14 languages
That’s right, 14! We’ve got complete courses in English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Polish, Russian, Arabic, Dutch or Turkish with Busuu. 

– Master languages with real people
You want to learn the relevant language, right? You’re in luck: we’ll connect you with our community of native speakers so you can get localized language knowledge and support. Feel even better when you help other learners in return.

– Learn from the experts
Busuu’s online courses are created by our ingenious language experts. Learn step-by-step with bite-sized lessons, plenty of practice and lots of opportunities to test your progress.

– Say hello to useful language skills
Learn the language that will really take you places! With regularly updated content, video flashcards featuring real people and useful cultural tips, you’ll be fully immersed in no time. 

– Kiss goodbye to stressful timetabling
We’re serious. We organize your learning time for you with a personalized Study Plan. Simply tell us when you want to study and for how long, and we’ll send you notifications to keep you on track.

– Revise with ease
There’ll be no forgetting on our watch. Smart Review cleverly saves all the grammar and vocab you learn in lessons and stores them in one handy place, so you can make those tricky words and rules stick.

– Show off achievements with official certificates
With our Busuu language certificates, you’ll have actual proof of your language capabilities.

– Access specialized courses for language lovers
You’ve learned the basics, and now you’re hungry for more. Learn about manga, advance your pronunciation or add travel-specific phrases to your skillset, plus much more. 

================

DON’T JUST TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT.
See what others have to say about Busuu:

● EDITOR RATING: EXCELLENT - PC MAG
● Named 'Best Buy' language learning app by the Independent in 2021
● Language Learning App of the Year at the EdTech Breakthrough Awards 2020 


================

PLEASE NOTE
A lot of the features are free, but you will need a subscription in order to get access to all features of this app. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your Account Settings.
You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.
Privacy policy: https://www.busuu.com/en/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.busuu.com/en/terms/
releaseNotes: Improved learning experience. New content. Bug fixes. Our experts have been working hard to make learning languages with Busuu easy and effective.
reviews:
Great app for language learning. 😍 | Just look at the title | This app is amazing, and I’ve become quite fluent in just 3 days, I really recommend this for anyone who wants to learn a new language, this helped me A LOT! | Definitely recommend~ | There’s something about it that makes me want to come back every day | I love Busuu. It is the only language-learning app that has a serious approach to learning a language, and it emphasises a lot on grammar, | I like that this app goes into detail about cultural aspects, and the fundamentals of why endings are changed. I don’t pay for premium, so I deal with all the ads, but it doesn’t let me review, and there isn’t enough repetition in the course progression to really understand fluently. So basically either I have to redo my budget to pay for this (which isn’t an option for me yet) or I can only learn a certain amount via this language app.

Update*
I did end up getting premium. I wish they had a family option like DuoLingo. I do like it in general, I’ve met some really nice people in the Busuu community, but I feel like it’s way overpriced. I’ve found a couple bugs, and haven’t been able to report them like they allow on Duo on the actual activity.

I think they need more repetition as they continue the lessons, or activities that solidify the knowledge you’ve learned, otherwise I feel like I have to spend more time in review than on new lessons. | Better than Duo Lingo actually teaches real life words and interactions, not just Apple and boy. Real French speakers also get to give you advice on your writing and speaking | A great multi language learning app from 0 to 100 | I’ve been using it to learn Korean, and it sort of randomly started asking me to read Hangul in the lessons. The only problem is that it doesn’t tell you “It’s time to start learning Hangul” it just throws you into it | Harika👌 | Muy dinámico e interactivo | I’ve tried them all. Busuu is the best. It’s the most comprehensive. The most user friendly. With vocabulary reviews and grammar reviews, you will learn fast and remember everything easier. One of my favorite features is the community tab where many of your completed lessons get graded by native speakers of the labguage you are trying to learn. You can also grade theirs who are trying to learn English or whatever your native language is. You can connect with people all around the world and learn languages at your own speed. Busuu is amazing. | love it | I’ve only used Busuu for about a week and I feel like I have learned more than a month in duolingo. I really like how the community can correct sentences you say or write and the explanations that are given in lessons about the words and how they can be used. I do wish I could learn the Japanese alphabets sooner so I could practice in them but other than that I have enjoyed using this app. | Very interactive, definitely glad I use it. The premium is worth it. | Awesome , wonderful and easy to navigate app. Love the fact you can set goals and get Reminders to stay motivated! Completely loved the 1:1 and group classes! | I just wanted to write here and needless to say, Busuu is awesome, if you’re starting to want to learn new languages, this is the right place to be!

Busuu is so better than any other language teacher app. You should try it, I recommend!

I currently can speak foreign languages (Spanish, English, Japanese, Korean, and American Sign Language) thanks to Busuu! 

Signed,
Harmony. | Thanks for your app | three days into it but i found the app from reddit, and it’s been really wonderful so far! | Best app for learning English and other languages | Está muy buena la app ya q es gratis aunq sea con anuncios esta re bien | I’ve been using Busuu for over a week now and it’s pretty nice, it’s helped me learn a good amount and it’s pretty fun too. I’ve been using Duolingo for a while and now I’m using both of these, but Busuu gives a much better explanation and native speakers that say words too. So it’s very well rounded and gives a lot of support and I really appreciate using Busuu! | I’ve found Busuu to be great for me. It works for sure. It all comes down to preference. No app is perfect but give Busuu a try🫶🏻👉🏻✝️ | Muy buena app es genial para aprender idiomas | ممتاز جدان انصح به | I wonder why can’t I see people in my community? | 👌🏽 | This is the best for teaching me useful conversational language. It is fun and interactive, too. :) | I learnt so much from bussu and soon will be able to have a full on conversation with family. title: Trucker Path: Truck GPS & Fuel
description:
North America’s most popular app for Truckers. BUILT FOR TRUCKERS, BY TRUCKERS! Get all trucker tools in one FREE APP! Best Trucking APP featured by truckers! Trucker Path is a mapping tool used by more than 1,000,000 truck drivers, to find truck stops, weigh stations, and cheapest fuel while over-the-road. We also provide truck-specific GPS navigation directions. Join the community of more than 1,000,000 truck drivers now! 

500,000+ TRUCK STOPS IN USA & CANADA  

Find popular Chain Truck Stops: Petro, Pilot, Flying J, Loves, TA, Travel Plazas, AM Best, More 

Thousands of Independent Truck Stops with reviews from fellow truckers 

Find Amenities: Showers, Parking, Food, Entertainment 

Rest Areas and Shut Off Areas 

TRUCK GPS 

Get routes specifically for your truck height, width, weight and type 

Avoid sharp turns, low overpasses, bridges, small roads, and more 

Access turn-by-turn navigation, and night mode navigation 

FUEL DISCOUNTS 

Buy fuel through our trusted payment system with your credit or debit card and save big on fuel 

Use Trucker Path to plan and purchase discounted fuel along your trip 

Available to all app users - no credit checks, 0 fees to participate 

PARKING AVAILABILITY 

Real-time truck parking availability 

Truck parking status history 

Parking status prediction 

WALMART Locations with overnight truck parking 

WEIGH STATIONS & SCALES 

See which weigh stations are open or closed 

Check weigh stations status history 

Find CAT Scales 

FUEL STOPS WITH TRUCK CLEARANCE 

Find fuel stations with diesel and DEF 

Compare fuel prices 

All featured fuel stations have clearance for trucks 

TRIP PLANNER 

Plan with Trucker Path GPS Map 

Find Low Clearance Bridges 

Get recommendations for HOS rests 

Unlock fuel optimized trip plans 

 

Terms of use: https://truckerpath.com/terms-of-service

Privacy policy: https://truckerpath.com/privacy-policy

For questions or feedback, please contact support@truckerpath.com
releaseNotes:
In this update
- You can now compare and choose alternative routes while in navigation	
- You can now check ETAs of each stop and make quick removal in navigation "More" page
- You can hide all place icons on map while checking route in navigation
- Optimize performance in poor network conditions - data are cached in advance and routing latency time is reduced
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements
reviews:
Update the app | Timing prediction is a bit off. 77 miles in 52 minutes?. I wish lol. Besides that, very great app. 👍🏽 Please fix | Not impressed with fact that now you have to use there navigation and that’s the only option I payed for the subscription once and there was no benefits still has ads was waste of money | Customer service doesn’t exist so if you’re not wanting to keep it after the free trail good luck getting rid of it they will just keep billing | What happened to being able to run route on google?  I know they aren’t trucking …but really!!! | Thank you for your development, longtime subscriber I love what you guys are doing.

Can you please enable split view for iPad iOS?

Split view was very critical for my day-to-day use of Trucking
I’m unable to use navigation on Trucker Path because I can’t control my media. I’m stuck having to run two devices, which is very clunky and a distraction on the road. | I really like the app. It’s unfortunate there are some that ruin it for many. Too many times I look up available parking to see red (No parking) to actually show up and find parking available and should be reported Green. The app is losing its value because of false reports.  Losing my interest in this app. | I paid for the diamond membership a year ago. I used the app pretty consistently up until my subscription expired last month and discovered it had quite a few routing flaws. For the year, I used a combination of this app, Google maps, and my Garmin GPS for RVs. I set up my Garmin for truck height, length and weight and got better routing through that than I did this app. More than once this app tried to take me down roads that would’ve put me in a bad way had I followed it. It’s difficult to submit these types of app errors if you can’t screenshot the routing issue at the time it happens, especially when you’re in an area with an ‘80 rig that an 80’ rig shouldn’t be in (e.g., most major metro areas). All you’re worried about at that time is getting free of that area without incident.

In all honesty, I never reported the issues because it seemed pointless at the time. I couldn’t figure out how to recreate that part of the route and the options it was giving me during navigation. So, in the developer’s defense, they never had an opportunity to resolve the issues. But it happened enough times for me to lose confidence in the app for navigation purposes. 

I basically relied on my Garmin for routing, Google for traffic, and Trucker Path for truckstop, rest area, and Walmart locations. I did like that I could put in my route and my available hours and it would show me where I’d have to shut down. But that feature by itself is not worth $149 or $249. 

So, I’m sticking with what works. Oh yes, another very annoying part of this app is that even after you pay full boat on an annual subscription, they will continue to bombard you with their own ads for fuel discounts and whatnot. So, it’s definitely not “ad-free”. | I am a returning customer.   When I ended my subscription the customer care team reached out to me and asked why I no longer a customer.  I said it’s way too expensive for a navigation system that I don’t own.  
     Now I miss having trucker path and I use both my garmin and trucker path.  This app offers so much more than a garmin offers.  Trucker path also has better routes than my garmin.  I use both now and I love it. I edit my garmin to trucker path routes.  Using trucker path saved me several times for almost running out of hours.  It tells you if parking is full or many spaces available.  If weight station are open and if the offer over night parking.  This is a great app.  It is very well worth the money.  I’ve tried every free trucker navigation app out there.  This has them beat by far.  You get what you pay for.  This is top quality and paying for quality is worth the money .  If you have any doubts about this navigation system PM me and I’ll clear you of any doubts.  Buy the app it’s so worth it.  Sorry I ever left. | Best app for truck drivers!!! | I don’t like this updated version, it seems to make the directions more confusing, and still doesn’t route me correctly, that’s just my opinion for now, I’ll see how it pans out in the near future. | don’t know what’s going on but app keeps on taking it upon itself to jump to routing when i’m not even touching the phone. | The app is great but I was having a hard time figuring out how to route for Hazmat loads(avoiding bridges and tunnels) | The interface is so great and directions are super clear. With new update it’s even better. It’s hard for me now to switch to google when I drive my personal regular car lol. 

My suggestion. Do something with your report button to encourage other drivers report thing on the road. (like a waze)

And thank you again for such a great product.🙏 | We are really thankful to you for providing this best app, but we have one request. Please add. Gym option also along with route, so we can easily search for a gym like as TA pilot loves | Trucker path scammed me out of $500 on fuel through the trucker path app. DO NOT BUY FUEL THROUGH THE APP. You’ve been warned | Please check the app, the navigation mode didn’t show any facilities on the route, no truckstops no weight stations, please fix it as soon as you can I’m begging you!!! This app is my everything!! | I love the app it works well I just wish it was a way to check the notifications when some one ask a question without having to stop the navigation to respond | I have used this app for a very long time. I have ranted and raved about it before.
The new update messed up how you can route fuel stops making it a hassle. switching to Garmin. | Recently they stopped showing flying j and pilot at maps which is kinda annoying. | Great app. Some of the exits in the NE are wrong. I.E. i91 going into Vermont and some in Connecticut and Mass | Would be nice to see the option of diesel 1 when running the Midwest | Return the navigation back so that I can see the foot truck and weighing stations when navigation is on. It's very inconvenient that you have to turn off the navigator and view the stop | Yesterday may took me off the truck road and I was pulled by the officer. I would suggest map to update sooner so we don’t drive on off the truck route. | I have been using this app for 3 years but last days 
The app is showing wrong price on every single gas station. This is  not about  5 or 10   cents, 
It is up to 45 50 cents . | The apps doesn't work fine, what are we paying for?!?! | 1. Usually it works well as it should because it not free!. But why you want me to rate a trip, why!? It takes time! If it’s not perfect any driver will let you know!
2. 4-5 last updates making app worse.
3. When I approach exit the worst thing what can be is zoom in or out! It’s disaster! I missed more then 10 exits. For this you get 1 star from me.
4. Last update: I can’t see no any truck stop during navigation
Overall, using because no any other out there | I purchased the app, and it won’t let me use it. It keeps acting like it’s the free version and when I press purchase or restore-it says invalid receipt. I would love to give the app 5 stars but if I can’t use all features after purchasing then I won’t waste the time. | Love the app and use it often, but it doesn’t have CarPlay so at times I’m forced to use your competitor. | They had a free 7 day trial to try out with a lock symbol on it.  It literally says free 7 day trial…. They charged me $149 dollars. I’m beyond upset. I’m going to buy a normal truck gps and discontinue doing business with them. Misleading / advertising tactics to take money from hard working people. That’s literally my child support payments for the week. I’m so mad man. I hate this feeling of being robbed. The app is great hands down compared to all other apps on here. But this situation is costing them a loyal customer. 😭🙏🏽 Unforgettable | When not updated, many glitches and bugs. It can even take you to non truck routes and compass may not sync… | Really great app! And really good routes! | This truck gps is the best one that I have used but it has it flaws. Most commonly is exit signs that are incorrect, it tells you one thing and the sign says another. Second, I'm in New York and my truck fits in the Holland tunnel but I’m always directed to the Lincoln tunnel a huge deviation. But my biggest peeve is that when starting a new trip, it will add stops from your previous trip to your current trip. The number of times I’ve had to pull over just to confirm that I was not heading to the destination I wanted. The problem with the app is that when you select Quit Navigation it should clear everything out, it does not | We were trying to use this app to move our RV. And had we not pre tried out the route we deff would’ve been screwed. Not only did it have us going under very low power lines and a low overpass but it had us make a turn that was more than 90 degrees. Please do not get stuck in a situation because of this | It leads you to unnecessary roads so many tomes. | I’ve been using the diamond version for about a year and a half. It’s very accurate with low bridges majority of the time as well as truck restricted roads.  Still could use some minor updating though. At the end of the day, have to use common sense on something’s out there. 

The option to see if parking is available at rest stops and truck stops is spot on. Just wish more drivers would use it more to be 100% accurate but still good enough for me. 

The entrance and exit for shippers is 98% accurate which is more than I could expect so that’s a huge A+ and so important. 

Seeing if weigh stations are open, seems to be what most people focus on and I’m not mad about it. Being able to input speed within the preplanning is an AMAZING feature for planning out the trip. 

One of the biggest reasons why I continue using this app as my primary trucker GPS is the fact you can have the option for satellite view not only for when arriving at shippers/receivers but at all given time!

 A few things for the developers to focus on… First, make the speech more realistic. All of the voices are brutal to listen to, sounds like Macintosh computer animated.

 Second, the app crashes on my iPad. I keep it up on my iPhone and iPad but the iPad seems to be the only one with issues on a daily basis which is frustrating and distracting. 

Third, there should be an all in buy feature for this app. I’ve spent a lot of money with being a diamond member and there should be a cap. 

Overall love everything about it and would recommend it to anyone. Keep up the great work! | No. Too much. | This has always been a great app, and it seems to be getting even better! 
I have always like that it shows a satellite photo of every parking lot. Newest update makes it easier to see options down the road too. | Using this app has been a god send ,with the scales ,and truck spots helps all hours of the night | Please don’t buy a plan they will make u buy a plan then it will stop working 
I give them a call to see what was the problem and they gave me the runaround and never call me back they jacked me lol | I really love this app. It’s my go to for checking ahead for parking availablility. And it provides a lot more information about each place. 
Only wish more drivers would actually use it. | I use it every day it is extremely helpful especially when navigating off the interstate system | With android auto and apple CarPlay now coming in semis, can we get this app to work on that? Apparently developer responded, but the apps prof won’t show me. | What is going on with the Image? It’s blank on regular map and satellite map. You’re not able to see anything, streets, highways, nor building’s. As of 2/27/2024 I’ve had this issue. I’ve even checked for updates, deleted the app, and then re-installed. No change in the results after doing so.

*Issue resolved the following day. Appreciate the follow up. | The latest update is terrible, it is very difficult to see the lanes on the exit!!! And remove these red stripes, they are very confusing!! | Don’t download you can use without pay | TA travel center no longer appears on the map route | This app is keep on crashing all the time. Please fix this issue or give my money back. I do have gold membersip.

But now its working good👍🏻 | This is by far the best app I have found!! Thank you TP!! | Update review 3/2/24. The app has not glitched since troubleshooting. I use this app all the time and overall I am happy and will continue to use it. 

Couple of things I would like to see changed/fixed;

1) on occasion when trip planning, the app changes what I picked as the start location to my current location. This messes up all of the arrival and departure times. 

2) during map guidance, it would be nice to know that the route has been changed from the plan I set due to traffic conditions. More than once I have “fought” against the new route only to finally figure out what it was trying to do too late and get stuck in a traffic jam. Please give a pop up or notification or something saying Route change due to wreck/congestion. 

(Previous review below)
Up until this trip I have had good success with “Trucker Path“. I have been using it for about a month without any issues and loving the usefulness of the app. The night before this past trip the app started glitching when I was setting up my route for the next morning. I thought that was weird. I am going to go ahead and set up the company provided navigation system as a back up just in case. Good thing I did, because a few miles from my final interstate exit in an unfamiliar area “Trucker Path” completely glitched out and was useless. I was able to use the company navigation to get me to my final destination. So, when I got settled at my destination, I opened the chat function with the helpdesk, and they gave five different things that I could do to try to get the app to stop glitching. I had done the first four and the final fifth one was for me to completely uninstall the app, delete all of the data, and reload the app. They were hoping that would be what was needed to stop the app from glitching. Needless to say, I am disappointed in this app because now I have to set up Trucker Path and the company navigation in the future because I don’t feel like I can trust this app. That is more work than I really want to do, but there are some awesome features in “Trucker Path” that I love. I will do this for about a week or two and if the app is working correctly from now on, I will “eat crow“ and come back to this review.

title: Carnival HUB
description:
Use the Carnival HUB app to share your cruise countdown with friends, then explore and book shore excursions, spa treatments, drink packages and more. When the time comes, you may also check-in and obtain your boarding documents.

As you board your ship, connect to Carnival’s Wi-Fi to view what’s happening, weather, dining menus and more! Onboard internet purchase is NOT required to use the Carnival HUB app.

Before your cruise:
•   Load up on excursions, drink packages, spa treatments and more
•   Check-in and prepare your boarding documents
•   Share your cruise countdown with friends and family

Once on board:
•   Chat to connect with family and friends on board. (Low, flat activation fee applies.)
•   Day-by-day schedule of hundreds of onboard events
•   Choose your favorite events and get reminders
•   Open times of food and drinks venues
•   Daily restaurant menus
•   Searchable deck plans with key areas highlighted
•   Itinerary details, including current ship time, arrival/departure times for upcoming ports of call  
•   Real-time information on guests’ current Sail & Sign shipboard account balance
•   Weather for each day of your sailing
•   Find information like dining attire easily
•   Ability to view and purchase shore excursions
•   Order food and beverages for delivery almost anywhere on board (Fees apply.)
•   Check into a virtual queue and skip the line! We'll simply notify you when it's your turn

Go ahead. Download it now. Your vacation deserves it.
releaseNotes: - Bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews:
Great trips. | This is about my 7th cruise with Carnival and as usual the app makes everything seamless! From dinning to events in-board, the Carnival app has you covered. Despite a slight issue with checking into our early dining—which was more on the fault of a switch from any-time—everything ran flawlessly. We sailed on the Carnival Panorama and didn’t miss a beat of what was going on on-board and had the best time of our lives! Happy cruising! | I love being on the ship I especially love the room service I forgot the name of the man that service our room which is room 8382 he did a great job please let him know we appreciate him my name is Latin. | The app really helps in planning and keeping you updated before and after the cruise.  I liked that you could keep track of your expenditures as well as where to find the activities and restaurants .  We didn’t have any problems with the app itself.  

The chat feature was a different story.  It was horrible!  There was a group of 14 of us and we all purchased the chat.  Big mistake!  Most of the time it would not work and it would just go yellow.  You’d have to go back and reboot the app and you had your app back but most of the time, still no chat.  It got to be very frustrating for all of us. | loved it everything you need for the ship could be right in your phone | The app is great for reservations and finding activities.  We purchase the chat app but some people in our chat will not receive messages.  They haven’t log off and get back on to receive messages. I think the chat option should be free just because of the glitches it has. However $5 for the duration of the cruise not bad. | The app worked great! I needed a little training on the app to receive the full benefit but over all it was a great addition! | We constantly lost the wifi connection in our cabin that was in the first floor | Temperature wasn’t up to date. Froze for several days. Some days worked well. Some days I had to go to guest services for help and they had to troubleshoot it and reset it. | The app worked fine when the WiFi was working. I didn’t have to pay for WiFi just to use the app. Carnival should emphasize to customers how important it is to have the app on their phones, especially when it is time to get off the ship. My rating is 4.5. | The app was great, I loved being able to see what was going on around the ship. Being able to see all the food options as well as locations & times was great. It lagged a lot and it sent a weird “invitation” to my phone every 5-10 minutes, I had 531 notifications from just one day. Couldn’t even open the notification when you did check it. | Very good for use during the cruise stayed | The app works only when the WiFi works. | Made communication better | Works pretty good. Occasionally dropped the ships WiFi so messages wouldn’t load or go through. Overall though it worked well. Able to see menus and check in for dinner.  We could see all that was going on as well. | The app is very efficient and easy to use! Love it! | The app chat worked as long as you could stay connected to the ships internet.
The other features worked great! | We found so many of the amenities and shows through the app. The map as well as “what’s happening” tools were essential to our trip. 
We made friends on the ship but didn’t have cell service so we purchased the messaging for $5 and it was amazing to be able to communicate while doing our own activities. 
Having boat time was great. We would have been lost without the app for sure. 
Checking in for dinner was so easy through the app. | This was our first cruise. We absolutely loved having everything at our finger tips. | The app helped with the scheduling and helped me see what was for dinner | I didn’t know how we would communicate with one another once we were on the ship since I was the only one who purchased the internet package (the cheapest one) but the app includes a “chat” feature. Each person does have to pay $5 each but that’s the cost for the full trip, not daily. You can also “star” things you are interested in and the app will remind you when the event is coming up (no obligation to attend). 
Suggestions: 1) Add a “locator” so you can see where your loved one is without having to ask them “where are you?” because if your family member is swimming, for instance, they won’t see the message. Other cruise lines have this. 
2) Debarkation Day was messy. I registered us for a time slot of 840-900 am, & it told us where to gather. It didn’t say when so we went early since we chose to bring our own luggage & didn’t know how chaotic it would be. When we got there cruise employees told us we had to leave, go back to deck 10 (or 5?) and wait until the app told us when to come which didn’t happen until minutes before. It would be more helpful to have more instructions IN THE APP. Tell us what to expect, when to come, etc. | This rating is for what you can find on the ships stay connected including menus in the dining and all activities.

We did have problems staying connected, but could always get back on when we realized it had dropped. It would drop often. | Loved having everything right at my fingertips, made navigating the ship easier and choosing where to eat, the shows and what’s happening so much smoother! | We went on a 15 day cruise and the app worked great. We used the app to message each other and friends, loved having the app since I didn’t have the internet. | Just got back from carnival horizon. Apparently when booking, my account didn’t link with my reservations causing me to lose my points and gratitudes of a red customer. Never getting my credit of $50 since I never received my gift from booking. Now I still can’t link up VIFP number either.  Refreshing account numerous times doesn’t work either. Now to hopefully deal with an English speaking human in customer service. | Younger generations of cruisers speed thru this app making them the people in the know of all the fun activities and updates while on and off board. For the older generation of cruisers unless a little tech savvy would be glad to have a millennial or gen X or Z as there shipmates ya dig……. lol !!! | It works great for what’s happening, dinner menus and account balances but the $5 chat feature is not worth it it only works less than half the time and drops the ships WiFi and buffers the other half. It does not deliver messages until hours or days later. It also doesn’t let you check in more than 10 people for dinner and you can’t make reservations so you have to go to restaurant check in with hostess, wait and eat later if you have a group like we did. Lots of info on app and if you think you can unplug while on the ship someone in your party has to have app to do things for you like debarking. | The app is great, but paying $5.00 each to use the chat and it only works 40% of the time is disappointing. | Understandable we’re at sea and wifi can be spotty but is certainly did seem to go out often. Worked well when it would stay connected ! | The app and chat feature are convenient and super user friendly! Unfortunately, the group chat feature was not working the entire cruise which was a bit upsetting. You had to message everyone individually. 
We had an amazing server at the Meridian that we continuously went back to see (we had our time dining). There’s no way for us to request a specific server from the app so we had to physically go to the restaurant which would reset our wait to be seated. It was inconvenient.
Lastly, I would love to see the app go in a direction where it has its own social media available to everyone on the ship. That way I can easily interact with people, see who's where, post pictures, etc.
Overall, the app definitely makes the cruise experience better! These are just things I’ve noticed that would improve the already good experience. | It work good for us ! 
We also had a wonderful time ! 
This was our 6th cruise on Carnival GREAT SHIPS …. | In my opinion carnival is the best cruise line. I just went on carnival celebration and the staff were super friendly and the whole ship is so big!!!! I love the countdown on the app that tells you when your cruise is. It gets you so pumped up for your cruise! This app also lets you text your friends/family when your on airplane mode! Overall I just love this app I would recommend downloading this app!🙂🙂🙂 | The app needs a link or two for new cruisers. 

Maps maps maps but interactive maps!!

Maps so you can mark where to go and have it give you the quickest route step by step, like Google maps. 

If areas are down, have the app show that, like the self serve beer, and sent working but still showed as an option. | We just got off the Celebration and the app worked GREAT all week!! The 1 thing I think we should be able to do is schedule your own time for your time dining. We never really had to wait more then 10 mins but we had others in our party which made coordinating a little difficult. BUT ITS WAY better system then Royal Caribbean. | This app was great for my cruise because I was always able to see what was going on around the ship. I was also able to always for to the chat and there was no lag on the chat or app in general. | App worked good but it wouldn’t stay connected to the Wi-if. Each time we had to reconnect it manually (even though I had selected auto join. Not such an issue except when you purchase the Chat plan we’d have to constantly check to reconnect to see if family had sent a chat message or not. Often times it could be hours before they saw the message. | The app works great but the free WiFi needed to use Chat was constantly disconnecting. Became very frustrating. | If you just included internet with each passenger because I’d be more likely to rebook with you than a ship charging each person like you do now. Hotels include internet and it just comes with the room and Carnival calls itself a hotel on the water. So… include internet please. | Overall it was good. I would recommend to add the ship’s current position on the map like the map channel on the TV’s. I really enjoy that channel and while out and about on the ship would be nice to see on the app. | I love how I can find every event happening at the tip of my fingers! There are some times where the app lags when it comes to reservations but it’s not too bad. I attended a bunch of events because of this app and I’m really happy about that!! | Download the hub. It works to keep your family and friends connected on the ship.
We had a blast! | The app is great when the WiFi is working but it only worked about 25% of the time. Makes it difficult to book a dining room table or see activities. | Chat wasn’t good
Had a group of about 20 in a group 
Messages would get to each other maybe 2-6 hours later… not much help | I it worked perfectly. Keep me very informed. It saved me time from going to guest services and I like that I kept up with my incremental so I won’t over spend. It was very useful. | The app is nice to have if the WiFi works. Sent several messages that my group never received. | We just disembarked from a 6 day on Vista yesterday. The app worked perfectly for all things scheduling and keeping you informed as to what was going on throughout the day and what times each food or drink place was open, as well as viewing menus for the different food places. However, the in-app messaging feature that you pay $5 each for in order to keep up with people in your party was severely lacking. Some messages would never actually get sent even though it shows as if they did on the senders side, the receiver never got them. And the times for the messages were all out of whack. It would be 3pm and tell you the person sent it at 8pm, or 7am. There was no rhyme or reason to the times so you never knew if the message you were seeing was real time or not. Also, the notifications feature, at 10:30am you would get a notification saying the casino is now open, but the notification was time stamped for like 6:08am. Just some bugs to work out I’m sure, but overall for scheduling and not having to rely on the paper copy of events going on, it was helpful. | It is a great idea that was handy to have, but didn’t always work. Definitely worth the $5 for on board messaging, but needs to be more reliable.  Great for checking schedule of events and dining hours. | This app is great while on the ship. Helped so much to be able to see what was happening & you can go days ahead to check out what is going. Helped with planning. Also great to check your account summary. Have used this app for several cruises & works great, | I was very pleased it’s an awesome app!!! | As a first timer I absolutely fell in love. I was with a small group of 4 and there were times we all wanted to different things so the app definitely helped keep in touch. Thank you carnival for making this experience so memorable. I will be back!

title: Seaside Escape®: Merge & Story
description:
Kryphos has changed almost beyond recognition in the last five years, and fallen celebrity Rowan needs your help to turn things around. Here, the right merge can change everything.

Come and join us, and get lost in the world of Seaside Escape!

Game Features
• All it takes is a simple drag of your finger, to turn two basic items into something incredible! 
• With hundreds of items, you can merge almost anything you can think of!
• Help the residents of Kryphos not only survive, but thrive!
• Help Rowan restore her shattered confidence and rebuild her life!
• Uncover hidden secrets as you rebuild Kryphos!
• There are surprises hiding around every corner, just waiting for you to find them!

Enjoying Seaside Escape? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/SeasideEscapeGame/

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to SeasideEscapecustomer@gmail.com.We're here to help you! 

Privacy Policy: https://www.microfun.com/privacy_EN.html
Terms of Service: https://www.microfun.com/userAgreementEN.html
releaseNotes:
NEW CONTENT EVERY WEEK 
- Locations! Unlock a new location and its secrets!
- Events! Spice up your gaming experience with this weeks' event!

We've also fixed bugs and added cool new features!
reviews:
keeps me entertained forver lol | I had this game previously. It was fun at first and quickly lost interest. Saw an ad just now where I could have heard the two people swearing at eachother through the terrible music playing. Kind of a different approach I suppose. But not good enough to get me to start playing again. | Game was fun at first. And I guess it’s still fun when they have side goals that earn extra energy fast or the treasure boxes that spit out items you need. The frustrating part, once you get further into the game, (I’m at level 68 and have not spent a cent), is you have generators that spit out multiple categories of items. And it always seems that when your looking to get a specific item it produces that category of items significantly less than it would if you weren’t looking for that item, eating up your energy and making it impossible to meet your goal and move on. For example: there’s now a fishing rod generator. It spits out different levels of A. Fish B. Oysters or C. Shrimp…the customers always seem to want a shrimp or oyster item and it RARELY produces those. So you spend hundreds of power bolts, literally, just to start getting close to producing what the customer wants and there’s no way to force it/pick which items you want it to produce. Extremely frustrating to not fulfill orders for days upon days just to continuously have your board fill up with useless items that you can’t gain anything from. Another point is everything is paid for in rubies. Which are very hard to come across. So the ability to use these effectively is nonexistent. I’m sitting here with 73k + in coins and I can’t do anything because I only have 11 rubies. Ridiculous. 

Make money more useful and create a way to dictate what the generators produce or at least a way to increase the odds of getting the pieces you need! | I started playing the game to play the tiles.  Then when I saw that I had to do all this other stuff before I can play the tiles, I didn’t like it at first.  All of a sudden the tiles game part ended. By this time I start liking the game a little bit. But now, get to the point where I can’t, I can’t clear my board. My board is getting full and is getting frustrated that they don’t give me the pieces that I need when I click on the stuff to get the pieces that I need to clear orders. Then you all added additional items like cupcakes and all that stuff you know is getting is getting to the point where I can’t clear nothing and my board is getting full faster and then the games allow me the right pieces to fill orders. But before I can complete a new game that started it expires before I can ever clear it. It’s not getting to be un-fun. | The ads for this game are nothing like the actual game. | Why advertise a totally different game that what the actual game is???? False advertisement!!!!!! | Complex but with lots of help. | I love it so very much | اجمل لعبة | Great game | Addictingly good | I love the game. Me and my ex used to play all the time | What is it with the advertisement for this game that domestic violence is suddenly OK the woman walks in on the mend cheating, and the man slaps her in the face kicks her dog, and then they both laugh at her

This game is supposed to be for ages 4+… Is this what we’re trying to teach our children is OK? To be disrespectful to women to put a woman and a child out in the cold even in a cartoon impact somebody’s life do I have an advertisement like that? I can’t believe nobody has said anything and this is not been taken down because this is not the only game that does it.

I don’t even play this game anymore because of those ads.  I don’t know who is at the helm for PR or advertising…. But this misogynistic garbage needs to be addressed. | I have been obsessed with this game the last few days! They push the in game purchases HARD, but still fun. | I am enjoying this game | This game could be better if it was advertised correctly I got the game thinking it was more so the tile aspect part of the game turns out it’s only got 20 levels then no more after that…. Overall very disappointing. | Yah | Love the graphics and the storyline but whenever we run out of energy it runs out so fast. I personally think that there should be an ad to get at least 100 gems so we can refill the energy | I got this game because i see many people with the tiles and wanted to play that. But i can't find it anywhere? | This is a pretty decent game. Kind of boring though. I will admit I came to play this game to play the 2 player mahjong game but this game doesn’t even have it so I’m not sure why it has a picture of it in the app overview picture thing. I’m not sure why people on TikTok are advertising this game for the sole purpose of the mahjong game when it’s not even on here. All in all this game gets kind of tedious and I think adding the mahjong game so people aren’t baited and have something else to do in the game would help. | Fun and enjoyable! | ive downloaded a BUNCH of merging games with the same concept and gameplay, but genuinely this is my favorite. i play it every day, there is always new stuff and its very easy to progress in the game. a lot of other merging games take ages to progress in. 10/10, addicting lol | It’s 5 energy using items at a time. Not hard. 5. Get rid of old stuff after 5. | I LOVE this game a lot and have spent so much money because it’s genuinely an addiction BUT I’ve been noticing how the further you get on and level up, the more unreasonable difficult it gets. I understand because you level up, it has to be a diff setting but why do we not get an upgrade on how much energy we have? I’m on the medkit part and it takes all 100 of the energy to gather items for whatever is needed and it doesn’t even complete the order list. Can we get more energy as we level up? Like it stays at 100 even though the orders gets more difficult so it takes even days to complete orders. | Love the game and it’s so addictive | Super addicted | It’s addictive! | This game is actually really fun. I would recommend. | Yay | This game is for the quick minded people who has a big purse and quick hands | Great game that doesn’t require purchasing | Super fun | I’ve played many merge games and this one by far is my favorite! The only thing is, and by no means am I mad, as I’ve had no issues with my purchases, but just searching for help. I’ve made many purchases and the purchase I made 2 nights ago for the VIP cliff side challenge, was made at 17 creating a bunch of things to claim. I didn’t want to claim all at once as it was late and didn’t want to play much more, so figured I’d save them. Welp I came back to them for the 2nd time today went to claim the most recent one, I got that one, but the rest disappeared… I figured they were in my dump on the board slot on the merge screen & they were just gone. I’m not sure exactly how many I lost, but I’m going to guess 10? Can someone help please 🙁 | Cute time passer. | As a merging game enthusiast, I’ve played my fair share of titles, but this one has quickly become my favorite. The pacing is just right, and the gradual introduction of new elements keeps me engaged without overwhelming me. Ah, the Greek islands! The game captures their essence perfectly. Kudos to the developers for creating such a gem! | I enjoyed the game at first, not so much now. 
I dislike the fact that you have to wait a millennium just for “energy”. The app strategizes the player to buy items in order to continue the game. | They charge $7.99 for cliff side vip ticket. So you get 1.5X the xp to unlock the rewards. Which would be cool if the xp needed stayed the same it doesn’t they up the xp needed to unlock rewards so your paying  7.99 for absolutely nothing… no better rewards and it takes the same amount of time to unlock them…. Don’t waste your money…. Definitely scamming people out here! | Enjoy | I enjoy this game but it is becoming more and more frustrating when there are things that you need to complete but the ratio of how often you get that versus the other items from that produces is ridiculous. For example the boutique trolley and getting the envelopes. The frustration for these types of items is more than the enjoyment of the game now. | This keeps me occupied all day and I get mad when I run out of energy but I get it back so fast and I don’t have to spend any money either. | Very slow & boring. Very mediocre prizes unless you pay & even then it’s still closer to mediocre. Story line is a snore fest you will skip through it (as you should). The graphics are truly the best thing about the game. | USUALLY most games get boring or are different than the adds this is exactly the ad and better, very enjoyable the merge is my favorite thing to play with | It is so fun definitely a 5 star review | I wanted to play the game that was in the first picture and it never happened 🥲 | Loving this game and so far no glitches! | Love this game.  Bought the real tiles to play with family as well.  Relaxing, not stressful.  Beautiful graphics and smooth gameplay. | I like to play this game when I’m waiting in a long line. | okay, so i love this game but i want to have an account on my iPad and my iPhone at the  same time,however,when i try to do the transfer it just creates another account. so if you guys could fix this that’d be great! | I have a iPhone and I don’t have the tile game, the only thing it gives me is a paint the side walk and it won’t even do that. I love the game but I downloaded it to play the tile game that it showed, and they show on tik tok. | I’m only just beginning to play but I enjoy the story and the levels so far. We shall see as I continue…

title: Memrise Easy Language Learning
description:
Unlike other language learning apps, Memrise is built around mastering specific conversations. 

1) Set your level and import your streak from other apps. 
2) Pick which conversations you want to master 
3) Learn practical vocab and phrases
4) Listen to native speakers, get used to their accents and tempo 
5) Practice speaking with your AI tutor, MemBot so you’re confident when you do the real thing.

Never get stuck learning a language but not knowing what to say. 

- Helping 65 million learners speak confidently 
- 190,00 4.6 star ratings 
- Featured in BBC World Service, Forbes, The Verge, The Financial Times and more 

Example conversations you’ll actually have: 
Beginner: Chatting about your holiday with your friends 
Beginner: Chatting with friends while studying abroad 
Intermediate: Order at a restaurant 
Intermediate: Greeting the receptionist …and hundreds more 

Why Memrise? 

Speak with our AI language tutor: Get unlimited speaking practice (and feedback) from MemBot, our AI language tutor. Build up confidence in private before speaking with natives for real. 

Hear how the locals actually speak: Watch 30,000+ conversations between real natives, so you can confidently understand their accents and listen to words and phrases they actually use. 

Learn words relevant to your life: Pick conversations that reflect your interests so you can show off your personality. 

--

What other learners are saying 

Voloúre - "Best app for getting experience listening and interacting with native speakers. Listening to conversations by native speakers is so much better for actually being able to understand people"

Beth Williams - "My Fiancé is Portuguese so I wanted to learn their language to communicate easily. Over the year I can now string small sentences together. I don't think I could have done it without the help of Memrise."

Serious about language learning? Build your confidence faster with Memrise Pro 

Memrise Pro: - Unlock all vocab lessons - 30,000 native speaker videos - Unlimited speaking practice - Ad free 

Compare with our Free Plan: - Limited vocab lessons - Limited native speaker videos (2 per day) - Limited speaking practice (2 conversations per day) - Not Ad free 

--

Download our app for free and start learning with Memrise today: Learn French, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Mexico), German, Korean, Japanese, Japanese (no script), Turkish, Italian, Chinese (simplified), Dutch, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Swedish, Norwegian, Polish, Danish, Slovenian, Icelandic, Yoruba, Mongolian, English (UK) and English (US)! 

------
*PLEASE READ: A Memrise Pro subscription is required in order to access all our learning features. These features may vary depending on your device's language and language pair. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your Apple App Store account. In-app Permissions – To enable some of the features of the Memrise app we may need to ask for your permission. For example, we'll ask to access your microphone if you'd like to practice your pronunciation skills. You can change permissions at any time in your settings. 

Privacy Policy: https://www.memrise.com/privacy/  
Terms of Use: https://www.memrise.com/terms/
releaseNotes:
In this update:

Fresh lick of paint, checked the oil, pumped the tyres, just a bit of a tune up.

- We fixed a few buttons that weren't displaying properly
- Our designers popped in some new images
- General bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews:
The app used to be my favorite place on the iphone. I invested heaps of time in creating smart and fun community courses in Latin, chiefly because I needed to improve, but also because it filled a need among other users. To me those were golden years, and my proficiency grew by leaps and bounda. Then I learned, yeaterday, that the app no longer gives access to your own courses. Instead you'll have to log in to a website from a browser. What was the reason to suddenly deprive users of their convenience as they spend hours and hours every day trying to learn new languages. Memrise must want them to not learn, and not be creative about making new courses, What an incredibly hostile move. It didn't ever occur to them to create a new app that could do what the regular app used to do. I can only imagine that Memrise is under new management, and run by people who have no interest in language learning, but only seek to monetize what's already there. It's over. They killed it | I’ve been using the app for years because of seamless community course integration with my university and private study materials. It was the BEST solution on the market for this—not even close.

Now you remove this functionality because of myopic short-run profit motivation around direct control of content rather than allowing for a crafted UX and pedagogical proliferation. I hope whatever fresh biz dev consultant who made this decision either gets fired, has their MBA revoked, or the app suffers up to the point at which you realize how atrocious this decision is. Very sad to have to find a new app after learning so much on this one. Guess a good thing cannot last forever. | Without the community courses, and with the terrible new upgrade, this app isn’t worth it any more. I’m sad to break my almost 500 day streak I had going in 7 different Korean courses.

To hear we won’t even be able to access them is gutting. | I have been using this app for many many years, more than I can remember. It was an amazing tool for learning and memorizing facts and vocabulary. The recent change to in house content only has destroyed the app for me. 90% of the content I use is community created and now that has all been removed to force in house content on me. The in house content does not cover my needs. So disappointing. | No more community flash cards so custom sets are a thing of the past. Other apps do it better in every way now. | Community courses are the only thing that makes memories worthwhile. Deleting the app now that I can no longer access them here. | This app has changed so much since I used it a few years ago. It used to have so many more options and features and I learned so much from it. I miss the community created courses and the old interface. Now you have to pay a (huge) subscription fee to get more features- and they’re not even the features that made this app the best. there’s really not much you can do with this app anymore if you can’t afford it, and even if you can, you’re getting a degraded version of what this app used to be. 
I’m seeing tons of other reviews saying these same things- developers, please listen to your users. | This version of Memrise makes me want to go back to the original. It keeps pushing me to chat with Chat GTP especially when I don’t have time. That is fantastic chat GTP is around to speak with but it is keeping me away from learning words and phrases that I need. Plus, it seems really lazy to include Chat GTP and call that a feature. I’m not really interested in yet another opportunity to speak with Chat GTP. Maybe there is a way to connect us with other individuals that are learning Spanish instead? I would find that incredibly more useful | I’ve used this app for nearly 10 years. Someone who knows and uses multiple languages daily for my career, this app was invaluable for maintaining and expanding the specific knowledge I needed. I could tailor lists to my specific needs and build them to reinforce topics I was weak in. I could just open the app and study a little each day. But now that you removed my vocabulary lists from the app, there’s no reason to keep it. | Please bring back the old interface or something like it. It’s no longer clear where one is in the progression of lessons for a given level. I really liked the old interface where each level was broken into a set of lessons, which contained some number of vocabulary words or phrases. Many language apps have copied the DuoLingo interface for a reason—it’s very motivating to see that one is moving along a lesson track. Where are the levels? | Super useful! | Got the lifetime subscription of Memrise a month before the most recent update. Now I’m stuck going to a website and rarely works to finish my community courses. Courses that I only have access to until the END OF YEAR?! The app is useless now and so does my “lifetime” subscription as well. | Помогает сильно по языку | One of the great things about Memrise for the 5 years I’ve been a paid subscriber is how community members can create their own courses on the platform. Well, Memrise has slowly eroded this feature, and as of this month (April 2024), they’re officially killing it off. Now it’s “use our predictable AI-infused courses or get lost.” Message received. Goodbye, Memrise. | Freeze on community course moved page. I am not able to navigate further on this all. Please suggest if this all is abandoned or blocked | I no longer have a reason to use Memrise. I moved to Armenia and can now no longer access the Armenian courses on the app due to the move. Now I need to go to a website that leads to a “bad gateway” to access the courses that have moved. In layman’s terms… I don’t have access to anything let alone the courses I used to study. A very genius idea on Memrise’s part 🙄 what a foolish decision. | Loving this app so far! I cannot wait until the ChatBot for Icelandic is available 💖 þakka þér fyrir! | The new update, which removed community courses, has created a great sense of disappointment. Memrise courses themselves are NOT GOOD or informative. Everyone had created their own courses to better teach themselves and their own lessons. Memrise had ultimately removed that feature, forcing millions of users to ONLY USE their courses. Deleted the app. Will not be using it again. Flop app | Getting stuff correct feels good. Also, at least for italian, the videos are funny and less corporate than other apps. | I need a refund bro! I didn’t want to pay for any apps | Community courses were the feature that truly set apart this app from others. Their removal killed the value of the app. | For some reason community courses have been removed | The new update removed offline learning and grammar exercises. It’s buggier as well. Somehow I tripped into a mode where the app endlessly suggested I watch videos. | I bought a lifetime membership, only to have them replace the original app with some weird, half-baked, AI disaster. Stay far away | This app is steadily going downhill.  I used to love it. I’m regretting buying the lifetime membership. Now it’s just the same as all the other generic language apps anymore | Used to be my favorite language learning app until they took away community courses. Very disappointing they took away such a useful and unique feature. I will not start using their official courses. | I am frustrated that Explore Mode does not work. After deleting and re-installing the app on my iPad, it no longer shows up in the list of apps requesting camera access. If the app does not show up in Settings requesting camera access, I can’t grant it. I’ve deleted and re-installed twice. This app has no support if the general FAQs don’t resolve your issue.  

Some of the French speakers are totally unintelligible, literally leaving 2 or 3 words out in a phrase or combing them into a mumbled blur.  I would have just as much trouble understanding my native English if pronounced so poorly.
