To be fair, there are some features I like, particularly the ability to practice/review lessons you’ve already covered.

If I had it to do over, I would not have purchased lifetime access. | Only look at recent reviews. In 2024, the app was replaced with an unrelated product. | Completely getting rid of access to community courses on the main app is absolutely ridiculous and heartbreaking. We as a community spent so much time and energy creating our own courses and to have them completely wiped away and just put on the web app like that is supposed to help is maddening. So please if you have a heart or a soul please put community courses back on the app. We as users will protest this decision until it is reversed. | I really enjoy the interactive Memrise language app that include practice conversation, videos, and lots of helpful repetition | Their removal of the community courses from the app removed the entire reason I paid for a lifetime membership. The app is totally useless to me now. | My recommendation is to use Duolingo for the beginner lessons and once you get those down. Use this app Memrise to expand on your learning with the "I'm a Beginner (knows some words)" setting. The native speakers really help in getting you to speak naturally. | I am learning Russian, German, and Italian and this app helps a lot reviewing words I learn while watching shows and on Duolingo and Memrise also teaches me new vocabulary that I hadn’t learned yet on Duolingo and this app has very useful vocabulary that is the most important for travel such as “how are you” and other greetings like that. It also has videos of real native speakers saying the words and also Memrise has an ai chat that involve real life situations like getting coffee and asking for directions, and other things that will happen often. Over all this app is very helpful and can get you to a B1 or B2 level of the language that you are learning. Just as something that you can use along with this app is Duolingo and just plain old google translate to find out important phrases specific to your needs. | the reason that I downloaded the app was so that I could learn LATIN for SCHOOL. But now, it’s worthless. The app was great. You could just open it and then learn. BUT THE WEBSITE you open it, put in your passcodes and everything AND THEN you can learn. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE put them back. I know A TON of ppl feel this way. My respect for the app just went WAYYYY down 😞😔😭 | Seriously what happened to this app? I used to love using it now I’m probably going to delete it from my phone. It keeps forcing me to talk to a chatbot which I hate doing in real life much less for fun. They used to do videos of locals around the city and now it’s just the same 2 people in their homes. Pretty sad to see. | No More Community Courses in App; WebApp is not visually user friendly on phone due to limited screen space | I loved this app until their recent changes to remove the community courses. Now, it’s basically useless to me. | Used to be a great app but with the removal of community courses and the introduction of unreliable AI to the app, Memrise has become nearly useless. Total shame. | Pros: seeing and hearing actual Italians speak to you
Cons:1) Videos of conversations is helpful but too much repetition
               of the same video 
          2)The concept of using AI to learn a language is great but it
              only works with typing on my iPad (audio function not 
              working).
          3)Tried to contact customer service about my Membot 
             issue but there is NONE.
Due to these issues I will not renew my subscription unless they make improvements to the App. | Great app for learning. I have been using it to learn Japanese for a while now and for the most part I like it, but for the love of god, stop recommending the chatbot after every lesson and review! | So I’ve used this for about one month and I’m learning Japanese,Korean,Chinese, and German. I Always go to nail salon’s but they mostly speak Vietnamese and the last time I went there I decided to learn Vietnamese,there’s no Vietnamese. This is the only app I trust with languages if you put Vietnamese on here (MemRise) I would be so happy! (Also could you add Thai please) | Expect to receive three emails a day and pop-ups in between each action in the app asking you to buy the (expensive) pro version. I understand needing to make money but I have to find the app useful before I decide to pay for it.

Most of the trainings feel pretty useless. It’s easy to pass all the quizzes since the questions only reference material referenced in that session, and the other multiple choice options are words that haven’t been covered often at all. 

Most of the training is based on phrases which don’t really get into the etymology of the words, or even the meaning of individual words, so you’re just relying on pure memorization.

Not much better than duolingo | I love this app!it helps me learn and memorize new words, and it a lot better then the most apps I have used! | I am so frustrated. I was billed $105.99 as per the Apple Store receipt. I had subscribed to the lifetime plan which was advertised as $99.99. 

It took me a long time just to find this and I can’t seem to communicate directly with Memrise. I have the same issue with duolingo. | I can barely spell in English. Why would i be able to spell a term i just learned in a language I don’t know with sentence structures I don’t understand yet. | This app was phenomenal last year! The interface was intuitive and easy to understand and cleanly displayed all the needed information. It even displayed a “total words learned” count at the top to encourage you to keep learning!

Unfortunately a lot has changed and the interface has been simplified considerably and even removed some beloved features. You also have to click extra boxes to move around or even stay on the same section to keep studying.

Despite the unfortunately changes there are still parts of the app that are amazing. I love the videos of people speaking the vocab, and not just one speaker! They shuffle through several people with slightly different accents to help you understand in the real world. The ability to select your own topics is very freeing, and I love the chat bot discussions or challenges!

So no longer a five star app, but I still recommend giving it a go 🙃 | I’ve been a longtime subscriber to Memrise but the recent decision to remove “Community Courses” from the app has left me disappointed and cancelling my subscription as well as finding a new language learning app home.

The ability to create and maintain your own courses alongside Memrise’s formal offerings was invaluable in my language learning journey and it was incredibly convenient way to centralize vocabulary and sentences picked up from television, university courses, music, etc. | It’s great but needs to be free for every lesson | Excelente app para tu día a día | Make the app just how it was last year

title: World of Hyatt
description:
From travel planning to checkout the World of Hyatt app is here for you, with easy access to more than 900 distinctive hotels and resorts, plus a suite of powerful features right at your fingertips.  Not a member yet? Join and instantly make travel more rewarding.

FEATURES
• Enjoy exclusive member rates
• Use your World of Hyatt points to book stays
• Explore our hotels with photos, hotel details, offers, local area attractions and more
• Save your favorite hotels for future quick booking
• Add your reservations and World of Hyatt membership card to Apple Wallet
• Check-In/Express Checkout: Bypass the front desk when you arrive and depart
• Real-Time Charges: View your room charges during your stay
• Past Activity: View and download folios from previous stays

Make the most of your stay. 
• Guest Requests: Request items to your room, such as towels and toothpaste (supported at 300+ hotels)
• Hyatt Mobile Entry: Use your device as your room key (available at select hotels)
• Google Chromecast: Stream your favorite shows right to your room’s TV (available at select hotels)

Access your account instantly.
• Track your progress toward elite tiers and Milestone Rewards
• View your current benefits and explore other elite tier benefits
• Track your progress toward free night Awards via our Brand Explorer
• Access your available earned Awards


When booking through our app, you’ll always receive the best published rate without any booking fees at our more than 900 hotels across Park Hyatt®, Miraval®, Grand Hyatt®, Alila®, Andaz®, The Unbound Collection by Hyatt®, Hyatt Regency®, Hyatt®, Hyatt Ziva™, Hyatt Zilara™, Thompson Hotels®, Hyatt Centric®, Hyatt House®, Hyatt Place®, Joie de Vivre® and Hyatt Residence Club®. 

WORKS ON APPLE DEVICES 
- iPhone® and iPad®
- Apple Wallet: Add your confirmed reservations and your World of Hyatt membership card
- Face ID/Touch ID on iPhone and/or iPad for easier, faster sign-in

- Available in English, Spanish, German, French, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) and Korean
releaseNotes: We've fixed a few bugs to improve the performance of our app for you.
reviews:
Hyatt is my preferred stay over any other hotel chain - the app is amazing and so accesible | Had 44,000 points 4 days ago. Could have gotten 3 nights free. No for one night had to pay $500. Only company that I have points with that took them away. | I am able to log in through the website version, but it is not letting me log in through the app. | I needed to modify an existing reservation by 1 day. Hotel app wouldn’t allow the modification, and after wasting time calling customer service who was also no help,  I was able to book a completely separate reservation myself and cancel the old one. Hyatt needs to join the rest of the world and have a better app to service customers. | I am unable to log in to this app. The sign in works on the Hyatt web site but not for the app. And this is the 2nd Hyatt I’ve been to where it says streaming is easy but I cannot cast to the TV. It says it cannot connect even though I am on the Hyatt WiFi. | Very user friendly | It's a great app except for when you search for rooms using points. When you do that, it shows you point values for rooms at hotels where there is NO availability for the dates you searched. You have to click on each hotel to see if there is actually any availability. This needs to be fixed ASAP. What good is the search if you show me 20 hotels that done have availability and I have to click on each to see that?  I have asked several times for this to be fixed to no avail. It shouldn't be that hard. 

Only 2 stars until this is fixed. | Wants me to update to their latest app but my IPhone will not accept that operating system.  App is totally useless unless you are using a new phone.  I stay at hotels weekly.   Sure am glad that Marriott BonBoy, IHG and Hilton aren’t as foolish as these guys! | I always stay here when in town. Always clean, pleasant, and great staff and breakfast! Mongo | I was excited to try digital keys in the Hyatt app and followed all instructions to provision. The app reported “we’re preparing your digital key!” for the duration of my 2.5 day stay, but never activated. | A real struggle for fields to open up and not sure why on a signed in app I need to put in name address etc | Quickly make a reservation and have all your info quickly with a push of a button. | Having a problem with the app automatically closing when I try to use the chat feature. Also had a lot of problems trying to reset my password with the request going through. Tried it over 20 times. | Dev & QA team - search/filter functionality needs a heavy dose of QA. When you filter for amenities, the filter is not working correctly. Use case: explore hotels & resorts -> filter -> amenities -> resort property -> apply -> select United States. There are 66 properties. Select any state. The filter disappears and app displays all properties. You need to re-filter again. | Easy and convenient. FB messenger for Globalist is fantastic | The Hyatt has very clean rooms with comfortable beds. Their staff is welcoming and very helpful. Outstanding customer service which is why I only try to stay at the Hyatt. | Hyatt updated app to not work with anything but latest IOS.  So can’t book hotel using app.  When visiting website and after logging in.  When I go to select book free night award the website says error page not found and freezes.   So Hyatt has effectively locked out their customers from booking unless they buy a new iPhone.  Useless | I need time to give this review 
Worth seeing at a later date 
Still on a travel thankyou ALL 
ESPECIALLY THE SERVICE WITH A SMILE THAT'S you AMBER!! | Not sure why this app and your profile doesn’t connect to the systems used at the Hyatt resort properties. Very annoying. Hilton and Marriott don’t have this issue. | 업데이트를 해야 사용할 수 있다고 나오는데, 업데이트 버튼을 찾을 수 없어서 Apps을 사용하지 못합니다. | After logging in to my account on the app and after attempting to book my stay through it, by first entering its hotel location and all, it wouldn’t let me do it; instead, just showing me the “We’re sorry, please try it again later” error message. To the app developer or whoever’s in charge of the app, please fix it. | Digital Key doesn’t work. Don’t trust / use it. | Love this easy to use  app. Easy to book when using points. The map view is fantastic and helps find the perfect location you need! | My brand explorer can’t display correctly on the APP. Even I tried reinstalling the APP and re log in it did not help. | The Hyatt phone app grays out (blocks) the credit CVC code box. It won’t let you go there to enter the required information. Then it blocks the form of payment because you didn’t enter the CVC code that it won’t allow you to enter. So you have to call to make a reservation even though you’re a Hyatt member. Reservations should be very simple. This app is why I avoid Hyatt as much as possible in favor of the other major brands that have workable apps. | We have always enjoyed staying at the Hyatt! The service is above and beyond, the rooms are clean & comfortable. The food has always been good! | This app refuses to run on my iPhone 7 unless I update to the latest app version — which is not supported on the iPhone 7. The response from the “Developer” states that this app is compatible with IOS 13 and higher. That is obviously not true, as I have IOS 15, and it won’t update or run on that version. Neither is it a “Service Provider” issue as they said. My only options are to spend $1000 or whatever the cost is for a new phone these days, or visit the Hyatt web site from my computer, which defeats the purpose of having a mobile web app. | The digital key is not working even though I have it Bluetooth enabled.  I’ve requested a digital key three times now having it say it will notify me but nothing.  Also doesn’t give you a really good breakdown of your bill.  An it needs to be more upfront about charges like parking. | I just downloaded the app and set up an account. I can log into my account on my computer, but not on my phone.  Worthless. | Funny how everyone is complaining about the same thing, and the response from developers is “contact us”….how about you just fix the f’n problem! | I have reset my password after being locked out, I have contact support and they say it’s not locked, I cannot access my account at all through the app. I was able to login on an internet browser on my desktop but the app is garbage. Hopefully they can fix it since I travel a lot; it’s super inconvenient and forces me to use other hotel chains. | My iPad is older and I have updated to software version 15.8.1
World do Hyatt requires a 16.0 version or later. I am now locked out of using a mobil Hyatt app. No other option available unless I switch to another hotel brand. | App is no longer working and will not update.  Tried deleting and reinstalling but did not fix it. | This is the only major hotel chair site I have found where I can easily make an ADA room reservation.  Thank you Hyatt for making life easier for the differently physically able. | It was working fine for awhile, then all of a sudden stopped showing me updates I made on my reservations, so as Hyatt suggested I deleted and reinstalled the app, but now all my reservations are gone.  Have tried reinstalling and logging out multiple times but didn’t work, it’s been a week and still no fix | I stay here frequently and have never had a bad stay. Great location. Great staff. Would recommend to anyone looking to enjoy Boston. | Hyatt is being somewhat deceptive in making reservations - in that it does not make it easy to determine IF a reservation is NON-REFUNDABLE  until you reach last screen of reservation before hitting the SUBMIT button!!  They should CLEARLY AND BOLDLY list “NOT REFUNDABLE” in the rate category page selection options- WHICH THEY CURRENTLY DO NOT DO !!! | We attempted to book a room, put the information in and hit submit - the app spun and spun. When it finally refreshed- we were charged $115 more for the same room.  Not a great experience, hopefully the hotel experience is better. | App says I need update. When I click on update it takes me to appstore. when I try to download it just goes back to update. What gives? around and around. HELP Please. | Amazing service overall | Shame | Like everyone that has reported this issue. Can’t believe this was missed and still not corrected one week later. | The app should have more functionality. For example, you can’t filter for things that are important like a kitchen or view. Marriott’s app does a much better job being user friendly. | The app is fine, but it needs to give the total price of a room,including taxes and fees.  You need to click “book a room” to see the actual price. | I can’t create an account on the app.  And once I created an account I couldn’t use the app to login.  Buggy | The title says it all. No problem on my laptop. 

When it is working, no complaints, but as it stands right now, the app is useless for accessing my account. | App no longer lets me sign in after most recent update. Just keeps saying “authentication error” | App was great when it used to work. With the new update, I’m not able to sign in even though I can sign into my account on the web. Please fix. | I can’t choose child age easily, have to click multiple times.
App hangs in the middle.
Can’t book with free reward night awards. I had to call customer service every time.
Couldn’t enter CVC number for credit card. | I can sign in just fine on my computer but I’ve yet to be able to log in with the app. It keeps saying authentication error something went wrong. I already checked my username name password and it’s correct. Why?

title: inDrive. Save on city rides
description:
inDrive, formerly known as inDriver, is a revolutionary ride-share application that boasts a presence in over 600 cities across 48 countries. Best of all, it’s completely free to use!

We're a new kind of rideshare app. We started up from scratch in 2013, and since then we've grown like crazy all around the world.
And now we're bringing our game-changing rides to the USA!

It’s an excellent taxi alternative for your trip. You can either find a ride or offer your own driving services through the app, making it super convenient and flexible. inDrive is a great ride-sharing option for rides in Miami. 

MORE CONTROL
Set the price you're happy to pay for rides and choose the driver you want to take you

FAIR PRICES
Our rides are cheaper because we don't charge drivers big fees

SAFETY FIRST
Vetted drivers, in-app safety features and a dedicated 24/7 support team

As a driver, you have the potential to earn more than a traditional cab driver using a standard transportation app. This is because you have the flexibility to create your own transport schedule and select which rides you wish to take.

Why Choose inDrive (a ride app or a driving app)

LOW SERVICE PAYMENTS FOR DRIVERS

We keep our service payments as low as we can, and they'll actually be 0% for six months from our launch.
We think it’s fairer this way. To us, you’re not just another driver who should simply take the rides we give you at the price we decide — no way, you're one of the team. 

QUICK AND EASY

Requesting an affordable ride is quick and easy with this ride-share app. Simply enter your starting point (A) and your destination (B), set your desired fare and select a driver to get started.

OFFER YOUR PRICE

We understand that finding a reliable and affordable ride can be a stressful experience. That’s why we want to offer you an alternative to traditional cab booking apps. With inDrive, you have the power to customize your rideshare experience. You can choose the driver you feel most comfortable with and set the price that works best for you. 

CHOOSE YOUR DRIVER

With inDrive, you have the power to select your driver from a list of those who have accepted your ride request. In addition, unlike other taxi booking apps, we offer you the freedom to choose based on factors such as price, car model, arrival time, rating, and the number of trips completed. This unique feature sets us apart as a preferred alternative to traditional cab apps.

STAY SAFE

Before accepting a ride, you can view the driver’s name, car model, license plate number, and the number of completed trips. This level of transparency is not standard in traditional taxi apps. Additionally, our app includes a “Share Your Ride” button, allowing you to share your trip details with family or friends. Our team is dedicated to developing new safety features to ensure a completely secure experience for both riders and drivers.

ADD EXTRA OPTIONS

By using this alternative taxi application, you have the option to include any specific requirements or additional information in the comments section, such as “traveling with my pet” or “carrying luggage.” The driver will be able to view this information on their driving app before deciding to accept your request.

JOIN AS A DRIVER & MAKE EXTRA MONEY

If you own a car, you can make extra money with our driving app. Unlike other cab booking apps, inDrive lets you view the passenger’s destination and price before accepting the ride. If the price seems inadequate, inDrive offers the option to suggest an alternative price or decline the ride request without penalties. Moreover, this car booking app has low-to-no service rates, meaning you can make more money while driving with this taxi app alternative.

Whether you are looking for a new driver app for your trip or need a ride in Miami, you can get a unique rideshare experience with this great cabs & taxi alternative. Install inDrive (inDriver) to ride & drive on your terms!
releaseNotes: We've been busy improving things behind the scenes. These changes may be subtle, but they are meant to make your experience more delightful. Please rate our app and share your thoughts and suggestions.
reviews:
Fast and sweet❤️ | The app is reliable and stable. Location picking is a good but I would recommend one to use manual location picking when one is setting up pick up location especially if you are not at the exact pick up location. Needs reporting function when driver shows up in a different car for safety reasons. | The application crashes multiple time when I am using it. It got to the point that I can not use it any longer. | In drive need to work on their motor inspection very well. Last week, I booked a ride, while fitting to my location I saw 1996 Mercedes Benz, I couldn’t reject the ride because I booked it late in the night.
Today, I booked another ride, the interior was so rough, the seat was tattered, dashboard look like something they use solding iron join together while the glasses are not whining down. To cap it all, I’m on 3rd mainland bridge for the past 15 mins now. Fuel finished and driver had to use public transport to go and look for fuel from 3rd mainland bridge. | التحديث الجديد سيء جدا جدا جدا | Very efficient and easy to use | I hate this new version you have to select your ride instead of it bringing new requests from nearest pickup location takes too much time please review this and pls add features that will allow drivers pick route they want to be on instead of going to unsafe areas we can stay in a preferred region thanks | Missing income yearly summary that includes rider payments, service and operation fees, insurance fee, toll, miles, etc | Perfect | The riders are to selfish and always asking for more money then estimated also not picking the ride even there are near | It is not a problem, but, you need to improve the payment method, to get immediately the money of the day work | Muy amable | I’m reviewing from Nigeria and InDrive certainly has the worse drivers. I am convinced they don’t screen their drivers. They are very rude and pull up with the worse and dirty cars you can actually imagine. Indrive!!! You can do better! | Drivers can’t grasp the concept of GPS and feel the need to always call to ask “Where are you?” instead of just checking the app. 

Even after giving your location, they will not move. InDrive won’t let you cancel the ride either until after 5+ minutes, even when obvious the driver is not coming. Do better. | excellent, very good person | In Egypt, Indriver provides a very convenient taxi experience for tourists. Thank you for your efforts. I will tell my friends about it. | خدمة رائعة وقائد السيارة محترم | My ride was memorable | Customer never ever support in case of disputes with customers!! | In Bangladesh they are starting | No hay responsables ala hora de perder uno algo ni algún tipo de comunicación con ustedes 😡😡😡 | Muy costoso el porcentaje que cobran 13% es un abuso | Es mala la aplicación es muy caro los viajes | I have been a driver of this app since July 2023 when I started working in Miami, this app is quite good for drivers and passengers but it has several problems, for example to validate documents such as Insurance, registration and other car documents it takes up to 7 days to respond, that for example Uber and Lyft only take minutes to validate these documents, the truth is I don't know how they plan to compete in the United States market against Uber and Lyft with these problems they present and their technical support is the most bad, lousy and incompetent that exists, they only give answers that seem to be reading like robots from a screen, the truth is that if they improve some things they can succeed but right now they are light years aways from their competitors | Your courier riders are extorting from customers I’ve tried different means to report the rider all to no avail..you are not reliable | I emigrated from America to KTM 35 years ago. This app works. The others, not so much. | I feel sad I wait 22 minutes and he cancel without ask me | Merci beaucoup | Love new update its better i can call directly from app to driver | Tienen que darle seguimiento a los conductores que usan el bot porque esas personas estan cogiendo todos los viajes automatico | The location finder was not exactly as expected | This must be quite honestly the most intellectually lacking company I've ever had the misfortune of dealing with.

After weeks of emailing and struggling to get any assistance with a potentially lost item in a driver's car, this company asks again for the ride details, which I share openly.  They stated they would reach out to the driver about the LOST item and ask him to contact me.

The driver then reached out to me, only to share that the company had accused him of theft, saying that I logged a complaint. 

They threatened this poor man, who was an amazing driver, and I gave him a 5-star rating and a 25% tip.

The poor administration and communication of InDrive from the South African office, is one of the most pathetic service delivery I've ever experienced.

Do yourselves a favour and pay R30 - R60 more for another service and steer clear of these incompetents. | Buen servicio | Phuddi deyo 2 rides cancel kita aa ne pain ke aa loreya ne  id ban kar diti ae phuddi deyo shoreyo | My best application ever ..thank you so much | Why’d you remove enroute?
Please bring back this feature. | Muy seguro | Polite fast driver | 🙌🏾 EXCELENTE SERVICIO | I have relied to inDrive for the last few years and it gets to my destination hassle free. A huge thanks to inDrive for your excellent service! | Hi, when i make a swipe to hide the request it doesn’t hides or i have to swipe it twice and when i hide the request it just pop up immediately after i hide.and after the latest update the map shows the 400m request to long route even it takes 5 min from my location it shows 15 min long route. | guys i use an old phone as a second phone, an iPhone 6 and it doesn’t have the latest iOS. the app used to worked fine until now it pops a message saying it needs an update and i can’t cus i’m on 12.5.7
kindly fix it if possible again | Best driver I had | Hola no sirve el botón para recargar saldo | It was good timing and excellent drivers very obedient and fully respectful. | This app has been a blessing 🙏🏽 | Soy nuevo en la aplicación esta buena | Siempre viajo rápido a todos lados y seguro 🚗🙏 | Deberían mejorar la seguridad como dejar compratir el viaje con un familiar y dejar ver por donde va el servicio por que no se puede ver y eso son cosas buenas que tienen otras app como Uber 
Con inDrive no le siento segura | I got scammed by a driver from this app. I have tried to do the chat on the app but it takes forever to get a response and you can’t leave the app while you wait or it closes the chat. The scam was so bad that myself as a female traveler, I felt genuinely unsafe. I have advised everybody to not use this app. Uber is often gross and mean drivers but at least I can count on them.

title: Resy
description: Resy powers the world’s best restaurants, using technology to imagine the future of hospitality. If you’re a person who loves dining out but hates hassling for reservations, download Resy now! Book sought-after seats at the best restaurants in 80 cities worldwide.
releaseNotes: We’ve been working on improving the Resy app! Our latest update includes bug fixes and enhancements and an improved browsing experience.
reviews:
In NYC you have to use this horrible app by default because all restaurants are on it. There is no way to accurately browse available reservations. You look for a reservation for two people at 8pm and all that comes up are restaurants that are fully booked. How is that helpful? The worst is if you are trying to browse availability at one restaurant over multiple days. Every time you check a new date the ENTIRE app refreshes. I cannot believe how user-miserable this app is. Can someone fix it, seriously horrible. Also Resy notify no longer works. | I can only assume Gary V isn’t paying attention anymore, because this app is trash now. | Can’t filter by price level…. | In last update, the ability to complete booking confirmation vanished. The booking process was never that intuitive for future resers (next day and beyond) but now.… it’s impossible. TBH, The only reason I use this app is because a favorite restaurant of ours has it as their only booking method. It truly needs a makeover, with more info for each restaurant, menus, take-our/deliveries, and including a separate page where active reservations can be managed. | Requested a “notify” availability. Was actually booked at the restaurant and then charged a cancellation fee. | Had been charged twice and a pretty substantial amount but really just redirected me to the restaurant who never picks up. | I put down a reservation for a large party one month in advance. But when I tried to put down a reservation for a bar for the group after dinner, instead of securing both reservations, the app just canceled my original reservation without clear warning. I contacted the customer service immediately but they just told me there’s nothing they can do to re-state the reservation. Now my party lost the reservation. This app is supposed to make reservations easy not difficult!! | The search functionality is what I find most frustrating. It doesn’t allow you to filter on neighborhoods or cuisines and still shows restaurants even if they aren’t available for the designated reservation time frame you are aiming for. It is the least user friendly out of the other restaurant booking apps that exist today | I have no idea who developed this app, but they should be ashamed of themselves. The app is aesthetically pleasing but the functionality is horrendous. For example, Resy texts an account verification code to finalize a reservation, only to say “Oops” the code isn’t correct. It’s the apps own code, how could it be incorrect?!? Simply useless app and a waste of time. Use OpenTable instead! | Annoying that sometimes it takes multiple tries for the notifications to set.  Also when a notify does come up half the time when I click on the notification it just opens the app without actually going to the reservation page. | It is impossible to use the new update. I find myself looking online instead of using the app. It doesn’t let me look for future reservation in a specific restaurant. Very disappointed | Downloaded. Tried signing up with mobile number 3 times. Code sent. Code entered. App says error. Then tried to setup account using Apple login. Go through a few screens, then app asks AGAIN for my apple email…I’m using hide my email…again failure. How can such companies stay in business? | Made a reservation for the wrong day by accident,  called and emailed right after. Rebooked for the correct day and was still charged $40. How do you stay in business treating people  this way? Definitely won’t be using this app again. | This app is truly terrible in regards to user interface. Crashes all the time and returns to home screen when searching. When reaching out to customer service they suggest uninstalling and reinstalling the app. With so many restaurants using it, this should not be happening | The app always glitches. A lot of the buttons aren’t responsive. Better off using desktop browser. | The only reason I use Resy is because of the restaurants selection but the app itself is a garbage. Map view is terrible. Default selection to your current location unnecessary. Selecting another date kicks you out from the restaurant page and gives you irrelevant search around you, even if you’re in your own list. Not to mention it crashes during peak times when people are trying to get a reservation. So much wrong with this app but this is all by design. They have no intention of improving the UX on purpose so it’s harder to get these reservations as demand is high for some of the best restaurants. All you can do is just keep trying and hope that you get lucky. Sadly, will keep using the app and even recommending but genuinely have an issue with it. | Can never properly select number of folks for a reservation no matter the update never works on apple 12! | Worthless, allows bots to grab all the prime tables.  What’s the point unless you want a mid week 5 pm table? | I wish there were a way to add a screenshot It’s all scrambled on the iPad app. The keyboard covers the dates etc. They run on top of each other I deleted it and downloaded again- no use | OpenTable is a million times better than Resy. All you do on Resy is click "notify" and it won't even notify you 😂 Open Table cares more about the user than the restaurant whereas Resy cares about the restaurant more than you! Terrible app | The app is useful for its purpose: to make reservations.

I wish there was a "My reservations" button on the map view. This would make navigation a lot faster if I don't need to view my profile first | Doesn’t let you change the number of guests in your party | The current format does not allow user to select dates beyond 5 display lines on the calendar.  So Easter Sunday is not a day to choose per current format as the app won’t display the 6th line and the next month doesn’t display the date either.  Overall the UI is poor and hard to manage but this error is egregious. | Unable to select March 31, 2024 or June 30, 2024 on Resy installed on iPad Pro. Those dates don’t show on screen | Resy has terminated my account twice without prior notice and specific explanation, only suggesting that their team (which in actuality is probably just an algorithm) thinks I’m a bot. This repeated random termination of my account has led to the loss of my reservations, ruining several dinner plans (including my birthday). Complete lack of customer service, which often sends automated emails instead of an actual human response. I live in a city where it’s essentially impossible to dine at restaurants without using the Resy platform. Beware. | Another app that is appalling to use. Enter time and date etc, click Search. Nothing happens. How hard can it be to design such a simple app? But instead of doing the job you want it for, the app focuses on sell, sell and SELL. What a disaster. | Wow Resy is perhaps the most frustrating app I have to engage with on a regular basis. It’s obviously built with restaurants and not customers in mind. You can’t book multiple things in one night so if you want to do cocktails for two hours before dinner at two separate places, forget it. I shouldn’t have the have my dad create a RESY account to get around the system, just so I can do dinner and drinks with him. The sign in process is so friction heavy, why do you need to send codes to verify my email and phone number every time (and yes this is more friction filled then standard two factor). Also it doesn’t allow autofill of simple things like your email, phone number, or password for secure password apps. It also doesn’t support public facing restaurant reviews. But somehow they’ve got charging you down to a very seamless process smh. This is an example of an app that is used because most of us have no choice. Too bad it has to feel so hard to enjoy a good dinner. | I’ll get a pop-up that one of the restaurants I’ve set a notification for is available, but when I click on the pop-up, it doesn’t take me to the reservation. This is new and never used to happen. I used to use the notification feature all the time. Frustrating. | I never write reviews - this might be my first one ever - but here it goes. I feel like the Resy app gets worse with every software update. It’s unfortunate because I love Resy as a concept and I continue to use it a lot reservations on a regular basis because of the restaurants on the platform, but it can truly be painful to use. | This is a solid app but there is some functionality missing that would really improve the user experience.

I’ll add additional notes over time.

My biggest frustration is that I can’t book two reservations for the same evening, even if they are a reasonable amount of time apart.  Dinner followed by another reservation right up the street and three hours later should be allowed. I understand not booking tables for the same 90 minutes time slot, but beyond that seems unnecessary. 

Next, I wish the restaurant names would display on the map when searching for available tables, its a small extra steps to click into the blue map dots, but cumulatively it does take a lot of extra time. 

It would also be great to be able to search for a range/window of times with available tables, instead of just one hour.

Lastly when setting up notify, it is important to be able to distinguish between indoor and outdoor tables, and presently, there is not that capability (at least on mobile).

Thanks for your dedication to a great user experience! | The search feature is all but useless as it just continuously jumps back to the home screen and doesn’t actually show you the reservation you’re looking for. Please for the love of god fix it. | I can’t even sign up because it won’t take my phone number | Unable to sign into app
Response status code unacceptable / 500 | On a way to a restaurant reservation made through Resy, while I was driving, I received a text message from Resy that asked me if I wanted Resy to silence my phone while I was dining.  Outrage by the implication that Resy would presume to deactivate my phone — after the only thing I did was given them my number — and because I was driving, I ignored it. While waiting to be seated I checked my phone and discovered that it had, in fact, been turned off.  I’m a physical on call, and also I have an important reason to keep the line open for an urgent family situation.  I’m outraged by the fact that Resy falsely believes that they hav a right to intrude in a unauthorized manner into my private cell phone.  I’m also outraged by the fact that Resy has not reached out to me to issue an apology.  What have we come to when a third party can legally enter an alter someone’s cell phone? I plan to escalate this in order to find if what Resy as done is legal. And, if it is I will work to change the law.  And, if it isn’t I will consider charges. Seriously, Resy. How Dare you? | Traveling for business, and I prefer reservations when brining business guests.    Looks nice, buggy acting and well…….  Got a long way to go before it feels dependable.   Might wanna take notes from the other apps. | Great idea for the app, But it could be so much easier. Like trying to cancel a reservation for instance. You absolutely have to have the app instead of being able to cancel it by email or on the restaurants website. Very inconvenient and you’re holding our reservation hostage until we download your app. star only because I can’t do less | Very laggy, slow to update, no innovation, poor customer service. This app does not deserve to he treated as a real complete app. Learn from Catch Table. | My contact information is REQUIRED for my viewing local area options?

Surely NOTHING COULD GO WRONG with my blindly trusting your protection of my privacy, right?

Oh, I FORGOT ABOUT YOUR BOLD PRIVACY GUARANTEE…

Crickets… | More and more restaurants are using Resy these days for reservations, and that’s great, but something really annoys me. I book reservations for my boss all the time, and need to put the reservation in his name, but it doesn’t have that functionality. I can’t log into a different account, because I need to use my cell phone, and I can’t create more than one account. 

Actually, Resy has very little functionality. It is nice that it’s simple, but being able to change diners is important to us Executive Assistants! Please help! | Tried booking restaurant multiple times with saved Amex card. It would freeze and I’ll have to force quit it. Really buggy overall. | Resy is very limited in the restaurants available to book reservations, and the restaurants listed are mostly limited to a small number of large cities. There are other restaurant booking apps that have many more restaurants available at numerous locations. Recommend other apps as Resy is very limited in it’s usefulness.

Had never heard of Resy until it was forced as the “new” partner for the Delta AMEX credit card (soon to be known as the “K-Mart Blue Light Special” of credit cards. | Login attempt #19 and it still doesn’t work. Somehow there is an account with my email….but it can’t find the account. So I can’t create an account because the email exists. Fine create brand new email, fake name and wow it now works. But I can only make a reservation for that day…not tomorrow like it shows on the web version. Idk if this is due to the new apple update or what, but wow is this app terrible in every way. Do not bother downloading or trying to use | I tried to book a reservation at a very hard to book restaurant. I did everything right, but after hitting their “Complete Purchase” button, I just got a hanging screen that said “reticulating splines“ for 15 minutes. by the time I was able to try again, the table was long gone. | Many restaurants don’t allow you to book a reservation until 3 weeks out at a certain time. This app will surely not work and/or crash if you try to book in advance during that time. | I feel like they made this app bad on purpose. Search is terrible. Keeps sending me out to Long Island.  Can’t change party size if it’s let’s over from the main page.  Truly not getting the developer attention it needs.  Maybe on purpose.  Can’t be this bad by mistake. | At some point resy overtook open table and became the main reservation app. But functionality wise I have no clue how they managed to do that. Their interface barely works, you can’t search for restaurants based on preferences. And more than half the time there’s some glitch where it won’t show me my current reservations. You can’t view people’s reviews or anything. The move is to research on Yelp or Google and then book on resy bc restaurants won’t let you book on anything else. As a product manager this app is truly a shame in both UI and functionality. Eng/product/design do better. | I tried to book at a popular restaurant that is always booked. Everyday at 10am, it opens new reservations on Resy. The app does not reflect the new available reservations fast enough. So I had to go to the website to try to book, but it was too late. | I have never had so much difficulty navigating a reservation app before.  Wish my favorite restaurant utilized OpenTable which I love! | This app is absolutely useless if you’re trying to snag an in-demand reservation at the release time. Developers have allowed bots to snap up every in-demand reservation faster than any human possibly could. Incredibly disappointed that Resy continues to allow this to happen. The app regularly crashes during popular release times and has a poor user interface to boot. Not sure why this has become the default app for customers and restaurants when the experience is so consistently poor. | Resy CS would not cancel the reservation the app automatically made me, for the wrong time, with a cancellation fee, when all I did was sign up for the waitlist to see if we could make it work. Resy CS also refused to close the account I created to make the reservation, since I had a pending reservation (which again, I did not create!). I wasted HOURS emailing the restaurant to cancel the reservation, emailing Resy CS, and was completely stymied by the entire experience. In the future I will skip the restaurant altogether if it requires a reservation through Resy. 4 hours I will never get back.

title: Priority Pass™
description:
Download the Priority Pass™ app today to access the original and market-leading airport experiences programme. 
 
Activate your account in the Priority Pass™ app in just 2 easy steps, giving yourself access to airport lounges and travel experiences in over 700 airports worldwide. Choose from an ever-growing range of premium experiences – from spas to sleeping pods to dining – to help elevate every journey into something special.
 
 
•Enjoy contactless entry with your Digital Membership Card

•Stay up to date, check your current membership entitlement and visit history

•Search for lounges and experiences, and save your favourites

•Unlock more with access to additional Travel Services and benefits that enhance your travel journey
 
 
Enrich your airport experience with the Priority PassTM app.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Priority Pass™ !
  
We regularly update the app to make it faster, safer and more engaging for you.
  
Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in this latest release:
  
 - Feature enhancements and  bug fixes
reviews:
I walked 30min across LAX to access the only lounge listed in the app only to be told by the front desk that they haven’t accepted Priority Pass in over 3yrs. Apparently the only supported location now is some random video game room. You would think there would be at least one place to get a drink in the main airport of America’s largest city. | There are no gluten free dishes offered . Nor desserts. They could have even small frittatas. | I arrived at the Nassau airport to find out the lounge has been closed for 3 months for reservations. Why is this not on the app? | Despite activating my account via my credit card, the app won’t let me register via credit card. Admittedly could just use membership number but forgot card at home though specifically because I saw I could register supposedly through credit card. | I just received my Priority Pass select membership renewal card in the mail…so I decided to download the app.  The app seems half finished…it doesn’t even show my membership number when I log in…nothing on the phone for the lounges to scan?  “My details” shows nothing but my name….I already know that info!  So other than locating the handful of these overcrowded lounges around the world…what’s the purpose of this app? | Was the best in New Orleans | It’s sometimes difficult to navigate and difficult to update account info. Also system doesn’t allow access to multiple priority passes if a person has now than one card.  However, enjoy the lounge internationally. Domestic is a hit or moss. | I cannot reset my account… thoughts? | No way to update account with new priority pass card. App cant even find Nashville airport. | The credit cards tout the Priority Pass but we can rarely get into the actual lounges because they’re at “capacity.” | The Google Map hour and Priority Pass App hour is wrong for the Be Relax Spa in LAX international Terminal. The shop said they closed at 9PM. And the staff is really inpatient and annoyed to tell me the shop is closed. I understand it has been a long work day but it’s not the guest fault to arrive before 9PM and no one update any source of open hours. | Priority Pass is advertised as a key perk of the Capital One Venture X card. Restaurants are completely excluded on the PP membership that comes with Venture X. Basically worthless!! | The most horrible experience, except for the attendant at the entrance desk.  She was welcoming, unfortunately everything went south from that point on.  Coffee bitter and cold.  Food in the self serve area was scanty, salty and unpleasant.  We placed an order but couldn’t wait because it took too long. The first experience was good. I don’t know what happened!! The new coffee machine with the fancy touch screen needs to go back to the previous coffee making school. It’s HORRIBLE! | Had to create 3 accounts to make it finally work | One and a half hour wait list . It’s a useless as it could be. Very disappointing. | The app shows nearby lounges, which is great, but it doesn’t tell me how many visits I have done and how many I left before getting charged by my credit card company. This caused me to get charged for a visit which I thought was still free. Guess what? The lounge staff are also unable to tell me how many visits I have left. Unbelievable! What’s the point of having an app if you’re not going to give the user essential information regarding account usage? | Says it needs to download data but just gives the spinner of death. Can’t login. Can’t access anything. Yet I’ve got great internet as I’m writing this review so you can’t blame it on bad internet. | Every time I attempt to use a club it is either full or closed. I am here at Los Cabos Airport awaiting my flight that departs in 2 hours and the club is closed. By the time it opens at 9:00am I will be boarding my flight…!!! I will surely remember this when my membership is up for renewal. | Staff lovely. Food excellent! Homemade!
BUT very very small. Worse atmosphere than sitting in the terminal. Photos deceiving. | The number showing as my acct number is not correct. When I go into the edit section there is a message saying I need to update my payment details but I just received a new card in the mail last week.
It will not allow me to log on! | This app is a mess. I cannot update my account details. | Thank you | Checked in at Schiphol Airport the morning and I am unable to find the Priority Pass lounge. Have you designed the app intentionally so customers can’t find the lounge? | Received new card w new #
Deleted old
Now can’t download new card to apple wallet
???? | Wait list to get into lounge. 20-30 minutes.
Why bother joining this service if you can’t use it when you need it.
Unimpressive lounge. | Do not have the lounge in the Newark airport where I fly most of my travels | Unable to login with new info despite deleting app and reinstalling it…so frustrating | Please fix. When you said enter username or member # and I did using what you sent me from email and still didn’t work . Spent over 10min and tried over 6-7 times. No good. | When we tried to use the United Loung, which showed up on priority pass web page, we were told the pass is not accepted at that lounge. | Buenos Aires airport ( EZE ) won’t allow passengers into the area where the lounge is located until 3 hours prior to a flight.  Upon arrival, the lounge is nearly empty but the reception desk reports a three hour wait to enter. | The digital card doesn’t expire for another two years yet the app says my membership expired two months ago and will renew (two months ago), as if the date is in the future.  They have a very small number of maps for airports.  The info on the lounges tells you nothing about guest fees and how to make a reservation at the lounge.  One of the worst apps I’ve ever seen. | The website does not say what details are needed for the particular line unless you click it multiple times. I found this difficult to enroll and did not know which plan I was being enrolled to with the card. It was clear as mud. | How do I edit my address?  Edit buttons don’t work in app. | This application is completely worthless. Will only let you select American Express, which I do not have obviously. Talk about a real disappointment. | No clubs in the most popular airports, and more locations close than open. Perhaps if you fly out of one of the very few airports that still has clubs it makes sense, but a pass for everyone else. The app is fine | I a member of a few and have found Priority to be the best of all lounges including Admiral and United | And now won’t show up as app on fone. Its there but no widget.  Super irritating | Unable to use the priority pass as a Chase Sapphire member. What a waste of this benefit. | I’m disappointed.   I’m here sitting in some miserable gate seats for hours in miserable terminal 5 at ORD.  Swissport Lounge was “at capacity” but then the guys lists off airlines who’s passengers that do have access.   This is worthless.   This card represents the 2nd class leftovers like the dummies that you see waiting outside a night club because they are “at capacity” and aren’t on “the list”.  

I suppose it is a marketing thing to show the world that they can have access to all these lounges to sell it the product, just to get rejected and realize they’ve been duped.  

I’m going to write a review in every place that I can.  I’ve got 3 hours to kill before my flight and another 16 hour plane ride with WiFi after that.  

Good luck with your business model. | I I joined Capital One Venture X card which says that I can be a member of Priority Pass. It’s been over a month now, and Priority Pass says they don’t recognize my card number. I called Priority Pass. They told me to call my bank. I called my bank they told me to call priority pass. This appears to be an unresolved issue and I think it is a scam. Reporting it to Better Business Bureau.
Just received a response from Priority Pass to this complaint. They told me to reach out to Customer Service. My arms are sore from reaching out to their customer service as well as Capital One. Continue to be disappointed in this offer. Deborah Owens. | Attempted to visit this Lounge and while few persons were visible in it we were told that is was all booked and we could not enter.  About 18 people we waiting to enter this vast understaffed facility when we arrived.  

Jeffrey T Skeim
Clearwater, FL | The app used to be great. Now I can see my renewed priority pass card but have no ability to change the expiration date on the credit card attached to reflect the new date. It gives the option to edit but when selected does not allow you to make any changes just exit back out. Also, it does not seem to be showing lounge information for almost any airport and I know there are lounges in some I regularly use. It has become useless. | I was looking forward to setting up my account with the Priority Pass but I’ve struggled to even get the website to recognize my card number and two attempts to call the service number have resulted in calls being ended without being answered. Wish the experience were better, but it’s been absolutely disappointing | App or their website won’t let me change billing info. | So many website/app errors | None of the lounges were available because they weren’t giving Priority Pass access because there’s not enough tables. | Terrible app. Doesn’t work. | Great service, ugly new logo | Just tried to get in the lounge in lima, Peru, and was told my pass was not valid. | Priority Pass was involved in a data breach and now we cannot change our passwords through the app. The function simply doesn’t work

title: Avis - Car Rental
description:
Need to rent a car on the go? The Avis Car Rental app has you covered. Exclusive to the Avis app, Avis Preferred members gain access to all features as well as exchanging or upgrading your car upon arriving at the rental location, quickly returning your car, locking and unlocking your car and more real-time rental features. Find your nearest Avis Car Rental locations, hours of operation, addresses and phone numbers at any time.

Avis Preferred members can also earn points by opting in upon check out. With the Avis app, you can make, modify or cancel reservations 24/7. Using the Avis app will also provide access to getting a receipt, viewing and reviewing past rentals and contacting Roadside Assistance for immediate help.

By tapping the Install button or by downloading the Avis App published by Avis Rent A Car System LLC, you consent to the installation of the Avis App and to its future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling the app. To request assistance with the removal or disabling of the Avis App, please contact us.

You acknowledge and understand and agree that the Avis App (including any updates or upgrades) may cause your device to automatically communicate with Avis’ servers to deliver the functionality described above and to record location-based information and usage metrics, (ii) affect app-related preferences or data stored in your device, and (iii) collect personal information as set out in our Privacy Notice at https://www.avis.com/privacy and in the Avis App Terms of Use at https://www.avis.com/mobiletou. The Avis App delivers push notifications. You may turn push notifications off in the “Preferences” tab.

Contact us at:
avis.com/mobilefeedback
Or contact us at 
Avis Rent A Car System LLC
Phone: 1-800-352-7900
Email: custserv@avis.com
Write: P.O. Box 699000
Tulsa, OK 74169-900
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and enhancements.
reviews:
With the latest update my points and status do not show up at all.  Please fix this! | We’d already been traveling for 10 hrs, for a family emergency no less, and still had another 4 hr drive ahead, but surprise! My kid and I were S.O.L. upon arrival at the PDX Airport.

I’d scoured Avis’ site prior to reserving a car, to ensure I brought ALL documentation *they* accepted for Debit card use (instead of a Credit card), and even PRINTED that list out (and them some) and brought it all with me. In fact, I’d cancelled a reservation with a different company, *because* Avis was seemingly both more affordable, AND openly listed the accepted documents for debit use on their site; I had no reason to believe otherwise. 

However, they failed to include anywhere that they are *credit based only*. Those 3 words would’ve save me literal days and money. They run a credit check on you *regardless* of documents or deposits, and will not take them in lieu of credit like other companies will (AND you won’t be able to book with the *other* company’s at the airport either, because while they do take your documents, and do not run a credit check, they have to be reserved already; no walk-ups allowed). And if booked online or through a 3rd party app/host, you’re doubly S.O.L., because they don’t run it until you’re at the counter of that city somewhere.

This company didn’t accept *any* of the documents they listed—not a single one, much less all the ones I brought—even with the printouts of THEIR site of what’s accepted. Yeah, they “take” Debit, but it’s only on a technicality, they run a credit check— that’s what they do, plain and simple—and THAT is what they should advertise front and center when listing what to bring for debit. That part on their site is misleading, and it could leave you stranded too if you’re still building your credit.

I figured something out, thankfully, not that I had much choice, but I won’t soon forget how mislead I felt, and how costly this failed booking ended up being on my family, financially and emotionally. Lesson learned; I’ll go with a different rental company, even if just on principle now. | Poor | Cars are typically unclean and unkept. I pay high prices for a car rental to get into a dirty car. Why? Why isn’t a car they cost you $180 to rent for 24 hours detailed and clean? there’s nowhere on the app to rate the condition of the vehicle. The last vehicle was wrecked. How do I know I’m getting a wrecked vehicle? Who wants that! does Avis even care about the quality of product and customer service they’re providing. | The app is decent but only displays obvious information and the only functional part is the make a new reservation tab which tells me the objective is not to make the rental experience fantastic for the customer but to just get you to make and pay for a reservation. Any app that cannot match for the most part, the capabilities of the web interface should just not exist especially if the company cannot be bothered to update and bring new features to it | I don’t know if it’s the app or the various Avis locations that is the problem. | Even with a reservation, the application surfaces an error whenever i am asked to select my car. And am forced to wait in line at the desk, which makes it pointless to be an avis member | I starting renting from Avis when I was on active duty because they were military friendly, but I continued after separating from the service due to their awesome rates, comfortable vehicles, and their support staff are second to none!!! | Great Service and was able to pick out of a nice selection of cars/trucks and quick service | Not able to store new reservations and every time I have to enter | Great app easy to use. Was able to confirm ,modify rental easily | Should be able to find your Avis number by entering your email. I guess I’m using another rental company. | I would like to Thank Avis for a smooth transaction. It began unsatisfactory, but the awesome customer service I received to resolve any issues was amazing and much appreciated.

Thanks again. | Love them customer service always goes beyond | Seldom works and many features never work. quite silly actually. | Simple and easy process to extend return. | The app won’t give me a receipt even though  it shows the rewards were issued | I reserved a car and after I use my points it came out to $134 and some change which I prepaid ..after my trip a checked my credit card to see if I was reimbursed for the hold and I see I was charged by Avis a full amount…I checked the app and the points weren’t applied I called them about this and they ask for email stating that points were used I told them I never received emails from them saying points were applied and this is my 3rd time doing so.. was told that I didn’t apply the points and therefore I can’t apply any points and refused to apply points since as they said rental is closed…I did my rental agreement just like I’ve done before and I questioned whether they had a computer glitch and both people I spoke with flatly said no…. I mentioned why would I reserve a car and not use my over 15,000 points…was told you just didn’t apply it …HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE..will not EVER tell anyone to use Avis…I Will you up these points and triple Check and then I’m Done | Tried to use app to return car and it kept saying refresh gps ! Usually I don’t have a problem | Last 2 times after leaving the lot - noticed fuel tank was not full only about 3/4.   My name was not on the board, no text notification, app said car was not ready.  Had to wait in line for about 20 mins to get the car.   Desk Agents were nice - they said they got really busy and were understaffed.  Felt bad for them - but National and Enterprise had cars and no lines - may be looking at moving my business. | Charging me a ridiculous amount to keep the car an extra 6 hours due to a family emergency. | Why even have an app if you’re not going to support it? After making my initial rental reservation, it wouldn’t let me log in or even look up my details with my reservation number. No matter what you do it tells you to call. I haven’t even picked up the car yet and I’m already disappointed. | Whenever I use this app over 30days it's very difficult, resetting password, edit credit card but you have to go all the way out or do a split payment. However, cc is not expired but the app says it is. | All of the supposed benefits of using the app (choose your car! Skip the line!) are nonsense. Error message, get in (long long long) line. Every time. | Is impossible! | This app is terrible.   It has all your info but then tells you that you are not logged in!   There is no obvious way to log out and re log in.  I'm about to change rental companies.  It's taking too long to make a reservation | I don’t want a $@&/ EV, stop pushing them on me. | I tried to use the Avis car rental app this morning and it did not work at all. I attempted to put in the location I wanted to rent from and got no results. Had to call a customer service representative to get the information I needed | Current vehicle is in bad condition.  Beside high mileage and damaged at some places; the car shakes and vibrates when driving on the highway. The assumption might be something simple such as tire balancing and/or wheel alignment.  Based on damages to all 4 tire rims.  It might be something worst and might be a hazard for the road altogether. 

In addition, vehicle was super dirty.  There were spillage of food n drinks left stain at the seat.  Carpet is vacuum though. | They don’t honor reservations, and their employees are incredibly rude. Stay away and spend your money elsewhere | This app is of little use if it doesn’t save entered reservations. | Work with Advis through Coporate relationship. Made it easy to book, pick up and adjust rental drop off on the fly. Very easy to use. | Love the way I can rent my car and walk straight to the rental and leave skip the lines and customer service is helpful when needed!!! And the app is so convenient!!!!!! | I’ve been renting from this Avis for awhile now, and the rental agent Michael has been phenomenal in his assistance to make sure I’m satisfied and that I receive the help I need to meet my needs. This is the place to rent from. Mike is just good people and he has made experience worth recommending to others. | Short of making a reservation or finding rental car, it never works. Can’t exit with pass, can’t return car when at lot. NEVER works. | Today makes the fifth time I reserved a car trough this app and wasn’t able to pickup a car on the pickup date.  Tampa (Dale Mabry) location is unreliable | Easy to use.  Clear details. | I love Avis as a whole but it seems the past few times I have rented in VA, my car has been dirty. In Houston, it was dirty and I had them wash it before I drove away. I did not have time to wait this time. It was really bad but I kept it anyway. | Your app is very confusing.  Does not know who I am and always forgets that I am a preferred customer.  Very frustrating | I make a reservation to get it get a truck you guys can’t even send me a notice saying that you don’t have no vehicles available for my reservation if you wait till after I landed at your airport and then tell me that there’s no cars available I will never ever deal with Avis ever again | Impossible to update my credit card nor my driving license | Always on spot. Avis exclusively for over 30 years | I was given a car that was damaged!!The customer service is very poor the representatives have a habit of hanging up on you and it’s very difficult to get them to credit you for miscellaneous charges that are not applicable I’ve made four calls to this company regarding incorrect charges. I should not have to fight for mistakes made, then they offer me two free rental days but I can’t use them because I don’t rent those type of cars. | The process to activate your account takes you in endless loops, continually tries to get you to create an account- which is verified. WTH?!? | No such thing as Preferred in SAV.
Been waiting 25 minutes for my car after completing the paperwork. 10 other people waiting as well. The counter just blows you off when you inquire when we may expect a car. | This app needs an immediate update.. my upcoming, current, and past rentals are never there.. For me to find my reward points I have to go to a summary just to find it..  Notifications doesn’t work either.. Avis should do better. | When I rented a car recently they automatically charged me for a full tank fill up and said this option was on my preferences (in the app).  I logged on and went into preferences and there’s no option for me to change the above.  Very frustrating, now I have to make sure that gas fill up charge is not on my bill when I pick up my rental. Help!!! | The app repeatedly gives me error messages at the end of the long process of making a reservation or creating an account. It’s awful. | After numerous tries over the years going with the cheapest, finally decided to pay more and go with AVIS where you have reliable service … and  friendly staff, for the most part.

And great service at airports. Cars are modern, clean and app is easy to use to change rental period / drop off location. | Making you wait for a new nonsense id verify

title: Gaia GPS: Mobile Trail Maps
description:
Whether you’re out in the snow or exploring scenic hiking trails and amazing offroad routes, Gaia GPS has you covered. Spend less time looking at your phone and more time taking in the snowy landscapes with the newly redesigned app. Backpack, overland, discover campgrounds and skiing routes, or explore breathtaking hike trails thanks to Gaia GPS.

Make the wilderness your backyard with Gaia GPS. Enjoy the best hiking app, road trip planner, and backcountry navigator – all in one. Reach your next summit out on the snow with offline maps, GPS coordinates, and distance tracker features to help you explore the world around you.

Cruise through popular ski tracks or hike trails confidently with GPS navigation tools to guide you through national parks and nature routes. Download the premier outdoor activity app featured in publications like the New York Times, Washington Post, and GearJunkie.

BACKPACK OR HIKE
• Hike trails and running routes are available on Gaia Topo, the ultimate backcountry navigator.
• National parks or backcountry trails – Pave your path out on the snow with nature routes waiting to be explored
• Access the full NatGeo map collection
• Backpack along offroad hiking trails & back to base camp with breadcrumbs
• Distance tracker with altitude and elevation monitoring for each activity

BE READY FOR SNOW SEASON
• The Gaia Winter base map is designed for winter activities and works well with other winter layers
• Know current conditions with ski resort information and Nordic trails from OnTheSnow
• Skiing, snowboarding, and more – chase the snow with curated snow mobile trails
• Find the perfect snow with Snow Station and Snow Forecast map layers
• Ski reports help tackle any adventure safely with Slope Angle and Avalanche Forecast layers

ROAD TRIP PLANNER MADE FOR YOU
• Offroad travel is easy with GPS coordinates
• Offline maps: RV travel is easy with offline maps that track your location, even when far from cell service
• Road trippers can prepare with available parks, route conditions, and activity tracker features

OFFROAD ACTIVITY PLANNING
• 4x4 & overlanding adventures are easy to record on Gaia GPS
• Activity tracker and route planner make navigating trails offroad simple
• Follow ski tracks or create your own routes on the fly with snap-to-trail route building
• Maps, routes, and waypoints displayed directly on Apple CarPlay

EXPLORE THE WORLD LIKE A PROFESSIONAL
• GPS coordinates help explore the wilderness while creating routes and tracking progress
• Mark ski tracks, hike trails, routes, & campgrounds
• Share your data with clients & fellow guides to improve Gaia GPS

ELEVATE YOUR OUTDOOR ADVENTURES WITH GAIA GPS PREMIUM WITH OUTSIDE+
• Access 300+ maps including NatGeo Trails Illustrated, Private Lands, weather forecasts, and more
• Offline maps to download anytime.
• Weather, terrain, and safety features
• Access the Trailforks GPS biking app
• Expert-led online courses on Outside Learn
• Premium access to award-winning films, shows, and live TV on Outside Watch
• Unlimited digital access to Outside Network's 15 iconic brands including Outside, Backpacker and National Park Trips.

Explore the world with Gaia GPS to guide all of your wintry adventures. Enjoy GPS navigation, skiing features, and countless hike trails with Gaia GPS – your perfect outdoor companion.

SIGNUP
• Gaia GPS is part of the Outside Network. Create an Outside account to access the app.

TO MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTION:
• TURN OFF auto-renewal: https://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098
• Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period.
• Your Apple App Store Account will be charged at confirmation of purchase.
• Privacy Policy: https://www.gaiagps.com/company/privacy
• Terms of use: https://www.gaiagps.com/company/terms_of_use
releaseNotes:
- Updated available activity choices
- Fixed a bug where waypoint links would crash the app
- Removed the new UI tutorial
- Fixed a crash when trying to load a track
reviews:
Love the all the features and all the map layers and what I am really looking forward to are tree type map layers coming out pretty soon, eh? Yeah? Do it for the fungi folk! Much thanks in advance. | Watch out for the classic being billed even though you cancelled the subscription. Many apps with comparative features that have actual support that don’t do stupid billing tricks. | THEY SHARE YOUR EMAIL BIGTIME - Ive been tracking numerous 3rd party emails coming to the address i signed up with. i did not give the company the right to share my personal information. BEWARE | I’ve been a Gaia user for a few years. Over the last few months to a year it has been a pita. Lags, won’t load the map area or takes 5-7 business days to do so under WiFi, the display is cut off on the iPhone, address that do in fact exist, won’t populate when you search for them. Mind you, yes, my app is up to date and yes, the saved files are in constant need of being updated which gets done. I would switch to OnX BUT I don’t want to pay for 2 of them as I cross between 2 out of the 3 I need for my usage. I unfortunately have no choice but to keep this over OnX until someone changes 😫 | Utterly nonfunctional for any navigation. Crashes instantly. Used to work, disappointing to lose it. | Sure, the free version is adequate enough to track where you’ve been. But if you want the satellite view, you have to pay a minimum of $60 a year. You’re out of your mind for that kind of price. I miss track kit pro | One of the best cross platform apps that seemlessly updates to all your devices. Maps are detailed yet not cumbersome. Excellent user interface with easy route creation due to auto-snapping into known streets. Also very easy to share easy to export/import data and share tracks.  GAIA team takes consumer input and continues to improve the product and user experience. | This app was my sole navigational source during bikepacking the Baja Divide. 
1000+ miles not a single problem!!! 

Great app and thank you Gaia Team :D | CalTopo is way better! Gaia app just locks up. Not reliable at all! | No idea why people pay for this. Other apps don’t require you to login again and again (which would be impossible if you didn’t have cell coverage in the back country), and you also have to pay for downloadable maps, which is a free feature in other apps. | Totally new to off-road apps so I downloaded Gaia and OnX at the same time. Very different experiences. Touch anything in Gaia and you get blocked by an add to upgrade for $60. Kind of very limited use click bait kind of thing. I couldn’t try out anything without paying $60. How do I know if I even like the app?  Frustrating. | The only real difference is this feature. And it’s very important feature considering how most people will want to download at some point. Unfortunately you’re stuck with the new version as the old version is not available for purchase anymore. | Great features, I use all the time and a super good app | This app consistently underreports how much altitude gain I have on hikes.  On a recent hike it reported a roughly accurate gain of 530 ft. at the top of a ridge but as I started to descend the total reported altitude gain decreased to 414 ft. then remained constant all the way back to the trailhead.  The cumulative altitude gain/loss on the trail from the guide was 630 ft on this out and back trail so the app underreported by about 35%.  I otherwise love this app but it seems to always underreport altitude change. | Can’t create an account, can’t sign in. Messsge is unclear what I’m doing wrong. Outside screwed this app up. | I feared Gaia QC would go down with recent changes. And it did. Routes you work on for hours go missing, trails go missing unexpectedly even online mode then also comes back unexpectedly. Gaia can not be trusted anymore. | I can’t log in and there’s no customer service to talk to. There should be customer service if I’m paying for an app. | Hello. I am vocationally Oly a UX UA designer and I can’t figure this app out. I understand that if I know my the name of my hike or the address, and I can download the map it’s going to be fantastic. 

But all I want to do is find hikes that are near my area. I am new to the state. What hikes are around me? I thought this app could help. But I’ve now spent an hour and a half on YouTube trying to figure it out and I’m convinced that there must be another resource for this. Potentially printed book?

It would be an easy fix to include hike locations highlighted on the map (if you CAN do this, I can’t discover anyway on the interface, or in a video to do it). Or, enable to filter the “near me” search results to sort by distance to my location. You know where I am, because I turned on location settings for the app. All of the recommended near near me hikes don’t have any information about how far away they are.
