I don’t recommend downloading this app currently. | 😕 | We used Park Whiz for an event in Indianapolis. Following the event, most of the exits were chained shut. This caused us to be unable to exit the parking lot for over an hour. We had a child with us and there were vehicles speeding through the lot, jumping curbs, drivers screaming and cursing- overall creating a scary and unsafe experience for me and my child. | Parking at my event was LESS in person than using this stupid app. | The last 3x I used the app, I pre-paid for a spot, only to be turned away by the attendant as the lots were already full. Getting refunded is also a chore.  Never again. Lost customer. | Absolutely the worst customer service I have ever experienced. The app changed my request from 8 hrs to 24 hours, tripling the price. I tried to cancel within 30 secs and provided them with everything they asked for to get a refund and they gave me credit for future parking but would not refund. I will never use this app again for any reason. Spot Hero support is great. | Accurate, and so convenient to be able to reserve parking this way!! | Used the app twice for Tampa events, found it easy to book, pay and find the parking lot , fair pricing. The lot was easy, safe, walking distance to event. Well maintained lot and parking attendant friendly and helpful. No complaints would use again and recommend. | I got pretty cheap parking from this app and was happy AT FIRST. When I arrived at the garage there was no where to scan the QR code. I had to pay 48 dollars on top of what o paid in the app. I contacted customer service for a refund and they told me I parked at the wrong spot. Which is complete bullsh*t because I got the address from the app and even followed the pictures provided. I parked identical to what the app showed. When I told them this, I received complete radio silence. I will be disputing the charge and never using this app again. I do not at all recommend.

UPDATE: 
I contacted support again and they kept telling me I parked in the wrong spot. Turns out, the app gave me the wrong address. Even though it was the app’s mistake, they refused to give me a refund. I’m very upset with how they handled their mistake and refused to do anything but “flag the garage”. If the app is wrong, that is not my fault and I should have been refunded. This app is essentially a scam. I  would not trust this app ever. | I’m trying add extra time | Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. Make sure to keep your email or a paper copy. App won’t have your purchased parking info/QR code always. | Easy to use | Love this app, no issues here in Chicago. | Been using this for years to get parking for shows in Las Vegas at the smith center. No other option, that’s why. 
Recent updates and improvements have changed the app so it defaults to charging you more than is needed. It used to always be the same price. Now it shows nearly double. You have to physically go in and edit the times needed so it is the correct price. Shady companies being shady. | I payed for my parking spot in advance through the app and when I approached to the screening panel to scan the code it didn’t worked, and I had to double pay for the parking. I wrote a message letting the app people know and tried to get in contact with someone for a reimbursement, and never heard back from anyone. Lost that money trying to get into a Parking lot in Pittsburg. ☹️ | About two thirds of the time the tickets I bought from them turned out to be bogus.  If you buy a ticket for sporting events there is a strong chance you will be turned around at the gate! I don’t know how they allow this to happen and at this point nor do I care.  I cannot buy any tickets from them anymore just in case.  If you are attending a sporting event particularly if the ticket is labeled for that event do not buy tickets from this site. | Second time I’ve used it -hate the interface. You have to zoom out to see what parking to pick. It doesn’t remember my license plate so I have multiple steps to not get ticketed. All so the facility doesn’t need customer support for parking. | Can’t pay if I can’t scan | When I parked, scanned the QR on the sign, downloaded app and see red the first location on the list of options, paid and went to the event. Turns out that the list of available locations are not in distance order so being a tourist and not knowing the town very well, I selected a parking lot that was 500ft west from the one I was. My car was towed, ParkWhiz has no one to assist you, had to pay the tow and dispute later. Took from early October until mid March to have a response. We will refund the Uber expense as a good faith gesture since it was user fault that you select the top parking location on the app and not the he third down the list. BTW, all were same price. Anyway, parking costed me $20 + $250 tow + $9 Uber, they only refunded the cost of the ride $9. Stay away from this guys!!! Also worth mentioning that took over a dozen emails to finally someone respond. | Excellent | The parking prices just went up again where I used to pay $11 to park it’s now $27 and this was just last week… price gauging is ridiculous now I have to find another job because I can’t pay $30 a day to go to work when that’s gone be giving out my whole check just to pay to park shame on yall…. And I will just delete your app cause shame on you | Check if your lot accepts this app | App very handy and easy to use. One suggestion. Sometimes reserved spots are not held in nyc so makes parking a bit unreliable. Not your fault but if there was a way to know , it would help. | I like using park whiz   Your app said if I booked today, I would get $15 off but the $15 savings didn’t get applied…   I’m disappointed | I made (and paid for) a reservation for a spot in a nearby city. I drove to the lot and the attendant wouldn’t let me in saying “it was only for the hotel this weekend.” I had to find a new spot while also calling to get a refund. When I found a new spot near where I needed to but they told me I could only get a refund if I submit I receipt proving I parked somewhere else. So then I had to go out of my way to find another lot and pay for parking. It was ridiculous. Totally defeats the purpose.

title: Avenza Maps: Offline Mapping
description:
Avenza Maps, #1 app for hiking, biking and all trails. Featuring maps from National Geographic, national parks and more!  

On your next adventure, stay on track with GPS using offline mobile maps. Make your own maps? Import your custom maps and never get lost off the grid.

Explore the largest mobile Map Store of hiking, topographic, cycling, city, nautical, travel, and trail maps. Featuring maps from professional publishers including National Geographic, National Park Service, and the US Forest Service. Discover maps for your next camping, fishing, or backpacking trip with your family and friends. Navigate confidently when off-roading or taking those backcountry trails. Precisely identify your location with what3words and stay safe wherever you are.

Avenza Maps is free and the best map app for recreational use. Maps are available for free or purchase from the in-app Map Store. Plus subscription is available for unlimited custom map imports. Pro subscription is available for professional users with full access to all features and mapping tools.

Avenza Maps for your offline adventures on all trails!

ENHANCE YOUR MAPS WITH THESE FEATURES  
- Locate your realtime GPS position and find direction, even when offline
- Record GPS tracks during your activities
- Navigate to features using compass tools 
- Add photos and notes to any location
- Add placemarks to your map and style them with recreational symbols
- Measure distances and estimate times
- Supports KML, GPX, and CSV Formats

EXPLORE THE MAP STORE
Search and download maps by activity, category, and specific publishers with premium maps from:
- National Geographic
- Michelin
- Backroad Mapbooks (BRMB)
- New York - New Jersey Trail Conference
- USFS (United States Forest Service)
- USGS (United States Geological Survey)
- FAA (Federal Aviation Administration)
- NOAA (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration)
- BLM (Bureau of Land Management)
- HarperCollins
- DeLorme Atlas & Gazetteer / Garmin
- BaseImage
- National Park Service
- And thousands more!
A free account lets you access all of your map downloads.

GET MORE WITH AVENZA MAPS PLUS
For recreational and power users who need more
- Unlimited import of your own geospatial PDF, GeoPDF®, and GeoTIFF maps
- Create geofences for up to 50 individual features and up to four geofence layers

GET EVEN MORE WITH AVENZA MAPS PRO
For professionals and organizations who require an offline mapping solution with location awareness with more features and tools
- Unlimited import of your own geospatial PDF, GeoPDF®, and GeoTIFF maps
- GPS averaging, additional coordinate display formats, custom symbol sets
- Connect high-accuracy GPS devices including Trimble, Bad Elf, and Dual via Bluetooth
- Created unlimited geofences and get global geofence notifications
- Convert tracks to areas
- Map orientation lock
- Import and export Esri® Shapefiles
- Import and manage custom symbology sets
- Priority technical support
Avenza Maps Pro subscription required for commercial, academic, government, and professional use.

Avenza Maps Plus and Pro are available as annual subscriptions. You can subscribe and pay through your Apple ID. Subscriptions are 12 months in duration and will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of your selected plan. Auto-renewal can be turned off in your iTunes Account Settings. If you didn’t use iTunes to subscribe, you can manage your subscription through Avenza.

SUPPORT
We can help! Go to support.avenzamaps.com

LEGAL
Privacy Policy: avenzamaps.com/legal/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: avenzamaps.com/legal/terms.html

CONNECT WITH US
avenzamaps.com
facebook.com/avenzamaps
twitter.com/avenzamaps
instagram.com/avenzamaps
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Avenza Maps! What's new in this version:
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes
reviews:
GPS is functional and good | Very well put togather simple to read and easy functions | Good for property boundaries. | Excellent app! Very accurate. | Easy to use | Not sure I like it | Avenza has great topo maps and is a high quality app!!! | With G.P.S. tracking and so many features, Avenza is incredibly Awesome! | Awesome collection of Regional Maps! No excuse for setting at home when there’s a lot to see and explore in the WEST! | Love these maps for the detail, especially the hiking maps. | Everytime I try to purchase a map I get an “error” message that gives me no solution to fix this problem and nothing is on the website for it either. 

I am able to make in app purchases on other apps and have a balance on my iTunes. | Venezia is a great mapping tool | Clunky map search even with filters. Have to scroll through many maps | since last update the maps can't be used and the 'reload' has been stuck for several hours | Liar. Mug. | I had bought 7 garmin maps and now 4 of them I can’t access because they are no longer available. I would like them to work or get a refund for those 4 maps. The app works great otherwise. | I use the app when I stay in state parks around Tennessee and I love it! I’m able to see trail markers, set waypoints, and track my walks and bicycle rides. I truly believe it’s one of the best apps available for maps and mapping. | Fantastic map was on hike with my daughter and wondered where we were at. Stopped and loaded app. Located our position on trail and how to get back to start. Great map. | First, it's absolutely ludicrous that a for-profit company like this can become the "official" tool for the USFS MVUM with such a poor product.

Any time you get to a new location and want a new MVUM, expect to spend 5 - 10 minutes trying to find the map in the "Store". Often times it displays tons of unrelated maps that it wants to sell you. Even when you put "mvum" in the search field, it comes up with a bunch of junk results.

No idea how this has 5 stars. Why can't it just simply and easily load the maps I need? Or at least have a working search? | I began using Avenza several years ago while volunteering for a national forest. While out of a cell phone connection it connected and showed me where I was in the forest (satellite?). I advised hikers to download to keep from getting lost on multi day hikes. | I used it for a recent state park hunt and it was great tool. From planning to navigating, it was very helpful. | Tracks you on the map so if you get lost you can find your way back | Great detail and easy to use. | Where was this app 30 years ago! Awesome app. Easy to use! Thank you to all involved creating this. | Really impressed with the features and functionality of this app and the free access to topographic maps and the ability to track your location on the topos! | I work for a land management agency and frequently utilize Avenza to help track treatments of invasive species and during planning and implementation of prescribed fire. I also use it in similar fashion on my private property, and for private landowners with whom I’m working for with my other job (private sector). The two things I would love to see are real time GPS positioning of the entire burn team (individual members), and on a personal level - a GPS dog collar compatible with the app for real time positioning display as well. Love the app overall. | Good interface with Gazatter | This app is great for navigating MVUMs but it’s a pain that it doesn’t work with Apple CarPlay. Because it doesn’t I’m forced to use two navigation sources (phone w/ Avenza and CarPlay w/ Gaia GPS MVUMs) for accurate location and direction. 

Please update app to work with CarPlay. Pretty please. With a cherry on top. | It’s reliable and easy to use.  Easy to convert recorded tracks for use in ArcGIS applications. | Very easy to use and the detail of the map was spot on.  amazing having all the quality maps at your fingertips. | Probably the best free navigation app for those going off of cell service without a gps. It does require a level of familiarity with the area as mostly maps don’t have descriptions of trail/road difficulty but that is more a comment on the types of maps that are available than the app itself. Overall a good app that will only get better over time. | Have been using avenza for years for home and work. At work I have the paid pro which is great. At home on the free app the newest update has made it unusable for more than three maps. Have others in my device for reference and get pop ups to upgrade to pro every few seconds making the map unusable. Please fix | I download and try the app about once a year, get frustrated and delete it. | App is excellent for backcountry trips in areas of poor cell service. Interface is a little complicated and unclear. If there was an intuitive button to walk users through all the functions either when they first start using the app or before a trip after not using the app for months, that would be amazing. | Avenza Maps are super easy to use.  The maps show exactly where you are on the trail. The maps look just like the paper maps provided by the parks! I love Avenza Maps on trails that are not very well marked or have unofficial side trails. | The apps technology is so accurate. What a pleasure and time saver. Plus the best part is its user friendly. | I sign into the website with an email and a password, find what I want and then get a CTA to download my maps. This launches the app, but doesn’t download any maps and what I just purchased doesn’t show up in the app. The app account requires an email, and a username, and a password is optional, but I have just signed in to the website with an email and a password— no username. So do I make up a new username and hope they can link my account? Why username at all? | Love. Has been a valuable tool during hiking | I’m wondering around in here as a beginner and am finding it to be nice. As a wild land firefighter, it comes in handy to scope our work. | I’ve been using Avenza for years and it is user friendly and an all around great app! | Perfect | If you buy maps with your Apple account before you login, Avenza will not show the maps in your account so you won’t be able to download them again.

The instructions/documentation are terrible, terrible terrible. Also, it’s unclear to me whether the maps are downloaded to my device or not. 

Really surprised, given how highly rated it is. This isn’t rocket science. An app like this should be intuitive and seamless. | Of NO value much better apps with less gyrations and added purchases to maybe get current data. | I don’t know why I needed to sign up, download and pay for a free map. And it was a ridiculously long download. All for a map that is available on a pdf | Found this online while looking for sleeping giant park maps.  Tried it with an army friend while we were hiking and we were both pleasantly surprised by how user friendly and accurate this app is.  Highly recommended. | We really enjoy using Avanza very detailed, highly recommend it to any novice or avid experienced rider. Thank you.
The Poirier’s | As a wildland firefighter, I understand the importance of having accurate and up-to-date information at my fingertips. Avenza Maps has become an indispensable app in my firefighting toolkit. Its exceptional features and user-friendly interface make it an invaluable companion during intense wildfire incidents.

First and foremost, Avenza Maps excels in its ability to provide detailed, georeferenced maps that are essential for navigating and understanding the terrain. The app allows me to import and access topographic, satellite, and custom maps, ensuring that I have a comprehensive view of the fire area and surrounding landscapes. With just a few taps, I can quickly switch between maps to gain a clearer understanding of the fire's progression and potential hazards.

One of the standout features of Avenza Maps is its ability to track my location even in remote areas with limited or no cellular service. This offline functionality is a game-changer for wildland firefighting, as it enables me to maintain real-time situational awareness regardless of the connectivity conditions. The app's GPS integration ensures that I can accurately mark and navigate to critical waypoints, such as fire perimeters, evacuation routes, water sources, and safety zones.

Avenza Maps also provides valuable tools for annotation and collaboration. I can easily add notes, drawings, and measurements directly onto the maps, allowing me to communicate essential information to my team or incident commanders. This feature streamlines coordination efforts and enhances overall situational awareness among the firefighting personnel.

Furthermore, Avenza Maps' intuitive interface and smooth performance make it a pleasure to use, even during high-pressure situations. Navigating the app, zooming in and out, and switching between maps are all seamless experiences that contribute to its overall effectiveness in the field.

The developers behind Avenza Maps consistently update the app, ensuring it remains up to date with the latest technological advancements and addressing user feedback. The dedication to improving the app's functionality and stability is evident, making it a reliable and trustworthy tool for wildland firefighting operations.

In conclusion, Avenza Maps is a must-have app for wildland firefighters. Its ability to provide accurate georeferenced maps, offline functionality, annotation tools, and extensive map overlays makes it an indispensable tool for navigating and responding to wildfires. The app's user-friendly interface and regular updates further contribute to its excellence. I highly recommend Avenza Maps to all wildland firefighters looking to enhance their operational efficiency and situational awareness in the field.

Note: While Avenza Maps is an exceptional tool for wildland firefighting, always prioritize following official protocols, guidelines, and the advice of incident commanders during firefighting operations. | As soon as I started using this I decided this will be my first primary mapping app for public lands. Still impressive it takes a “printable” government map and can locate you on it. | OMG!  I would rate this even higher if possible! I tried this out in the Grayson Highlands this past week and it was spot on and tracked me even though my phone was in airplane mode! What a relief. I am definitely using this apps on my other day hikes!!! Thank You | I get booted out of my account at least twice a week on Avenza. If it weren’t required for work, I’d have deleted it years ago out of frustration

title: HotelTonight - Hotel Deals
description:
Travel to the hotels we love, with deals you’ll love. From top-rated luxury hotels to tried-and-true favorites to one-of-a-kind boutiques, we work with great hotels (and only partner with hotels where we’d wanna stay). 
 
On-the-go? Use our app to book travel deals so good we don’t offer them on the web. Experience the simplest hotel booking app – just 3 taps and a swipe to book in under 60 seconds.
 
Don’t miss our Daily Drop deals, which rocks awesome jaw-dropping hotel discounts. Just swipe to unlock the extra special deal of the day and book your stay.
 
EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN A BOOKING APP
• Weekend stay? Last minute trip? Dream vacation? Business trips? All good. Book tonight, next week, or up to 100 days in advance
• We’ve got the hookup for deals on last minute hotel bookings wherever you travel to
• Select hotels offer cancellable rates – only on our app. Look for the Cancellable badge before you book if you need travel flexibility
• 24/7 customer support (from real, live, nice people) for every booking
 
FIND HOTELS EASILY
• Hotel descriptions provide the three reasons why we love it (and why you will too)
• Our categories (like Basic, Hip and Luxe) make it easy to book the perfect hotel, bnb, inn, resort or over-the-top suite
• Find hotels by city, neighborhood or filter by your trip needs. Traveling with Fido? Toggle on “pet friendly”
• Need a second opinion? Find hotel ratings, stay reviews and photos from fellow bookers
• Frequent Traveler? Favorite your usual hotels
 
HT PERKS PROGRAM
• Loyalty is a breeze – the more you book, the better your hotel deals get! Level up to claim more travel discounts and rewards
 
SOME TRIP IDEAS
• Happy hour is never just an hour. Book hotel deals where tonight takes you
• Skip the commute. With a same day last minute hotel deal, traffic can wait
• Travel for business or pleasure - or both? Lock down biz travel then book another hotel night, it’s a vacation deal!
• Group traveling made simple. Book multiple hotel rooms for the ultimate friends vacation
• Summer road trips are fun. Find new hotels at every stop and enjoy the cheap discounts
• Surprise! A last minute trip is the best gift. Book rooms and text the BFF “Vegas, tonight” 
• Invite a fellow traveler or two on your last hurrah, and book the most over-the-top rooms or VIP suite
• Spontaneous travel decision? Booking a trip on a whim is fun with deals!
 
“The app made its name with last-minute deals, but you can plan as far as 100 days out and even score baller rooms for way less” - Conde Nast Traveler (2017)
 
Whether traveling near or far, searching for last minute trips and local hotel deals is easy!
 
Download the HotelTonight booking app today to stay at awesome hotels with great deals. Plan less and live more!
releaseNotes:
HotelTonight brings you amazing hotel deals for tonight, tomorrow and beyond! Hotels give us discounts on their unsold rooms and you get to book amazing hotels at great prices. Three taps, one swipe, and you are booked!

Download now to find deals so good hotels will not let us put it on the website.

In the latest update, we’ve made performance improvements so it’s even easier and more fun to book a place on HotelTonight.
reviews:
Great rates and the app makes it easy to book! | Hotel Tonight always makes looking for and booking a hotel so easy and fun. I highly recommend. | I seriously have never been so disappointed and mistreated by a hotel (citizenM - Downtown Los Angeles) as my partner and I were during our stay there. First off, at check-in the gentleman forgot to take or input a credit card for incidentals. Along with this, I asked if we could do a late check out just in case we had too much fun in DTLA. Unfortunately, he must’ve forgotten. He was really nice though. 

This morning, we were awakened by loud knocking and a request to leave immediately. We immediately called the front and reminded them of what we had asked for. We were told it was fine. But soon thereafter received a call again asking for us to go to the front immediately since there was no card on file. While I understand policies and such. As a superintendent of schools, I say “approach determines response” and I was fuming. In the end, as we were leaving, I asked an attendant for information on a manager. She shared that he was there and she would ask him over. She clearly went to get him. She came back with a gentleman who didn’t greet or anything but stood there. She shared for me to email instead. How distasteful and disrespectful. I feel that there should be something done. I am appalled. 

Hotel Tonight has always been great in customer service and I look forward to a resolution and response for this issue. CitizenM was a major disappointment. | I loved HotelTonight until I had to deal with their support team and will not be giving them business any longer.

I booked a hotel and the listing was inaccurate in regards to pet policy. I ended up booking a second reservation (same dates) through the app and reached out to support asking for a credit on the room where the listing was inaccurate. After spending over an hour on the phone and being escalated to a manager, I was told that they would not provide a credit against the $80 room. The manager continued insisting that the pet policy was on the listing, despite me sending multiple screenshots. The original agent acknowledged that the listing was incorrect.

Another example of a technology company getting larger and forgetting to take care of their long term customers. Absolutely one of the worst support experiences I’ve had in a long time. In search, could you allow for a filter to provide a two bed room? | Easy booking.. great price | As a former frequent Hotwire customer I’ve now switched to Hotel Tonight as I have found the star ratings more accurate, the hotels of better quality, and the service prompt and courteous. Love it!!! | Was forced to pay 30% more when I arrived at the hotel even though I had already paid the advertised price through HotelTonight. Unethical business practices. | I love hotels.com. They’ve always been super quick and easy to get a room for a decent rate and it has everything you need to make it quick and easy you can see your room, destination, location and ratings. title: Grab: Taxi Ride, Food Delivery
description:
Get everything you need with Grab — the leading ride-hailing, taxi, food delivery, and grocery app in  Southeast Asia.


We offer essential everyday services to over 670 million people across Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Myanmar. 


Grab offers various ride-hailing options, including 4-wheel and 2-wheel rides, and taxi booking. There’s also a diverse range of services including food order delivery from restaurants, prompt package delivery, and groceries from supermarkets, making it a leading delivery platform. 


From ride-hailing to food and grocery delivery, Grab is your one-stop app for all your everyday needs in Southeast Asia.


Book a ride for any occasion and budget
Order a ride on Grab, the top ride-hailing and taxi app in Southeast Asia. Choose from a variety of transport modes, including cars, motorbikes, and buses, and get matched with a professional driver in minutes.


Food delivery for any craving
GrabFood: a leading food delivery app that allows you to easily order food from your favourite restaurants and get it delivered to your doorstep, making it convenient and hassle-free 


Conveniently order food and groceries for delivery
GrabMart is a convenient food delivery app that allows you to order groceries and handpicked fresh produce from your favourite supermarket. 




Secure and seamless cashless payments
GrabPay: A safe and secure mobile wallet where you can easily pay for Grab services, such as food and grocery delivery and taxis, as well as at local merchants 


Reliable on-demand package delivery
GrabExpress: Order affordable, fast, and reliable courier service with insurance for your items


Rewards for using Grab
GrabRewards: Order food, ride and earn reward points for every dollar you spend and use them to redeem deals in the GrabRewards catalog


Grab is the only ride-hailing and food-delivery app you need. Whether you are searching for a taxi app, express food delivery, or grocery delivery, Grab has got you covered.


In addition to our renowned ride-hailing, taxi, and food delivery services, we also strive to promote economic empowerment for everyone in the region. We provide financial services such as wealth management, lending, cashless payments, and insurance.


Find out more about us at www.grab.com.
Grab offers the ability for users to receive personalized targeted advertising, offers, and updates from Grab and its partners and communications/advertising from certain third-party apps based on activity on your devices. Users may exercise opt-out choices under the Privacy and Consent Management sections within Settings within the app. For further details, you may refer to our Privacy Policy at www.grab.com/privacy.
releaseNotes:
Most of us think dinosaurs are the most amazing creatures. However, scientists discovered that there are lots of creatures that existed long before dinosaurs. One of those creatures is the grasshopper. The fossil record shows that these insects first appeared more than 300 million years ago.

We don't know how long bugs inside the Grab app have been around. That's because we destroy them from the app once we see them.

Remove the dead bugs by updating to 5.303. It's not im-fossil-ble to do.

Allows drivers one has just canceled to AGAIN accept a requested ride! Should prohibit a ride that has been canceled from accepting the same ride from the same person! No obvious way to get a refund. | Exceptional great and kind person! Hope ride again to this guy in the future. | This is my first time in SG and Grab app.The driver really help me to get correct ride even have to pay sur plus charge  ,I am Okay .Thanks | Good & friendly driver 👍🫡👏 | Tốt | Good | This bug has existed for years now. 

When I cancel an order, the promo is consumed despite not buying anything. This is a wasted opportunity for both Grab and the customer to have a business transaction. | The app is not reliable at all, you can place an order for food delivery, and wait for hours without any support and no one to contact. There is no way to check on your order or even the status, the time of the order will keep extending without you knowing what’s happening. | Courteous and engaging driver | For Singapore users, I recommend Grab over Deliveroo for food delivery. Here’s bad experience I had with Deliveroo. On April 1st, 2024, I ordered from Sushi Tei via Deliveroo, scheduled between 7:00 PM and 7:30 PM. Despite the app indicating that the driver was near at 7:30 PM, the order was erroneously marked as "delivered" at 7:40 PM, with neither the food nor the driver appearing. I immediately contacted Deliveroo’s customer support where the agent, Jose, claimed the driver attempted contact and left the food in the lobby, both of which were untrue. No evidence of these attempts was presented despite my requests. After spending over 20 minutes waiting in the lobby and receiving no satisfactory resolution, the options given were a refund or a re-delivery after an additional 90 minutes, both of which I found unacceptable. Following this frustrating experience, I reached out again to customer service to express my concerns. Sadly, it took two weeks for a response, only to be told that compensation would be limited to just the initial amount of the order. This lack of adequate resolution and the slow response time only added to my disappointment. This entire ordeal has significantly diminished my trust in Deliveroo’s service and reliability, especially when working late. The apparent dishonesty of the driver, coupled with the lackluster response from customer support, reflects poorly on Deliveroo’s commitment to customer satisfaction. title: Bolt: Request a Ride
description:
Use your smartphone to order a ride, get picked up by a nearby driver, and enjoy a low-cost trip to your destination.

Why choose Bolt? 
• Get a comfortable, low-cost ride.
• Fast arrival times, 24/7.
• See the price of your ride before you order.
• You can pay inside the app (Credit/Debit/Apple Pay).

Easily request a ride with the Bolt app:
1. Open the app and set your destination;
2. Request a driver to pick you up;
3. See your driver's location on the real-time map;
4. Enjoy the ride to your destination;
5. Leave a rating and pay.

Our mission is to bring fast, reliable and affordable transportation to millions of people around the world, while also helping thousands of drivers support their families. The next time you need a ride, take a Bolt!

Earn extra money driving with Bolt. Sign up at https://partners.bolt.eu

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
Twitter — https://twitter.com/Boltapp
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Bolt!
 
We regularly update the app to provide a consistently high-quality experience. This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
 
Enjoying Bolt? Please leave a rating! Your feedback helps us improve.

Завжди десь відбудеться « випадкова помилка» і вам спише більше коштів. Служба підтримки не те, що погана. Вона найгірша зі всіх, які я використовувала. | I really recommend this driver. | I downloaded bolt for the first time with a 70% of coupon for the first ride and the coupon code wasn’t applied to my ride. Tried to get customer support to honor it but got the run around from 4 different agents - one said the code didn’t work because of “irregular activities”, the second made me re-verify  my identity, the 3rd said the code could not applied after the ride and repeated “irregular activities” as the reason and then refused to respond when I asked what that meant.
Don’t trust their coupons or their very poor customer service | Usamos Bolt con muchos tiempo de espera, coches que iban en dirección contraria a la de recogida, anulaciones por llevar maletas a pesar de pedir XL… | Pascou was amazing!  He told me all about Lisboa and Cascais. He was helpful with my Portuguese too!  Please send me a message on how I can tip him!  Thank you! | Had multiple problems with this app not giving the driver the correct address. And the drivers add wait times due to me confirming that the address they had was correct. Uber is much better. | I’m not disappointed at all! When I get a Bolt, nobody cancels the order, and they always get you there quick, even with traffic! It’s definitely a great option. | App just crashes on launch | the app wont even send me a confirmation code to get logged into the app so i cant even use it to begin with | A wait that says it’s four minutes will be 16. Impossible to get drivers. So much worse than Uber it’s crazy | Bolt rides are an essential alternative mode of transportation in Asia. Great when you need to travel distances or would like air conditioning. Most drivers speak English in some way and many are very helpful with local tips and advice.. Shows you how far the driver is from you before picking up and the route along the way. Similar to Uber but with the nice feature to pay cash at the end of your ride. App is very user friendly. | Samir is very patient and safe driver | Experience: Needed to commute to work, located an hour away. Issue: Encountered a major hurdle with Bolt’s payment system - my debit card, despite multiple verifications with the bank, was consistently declined. Bolt’s system is apparently at fault. Customer Service Response: Lacking effectiveness. Now, there’s an additional 48-hour wait just to attempt adding a card again. Overall Assessment: Bolt’s failure in a basic service aspect - processing a payment - is more than just a personal inconvenience; it’s a glaring flaw in their system. This incident isn’t just about being stranded without a ride; it reflects poorly on Bolt’s reliability and customer service quality. Impact on Bolt’s Reputation and Business: Such experiences can severely damage Bolt’s reputation. In the competitive ride-sharing market, reliability and ease of use are crucial. Issues like these drive customers away, potentially to competitors. Every frustrated customer like me represents not just a lost ride but a loss of trust in Bolt’s ability to deliver a basic service. Moreover, word of mouth and online reviews magnify the impact of negative experiences, further eroding the company’s standing in the eyes of potential customers. Bolt needs to urgently address these issues to retain its user base and uphold its market position. | Это лучшая компания в Тбилиси.

I canceled my ride as I was unable to take it, and took the same exact ride a few moments later with a driver that went to the correct pick up location. I contacted support 2 times and they keep saying the driver was at the correct pickup location and would not be refunding me, I am disputing this transaction with my bank. | I attempted to register with my U.S. phone number but I couldn’t receive a text or call back to register.

title: What Would You Choose? Rather
description:
Would You Rather is a fun and addicting game where you have to choose between two difficult scenarios. 

This app contains hundreds of the best hand-picked Would You Rather questions

Features:
- Hundreds of questions
- Vote for your favorite option and view real time statistics on what one is more popular
_ Frequently updated with more content 
- 2 game modes to try. Normal and Adults (18+)
- Submit your own questions to be added into the game 
- Works offline. No Wi-Fi is required to play this game

Would You Rather is a great game to play with your family or friends to start conversations. 

What are you waiting for? Grab your friends and have a fun by playing a game of What Would You Choose.

title: Drops: Language Learning Games
description:
Join over 40 million people who use Drops for free language lessons. It’s fast, fun, and easy! Practice vocabulary in Spanish, Japanese, French, Korean, Chinese, German, English. Discover 50+ different new languages with Drops!

Learn new languages while playing games. You can become fluent, learn vocabulary and common phrases in Hebrew, Arabic, Russian, and Hindi. Set goals, unlock achievements, and get rewards!

• Become fluent in a foreign language with this language learning app
• Learn to read characters and scripts from different alphabets like Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Hebrew, Arabic, Russian, and Hindi 
• Custom illustrations for each vocabulary word makes it easy to remember
• From beginner to expert levels, grow your foreign language vocabulary
• A professionally curated vocabulary list with more than 3,000 words and phrases 
• Game-like language lessons that make language learning fun and effective
• Level up! Track your progress and get rewards
• Professional voice artists and sound design with correct dialect pronunciations
• Learn to speak languages like American English, British English, Korean, Mexican Spanish, Latin-American Spanish, Japanese, German, French, European Portuguese, Russian, Castilian Spanish, Italian, Arabic, Tagalog, Hebrew, Icelandic, Polish, Mandarin Chinese, Turkish, Cantonese Chinese, Dutch, Norwegian, Thai, Swedish, Vietnamese, Maori, Brazilian Portuguese, Farsi (Persian), Hungarian, Greek, Hindi, Danish, Samoan, Indonesian, Finnish, Serbian, Croatian, Esperanto, Estonian, Hawaiian, Ukrainian, Yoruba, Bosnian, Swahili, Igbo, Sanskrit and even Ainu!

"By focusing on visually appealing games and vocab, Drops aims to lower the barrier preventing users from exploring a new language and, ultimately, accessing the social and economic benefits knowing that language may provide." - TechCrunch

We are featured by CNET, Forbes, VentureBeat and many other places too!

Try Drops Premium with a 7 day free trial. Download the app to learn about different membership options, and register to learn all about exclusive discounts.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of Drops premium. Afterwards your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. You can cancel your subscription anytime, and you won't be charged in the next billing cycle.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html
releaseNotes: We made improvements to the Drops app! This update contains bug fixes and offers you a better play experience. Happy language learning!
reviews:
This was not difficult. Learning 5 words a day for beginners is great! | Honestly such a great app and the pronunciation is amazing although the words are all over the place so don’t expect like a Duolingo style lesson 

I couldn’t love it more tho 

Daalu drops !! | I’m currently learning Igbo on Drops and it’s been very helpful especially because there are not many resources out there’s to help me learn igbo. The stuff I’m learning is good and useful, but I do wish that there was more English translating in Drops. This is because I often find myself forgetting what some Igbo words or phrases mean because I don’t remember what they mean in English. | I love this app it’s so easy to use and helps you to understand Arabic better | This is a great platform to learn another language because it’s fun, and feels doable. | Okay so this is a good language learning app, but when I go do my lesson for the day it will say that I have to wait 20 hours until I get to do my lesson. On top of that, I can’t change how long each session is unless I get Drops+. | It is enjoyable learning and fun. When it congratulates you I think it should stop the timer. It is also nice to learn about the language’s culture. 5. Minutes a day is nice because it helps you learn the words instead of knowing a few and forgetting the rest because you have so many words. I would suggest putting 2 more lessons on to a topic the app says you mastered or use review dojo. | great supplemental tool for your vocabulary. Could have better review options, but other than that worth every penny. | I have a streak of over a year in this app, and until recently I thought it was fantastic. A few months ago, though, they introduced a glitch where if you complete a module before your 5 minutes are up, it usually takes you back to the start screen and sets your time back to zero. This means that you have to start your five minutes over if you want to keep your streak in the app. This has turned it into a lie when the app claims it only takes five minutes a day — it’s closer to ten minutes if you are actually making progress.

They’ve released a few updates since this started happening, but none correct the problem. The very poor maintenance of this app and the fact that they’re allowing it to be this buggy drove me to write this review. I have no problem paying for apps, but when I do, I expect them to work on the most basic level. This one doesn’t. | I like this so much. Very interactive and fun. | its so helpful and i just dowloaded and learned la fiesta sunglasses la perro  and hola gracias and more! | Great tool for learning. | Its very helpful even tho it’s my first time trying out this app, I hope to learn and understand Thai better in order to enjoy my Thai drama series without having to read subtitles | I love visual learning and it’s the best for me. It’s a lot easier learning on here then any other language app. | Never been more fun! | pretty fire | Started putting together simple sentences day one | it’s very helpful for multiple things I love the fact that I learn new words and review the old ones it really helps me master them | I love this app it’s really good to learn languages and u get a 7 day trail!!!m how cool is that? Download it right nowwwwwww | I really love this application it focuses great on memory and vocabulary. | I’ve had this app for years and used it on and off the whole time, but I’ve only started using it seriously within the last few months. First thing out of the way: unless you’re a genius, you will not become fluent in your target language using this app alone. That said, though, it’s excellent for vocabulary practice, which is one of the parts of language learning I struggle with the most. The free version (which I use) has a lot of options and even allows you some choice in what you study, which I really appreciate. | Namaste ji! I love the interface and formatting. The lessons are super cool and easy to navigate through. I’m a visual learner, so this approach works well for me. I get addicted to “playing” Drops because the design is so eye-pleasing and smooth. Yet, there are some blaring content and functional flaws I need to mention. This app is my absolute favorite (out of many that I’ve tried) mostly because of the exceptional visual interface and keen navigation. I am using Drops, along with Nemo and private Hindi lessons with a Native speaker in India. I also ask my Hindi speaking Indian friends when I have questions. So, I have a bit of insight and suggestions I hope the developers will take seriously. A big disappointment about words that are the same in English and Hindi. Granted, many words don’t have a translation (or it’s old school translation) and that’s completely understandable. Yet, as much as I love the visual learning app, with Drops for Hindi I find way too many words are in English (and obviously don’t have Hindi translations). I paid for the FULL app for HINDI words, not common English words pronounced with a Hindi accent! And in that case, as I’ve been taught elsewhere, you’d want to use the proper English accent to pronounce the English words anyway. So why bother putting it in there? Why say the word “salmon” and pronounce it with a Hindi accent? It’s not a Hindi word and it’s derived from the American language. Same with “broccoli” and a bunch of other foods, objects and situations. Why put English words in the Hindi vocabulary list at all? There are way too many words like this in the entire Drops for Hindi vocabulary section, which feels like a real rip off! If it isn’t a Hindi word, don’t put it in the vocabulary as a Hindi word! This is Hindi class, not English for Hindi speakers! Suggestion: Implement a “common words” section and don’t put them in the official Hindi vocabulary list. There’s no way to adjust the length of time to see the answers. After you’ve guessed at an answer, the solution pops up in less than a half second and it vanishes! As a beginner, I’d like to READ the answer and look at its spelling BEFORE going on to the next word or phrase. Suggestion: Please add a speed indicator and voice control, or maybe a pause-rewind-forward button. Look at Nemo for Hindi (yes, also using this) and you will see the ability to refine and control pace and voice. Some of the phrases are so long, the app moves onto the next word while the last one is still playing. They overlap. Then you have to replay the word/phrase all over again, meanwhile you don’t hear the entire sentence from the previous question. Then that learning moment lost forever. Frustrating! Suggestion: Again, add a controller for time between phrases or words. Maybe on screen or as a preference. See Nemo for Hindi. Pronunciation is questionable. As mentioned earlier, I am taking one-on-one Hindi classes from a Native speaker in India, in conjunction with Drops and other apps. It appears regularly the Roman spelling is incorrect or the pronunciation is way off. I know there’s variations but at least have the pronunciation MATCH the Roman spelling. Confusing! Suggestion: Include an alternative spellings list and matching proper pronunciation. Pronunciation is the most vital part of language! Many illustrations are baffling. I do report them as I come across issues and make suggestions for a better representation. My suggestions go into the ethers and I’m never sure any of them are applied. I’m guessing some images seem awkward because of culture gaps and lack of something translating properly. Not everything can be translated directly. That’s it for now. I’m still learning and have loads of questions. I’ll keep using Drops and bypass words and phrases that are redundant and/or not matching the pronunciation accurately (Accor to Drops spelling and pronunciation). I mostly have to giggle at odd illustrations! Dhanyavaad ji! | Team, I really enjoy morning drop sessions especially when I have a planned country visit. 

One of your older versions allowed users to continue to a different topic when they felt comfortable. The new versions sends me into different subjects quickly. I like to concrete my lessons and move on after. 

1.) Can there be an added portion in settings for users to preference.? | Give it a try I’m at my nah sound weird but it’s from a laugenge | Excelente | Resource to language learning. You will increase your vocabulary vault. Overall fun app and very affordable.🙃 | This app is great for expanding your vocabulary, but it might create a false sense of mastery. I find it complements tutoring well, aiding in vocabulary acquisition while leaving grammar to be addressed separately. Overall, it's a valuable tool. | So far so great! | This app is very helpful for vocab (I’m learning Tagalog) but less so for grammar. Would definitely recommend as a supplement to other resources! | So far so good. The repetition really helps. The pictures create memories with the words. Good app for beginners. | Superb | so useful and I learned sm in only one lessson! Can’t wait to learn more | A simple fun start | Keeps resetting my streak for no reason. Needs more new categories, not just switching them around and giving new names. | Love it | Thanks a lot. So useful app. I got a lot of benefits | It was very exciting | Goog | I know now how to speak and spell in English | love it | This is an easy and quick way to learn vocabulary, and can easily fit into anyone’s schedule who can spare 5 minutes. | Drops is a great App to learn a difficult language like Hebrew. It combines visual, audible, and a clever way to write words you have learned. I enjoy learning with Drops everyday! Waiting to get into grammar and sentences … hopefully soon | I like it because it makes and I love it because I know I’m very British | Big | This app is really good because you can learn Hawaiian and all different kind of languages. It can improvise your pronunciation with out a hard teacher | This app is nice for an eleven year old kid tryna learn a new language | Sometimes it decides to just reset my timer or switch topics without asking if not BOTH, it used to at least ask if I wanted to switch or move on, but now it just pops ups with a purple blob and decides to switch by itself—I have a subscription so it’s not even the free version acting up and I’ve tried contacting customer service yet nothing improves. | I’m loving the app for learning Cantonese! Literally no other app ( like Duolingo) has Cantonese on it. I would love for the app to explain the numbers beside the words when learning though ( assuming they deal with the tones) but I am unsure what the tones are for Cantonese. Otherwise I’m loving it! | Very helpful to visual learners | I have been paying for premium for sometime yet only getting the free level service. I have tried to fix this issue on my own to no avail. 

This is frustrating because it is taking up time that I could be using for language study. I only have a small amount of time to study, which is why I want to use the app to help maximize that time.

I need a refund for the time I paid for that I didn’t get premium service. I also need the issue fixed as I would like to actually use the app properly with the premium service.

title: Amtrak
description:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it.

• Show your eTicket while onboard, including multi-ride and monthly passes - no need to print
• Purchase one-way, roundtrip, multi-ride and monthly tickets with dollars or Amtrak Guest Rewards points
• Check train status
• Find station information
• Edit and manage your account profile
• Save credit cards for quick checkout
• Send your eTicket to Apple Wallet
• And so much more...

With the Amtrak app, you can do it all right from your smart device.
releaseNotes: Thanks for choosing the Amtrak app. We continue to fix bugs and improve the experience. Please check for updates frequently to take advantage of the improvements.
reviews:
The views were out of this world the mountains , I have no words the train staff was  polite attentive and informative  and went the extra mile to make us smile oh and the food was great you seriously should advertise more this was a great trip more people should hear about this | I love how easy to use it is. It’s so easy to make modifications to your trip. | I travelled to Miami on 4/18 from Tampa and from Miami to Tampa on 4/21. The coach from Tampa to Miami was not clean and lot of food waste, soft drink bottles and felt the coach was dirty. It would be advisable that before you let the passengers board clean it properly. 
Also it would be nice that Amtrak assigns seat numbers as you book.
I wouldn’t mind if you charge extra for window seats.
The staff are doing an excellent job and they are very friendly.
Thank you. | Opening Amtrak app stops music. | App is fine; works and easy to navigate.  A challenge to use with an iPad on landscape as it sometimes requires portrait use.   Seems like a simple fix (to a non-technical user at least) | The Amtrak app is generally good  with a few snags on more complicated itineraries. The fares in California are pretty good and I like the flex fare- for just a couple dollars more, your ticket becomes changeable and refundable.Amtrak wants you to arrive safely and comfortably. | Even though I use the app to get easy access to Amtrak. The payments go through and I get no rewards for it. Even though they say every 1$ spent 1point awarded I have so far not received a single point for the entirety of the usage of this app. 

Just absolute trash treatment in terms of rewards. | Train is the best mode of transportation; Amtrack makes you feel luxurious | Generally works well and easy to use. Mostly this was because only so many seats are available to pass holders so I was hesitant to cancel one before knowing I could make the change, no way to do that without talking/chatting with an agent. Need to fix the glitch! | I am using an iPhone and I have noticed that the app crashes pretty frequently. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app multiple times but it still happens several times a week. | Glitchy; impossible to use. | You shouldn’t have to log in and log out to use basic functions- glitchy - prone  to crashing - its 2024 - while you are it put USB ports and beefed up wifi - be tech user friendly = more downloads + more users | Why does the app for train tickets need to take over the phone audio? | Keeps track of my trips. | Tried to make a purchase 3 times. Marks error, but used up gift card | Forget The Plane….Ride on the Train…!!! | Although Amtrak has improved the app over time, this app still has some major problems. 10-ride tickets almost never show the correct number of rides remaining, even days later. Website discounts also don't work in the app, forcing me to buy a ticket on the Amtrak website and then use the app to board a train. Finally, the app constantly freezes after going away from the app and then returning. | In the month since the last time I opened the amtrak app, it has started to stop playback of music on the device when the app is launched. I’ve got an iPhone 14 and the latest everything. | I can't find anywhere in app to sign up for trip alerts.  Like the 3 hr delay today!   App says delayed. Nothing more. I received no notifications.  And app still shows original time for departure.
If someone sitting with me didn't tell me corrent updates I wouldn't even know. | Amtrak is my favorite mode of transportation | Can’t find my round trip tomorrow on this app and there appears no way to add it. | This message pops up every time o try to use the app. Pretty annoying. | Need to have text ability for ticket restorations. title: MTA TrainTime
description:
The TrainTime app provides a one-stop shop for Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North Railroad customers, where riders can buy and use tickets, plan their trips, track their trains, and more.

• Buy tickets with Apple Pay or credit/debit card. Split payment between two cards.
• Plan trips with departure times and transfer details before you travel. You can also search for two origin and/or two destination stations at once.
• Save your frequent trains for easy access
• Share trips with family and friends so they know when to expect you
• Follow your trip with real-time GPS tracking, updated every few seconds
• See the layout of your train and how crowded each car is
• Chat with a customer service representative for either LIRR or Metro-North within the app
releaseNotes: This release includes several bug fixes and improvements, including a clearer list of products when purchasing a ticket for a trip.

I use it all the time. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ | Love this app. Train time table, service updates, ticket purchase, all in one app. Easy to use, no fumbling around for information. Very happy. | If you’re riding the LIRR, make your life easier and just use this. | Very much improved over the previous version | I’m very convenient right off my phone don’t have to stop at a station to purchase a ticket! | Great work | The long beach line has run excellent since the grand central opening, do not change any times as a monthly ticket holder for over 10 years from babylon/long beach ive seen long beach is the best running line. Keep it up ! | Currently Today the schedule is misleading everyone and no good hope for trains. On an important day the LIRR let me down | Yes | It doesn’t bug out, it’s fast and smooth. Download and start using now. | This app is a great improvement to the previous setup

title: Staples - Deals & Shopping
description:
Shop, score app-exclusive deals, earn points with Easy Rewards™ and much more right from your phone. This app is a must-have, and with the latest features you’re able to:

SHOP with fast delivery or in-store pickup.  

SAVE even more with app-exclusive coupons. 

TRACK your orders in real time. 

SCAN products to get details instantly.  

EARN points on purchases — it’s free to join! 

DISCOVER all our new services at your local store, including printing, shipping, recycling, returns, tech help and travel services.

Plus, easy single login for this app and staples.com, making it easier than ever to work, learn and save!
releaseNotes:
Introducing Easy Rewards, our new, points-based loyalty program where it's easy to earn, fast to redeem and personalized by you.
 
Here's how easy it is:
• Earn points every time you shop
• Score 2x or more points on what you buy most 
• Redeem points to save big
• Points never expire for active members 
 
Download the app and join for free to start earning and saving today!
reviews:
this is the new, better app? the one that forces me to go back to the store to open every time? that forces me to log in again every time i open it? that doesn’t have a way to copy a link to a product? looking forward to the NEXT new app in 5 years that isn’t trash. | The new app will not go to full screen on my iPad, in either orientation. It would be nice if it did. The arrows at the bottom make little difference. | This store has everything enjoy the people | Great customer service in every dept | I have deleted and reinstalled Staples three times and have no problems until I try and download “Easy Rewards” only to be told unable to enroll now!
If you want to keep my business when you call it easy “it should be”. | There’s no support for wallet passes. I’m not gonna go to the checkout, login to the app, then hunt down the barcode deep in the settings every time I have to buy something. | The app doesn't work! | That’s enough, because it’s pretty bad | I am loving the new rewards program and the staples.com website has a large selection | Staples is a perfect solution for Printing, office materials including computer and furniture…Satisfied !!! | It shouldn’t be this hard to spend money with you guys. Half the pages on the app don’t load, and it’s super clunky. The old app at least worked. | I like Staples. So, I went to Staples to buy a color and black ink. | Have used the Staples app for years, but my entire purchase history and favorites list have been wiped out. Insane. | All my order history has been deleted. And no information is available about “Easy rewards” even in FAQs - how to use/how much are those worth/how may points are required to buy any specific product? | Going to uninstall—what’s the point of having an app that just spins the Staples logo when you try to open it. | I cannot stand the new version of the app. It’s not as easy to find things as the previous version. I felt like i was on a scavenger hunt trying to find what was so easy in the previous version. | The old app was useful. This is not. Further, it does not handle iPad use. Bloody waste of space and time. Don’t bother with this one. | The latest update is horrific.  It uses a browser interface and is much worse than the app was previously.  Today’s software developers are horrible. | Downloaded today since the old app no longer worked/prompted to download the new app. Definitely nice improvements with the UI and the speed. The only thing I can see after making a couple of purchases (and having to log in multiple times) is the lack of Face ID to log on. Add that to the app and I will gladly come back and give you five stars. Otherwise, well done. | I still have not received my file caddy. It was supposed to arrive about the 19th.
Helen Barber | It would be nice to have an easier way to find the correct cartridges or toner just with the printer number. Also is there anyway to have the cartridge number with the name of the correct printer that you can use it with. | The App does Not Load.   It will not allow to Sign Up or use as a Guest.  It won’t allow to use the SEARCH.  What is going on???   No part of this App works.  This App doesn’t work at all. | The LOOKYOUNEEDSIS review is spot on…this new, unbelievably stupid and useless  app is the pits!!!!!  Even AI wouldn’t be able to figure out all the mindless information on rewards, points etc.  Once I use my $14 owed to me from recycled cartridges (not even on my account after more than a month ago) I won’t be going to Staples any more!  I don’t need this frustrating and aggravating system in my life.   You idiots in Corporate better rethink and fire those responsible or you’ll be out of business! | What a sweet deal. I wait until the big sale comes around. .45 cents for k-cups is amazing! | Wonderful human being ! | Just wanted to thank you for making it easy to order | All previous points are nowhere to be found (who has them?). App shows no bard code or rewards number. Totally useless. | …for the membership card, please. 

App also seems very slow to use. | This app needs a update. I have an account but I can’t log in. The app gives you an option to put your email but it doesn’t recognize that there’s an account. So it automatically tries to create a new account | Why does it seem like this app has become harder to use?  Even a store employee couldn’t help me, so I gave up on using the app during my transaction.  Less is more. | That is formatted for a phone for an iPad. I will admit that it works better on my phone than the last version, but if you are making an app for an iPad make it fit the screen of an iPad. You have the money to pay the developers. Get it right. | App stuck on let’s see if you have an account. Glad I can still use the old app. | I love how easy it is to use this app, whether I’m trying to find a product, browse for sales, or compare prices, I can do this all right here!! | Hate having apps to get rewards & coupons.  Just use my phone number | This new app is terrible. I try to download it like it tells me too and then sends me to a screen to select store and just sits there. Does nothing. Won’t let me go any further. | Downloaded the most recent version of the Staples Rewards app. I use it on my  iPad but it is a horrible looking. It is designed to fit on a phone screen. I tried using the enlarge option but it loses focus and wastes screen space.
I deleted the new App and will continue to use the older version I still have on my iPad, since the new one replace it! | Your app no longer works.. I have no visible rewards, despite being notified of $20 in rewards plus additional 1000 pts from you for problems encountered. Can not find the teacher I support to donate to. There is no where to access the school or teacher.

You need to do much better! Please fix all the glitches. | This app right now is a total mess.  It does not function well on my iPhone and it forced me to change my username and password—because it only allows me to sign in using an email instead of the user name I used before.  When I did that it took away all of my rewards points.  Also, the new point system nexts fixing.  I turned in 5 ink cartridges for recycling and it only gave me credit for 4.  I was way under the monthly recycling limit.
