I guess I’ll be going to Office Depot in the future. | I have long loved Staples, especially the teacher rewards and have been a frequent customer for years. After my experience with the new East Rewards app, I’m not sure I will be buying at Staples any more. The products are great, prices are okay and customer service usually great. But using this app was a nightmare. The clerk and I played hide and seek with finding my card and my rewards for almost half an hours while I allowed others customers to go ahead of me. I had looked at the app earlier, then pulled up info I needed before I went into the store. Inside the store, I honestly believe the info moved from place to hide. When I managed to pull up both my card and my rewards, only one the rewards I had went through. Either Staples intentionally makes it impossible to use promised rewards and uses this app only as advertisement, or the app developers don’t know what they are doing. | Start over folks. After downloading the app, creating my account (even though I already had a Staples rewards account) because nothing transfers over, once I got to the store it did not recognize my sign it. So while 7 people queued behind me, and your very helpful store associate also trying to get me in, I simply gave up. I will likely shop elsewhere going forward. This is an absolutely brilliant customer DISLOYALTY app. Well done folks. | Was forced to download new app. Asked for my login email but does not see my account. I had been logging in with an ID before, but it no longer has that option. It’s making me create an account. I can log in via the browser. So guess I’ll opt out. Don’t want to screw up access to my account. The old app was fine and very convenient. Don’t know why it’s not recognizing my email? | I am stuck in a constant loop of the Let’s Go button from easy rewards to the loading screen. Can’t even use it! | Keeps wanting me to create an account. When I already have one. Heads should roll! | Is it just me, or is the new app “framed” in a wide black margin? I feel like am looking through a key hole. | I got an email saying my rewards number was removed saying it’s tied to a different account! 
Now it’s asking me to create a new account.
Also there is no information on how to get a new paper card-or where to see my old one. This is crazy plus the fact that if I read it correct-staples rewards for ink will change from $2 each to a point system? 
I will probably be going elsewhere as I used to LOVE my Staples membership..now.,Im not too sure | The new update to the app changed the entire UI and it is a confusing mess. I say this even taking account that changes require a bit of adjustment.  It is just not well thought out and messy. | I’m a supply manager for a small medical company and have been using Staples for supplies for 20 plus years.  This latest app is a nightmare.  Was hard to get signed into.  The shopping experience is glitchy and unpleasant.  I do not see any improvement on the customer end.  It shouldn’t be this hard to shop an app. | Love my local store 
Great service | On Feb 13 2024 I upgraded to new version. First it is an apparent smartphone app that isn’t formatted for the gen 6 9 inch iPad I have. It is just a vertical narrow ribbon with one inch black filler bars on each side. Why did you change from the last version? It filled the screen with multiple choices and worked fine. This one is next to useless. Fire someone. There are a lotta people outa work that could do better…

Feb 18, 2024 update - I needed 24 page presentation folders I used before but couldn’t pull them up in the search feature on the new website. So I used the exact same search words (without “Staples”) in Google and the top pick of dozens was what I wanted on the new website. But there is more..

I checked thro and ordered two and proceeded to check out. The website had an old expired credit card it was trying to use (?). I selected PayPal but it stuc’ on the endless circle on security check. There is no feature to remove or delete the basket (?) so tried for my Mastercard entered 18 months ago. They don’t have it. So I printed out what I want and hope to go in person to the local store (unlike the old app it didn’t show whether/they have stock).

A competitor could not have done a better job of sabotage. Yes fire IT, but upper management. must have blessed this. Maybe there are bigger problems there. I note that Walmart has many supplies I get from Staples but most are not stocked locally..

title: Recreation.gov
description:
Get out there, experience America, and bring home a story!

The Recreation.gov mobile app is your on-the-go solution for reserving thousands of incredible camping destinations. Return to your favorite spot or discover a new one by searching for the campsite that’s right for you.

The Recreation.gov app helps you find and book campsites and experiences, review location details for your trip, and quickly access information on existing reservations from almost anywhere.

Features:
•	Search unique campgrounds and individual campsites across the country
•	Discover personalized recommendations based on your location
•	Filter search results by what’s important to you and your trip (price, amenities, site type, and more)
•	View photos and maps of campgrounds and campsites
•	Seamlessly switch between interactive maps and search results
•	Check real-time availability and location information for individual sites
•	Pay for select campsites and activities on the spot by scanning a QR code
•	Learn about passes and tickets that get you into your favorite spots
•	Review important details on activities, attractions, and experiences for your next trip
•	Conveniently access your account information and all your reservations
•	Find tickets, tours, and permits for amazing activities
•	Access your digital tickets for a smooth check-in

Whether you’re booking a weekend getaway or planning your next cross-country road trip, federal recreation activities and outdoor adventures start with Recreation.gov.
releaseNotes: Bug spray applied! Stability improvements and bug fixes to keep the app running smoothly.
reviews:
So happy with all of the parks we get to go to for a discount !!! Love Indian point park ❤️ | This is a wonderful website to book camping sites and national parks. It’s very helpful. | This app makes getting a reservation so easy, you can do it on the road going to any campground!!!  The campgrounds here are in terrible shape not been mowed or weed eated in a while. Had to bring our mower out. | I’ve only used this once so far. My main concern is that it doesn’t take my trailer length into consideration when it searches for available campsites. It keeps showing me campgrounds that are unable to accommodate my trailer. As a result, I wind up checking numerous sites before I discover that the campground is unable to accommodate my trailer.
Other than that issue, I really like this app!👍😁 | The site is good for reserving but for example you cannot call jackrabbit Campground and talk to a human to find out if a site can accommodate two tents or just one or just a camper or whatever it might be. There is no human that you can reach at the campground. You just get some call centre and they don’t know anything except the little bitty square picture there. Kind of frustrating when you were trying to figure out if you can put two tents on the site or just one how steep is it etc. | Easy to navigate and reserve camping spaces. | We love it | Just like that, I’m booked for a weekend trip in two weeks. Easy filtering. Good information. Yay for this app. | Works well | Easy to use and great information on all the sights available. | At a National Monument this worked great, Apple Pay worked  and there were no hidden service fees. My first use felt hopeful. 
Sadly, my next attempt at a BLM site it added a fee (sprung on me at the last step) and didn’t offer Apple Pay. To make matters worse, the CC input interface was non standard and poorly programmed. Also, it required me to return to the kiosk just to scan a QR code instead of working from the campsite. 

This app is a nice start, but has room for improvement. | The app is easy to use and fairly intuitive.  The map feature is great for selecting a site and for finding your site when you arrive.  
   There are 2 things you should be aware of when making your reservation. First, pinch zoom on the map to see all of the campsites. Second, some campgrounds lock the gates at specific times, so make sure you arrive in time to get in. The app does not make his obvious. 
    We have almost always found the campsite information to be correct.  It’s filter functionality makes it easy to only see which sites suit your needs.  Inputting discounts is easy and straightforward.  
   This is one of our favorite camping apps and definitely our favorite for making reservations. | This app is super easy to use and to find campgrounds. The calendar feature makes it easy to find spots for the dates you need, and to book online if you are ready. Prefer the app over the website, but have used the website on occasion. | We have been camping at Smokemont for 21 years . What a treasure ! The location , the people that run and maintain the campground are first class ! And don’t forget the campers that show up …. Quiet couples, families big and small all enjoying the peace and beauty of Smokemont . It’s a great place to kick back and enjoy life . Thank you COE! | Please bring back the ability to filter out partially available sites. Was one of the best search functions and now it’s gone. | Do not like the 14 day and not camping for 30 days. Every time I go camping there are open camp sites that no one is camping in. I don’t mind 14 days and leaving for a day or moving to an empty camp site. If someone has the time and money to camp I think they should be able to camp in I site that is not rented. | Great app and really simple to use. | Love the app | Booking at peak time is really hard. Otherwise great app | Beautiful camping area looking forward to many more camping trips! Great place. | Would like to be able to save senior park pass number in profile | The restrooms were not clean!
We complained but to no avail. Wiped bugs off about all. Outside smelled clean but actual bathroom was Not clean
We camp here yearly but this was dirty!
We canceled our stay for May 2024 | Perhaps there is just not any campsites available when I look. When I try to reserve a site, it seems that you have to open each campsite to check availability. This last time it was different. It searched by dates. Glad I got a spot. App is very convenient. | The app is easy to use it’s just not updated quick enough to show sites available or not | Rec.gov has provided us the opportunity to book sites in wonderful parks in the middle of beautiful national forests and remote areas. Campgrounds are well maintained and very natural.  And the ap is very easy to use. | I book a lot of camping trips and Recreation.gov is by far the best app out there! It’s very user friendly, the campground maps are great, the descriptions of the sites tell me exactly what I need to know and the pictures of the sites is what we all want to see. | Love The App | A pretty darn good app that is easy to use. thanks! | Literally drove 2 hours to the geological region to enter ‘a daily lottery’ and the app either did not load or claimed my location was not in the region yet I was right in the middle of the circle. What a joke | Have used it a couple of times, works OK | Asking for a phone number? Selling my info? App doesn’t show map of BLM, geared towards third part booking. This app is for city soy Karens, not for serious campers. | Great place to camp | Great to have a fully functional, on the go platform for park/site information and reservations. | The way the app works it is hard to tell which days a site is available if it is only partially available. You have to clear the dates each time to which days are available. Then you have to go to the next site and do the same thing until you can string enough days together for your trip. | After three years of camping been wanting this sight 44 . A hard one to get. Well so excited to actually find it open. And so we get there and 😢 power box was not working 30 amp and 50 amp was not working. Had to run on 1/10 all weekend .  ☹️☹️☹️No at the gate , did get in touch wil someone finally and the say it going to Monday before they can get to it 😖 not happy with the price i paid for this sighting. | Fun and fast we love everything about this website | There is no way to choose an area with a horse camp filter check and see what is available. You have to pick the campground first, followed by the date and at the apply the horse camp filter to find out it’s not available. | Is always easy and fast to look and find a camping spot using the app. | I wish it was easier to see availability for sites | Buy, go and enjoy. | Makes finding adventure so easy when there's an itch to scratch! Everything I'd need in one place, plus the app itself works great | When booking fiery furnace passes it slows to a crawl.  The website lost my profile within the first week said it was corrupted and did not exist.  I had to recreate another account, so frustrating. | Loved my experience and ease | This app is user friendly. Love it. | This app does what it should very well | We enjoy this app so much.  All campgrounds have been safe and clean. | There needs to be a feature where you can put your dates in and see available campsites instead of having to go back every time that is super annoying | I like how easy it is to use and find the open campsites that I’m looking for | I was a park ranger for 26 years doing many reservations. The process you have implemented is quite easy and efficient.
Thank you for the effort for people on line to reserve, especially with site pictures and explanations. Good job !! | I’ve been using the app for years now and it keeps getting better !!

title: Word of the Day・English Vocab
description:
Stop being addlepated with unknown words! Don’t know what ‘addlepated’ means?

Get a step ahead. While others are looking up definitions, you already know the answer. 
 
Embark on an exciting journey into the lexical world with Word of the Day. 
 
To get started, take a quick vocab test to see how many words you already know. Now you are all set to begin learning new academic, obscure, and challenging vocabulary today, and every day.
 
Whether you are a native English speaker preparing for the SAT or GRE test, an ESL learner studying for IELTS or TOEFL or someone who loves to geek out on words, Word of the Day has got you covered. 
 
Designed by a team of corpus linguists, the app’s state-of-the-art word recommendation system will suggest words tailored to your vocabulary level, interests and learning needs. 
 
The Word of the Day dictionary content (pronunciation, definitions and example sentences) is powered by Oxford Languages.
 
An in-house editorial team is here to delight you with cool new word features every single day. That’s 365 beautifully narrated and illustrated word stories a year. 

Too busy? Pick the best time to receive daily word notifications. Set up the Word of the Day widget to learn and revise recently discovered words. 
 
Love the word? Store it in your own word collection.
 
Turn word learning into a powerful self-improvement habit with Word of the Day. 
 
Become first to start a conversation. Express yourself clearly. Wow your friends, family, teachers and colleagues. Ace your tests. Improve your writing and public speaking skills. Read any scientific article in one breath. Flex your brain and keep your mind focused. Express your thoughts clearly. Sound sexier.
 
Educate yourself in a small, yet profound way with Word of the Day. 

Please note that Word of the Day is a subscription-based app. Some of the app’s features are available to Premium subscribers only.

Privacy Policy: https://console.wordwordapp.com/docs/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://console.wordwordapp.com/docs/terms.html
releaseNotes:
Welcome to a whole new era of Word of the Day, where your daily dose of vocabulary enrichment is now more dynamic and personalized than ever!

Key Updates in This Version:

- Revolutionized Daily Learning Experience: Say goodbye to just one word a day. Now, get up to five specially tailored cards daily, each designed to cater to your unique learning style and preferences. Dive into a diverse range of words and expand your vocabulary more effectively.

- Introducing the All-New Discover Tab: Discover a world of words like never before! We've streamlined our app, consolidating multiple functionalities into one seamless Discover tab. Here, you'll find curated collections and innovative ways to explore and learn new words.

- Tailored for You: Each card in your daily deck is specifically chosen to match your learning curve, ensuring that every word adds value to your vocabulary journey.

- Simplified Yet Richer Experience: With our reimagined layout and UI design, navigating through the app is now more intuitive. Despite the simplified interface, you'll find
reviews:
I got charged for a subscription that I cancelled beforehand. Brought it to Apple, Apple denied it. Was told that they would help me and refund me my money if nothing else worked.
Have not heard a word since. | $49.99 for word of the day? Does not include the word categories, $9.99 per category is required !!

What a joke !!! | Like dang all I want to do is see a random big word everyday WHY R U ASKING ME 15 MILLION QUESTIONS CHILL | Come on people there us a subscription for everything. $50 bucks a year? Really?  Nothing the developers can say justifies this. | I cancelled my 20 secs trial | Cool idea. However, there should be games implemented to assist with remembering the words. | Love being challenged and educated everyday. | I play this stimulating game every day! Highly Recommend!!! | I don’t like that they use a business tactic that consists of making you answer a bunch of questions and then telling you at the very end that the product/service has to be payed for. | I hate that the introductory questionnaire asks who your role model is and only has a bias list of people to choose from. You can not skip the question. I deleted the app. There is only one person of color and all the choices are wealthy people who invest in things that are harmful to the environment and show little regard for the greater good. They have nothing to do with words or reading. | I havent used this app in a few years. But opened it up to look at some saved words to find all my data gone and now being force to pay to use. This is poor. | Was $50 had access to all types of word packs, 4 words a day. Now it’s one word and you have to pay for everything. 1/10 would not do again. I have asked for a refund for the remaining months since I’m only 3 months in and what I agreed to pay for and what I have access to now are drastically different. Will update if they refund. | It’s a great app but it’s costly. I can’t afford it. | Every time this app tried to update itself it fails miserably and it makes everyone else’s lives more difficult. This most recent update has made it so that every single time I go into the app, I have “missed” the time for the word of the day and I am forced to watch an AD. I’m sick and tired of watch a 1 minute long ad every time I want to quickly learn a new word and it genuinely makes me not want to hold onto my streak. Thanks for letting yet another app get ruined for profit. | Worth the money and time. | The daily word is properly written and used in a way that assist you in understanding the fullness of the word, with graphics and pronunciation. | I want a refund as you charged me $149 and then still keep asking me to pay for premium access. What a joke! | I don’t want word of the day, I want to see it listed like you’re promoting it. | The developers of this app, in their never-ceasing quest for new features and profits, have just released a brand new version.

It is so new that all the previous contents and saved words were deleted, without any trace, pre-warning, or remedy. Even preferences are reset probably because the new and the old are essentially two apps.

This is not the first time this app has undergone such maddening metamorphosis. Each reset is drastic and not necessarily better. 

I cannot trust this app to remain stable to be of greater use. The disregard for existing users in order to chase new ones should have adverse consequences. | feel like I wasted my money on the premium subscription for this app. I loved it so much that I ended up buying a Lifetime Premium Subscription. 

However, after the recent updates, the app has become buggy and I can only view the words in three albums in the "Stop Saying Very" game. All the other albums are now behind a paywall. I am extremely disappointed and I would give this app a zero-star rating if I could. I don't see any premium features. | I have enjoyed this app daily for years, however, with the recent updates, I’m bombarded with three mandatory ads before viewing a word. I don’t want multiple words—one word per day is fine. I’m going to delete it as I’m not going to pay for a “free” app, and the intimidation to pay is outrageous. I also am not interested in this newer game format. I just wanted one word definition per day. | When ads stop like before, the rating will be 5 star for sure! | I love(D) this app and the words that are offered daily are really good.  I’m not sure if it was a recent update or what- but now in order to view the word of the day I have to watch an ad or update to premium to see.   I don’t review often-but I really do enjoy this app and am just confused why the sudden paywall. The one word has always been free without having to watch a 2 minute ad. 🧐 | I was going to download the game. In fact, I did download the game, but while going through the steps, I had to select an actor which I thought was a role model and many of their selections should have been in jail so I decided to uninstall. | I had a 310 day streak going + the words I liked. After this terrible upgrade 4 days ago it started me over to 0 & cleared my likes. Extremely disappointed & ashamed of the ppl running the app. I was considering buying in but not anymore. 
Word of the Day went from an A+ to a C-. | I liked it a lot and the way it helped me to understand the concept of words | Even with premium my lock screen widget disappears if I don’t open the app every other day. The widget is why I purchased the premium version, quite frustrating to be honest. I believe it is intentional as a way to get users to open the app. Don’t waste your money if you are hoping to get a widget that functions without opening the app. | Since you can only test out the app after inputting a bunch of data and signing up for a trial that is automatically billed at $49.99 annually, here are some nuggets to help determine whether it’s worth trialing.  

The word of the day words and definitions are “meh” at best.  The intake requires you to tell the app whether you know certain words but the third day, my word of the day was one of the words I had indicated I already knew.  The definitions and sample sentences are, IMO, overly simplistic and often not in alignment - the grammatical structure of the definition often suggests a different usage than the sample sentence, leaving me wondering how to properly use the word, and turning to the googz for further context. 

Each word of the day is presented as a card that you “scratch off” by dragging your finger across back and forth, like a video game for a 4 year old.  I normally appreciate some gamification, but this is embarrassing and tedious.  The scratch off reveals a picture intended to represent the word.  I’m a visual learner, so appreciate this, though it’s hard to get past the mediocre art at times.  In addition to the definition and sample sentence, you can click to hear the word pronounced.

The app is only available as an annual subscription, for $49.99.  Oddly, when I went to cancel it, I clicked “see all plans” and noted that the same annual subscription is available for $39.99 and $59.99.  You can also buy themed “albums” for $9.99 each that offer 14-15 words.

The AI underpinnings are apparent in every corner of this app - the intake, the definitions, the art, the sample sentences - which may be fine if you’re looking for a crude vocab builder and have a deep nostalgia for paint with water coloring books, but it lacks the nuance and context that language demands and falls way short of its price tag. | They are not sending me words. | Just trying to improve myself, why does it have to cost money. | I initially found this app very helpful. One feature I particularly liked was the ability to search for words and add them to my collection, allowing me to check them later. However, after updates, the option to save these words into my collection was removed. | If I could give it 0 stars I would. I was very much looking forward to getting the word of the day app and spent such a long time filling out my personality traits and my “word interests” just to be hit with a $50 price tag what is America coming to. I’d be better off just flipping through a dictionary than dealing with this sorry excuse of an app. WHAT A WASTE OF TIME!!!!!! | Why is there not a simple way to add words to a collection? For example, I don't see an option to add a word to my collection when i search words nor is there an option from the word of the day?? | It’s good to be reminded to the Larmon new bar each day on top of everything we already have to remember, but it’s very useful. | I wish you could set it so you can chose to remove adjectives and only learn nouns and verbs | Could there be more attention placed on the usability of this app?? 
Where can I see all of my liked words all in one place. Too many locked features as a so called “premium” user. | App was a little glitchy at first but developer has corrected the issue. The words they send are always interesting and I feel my vocabulary is broadening. | After writing down my review a month ago with my disappointments regarding the update, the new update has fixed the problems amazingly while still incorporating some of the new features and making the app easier to navigate. Very good app and I highly recommend as well as a round of applause to the develops for listening to their users feedback. | Downloaded the app to just further expand my knowledge as an AM habit to get the brain going. Said it was free and oh it is for all of 7 days and then it’s $50 a year… all these ads claim things are free but they really aren’t. Very disappointing. | Definitely one of the better vocabulary apps. But there are some weaknesses to. The definition of the word is too limiting. It will be great if you have more than one example of use. Or links to other sources other than google. Is there a way to stop the ads? Pay for app? Would love to filter vocabulary based off its form. Meaning like to see verbs adverbs as it is etc. not that interested in scientific nouns. | There’s no way to save searched words to your collection. Other vocab apps have this feature. For a subscription app - I would think it would be included. 

Also - even after paying for a yearly sub, we still have to pay for the word packs? | I had methodically organized categories for the new words that I came across each day. What I was hoping you'd do was create perhaps a quiz option for the flashcards you save but no what do you do- make us pay $9.99 for albums of words that have no pertinence to me. And another thing.. I have premium, let me experience ALL of the features.. thats literally why I pay for the premium version! What the heck guys? | It should be a new word weekly or biweekly, not daily. This gives a person time to memorize and retain the word. | Too difficult. Nothing is useful | There are been several instances where the app pairs the term with an incorrect definition. | This new version is not the app I originally subscribed to! I can no longer save words I looked up into my collections. How frustrating!! I’m so upset. Please fix this issue! | This app has redesigned itself a couple of times, however on the most recent redesign, it screwed up keeping track of my 241 day streak. Whenever I pushed the “today” button it took me back to last year so I couldn’t log the correct day. Kind of ruined all of the fun of the streak. Not sure I will renew my subscription at this point. | The newest update took away some of the best features and demands I pay to get them back. Before, I could look up words that describe emotions, sounds, sight, and all of that for free. 

Oh, and it delayed my history. 

How is this an “update”? | Every time this app updates, it changes its entire interface and you lose all of the words you saved so at this point I think I’m done using this app because there’s way too much ambiguity and there really isn’t any set structure for the app so every time you come to the app it’s different! | Easy even after taking the test. You only get like 5 words in at 10 hour period. Also the words repeat themselves semi-regularly. Why pay for that?

Update: I ended up getting premium at a steep discount and then they changed the app suddenly so I only get to see one word a day. The update also erased all the words I had saved to review. No help from customer service. Will find another app to use instead.

title: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts
description:
Book stays at 8,900+ hotels in 80+ countries across 22 trusted brands—all at your fingertips.
 
With the Wyndham Hotels & Resorts app, you’ll have access to streamlined booking, convenient in-stay features, and Wyndham Rewards member extras like managing your account, tracking your points, and discovering exclusive offers.
 
FASTER BOOKING
· Need a room for tonight? Find a great hotel in just a few taps with Lightning Book™.
· Plan the perfect itinerary and book multiple hotels at once with our Road Trip Planner.
· Sign in to save your favorite hotels and booking preferences, so planning your next trip is easier than ever.
· With both map and list views, you can quickly compare hotels to pick the perfect one for your stay.
 
CONVENIENT IN-STAY FEATURES
· Check in and out from your phone at select hotels.
· Text the front desk any questions or special requests at select hotels, and get local activity recommendations for your stay.
· Easily order food delivery and takeout from local restaurants, available at select hotels.
 
EXCITING EXTRAS
· Earn “stamps” for stays, in-app achievements, and much more. See if you can collect them all!
 
WYNDHAM REWARDS
· Track your Wyndham Rewards points, stays, and activity—plus, enjoy exclusive member offers and discounts.
· For every qualified stay, earn 10 points per dollar or 1,000 points—whichever is more.
· Choose how you want to redeem your points with three simple free and discounted night tiers at thousands of hotels, vacation club resorts, and vacation rentals around the world.
 
Not a Wyndham Rewards member? Join for free using the app to earn and redeem points at our participating hotel brands:
 
AmericInn®, Baymont®, Days Inn®, Dazzler Hotels®, Dolce Hotels and Resorts®, Esplendor Hotels®, Hawthorn Suites®, Howard Johnson®, La Quinta®, Microtel®, Ramada®, Registry Collection Hotels, Super 8®, Trademark Collection®, Travelodge®, TRYP®, Wingate®, Wyndham, Wyndham Alltra, Wyndham Garden®, Wyndham Grand®, and select Caesars Entertainment properties.
releaseNotes: In this release, we have added some minor enhancements and bug fixes. We hope you enjoy using the Wyndham Hotels & Resorts app - and look forward to welcoming you!

The app is quick even on 4g data. | Reservations can be made fast! | This is my favorite La Quinta!! The location is very convenient for all my needs. I stay here every time I’m in Madera (every couple months). The staff is always accommodating for me (handicapped with recent surgery) and very helpful!! I highly recommend this La Quinta!! | Easy to use and well organized. | Only complaint is different rules for different folks and they make it a bit tough sometimes but I love going here for the most part | Have used app several times with to problems but have had issues once. Was unable to book with points and the app indicated no rooms available so exited the app and tried again using payment option. Payment option showed rooms were available, when we arrived at the hotel we had two rooms booked and were getting calls from another hotel that I ha only viewed as another option. Also have found that there have travel apps that have indicated a lower price than what is shown in this app. | I normally use a 3rd party vendor.  I’m gonna see if using this app is more beneficial. | We always enjoy our stay every time! | Love reserving easy with this app !! Makes travel easier and no worries about getting a room | My first go to when looking for a hotel. | Could have more rewards for long term stayers | I'm so impressed with this app. Great functionality. Updates rewards points quickly after cancelling. Makes it easy to rebook right away. Easiest vacation planning I've ever done. Thanks, Obama. 😉 | Easy to use and great pricing for members | User friendly. | The Wyndham Barclay credit card is great for earning points and getting free or discounted hotel nights. However, the hotels have been everything from pretty nice (Bend OR La Quinta), no frills but clean (Port Angeles WA), pretty crummy (Campbell River BC) to barely habitable filthy (Exton and West Chester PA).

Traveler beware. Wyndham has no health standards. Apparently any hotel can sign up for the “discount program.” | App was simple to use. --it's clear how to go about a Wyndham Properties location search.

--easy and accurate information provided by the app leads to a great experience at check-in and more time doing what i want to do>>experience a another great Wyndham Hotel that provides everything i need when away from home.. | App works goood. | Simple and easy to use this app. 10/10 | By far Wyndham Rewards is the best hotel rewards systems out there. All Wyndham properties are excellent, and the points rack up sooo fast!

title: Plane Finder ⁃ Flight Tracker
description:
Uncover the mysteries of live air traffic in one beautiful and easy to use app. Is it a bird? Is it a plane?! If it’s the latter, Plane Finder can tell you exactly which plane it is.
 
Plane Finder is incredibly easy to use and utterly fascinating. It enables you to see live air traffic patterns with real-time tracking of almost any plane you’re interested in, and in addition to the aircraft’s location you can see its current altitude, its speed and where it’s heading.
 
Get live information on flights - super handy when travelling. You can even be alerted when a particular flight is heading your way, which is useful if you’re trying to catch sight of rare birds such as the Airbus A380.
 
Switch to incredible 3D flight tracking anytime from any aircraft, airport or location on the map seamlessly to view air traffic as never before.
 
There’s a superb augmented-reality option that enables you to point your camera at the sky and see details of the aircraft that’s overhead, and with full support for iOS’s Dark Mode it’s just as handy for night flights as it is for daytime ones.
 
It’s all great fun, but it’s also very practical: in addition to flight tracking there’s extensive airport information, which supplements live arrival and departures with live weather reports for hundreds of airports.
 
Enjoy Plane Finder’s leading edge design as featured in Apple’s “The Power of Dark Mode” and “See it in Dark Mode” Collections 2019.
 
Apple’s App of The Day – Jan 2020 and Top ranking since 2009. Plane Finder is also featured in Gizmodo, CNN, GMA, BBC, Sunday Times, Mail on Sunday, CNET, Wired, GQ Magazine to name a few.
 
Trusted by friends and families of travellers, enthusiasts, pilots, cabin crew and aviation professionals alike. Choose Plane Finder for:
 
•	Live Global Flight Tracking
Quickly find and track flights live on a map and explore live status information
 
•	Switch to 3D Tracking Anytime
Flip instantly to 3D from any aircraft, airport or location on the map

•	Live AR Mode
Point your camera at a plane in the sky to instantly reveal live flight and aircraft information
 
•	Live Airport Information
View real time airport arrival and departure boards plus terminal, gate, baggage and weather information
 
•	Comprehensive Technical Data
Dig deeper into technical aircraft and flight data
 
•	Unlimited Custom Alerts
Never miss a flight, create as many custom notifications as you like and stay informed
 
•	Unlimited Global Playback
Replay interesting flights and watch fascinating air traffic patterns back to 2011
 
•	Unlimited Filters
Simplify your view with powerful filters
 
•	Custom Aircraft Labels
Choose the position, color and content of aircraft labels inc. logo with text label
 
•	Leading Edge Dark Mode
Adopt dark mode, a bold interface perfect for low light
 
•	Curated Map Styles
Switch seamlessly between simple, detailed, hybrid and satellite maps
 
Help and Support
Plane Finder is regularly updated with innovative new features.  Please email support@planefinder.net with any questions or queries, we are happy to help.
 
How does Plane Finder work?
Plane Finder receives real time ADS-B and MLAT signals sent by aircraft to transmit their positional data to land based receivers. This technology is faster than traditional radar and is used for air traffic control and navigation. You can check our worldwide flight tracking coverage for free at www.planefinder.net
 
Disclaimer
The use of the information presented using Plane Finder is strictly limited to pursuing enthusiast activities (i.e. for entertainment purposes), which specifically exclude any activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this application be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement.
 
Privacy Policy: https://planefinder.net/legal/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://planefinder.net/legal/terms-and-conditions
releaseNotes:
Plane Finder and Night Sky - We’ve teamed up with Night Sky to offer our Plane Finder Premium subscribers 50% off an annual Night Sky+ subscription. Tap the link in Settings > Premium to sign up at this special reduced rate!

January 2024 - Introducing MyFlights: Keep track of the flights you care about, from before departure until touchdown. 
Live Activities & Dynamic Island - Active MyFlights will automatically appear on your devices Lock Screen. 
Get Updates on delays, gate info and other crucial moments throughout your journey.

Thank you for supporting Plane Finder, we regularly release updates to bring you the best live tracking experience and are already working on the next set of features!

This builds upon our recent updates that include:

December 2023 - Shortcut Support: We've added multiple Plane Finder Shortcuts to give you more ways to explore the skies. 
"Siri, What's Overhead in Plane Finder?" New Siri Shortcuts let you control Plane Finder with your voice. 
Widgets: Add the Plane Finder widget to your Homescreen to quickly access Search and more! 

November 2023 - Flight Playback Improvements: Replay any flight with greater control using our updated interface. Swipe up on any flight playback to reveal a new speed, altitude and squawk graph. Increase the quality of your flight playback videos with new full screen mode. 

September 2023 - Airport Disruptions Update: New Explore tab - Discover which airports are currently experiencing the most delays and cancellations. 

July 2023 - The Markers Update: Will you stick with classic yellow or jump to new white aircraft markers? 

March 2023 - The Filters Update: Mix and match new filter types like military, aircraft families, squawk ranges and registration. Choose traditional filtering or NEW highlight option

February 2023 - The Enhanced Playback Update: Rewinding the skies just got better with Airline logos, 3D liveries and Focus Mode compatibility

July 2022 - The AR Update: Enjoy lightning fast load times, improved accuracy and a modern gesture based interface. 

June 2022 - New Aircraft Markers: 20+ new markers including F16, Spitfire and C17. 

March 2022 - The Map Focus Update: 6 map toggles including Military and Cargo to quickly highlight aircraft you're interested in

February 2022 - The Explore Update: Trending Flights, Recent Squawks and Notable Events at a glance

November 2021 - The Airport Update: Airport Performance data, Airport Weather trends and Daylight Times

August 2021 - The 3D Aircraft Liveries Update: Detailed aircraft liveries: Over 100 popular aircraft liveries recreated to enhance your 3D experience

June 2021 - The Search Update: Find More, with Less: Get more relevant results, simply type into the search box and we’ll find them

April 2021 – The Calendar Timeline Update: Easily navigate our extensive collection of historic and future flights

March 2021 - The Single Flight Playback Update: Play, Pause and Rewind any past flight including 3D

December 2020 - The Quick Filters & iPad UI Update: Simplify your view with Ground Traffic, Marker Type and Airport filters

October 2020 - The Aircraft Labels Update: Choose the position, colour and content of aircraft labels with powerful new label settings

August 2020 - The 3D Update: Flip instantly to 3D from any aircraft, airport or location on the map

May 2020 - The Watch Update: Add the power of Plane Finder to your wrist with our free Apple Watch App

April 2020 - The Weather Update: Experience the impact of weather on air traffic and airports worldwide
reviews:
Love this app, i work near ohare airport, and i have put it to the test so many times and its 100 percent accurate | I love using the Plane Finder app. It shows me everything from state police, to c-130s from the local airport, to FedEx to commercial airlines! | Potentially this was a great app. I purchased it and have encouraged others too also.
I found it very useful and even contacted Plane Finder how it was being utilized.
Plane Finder quit supporting my app and came out with a new app that appears to be the same thing. They wanted me to purchase their app (AGAIN?). 
What happens if I purchase their updated app? Are they going to discontinue my new app to squeeze more money out of me?
Never again… | I use it every day and have found out that I can depend on it ! | This used to be my favorite app of all time. Now, you click on 2 planes and it pops an ad. | This is so much fun a when I see a plane I can pull up the app and it will tell me what it is. | I love tracking planes on my plane finder app | My primary usage of this app was on Apple TV. And suddenly it stopped working. | The old bait and switch scam. Oh it works sometimes, then for to reason it will want you to agree to a free 7 day premium trial period. If you don’t agree to sign up for the free trial period it won’t even let you track your next flight. A total rip off and scam. | I’ve had a great experience! I own the premium and it works perfectly! There are a few problems though. The 3D mode is very laggy when planes are on the ground. Also, some plane models look odd. Like the 777, looks like a a330 to me. I also logged in with Apple, and I can’t figure out how to open my account on my phone. Other wise, thank you! Great app. | Always Works great. Recommend | Great app overall, but I think there should be more things to do without having to by the pack | So, I’ve downloaded a lot of apps. But this has got to be the best app I’ve ever downloaded. I’m not kidding. It’s got everything you need to track a plane. And not only that, it goes above and beyond. As an aviation YouTuber, I want to video tape rare planes flying in the sky. I wouldn’t have gotten the views I have without Plane Finder. I’ve tried other apps, like Flightradar24, but Plane Finder is still the best, hands down. It has AR, so you can quickly see what and where planes are in the sky. It shows every single plane currently flying. And much, much more! Download Plane Finder now! Trust me, you’ll regret if you don’t! | Great app | Bought the app for AppleTV a long time ago but developer has stopped supporting it now. Shame as it was a good way of having the flights showing on a bigger screen. | Fun app to play with on a clear night. Seeing who’s coming from where? To seeing the planes leaving and  where they are bound for. | Update 2/28/2024

The developer responded that my review didn’t sound right and would please send examples of erroneous flight data in the app. I had already deleted the free app and moved on. When I went to download it again to help the developer, it wanted me to pay after a free trial of seven days. Nice try. I’m not paying for an app that doesn’t work. If the free sample tastes bad, I’m not buying the actual ice cream. 

It has begun to freeze and data drops out. Many times if you touch a flight it will give flight info which is obviously for an entirely different part of the world. The ads to upgrade to the paid version are ironic: why would I pay for an app which doesn’t work right? Alternatively, are they holding me hostage, promising an app that DOES work if I give them my credit card data? | Precise , and informative! Always there! | Features like ad flight by boarding qr code , some information about baggage allowance more info about the airlines .. | This application is amazing and all but is it me or is it your exact location doesn’t show anymore ?? | Amazing i got to my flight on time | I’ve had this app for over a year and it’s really amazing how accurate and easy it it to use.

It’s fun to see what planes are overhead and where they are going. Even on a cloudy day you can use the camera mode and see where the plane is in the sky. 

Would recommend this app to anyone because it can kill some time and keep you occupied for awhile. | Super praticable! Keep up the good job! | WOW | Always fun to see where the planes flying over you are going and to find the longest flight | Had app after I paid for it and could see all the information on flight. Then app was taken away and I now have the free version and can’t see information. Don’t know how they can take a purchased app away with out refunding my money. | I use this to track my 2 pilot kids. This is never correct and difficult. I thought the difficult stuff would go away when I paid for the app. It’s still useless. No cross talk between devices.  Use FlightAware’s free. It’s better than this paid version. | App is great now one of my favorite apps to use, just I hate the fact you gotta get premium just to get 3D, I wish the developers would make it so you can have 3D without getting premium, please developers make it happen | Total rip off developer of this app. They sell you the app, and then decide they’ll suspend your use so they can charge you more every month! | The program is great for showing type and company logo on aircraft, but you have to manually locate where you want to watch.
There is no location dot showing where you are or airport location.   You must zoom in and try to locate where you are and then check aircraft in your area. | Sometimes it’s difficult to get the data to show when I click on the airplane symbols | I have the free version, and overall I really like it. The augmented reality view is definitely a big plus. The layout of the map view is really good too. I like the alerts for planes squawking 7700; it’d be nice if you could include 7500 & 7600 too (or maybe even let users specify what codes they want alerts for). The only other thing I would note is the info screen that comes up after you click on a plane has a lot more details locked for the premium version than what FlightAware gives for free. I understand there’s a limit to what can be given for free, but with a little more this app could definitely blow the others out of the water. | Awesome app that I prefer over flight radar 24. Minus one thing. If you click the scheduled flights for any aircraft, unlike FR24, it’s rarely correct. Usually showing random flights that aren’t even connecting to each other for future flights of an A/C. Wish this was fixed to be more accurate like FR24 | I have no complaints about this app. Love the options and it’s very accurate. I use this when plane spotting outside the airport or just watching planes fly over my house. | Set your parameters correctly and it will give you plenty of fun tracking what’s going on overhead. The real time accuracy is amazing. Worth every dime. | Very good | Sitting in the back porch underneath flight paths, it’s a perfect app to identify aircraft. Sitting in the aisle seat, on an aircraft, it’s the perfect app to see how much farther to taxi to the gate. | Why is the ADS-B feed lagging by 1 or 2 minutes in some cases? | I got this at a friends recommendation and it does have a cool feature to be able to point up at the sky and identify a flight. I find it a bit frustrating because many times I’ll try to find it known flight and it doesn’t show it listed on this app whereas on the other major app, it sure is listed. It’s free, it’s useful, it’s fun, but it’s not as accurate as the other one. | Best flight app I have ever seen! Love the 3D graphics of it, having subscribed to this app is well worth it! | This platform does provide limited & at times even completely competent reports given the context of aircraft. Even still, it is not even as primarily useful as an ADS-B antenna on an offline laptop. Free or paid version of the cell phone app. If I have to say more, just disregard & carry on. | I have contacted the developer about the military filter not displaying military aircraft as shown on the OpenADSB app. I have both apps and have compared them along with the online site. Nothing matches up. But this app for commercial aircraft is great. | I really enjoy this ap. I wish more aircraft had the identifier equipment onboard. I live on the north coast of Oregon and there are 2 to 3 aircraft that go over that can’t be identified. | Wanted to try this app out with the free 7 day trial as promised however was charged $18.99 right after the download 🤷‍♂️. I didn’t get to enjoy or look into the workings of it, due to the disturbance of being charged right off the bat. I’m looking into checking this app out, but just wanted to inform everyone who may be interested that they may be charged up front for it. Hopefully the makers can refund my funds and maybe get this straightened out for others | Can you just do 3D and military tracking for free?😡😡😡 | I’ve had this app for a very long time and you’re trying to make me pay subscription fee for it!  Keep it! | As a subscriber to FlightRadar24 (FR24) my expectations were already high given how accurate and innovative that app is.

As a United Airlines CSR at Logan/Boston, FR24 is a tool I use at work. Especially when  I’m meeting a diverted flight. 

My initial impression of of this app is - it’s fantastic! I’m very much looking forward to seeing whether my hunch is in fact true. That this app will swamp FR24 in terms of customizable settings and options. 

It’s already blown FR24 out of the water in terms of subscription costs. 

So far - CONGRATS! | This app will blow you away with what it does. You want to know what planes are flying right now around the globe? This app does that! Your country? Yes! Your state? Yes! And you can drill down to your local airport! Hey what plane is that? Just touch the plane and it opens a new window with all the specs. What military planes are flying? Just select the filter and VIOLA! It shows just those. There is a whole list of things you can do with this app. Try the free one and I bet you will be subscribing soon there after! | This is a decent flight tracking app which provides good but limited info on the free version.  Doesn’t provide some obvious info like the type of aircraft, however.  Much better free apps out there. | I really enjoy the detailed airplane flight information provided in this app. We live near a municipal airport and it provides detailed information about any plane in the area. I particularly enjoy the highlighted flight path of the various planes. The photo feature is VERY useful for capturing information on any plane that is visible. Good value for the annual subscription!!

title: Universal Studios Hollywood™
description:
Whether you’re planning your visit or already in the middle of the best day in L.A., the Universal Studios Hollywood App is the ultimate must-have. Tap in to purchase tickets, access planning tools, unlock exclusive experiences, book delicious dining reservations, and even order your favorite foods on the go!  

Get all of this and more in the palm of your hand with the Universal Studios Hollywood App.  

Navigate Our Universe: From attraction wait times to nearby dining options and everything in between, you can find it all on our dynamic digital park map.  

Join a Virtual Line: Use Virtual Line Access to choose a return time and save your spot in line at select attractions throughout Universal Studios Hollywood.  

Unlock More Interactive Play: With your Power-Up BandTM and the Universal Studios Hollywood App, you can track your score as you complete Key Challenges, defeat Bowser Jr., collect digital coins, and more throughout SUPER NINTENDO WORLDTM. 

Ordering Food is Deliciously Easy: With Mobile Food & Drink Ordering, you can now order ahead at select locations. That means less time waiting in line and more time enjoying delicious delights!  

Access Your Universal Studios Hollywood Wallet: Link your tickets and add a payment method to ensure an even more seamless visit! For a contactless experience, you can access your tickets on the go and even assign specific tickets to people within your Travel Party.  

Dine On Your Time: Make dining reservations at select locations within Universal CityWalk at Universal Studios Hollywood. From classic culinary favorites to show-stopping desserts, you’ll find something for everyone to enjoy!   

Plus, you can access additional features designed to ensure you have the smoothest visit possible. Virtual Assistant, Parking Reminders, Favorites, and more are available only in the Universal Studios Hollywood App.   

 

Privacy Information Center: www.universalstudioshollywood.com/web/en/us/privacy-center 

Terms of Service: www.universalstudioshollywood.com/web/en/us/terms-of-service 

Privacy Policy: www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy 

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo 

CA Notice: www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act

The app is fantastic. I can see wait times, view restaurants, create an account, and view my annual pass. I can also see my SUPER NINTENDO WORLD at Universal Studios Hollywood badges and achievements clearly in the built-in mini-app, and switch between SUPER NINTENDO WORLD at Universal Studios Hollywood accounts. However, there is no link to book a time to join the queue for Toadstool Cafe. Instead, I either have to go the park and scan the QR code near the entrance to either SUPER NINTENDO WORLD or Toadstool Cafe, or watch a YouTube video of someone getting near the QR code and scan it in the video to book at home before I enter the park. In my opinion, allowing guests to book beforehand via a link in the app will reduce stress and time-slots for the day filling up by the time you scan. For example, I can book Saturday at 1:00 P.M. on Friday at home via the in-app link, versus scanning at either entrance on Saturday and realizing all times are filled up that day.

There are other minor inconveniences with app. Otherwise, it’s great.

title: AARP Now
description:
Access your digital membership card from day one by downloading AARP Now. As a member, you can access your digital card anytime from the My Account tab and join AARP or renew your membership with a tap. The app also gives you access to relevant news stories, local and online events, and nearby member benefits including limited time member offers. Also, join AARP Rewards and sync to the Health app or your favorite fitness tracker and start earning points today.

Make the most of your membership by downloading AARP Now today!

DIGITAL CARD/MEMBERSHIP

Get instant access to your digital membership card, add your card to your Apple Wallet, join AARP, or renew your membership in seconds. Plus, manage your account on the go!

NEWS

Catch up on the latest news in just a few minutes; the AARP Now App features daily stories written with you and your mobile lifestyle in mind. Share news articles with your friends and join the conversation!

EVENTS

Explore hundreds of local events and online virtual events, from career workshops and movie showings to kid-friendly events, and quickly register for them right from the app.

MEMBER DISCOUNTS

Search for benefits and discounts in your neighborhood. Offers are added monthly.

GAMES

Access AARP Games, wherever you are! From Word & Trivia Games to Arcade Games to Solitaire & Mahjongg, there's something for everyone.

NOTIFICATIONS

Receive news alerts, reminders for upcoming events or when benefits you have saved are nearby. You can easily manage your notifications in My Account > Notifications.

AARP REWARDS

Get more from AARP Now with the AARP Rewards program! Earn Rewards points for downloading the app and visiting the app each day, plus synchronize your favorite fitness tracker or the Health app to get even more points for steps, swimming, and cycling.

NOT AN AARP MEMBER?

No problem! Non-members are welcome to download the app, join AARP Rewards, and learn more about how AARP is protecting and improving the lives of the 50 plus.

If there are AARP services or information you are unable to find in the app, we encourage you to visit aarp.org on your mobile phone to access them on the go!

In this day and age it’s ridiculous that this app seems to be stuck in the past. Older people are way more tech savvy now. Please catch up to us. In no particular order here are the things I have found so far that have created this frustration. For reference purposes, I have the iPhone 15 pro max. So it’s a new phone using an outdated app. 

1. If you turn the phone to landscape mode, either whatever you were reading freezes or it returns to the app home screen. 

2. Same with playing a game.  If you turn the phone you have to restart whatever game you were playing.

3. If the phone goes in sleep mode, you have to restart the whole process of going to that game again. 

4. Some games just don’t work at all. They open but you can’t play them.
 
5. Even when reading an article, if your phone goes into sleep mode while reading, when you wake the phone, the app goes back to the home screen and you have to find the article again. 

5. Why can’t we save an article to read later? I literally have to send an article to myself via email so that I can read it another time.

6. When anything is open, the word “Done” appears at the top left of my phone. Please get rid of this and just put a back arrow so we can choose to just stay on this page and go back to the Home Screen ourselves. 

7. I have not used this app yet on my iPad, but from what I’ve read in other reviews that is also a nightmare experience. I use my phone for the most part. But if this is the case, please, please have your app designer fix these flaws. This app shouldn’t be so frustrating to use.

Let’s see if they actually respond and do something about this or just send a canned response and do nothing. This is what appears to happen when reading older reviews complaining of these very same issues I have just written about. Reviews that are 3 and 4 years old stating the same issues. 

Please fix these issues. You would have a great app if you do. | This useful app works very well on the iPhone. However it just doesn’t cut on a iPad. As more and more seniors gravitate to the iPad as their primary internet device, this app needs to be customized accordingly. It is not helpful to stare at an iPhone rectangle inside an iPad screen. Thank you, AARP! | It’s a learning process. Stil adjusting! | All you get is a black screen. Worthless now! | * Search for articles

Frustrating it doesn’t have these basic features. Keep up the good work. | Not able to schedule  an appointment to have my taxes done.
I have tried but the page looks as if aarp app is not stable. I’ve used the app before had know problem. | I hope you always do these articles 
All so interesting -my hope is that I can always get to read them even after a month or so sometimes in that day I haven’t alwsys the time like to go back 
Thankyou | AARP may have lots of benefits but they slam you with ads so much it’s overwhelming. The app also constantly tells me my password is wrong (which it isn’t) and locks me out of my account. It’s very frustrating. | For over a week I can not load games.  Only get a blank screen.  What’s going on? | Every thing you ever said came true ! Thank you | Whether you need advice on insurance, health, finances, travel, AARP have many resources. | I played games for a very long time and now it is impossible to find them easily. I know you want me to look at the other stuff but IDO NOT WANT TO. I WANT TO PLAY My GAMES WHILE MY HUSBAND WATCHES FOOTBALL, COPS AND CAR SHOWS.  I am finished w AARP. | It’s very informative.I just pay service I had no idea it had this much information.I am amazed with what I learned just today. | Love this membership.  Lots of help and discounts
Whats not to love | Accessible and reliable. | Enjoy the words of encouragement that I get here. And the reminders to enjoy the life that I do have. Getting older is privilege and it’s nice on this app to be able to view so many different opportunities and ways to even enjoy life more. | I love this !!! | Should you leave the app for any reason or your phone just locks from time away, you can’t get back to the article you were reading. If the article is not currently on their front page you cannot search for it to return. Should you swipe oddly left or right the same thing occurs and you can’t get back to the article. Frustrating! | AARP is the best for saving especially at the age when you need it mostly.thank you | I love the discounts 😃 | I try to take advantage of as many AARP benefits as I can .
