title: Learn 33 Languages with Mondly
description:
With Mondly you can learn 33 languages: Spanish, American English, British English, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Norwegian, Danish, Dutch, Swedish, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Greek, Romanian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Hindi, Hebrew, Polish, Bulgarian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Czech, Croatian, Finnish, Persian (Farsi), Thai, Afrikaans and Turkish for FREE.

Learn languages with free lessons daily. 
In just minutes you’ll start memorizing core words, form sentences, learn phrases and take part in conversations. 
Fun language lessons improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation like no other language learning method. Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional with a tight schedule? 
Explore language exercises for reading, listening, writing and speaking, enhanced with a dictionary, verb conjugator and state-of-the-art speech recognition technology - you’ll feel like having your own tutor in your pocket.

Download the language learning pill today and enjoy the benefits of learning a new language for life.

Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you:
• Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. Learn pronunciation from conversations between native speakers.
• State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. Mondly knows how to listen to your words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak clearly and correctly.
• Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning languages. Mondly teaches you vocabulary through core words and phrases. The app breaks the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs.
• Learn from conversations. Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs.
• Verb conjugations. Learn more from this course. Tap the verbs and get the full conjugation, including the translation. It’s faster and better than a dictionary.
• Advanced Statistics. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better.

All these make Mondly the best way to learn Spanish, American English, British English, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Greek, Romanian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Hindi, Hebrew, Polish, Bulgarian, Ukrainian, Czech, Croatian, Finnish, Persian (Farsi), Afrikaans and Turkish for FREE.

At the end of these language lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

PLEASE NOTE

You will need a subscription in order to get access to all of this app’s courses and features.

Subscription options:
- One-monthly subscription for $US9.99 (or the equivalent in local currency), automatically renewed until canceled.
- One-yearly subscription for $US47.99 (or the equivalent in local currency), automatically renewed until canceled.

Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period.

Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your Account Settings.
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.

When a subscription is canceled, access to the app’s courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

Privacy Policy: www.mondly.com/privacy
Terms: www.mondly.com/terms

We welcome your feedback and suggestions at: ios[at]mondly[dot]com
releaseNotes:
Major content update: 10 new courses teaching Business Communication comprising of:

• 240 engaging lessons / 5500 quizzes
• more than 2000 new words and phrases
• 3 proficiency levels: beginner, intermediate, advanced

Special feature: Introducing dynamic, personalized Review lessons.
reviews:
Why are my total points not included on the leaderboard? | Good app so far, keeps me motivated! | this is great, I love this app ❤️ | I use it everyday, it’s so much fun!! | This is the best Application in the world | A good app | When doing the conversational portions of this it doesn’t recognize numbers it transposes them from the written number to the numeric number and then it doesn’t recognize it as correct. It’s infuriating someone updated so numbers are recognized during conversational exercises | Learning Catalan on this app. There were only a few options of apps. I like the way this app pairs pictures and words and pronunciations. It also seems to have a fairly robust amount of content. 

I had my friend who speaks Catalan listen to some words. She said the accent isn’t perfect but it’s useable and the words are correct. One critique is they frequently write phrases in the formal you (vosté) tense instead of informal which is more frequently used. I’ll manage because I’m learning verbs from many sources but someone else might sound oddly formal if this was their only learning tool. | Listo | It’s amazing and it teaches me danish very well thank you Mondly ❤️ | Makes learning easy and helps with pronunciation | Skiizzerr | I'm currently at an intermediate level, hovering between A2 and B1 in my Spanish learning journey. Firstly, I'd like to express my admiration for the aesthetic of the AP; it has a visually pleasing layout that's easy to comprehend. I appreciate the frequent vocabulary additions and the presentation of verb conjugations in a straightforward, practical manner. Moving on to the speaking practice, it stands out as genuinely beneficial, a cut above the majority of chatbots out there. It demonstrates active listening, offers correction, and allows room for errors. This approach enables you to master phrases while listening to a mother tongue while acquiring the rhythm and correct pronunciation. I think it's pretty impressive; well done. | I’m using Mondly to learn German. (I speak Russian and Italian in addition to my native English)

My complaint is that Mondly introduces German nouns paired with their indefinite article (ein/eine), but “ein” is used for both masculine and neuter nouns. 

German nouns should be introduced with their definite articles (der/die/das) so that the gender of the noun is unambiguous. 

Mondly’s German module is seriously deficient because if this — which is a shame because I love Mondly otherwise. | Voy por más con esta linda aplicación y de seguro les daré las 5 estrellitas completas! | The review posted here finally elicited a response. But it was to tell me that they could not find my account or username. :-) Four messages to customer support, sent through their form. And preferred email. No reply. But they could take my money? Support for this app is poor. | I like it it keeps changing up the way you learn so it reinforces lesson. | I use it everyday. Mondly is taking my Spanish to the next level | …… | Great application | It is best app to learn language | So far, so good.  App easy to use and fun.  Learning Croatian language. | I tried Duolingo for a whole year before I found this app. I am definitely happier with Mondly. I was never alright with the stalking aspect of Duolingo and what’s more important, after the initial period Duolingo wasn’t teaching me anything new. So definitely, Mondly is the better choice. | Great app, but technical support is slow/nonexistent. I bought a 2-premium account package, but can’t find any way to assign the second account. Queries through the website’s support window have gone unanswered. | Muy buena aplicación para aprender inglés | Mondly has much to recommend it and I’m actively using the app. Against the standard and purpose for which it was designed, it is deserving of high marks. 

Of course, no app is perfect and my main complaint with Mondly is that at this writing I see no option for Latin American Spanish. Nor does it appear to be devoted exclusively to Castilian Spanish. Instead, in its vocabulary, verb conjugations, and pronunciations, Mondly is a mishmash of both.

I urge you to break these out cleanly into two distinct and separate options.

That said, I recommend Mondly to those who want to jump-start their language learning with a variety of effective and enjoyable exercises which are presented in a very accessible way. | This is a great app at a good price to learn Thai. The lessons are short, well structured and very useful for every day conversations. I particularly appreciate the option of reading in English or Thai. Highly recommended. | Perfect!! | There are thousands of vocabs to learn. But I’d also like to learn grammar of each word. If there are some explanations about the meaning of each word, this app would be a perfect one. | I love it very muck it teaches me a lot even though I just downloaded I also enjoy that it takes the time to go over thing and it lets you repeat it. This app if very good to learn communication in Germany and different languages you need to learn thank you very much this app is a 10/10.!!! | I like this app because it’s only been two days and I can say about 7 difrent sentences in Spanish | It is very well.I like this app. | I really enjoyed this app so I just signed up for the yearly family package, but had issues after the upgrade. I emailed the Mondly Team and the issue was sorted and fixed within a day. Very satisfied customer. | Excelente | This app helped me so much I have improved my Spanish so much! It’s so helpful so I really really recommend it to all of y’all! | Excellent review of language no matter your level.  Recommend. | Great app to learn many languages. Great interface. | After taking some courses it starts to give you same exercise every day in daily course. And other lessons are very short and useless | Very helpful for learning Bulgarian! 🙂🇧🇬🇧🇬✝️✝️
JESUS LOVES YOU | I have Duolingo for years to learn Spanish and Japanese. I’ve started using this app to learn Chinese, and the experience is so much better. Where I left Duolingo, not being able to speak the language or listen to the language, but read very well, this app has me working on speaking and listening immediately, so that I can be more comfortable with it when I go into the real world to use the language. Considering that that is why I learn languages, this, and itself converted me instantly. Duolingo is good, but Mondly is great if you want to know how to speak the language. | I am from America and most of my family speaks Urdu and I know a decent amount of Urdu but when I started to use this app I gotten better I would recommend this to someone who wants to learn a new language.👍👍👍👍 | Much better app than Duolingo. | I generally like this program, although it has some errors in it, so it’s still not five stars, but I really like the fact that I can practice speaking. My other programs for learning Japanese don’t have speaking capabilities. | خیلی خوب | Only thing I wish was if they built in the polite “krub” “ka” and honorific “khun” I got a funny look for leaving it out 
But I’m pretty happy :) | I love the fact that it checks my pronunciation.
I’ve been using this for a week and honestly I love it | Thoroughly enjoy your Ap and find it very supportive and professional. | Monday has good daily lessons and is less gamified than other apps but still draws you in | After multiple attempts (and hundreds of dollars) to find an app I can actually learn from and interact with, I have finally discovered Mondly. It does have issues, such as silly "quizzes" after only 2 words, and does not always recognize my voice/accent when repeating-but aside from that, very happy with it. The cartoon nature of some apps left me very frustrated. Some programs spend way too much time on grammar, or simple conversation. Or they used really irritating "characters" (Duolingo). Mondly is good for me-a visual, audio, and hands-on learner, and without annoying voice types. Suggestion-a way to slow down even more would be nice. And get rid of the "here's a short quiz" after introducing only 2 easy words. Love this app. | very good

title: Spin — Electric Scooters
description:
Spin is reimagining the way people and cities flow by offering shared electric micro-mobility options as an alternative to traditional forms of urban transport. We are committed to being the best possible partner for cities while building the safest, most equitable, and most sustainable mobility solution for the communities we serve. Just download our easy-to-use, reliable app for access to thousands of shared scooters and bikes across the country. Spin scooters and bikes are emissions-free, so you’ll also help keep the air fresh every time you ride.

How to Take a Spin:

- Open the app to find the nearest Spin scooter or bike.
- Unlock your Spin by scanning the QR code or by entering its ID.
- Ride safely to your destination, using bike lanes where available.
- Park responsibly, avoiding pedestrian right of ways, building entrances, and wheelchair ramps.

Want Spin scooter or bike-sharing where you live for your commute? Have feedback on your ride? Contact support@spin.pm, or find more info at www.spin.app

California Privacy Notice: https://www.spin.app/policies/ca-privacy-policy

Terms of Use: https://www.spin.app/policies/terms-us
releaseNotes:
Thanks for riding with Spin! To make your rides even more enjoyable, we update our app regularly.

What's new:

- Bug fixes and general improvements
reviews:
Reporting repairs has never worked, will never work, the button stays greyed out. So you better hope your scooter isn’t broken because you’re not getting your money back. So the only company that doesn’t auto-refund if you only make it a couple yards is also the only one allowed to operate in this city, funny how that works! | After years of (mediocre) service I’m no longer able to make use of spin scooters. The app threatens legal action if you don’t lock the scooter to a bike rack after use. Firstly, there are barely any bike racks in town, and most are on private property—I’m not going to trespass into college property (where the scooters don’t even work) to lock a bike in a place I can’t end the ride. 

Secondly, the scooters don’t even have locks on them. It’s an impossible task. I’m done. | ❤️ | Used Spin in Chicago last summer and it was ok (Lime was better); now the app shows no scooters. At all. Anywhere. In any city. Sent customer service an email asking if they’re still serving Chicago, and got a reply back that where I can use a Spin scooter depends on where I rent it. What?? English barely as a second language? Really bad AI? No scooters, no support, and every review so far in 2024 is horrible. I guess I’m using Lime. | I don’t know why it will not let me pay, I have money in my account but it will just now work and it’s frustrating as I have to walk a long way home, if I knew what would let me pay for the app I would rate it Better. It keeps declining my payment and will not tell me why | Everytime i scan the bar code it has me double click to use my apple pay and it never goes through. Whenever I try and put in my card it says theres an error. | The app is okay but not good. I don’t recommend it and wouldn’t use this again even if I had to. 

The bikes are the worst I’ve ever used. I travel the country with work and have used everything you can rent on the street from coast to coast. I am currently in State College PA. And I will be petitioning with the local government to get them banned they are that bad and unsafe. The condition of the bike is to be expected for a street rental. Ruff, seats are bent up and adjustments are possible but won’t hold or last. The wireless charging does NOT work on any of the bikes I tested and everyone I asked. The “eletric assist” is just gear changing and does not help with motion. But makes it much worse as the gears are non controllable. I litterly fell off the bike when it felt I needed the hardest gear possible to up hill. Nearly getting hit by a car in the process. If it was possible to press charges I would. These are a saftey hazard and the reason you will NOT see anyone ridding them. Is because they are that bad. | it charges u multiple times without knowing | Only thing is the app wasn’t 100% accurate about batteries. Would use again tho | Prices have become expensive. Almost cheaper to take an Uber. Doesn’t make sense the cost of driving a car is close to the cost of riding a scooter?? | There are a lot of Deadspin bikes and scooters that are not being replenished very hard to locate one when needed | Zero customer service. 

No way to question charges, access additional services (e.g. for low-income students), or do anything but find a vehicle and pay.

Overlong ride charges: for instance, you get charged for the time it takes to photograph Spin scooters before you can end a ride. Have a momentary problem with your cell connection? You’re charged for the time anyway, and you’re screwed.

I’ll be using the rest of my Spin credit and deleting this app for good. | I’ve been using this service for almost a year, and I’ve had nothing but great things to say about them until the past quarter. In winter quarter I kept having technical difficulties with their new updated app (the original was amazing, and now it’s awful). I used to be able to filter which vehicle type I could see and now you can’t do that. Then, I started having issues with the bikes and scooters themselves, they wouldn’t unlock or lock back up way more often then it should, or the app would take forever to load and would then cost me more minutes because “I’m still using the vehicle.” I’ve had to call the customer service team way too many times for comfort, but they’re always really nice and helpful. And now my biggest most upsetting issue… I’ve purchase the same spin pass for the past year, and now they’ve changed their policy to where instead of getting to unlock the vehicles for free, I have to pay each time, AND I can’t use the bikes?! Only the scooters. So yea, I’m out $70 and transportation because of all these changes and they won’t refund me either, very unfortunate. They were a great company until they weren’t. | Won’t let me add funds or use any. | They don’t refund you, but give you credits instead. 
It’s more convenient to walk than use spin. | Too expensive | The monthly pass is not what it says it still charges you and you will have a negative balance on there even when you read it it says you will be able to ride for free for 30 days don’t say after a certain time it will charge you idc about it having more 5 star everyone I no always uses other people because spin be lying it’s sad and spin need to do better | Monthly Unlock pass. Ride all month with $0 unlock fees on every ride, u still get fees even when u purchase the monthly unlock pass , very disappointed, I want my money back, It’s a scam….! | Way too expensive compared to other offerings | Overall pretty good experience except the scooters i encountered in Salt Lake city probably have a 60 percent success rate not fun. | Can’t even process a credit card | I live right on the cusp of Maryland and DC and used to be able to drive from one to the other. Now, Spin changed its rules around that, adding a buffer zone that makes it super inconvenient to commute. Willswitch to the competitor | Fun, convenient and fast! | I thought this would be better than walking but the scooter didn’t work and there is no way to troubleshoot in the app and I was charged 6$ for 5 minutes. | Wouldn’t let me park for 15 mins | This is for customer service or Solution service. I gave a star bc i did not even get responded. I tried to use one of it, charged me a few bucks but it was broken and returned in a couple minutes. Still they charged even submitted a error report | We hoped on, went 2.1 mile got charged $27 each! Uber was cheaper! | Half the time the scooters don’t start and you still get charged the activation fee | Would give 0 stars if I could. We tried renting 2 scooters in washington DC for a shared ride. I unlocked the first of the 2 scooters but when we tried for the second the scooters lock mechanism was broken so we couldn’t rent it.  I immediately relocked the first scooter and was charged $7 even though we got NO USE of either scooter. Submitted claim for refund and NEVER heard back, posting this in hopes I get a response if not to at least let others know this service is a rip off (use any of the other rental providers and you won’t have the same issues I had with Spin) | There’s always some issue, it seems, whether it’s the scooter stopping you because it thinks you’re on a sidewalk, incorrectly mapping your journey and overcharging you, or not ending the ride. You have to navigate a maze to get to customer support and once you do, they’re unhelpful. I like scooters, but this company is seriously lacking | I hope I get refunded the difference that was initially authorized on my credit card | So overpriced! A 15 min scooter ride cost 6-7 usd.

Scooter is very harsh and hurt my wrist so much. Engineers should realize the height/ wheel base ratio will magnify the vibration at handle bar!

The throttle stuck open at a traffic light almost got me into an accident.

I do wish there are good car alternatives in US suburbs. | I sat there for 30 minutes trying to hand you money and all i get is errors and endless validation screens. Ill save today and walk the mile. **** you | Thank you for finding me in my broken state/condition. 

Taking me to your home was very considerate. 

Rabbi’s angels venice beach | Spin has the best rides I’ve done of all the scooters! 250lbs holds me well and battery is solid | It is truly amazing how horribly dysfunctional this app is. Never recognizes parking locations, scooters constantly make screeching noises for no reason. Absolute garbage service unfortunately. | Updated app as forced to, and now it does not accept any form of payment. Made me late for work as was counting on it to work as it normally does | Of about a dozen rides I’ve had to take with them as the only option only one ended when it was supposed to and the others it kept charging for at least 3 min with the longest over 20 min bc it wouldn’t let me end despite being within parking zones. | Spin gets a 40% rating because that’s how often it works. I have been charged for rides where the scooter never unlocked. This service has a long way to go. | Polk-Bush to  Union-Fillmore early morning  ride was mostly car free and fun.  Great time to get somewhere fast. | I have used Spin quite a bit since it is one of the only ride share apps in my area. However, it has recently increased quite a bit in price, making even a short trip almost double the cost.

However, I know this isn’t because of the app itself, but the app does not have a place to leave local feedback. This is a downside because I would have rather addressed this issue towards those who can actually fix things locally. I would love for a feedback field to be implemented to help me help them! | worst app ive ever used complete s show | First off I would like to say that Spins customer service is exceptional, which in part is why I think this review will be read and acted upon because it seems clear that Spin is very interested in their customers satisfaction. After I snap the photo it ends there.   I can’t submit.  Or I submit  it and it locks up.   I can’t remember exactly the point where it locks up but i just get this spinning timer indicating that something is loading but it never does.  I can’t do anything at this point.   If I take a ten minute break and want to ride again too bad.   Sometimes closing the app and reopening will work but in any event when I am allowed to rent again I get a message telling me I didn’t submit a photo.   I couldn’t .   It’s really annoying when I get stranded because of it
   Please fix this bug.   I can’t be the only one having this problem.   I’m using the latest update and I’m on an iPhone 15 Pro Max. | I prepaid for Spin Pass that granted me 60mins of ride time over the course of three days. One of those days the system was down and the next the scooters wouldn’t unlock then I had problems “ending” the rides I did successfully catch(app glitches). title: SeaWorld
description:
The SeaWorld App is your must-have in-park companion for your entire experience in Orlando, San Antonio, or San Diego. It’s free and easy to use. 

GUIDE
• Plan your day in the park!
• Discover park amenities including animal experiences, shows, rides, events, and dining
• View upcoming showtimes so you can plan your next move
• Upgrade your in-park experience with a Quick Queue®, All Day Dining Deal or reserved seating for shows
• Switch locations when traveling to other parks
• View park hours for the day

MY VISIT
• Turn your phone into your ticket!
• Access your Annual Passes and barcodes to use your discount in the park
• Access your Pass Member benefits and information
• View your purchases and barcodes for easy redemption
• Purchase in-park add-ons and upgrades to optimize your day

MAPS
• Get to the fun faster!
• Explore our new interactive maps to see your location and nearby attractions
• Find your way in the park with directions to nearby points of interest
• Filter points of interest by type, including animal experiences, shows and rides
• Locate the closest restroom, including family restrooms
• Search the name of an attraction or point of interest to find exactly what you are looking for
releaseNotes: Thanks for your continued feedback! This release includes miscellaneous bug fixes.

Also, I don’t recommend because if you’re using your phones for photos and then pulling up the app, you’re just wasting battery. I love SeaWorld overall because of the fun rides and the delicious food and all the family memories you can make. | I’ve come to SeaWorld Orlando almost every day for the past two weeks. The app is killer. 🐋 | Very useful information and accurate description and time of events. 10 stars | A quick how to video tutorial would be next level helpful. Additionally, why are users restricted from adding the passes to Apple Wallet.  This was an option at one time, by no longer.  

Please improve this app immediately as can be very frustrating. | very helpful in guiding you to the attractions and seeing the wait time but, the wait time is different once u get to the ride. So its not the exact wait time. | This app always gives me trouble. Most recently when trying to log it, the app just stops working. No error messages, just stops. Definitely does not help with using less physical resources. | Deberían de poder los tiempos de espera en el mapa | No search function. No ability to tap places on the map for more info. These are two essential features that would have made my trip better. | 💯👍🏻 | Prices so high for food and gifts (from China, not very good quality 😏), then they tack on 5%. Bathrooms much cleaner this visit, I was concerned last two visits. Entertainment very good, but where is the pet show? Needle hasn’t been running and how long is construction going to go on? Been so long. | As a season holder you would think you could do more on the app itself but it routes you to the outside website which can be slow to load and cause issues if you need to go back and forth to migrate bar code numbers etc for multiple tickets.

title: Weather & Radar - Storm alerts
description:
Key Features of Weather & Radar:

•	Accurate weather forecast
•	Innovative weather, temperature and wind radar 
•	Weather alerts + storm tracker
•       Local air quality forecasts
•	Ski reports
•	Expert weather analysis and videos   

Weather App
Be ready for all weather conditions with Weather & Radar’s free app, giving you accurate weather reports and forecasts at your exact location in the US and around the world.

Weather Forecast
The latest forecasts for temperature and wind, chance of rain or snow, sunshine duration and UV levels. Detailed data on air pressure, dewpoint, feels-like temperature, wind chill and air pollution. Plan further ahead with the 14-day weather trend.  

Weather Map
Discover our industry-leading weather radar, including high-resolution rain, snow, wind and lightning areas. The enhanced weather maps allow you to track real-time meteorological conditions down to city and county level.

Weather Alerts
Using the latest weather modelling and storm tracking technology, our weather alerts and push notifications keep you updated about inclement or dangerous conditions in and around your area.

Weather News and Videos
Stay informed with breaking news and weather stories from our team of experienced meteorologists, including expert extreme weather analysis and live videos. Blizzards, floods, hurricanes or heatwaves, we have got you covered!

Ski Conditions
You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to get the latest forecast and snowpack data. Easily find the best spots to make your skiing trip a success with live updates on lift status, trail and terrain conditions.  

90-Minute Trend
Our 90-minute nowcast feature gives you all the hyperlocal and time-critical data you need, using a blend of weather observations and high-resolution models to pinpoint the movement and arrival times of rain or storms around your location. 

World Weather
Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations in our weather app. Global weather data and rain radar at your fingertips!

Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalize your main page! 

Weather & Radar Pro is a subscription service that will be renewed on either a monthly or a yearly basis. Payment for the subscription will be charged to the user’s iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The user’s iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. iTunes will identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the Weather & Radar Pro free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription thereof.

Terms and Conditions: http://www.weatherandradar.com/ios/terms-of-use/

Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.com
releaseNotes:
We have been working behind the scenes to make Weather & Radar even better. With the latest update, you can now tap locations in the WeatherRadar to access the latest forecast even faster.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to send us an email on info@weatherandradar.com

I have checked your site daily in April and have yet to see any postings. If it says 44/45 it’s below freezing at our ranch. My wife’s weather radar is much more accurate so I will be switching.  Even your radar pics are inaccurate compared to hers. | It’s not free | Great features albeit the ads. I, however, in much need for this app experienced a let down. Monumental. title: Royal Cooking: Kitchen Madness
description:
Enjoy cooking mania and fever, get ready to make food and open a restaurant or don't forget to work in a crazy kitchen! Are you ready for the madness of this crazy kitchen?

Do you love time management games? Or are you looking for a different food gameplay?
If so, this crazy kitchen is totally for you. You can be a creator of your own restaurant story and open a family style cafe or diner. Immerse yourself into the mania and fever of making food!

This restaurant game teaches you to make food & cook delicious burgers, good and great pizza and other popular street foods. Join this crazy kitchen with time management gameplay and simulation fun.

The Royal Cooking game is one of the most interesting restaurant games. Experience the fun of time management!

 FEATURES:
 - Enjoy gameplay, classic casual and time management games.
- Unlock advanced diaries, make food and become a star chef with mania and fever.
- Hundreds of fun levels: you need to cook good and great pizza, burgers, and sweet baked goods.
- Get combo streaks to earn big rewards.
- Upgrade your crazy kitchen equipment to become the star chef of mania and fever.
- Use powerful boosters to have more fun!

You can find the answers to many questions by contacting our in-game support team. The FAQ is available here: 
https://matryoshka.helpshift.com/hc/en/8-cookinglive/

Reach out to us regarding any questions or suggestions you have. We read all the messages!

Subscribe to our social media pages to stay up to date on the latest news and to get useful tips for the game: 
https://www.facebook.com/matryoshkagamescom

Sincerely, the Matryoshka Games team
releaseNotes:
New Culinary Moves!
- We've introduced new animations to make every action in the kitchen look even smoother! Time to whip, chop, and cook like a real chef!
Smoother Than Ever!
- Some glitches have been fixed and overall game performance has been improved.
reviews:
i love this game so much | I love the game but when I got to the restaurant in level 92 where you serve steaks it stopped working. I am able to cook the steaks but it won’t let me serve them or drinks. It’s to bad because the game was really fun. Hope it gets fixed ! I would give it 5 stars but it’s not working. | The amount of ads makes it impossible to play. Otherwise it would be a fun game. Too bad. | I’m only on level 20 and I feel challenged to work faster.🫶🏽 | When will the update come out? | I like it | This game has awesome graphics for a mobile game and is just like the adds. It's really fun and I am addicted to playing it | I’m not a hard gamer and I got through this game all levels in one week!!
Extremely disappointed | Don’t allow data again | Could had more thing to add to cooking preparations | love the game its sooo fun no wifi try it out best game ever nothing is bothering me soo perfect game 👍👍💗 | It’s my favorite cooking game 
It’s so amazing and interesting game 
If I should rate this game 5 stars then it worth it 
The most interesting part is you can cook in different restaurant | Need an update. It is stuck at the first level of the pizza restaurant. Help!! | This game is so fun it’s funnier when you have a time to feed all customers it’s challenging and entertaining love this game 💕💕💕 | It is so easy and fun to play me and my mom play it all the time and I think that every mother and daughter should play this amazing game | I love this app | Awesome game but there is way to many ads | This game is so entertaining and fun no adds so give a try!! | Pro - I love this game.   con - Way too many ads! | While most of the game is fun and easy, right as it starts when first downloaded the game states if u allow the app to track you to other apps your game will be add free. but adds still pop up during your games. False advertisement? | It’s just that good it’s just that good my mother approved it | I play several cooking games and this one is probably the least stressful. In other games, when you have to make a combo’d item (as in, a specific item with multiple elements like a burger with lettuce and sauce or a burger with cheese and no sauce), if you tap the wrong thing it will make the combo’d item and it will occupy a plate/tray that you can’t clear unless a customer orders it, or you throw it away, and some levels have conditions like don’t throw anything away, so you either lose, or get angry customers and make less tips. In this game, at least in the first level, it doesn’t allow you to add something to an item unless that combo’d item is specifically on the board as an order to be filled, so you can’t make incorrect orders. This makes the game a lot more relaxing and enjoyable! The graphics are good, game play is smooth and easy, coins are easy to earn. I like this game a lot. | It’s super fun and interactive. Although it’s for kids I enjoy this game and I’m a teenager. It’s very fun and it’s great for long plane rides and road trips | So she can cook for people and she so pretty | Made it to level 181.  Game freezes after tutorial. Very frustrating. Have enjoyed it up to til now | What ever happened to “Zen Mode” for games like this? Enough said… | Would’ve gave this game 5 beyond stars if it would stop crashing | I am enjoying this game a lot. | I like how you have to keep things at a certain piece from this game because if you let the customer wait too long, they get upset and they leave but thus far I have kept all of my customers satisfied | In all the ads I kept seeing while playing another food game, it showed the food being rung up, and the server running the credit card. Where is that? This is just straight cooking over and over and over again. Part of the appeal to my daughter and me was getting to ring them up, too. False advertising?? | Rilygud | This is the best free game in the world and it soothes me btw I am 9 years old | This game is fun, I enjoy it but it’s WAYYYYY too easy! I beat the whole game easily, which isn’t saying much. I would like at least a harder level, instead of me not playing a level for 10+seconds so I have somewhat of a challenge. | Love the game itself BUT way TOO many ads!! | Can’t get more buns is frustrating. | I’m not going to spend money to remove the ads. Why can’t there be just one good game without ads?? Good game otherwise | I’m not one to write reviews but I gotta say, I love playing these cooking games, have played several of them and the one thing I always wanted was the ability to keep the phone in portrait mode… so tired of turning the phone… love that I can finally do it with this game!  

I’m only on level 32 but along with the phone orientation, I love that there’s no dragging ingredients involved, the money is automatically collected, AND the coins collected in one restaurant can be used in the next! 

Love it so far! Hoping it continues! | I actually like this game better than most others like it. The tasks are challenging but not so much so that you just give up. The only thing that is annoying is the ADS!!! I can see having to watch an ad to double coins but to then have to watch an ad to COLLECT the coins is unreasonable! I was thinking about uninstalling for this reason because I feel like I’m watch ads more than playing the game. The game is so much fun though | This game would be great for children or seniors who don’t want to start out fast paced. I have played and still play several cooking games. I’m always looking for new ones to keep my interest. There are good and bad points with this one. The good notes are: it is not fast paced (at least in the beginning), you get plenty of opportunities to double your coins, you get opportunities to watch videos for boosts before starting a round after higher levels, you get opportunities to watch videos for free coins, you can upgrade equipment by watching videos instead of using coins. The bad points are: it’s very slow paced leading up to level 37 compared to other similar games I’ve played, it’s very slow on upgrades compared to other games I’ve played (I’m fully upgraded on level 37 and can only make 1 cup of juice and the machine is slow. I’m also still only making eggs with add ons of either toast or tomatoes), there is nothing else in this game to keep your interest (example: no story -which I personally like and no decorating-which I don’t like). None of us like ads but know they are necessary, unless you play Township, Monopoly Go, Monopoly Solitaire or Chef and Friends (which I highly recommend btw), but when the ads are repetitive it becomes more annoying. When the ads are optional for a reward it’s easier to swallow unless they are immediately followed by a forced ad which is the case with this game. Yes, you can close out of them fairly quickly but I still find it annoying. Other games I play will sprinkle them in on rounds where you don’t have the option to watch an ad to double your coins. For example if you replayed a round for the third time for a third star or more coins for upgrades needed for new items. Thats another thing it doesn’t appear that this game offers. Maybe they don’t allow you to re-play rounds because you can upgrade items by watching videos? 
Again, if your looking for the basics and something simple this game may be for you. They make it easy to upgrade that’s for sure. I’m just not sure the upgrades are enough. Even in level 37 I had several customers waiting for juice. Something so simple that was fully upgraded and could not be improved on my part by time management. If you are a regular player if cooking games I would pass on this one. You will get bored fairly quickly. I hung in there longer than I wanted to just to try to give it a fair shot in hopes it would get better. | to many ads | The ads after every round is miserable I spend more time watching ads than playing if I delete this app that will be why. Do developers actually take advice from complaints or do they say they will but don’t?

Yeah that’s what yall say that’s how it’s free. But I have game that are free without a single ad so try again. No worries I deleted the game. No need to respond. | Way too many ads!!! | The game is fun but the music is beautiful and addicting. | I’m really in love with this game!! I like the fact that I can upgrade with just cash. No pesky gems to earn. The only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is because of the ads. If I watch an ads to double my points, I think it’s ridiculous to have to watch another as in order to receive the points. Besides the fact that between every level there is an ad. But great job making a game that is not impossible to win 👍👍👍 | It’s a good game I just really like it | I love this game, I’m not too fun of the ads after every level completion tho. I have to ask tho why does it start all the way over once you get passed a certain level?? Is it supposed to do that or not?? | Way to many ads other then that great game! | اللعبة جميلة جداً ولكن عندما وصلت إلى المرحلة الأخيرة قال ستُعيد كل شيء من الصفر وهذا أمرٌ سيء أتمنى أن يتم طرح مستويات أكثر بدل من أن يكونَ آخر مستوى هوَ 181. 

سأمسحُ اللُعبة، لا أستطيعُ تحمُلَ ذلك. 

جزيلَ الشُكرِ. | Excellent Game | The game is very fun and addicting, however, some levels are impossible w/out watching ads to earn coins or using "boosters." 
I made it to the third restaurant and I'm stuck. Only 8 customers come in and even with the booster that gives extra money earned, I can't make it to the 77 coins I need to progress. It's very frustrating 
 I would suggest making some of the levels give you more coins, as you can't really progress/ get upgrades w/out paying for coins or spending an hour watching ads.
 I do like the different restaurants & food choices as well as how fast paced it is, but could use some more work in my opinion
Yes, the ads after every level are annoying but that's part of how they can make cool games like this so I'm not too mad about that

title: NJ TRANSIT Mobile App
description:
Using the NJ TRANSIT Mobile App, it’s easier than ever to travel throughout New Jersey to New York and Philadelphia. NJ TRANSIT information is conveniently available to you. Buy and display passes or tickets securely and get transit options on your mobile device. 

•MyTix® mobile ticketing
•My Transit Alert notifications; real time rail and bus arrival/departure information
•Trip planning for rail, bus and light rail service


Features:

• MyTix – Buy and display your pass or ticket securely on your mobile device
• MyTransit Wallet: Cash in App – store cash value to buy tickets and passes
• Rider Tools – Manage My Transit alerts for push notifications, check service advisories and plan trips. 
• My Transit Alerts – Receive push notifications of NJ TRANSIT Rail, Bus & Light Rail  travel alerts
• Trip Planner – Receive suggested options for travel to your destination
• Schedules – Make travel plans using quick station-to-station schedule for rail, bus & light rail
• DepartureVision® – Get real-time train status for your selected station
• MyBus® – View bus arrivals for your stop
• Contact Us – Provide feedback on your travel experience
releaseNotes:
New Rail Ticket Layout
Bus Departure Gate Info
Rider Tools Enhancements
Bug Fixes
reviews:
This app is extremely difficult.  I couldn't even buy a ticket.  What needs to be done, is you should have a short cut to buy tickets.  Click buy, going by location, what buses are around, then when you select ask what city they are going to, to determine how many zones.  I literally couldn't get up the screen to buy a ticket with right amount of zones.. so i paid cash. | Why do I need an account to buy a ticket? Apple Pay is nice but not very friendly to single-time users | Meant to tap FIVE stars!! | I wish I could give no stars. | Find a way to make these things live online as tables, rather than PDFs make them interactive – – can users create an itinerary and have it notify through iOS? I will be requesting a refund which I anticipate being a very unpleasant ordeal. | Every morning when getting to bus I need to put in my password. Nowhere to store this or have Face ID? I get on the 320 bus and the driver tells me I need a zone 3 pass. The app sold me a zone 2 pass. After arguing with him for a few minutes, I decided to wait for the next bus. Some drivers are sticklers, some don’t care. The next bus had a driver who didn’t care. 

I’m extremely disappointed with whoever made this app. It’s extremely outdated since it doesn’t even include navigation or live bus/train tracking information. If NJ transit reads this and decides to discipline the driver who didn’t care, YOU GOT THE WRONG MESSAGE. | This morning I am unable to purchase a ticket and the app asked me to sign out. No alerts, nothing useful. Just a web view of crappy website. | It loops when trying to sign in (even though I already was), loops when trying to create a NEW account - TWICE.

NJ Transit needs more coding lessons from a school or class, not from a pamphlet. | Just horrible; how much money is made off of the riders only for the app to have the functionality of a crippled fish out of a water. title: Internet Speed Test Speedcheck
description:
Use Speedcheck to test the speed of internet connections and add your results to SpeedSpot's WiFi speed database. You can use the companion app, SpeedSpot's WiFi Finder right from with the app to find the fastest WiFi hotspots around the globe.

- Test your Download & Upload Speed and Ping on Cellular and WiFi networks
- One-tap testing in under 20 seconds
- Worldwide High-Speed Server network for reliable results 
- Comment on your tests (privately)
- Track your past results
- Calculate how long transfers will take with build-in Bandwidth Calculator
- Easily share your results on Twitter & Facebook
releaseNotes:
What has changed:
- Improved test algorithm
- Enhanced overall stability

Thank you for using Speedcheck! It would be awesome if you could support us by writing a review on the app store for the new version. That always helps a lot. If you have suggestions or questions you can easily reach us per mail at support@speedspot.org.
reviews:
Great app | Graphic display of speeds is helpful | Fast And Efficient! | Me ayudó mucho es práctica | Holy smokes! I googled the best internet speed check apps and this wasn’t on there. Thought I’d give it a shot anyways since it had so many 5 star ratings. I ignored the fact that most were from half a decade ago. Anyways, can’t do anything through the ads. Complete waste of time | They've received so many positive reviews so maybe I was doing something wrong but I found the app to be unusable unless I wanted to pay. I don't mind ads, but I also want to be able to run a speed test and see the results. | This app gives real speed test and analysis of data and how your current speed can support streaming vs gaming vs video chat etc. | Just has adds | This is amazing, I’ve always thought that my wifi was a little slow but then with this app I found out that it was getting slow but still is fast and thanks to this app I can find out the speed of any WiFi network | ADS every time you check your speed. Not worth downloading. Just download ookla instead. | Excellent app/ im on top of my cell service with this !! I suggest everyone get if like to know internet speed! | If I could rate this 0 stars I would. People download this app to test speeds and wouldn’t you know it immediately ads all over. My girlfriend literally downloaded an app and ran 3 tests on a different speed test before I could even get to do 1 and she didn’t start downloading until after my first ad started. This is so stupid that’s apps do this now. Just let us use the function it’s supposed to be used for and in a timely manner | Dark mode has been available on the android version for literally years. When will you finally bring this feature to iOS? | All good! | The best app! | Quick walk through the house showed me my problems. Perfect app for the job. | They let me get rid of ads free | Great software | I had this on every device and the adds were trying to hack me. Don’t use | Best program yet😊 | It’s great! | The ping seems to be completely wrong or every other speed test app I try is wrong so idk? | Simple Easy and seems to work accurately. 10/10 try it. No adds to use, after you run a test you see a super short ad that’s not intrusive. It’s great. | After the speed test has been carried out, a long, annoying advertisement appears - then a black screen that won't go away | Love it | Awesome app | Gives very accurate information and simplifies each category for your WiFi speeds | Super useful especially when traveling to see if work is possible in certain areas. | Love it | Very accurate and free | To many ads | Why do you want my location 24/7? Oh yeah, you tell me, it’s so you can sell it. No thanks. | A truly free app that works exceptionally well. | 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍 | Much better than others out there and like the features! | Very accurate | Awesome | Easy to use and understand. | These devs know how to make a man love an app ! Get this app !!! 100% worth it !! | Works Great, and after two days I was able to remove ads for feee. | It’s easy to use and very accurate. | Really good app with real speed check | Very courteous app and very understanding when it comes to in app ads. Very accurate wifi speed test, and it even will record your MBPS and speeds whenever you test so you can compare when it’s the best time to use the wifi and when the most WiFi traffic is happening. 
Thank you to the developers of this app for being so helpful. | For real, 5 Big Stars!  
Kudos!

PS:  why does Open Signal have two apps?? | Gives me more information than I know what to do with, it helped me troubleshoot my internet connection issues.  Thanks for the free app and for allowing me to remove the adds anyway.  Have a great day. | Clips the measured download speed below 30Mbps and then you have to watch an ad to see the grossly incorrect measurements. | Test only that you need for Wireles speed test. 
Also save your history tests, can compare the older connections tested. | SKIP
this app has ads that take over your phone’s screen | Speedcheck is easy to use for both WiFi and 5G. There is also a log where you can view history speed checks.

Thanks! | Quick and easy testing of your ISP speeds!

title: Google Earth
description:
Create and collaborate on immersive, data-driven maps from anywhere, with the new Google Earth.
See the world from above with high-resolution satellite imagery, explore 3D terrain and buildings in hundreds of cities, and dive in to streets and neighborhoods with Street View's 360° perspectives.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Google Earth! This version includes bug fixes.
Our recent release brings a fresh new look, with new features to help you collaborate with others across devices, create maps on the go, and add photos from your camera to your maps.

title: Airalo: eSIM Travel & Internet
description:
Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect to the internet in 200+ countries and regions worldwide and save up to 10x on roaming fees.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and serves the same function as a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination. No physical SIM cards, spotty Wi-Fi, or surprise roaming fees — just easy, affordable, flexible connectivity.  

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan. Airalo has eSIMs for 200+ countries and regions.
3. Install the eSIM. This only takes a few minutes to complete.
4. Connect to a local network. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet when you arrive.
It's that easy!

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
• United States
• United Kingdom
• Turkey
• Italy
• France
• Spain
• Japan
• Germany
• Canada
• Thailand
• Portugal
• Morocco
• Colombia
• India
• South Africa
• Ireland
• Mexico
• Egypt
• Dominican Republic
• Chile

Why Airalo?
• Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
• Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
• Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
• Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
• Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.
• Track and top up data on the go.
• Earn cashback rewards with every eSIM purchase.
• In a jam? Our support team is available 24/7.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
• Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
• 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
• No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
• Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
• Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.
• Keep your existing number for 2FA authentications.
• Stay connected wherever you travel.

eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
• An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
• eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
• Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
• You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
• Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
• Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
• Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
You sure can. Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).

Happy travels!
–
Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help  

Join the Airalo community! 
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy 
Terms & Conditions
www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions

Questions or comments? Feel free to contact us at support@airalo.com.

title: British Airways
description:
To Fly. To Serve.

The British Airways app makes booking, boarding and accessing everything about your flights easier than ever before. Personalised to you, the app gives you instant access to the information you need, when you need it.

Features:

- Personalised home screen
Your home screen is your personal gateway into the BA app. Themed around your next destination, it will give you easy access to important information surrounding your flight, including your mobile boarding pass.

You will also have quick access to flights you track, your most recent search and our best return fares to our most popular destinations.

- Book flights
Booking a flight with British Airways has never been easier. Browse our cheapest fares or quickly access your recent flight searches made from any device, and book a flight from over 130 countries.

- Manage your flights
Access and purchase upgrade offers from your phone, book seats in advance, add flights to your calendar or send them via email and get up-to-date arrival and departure times for all of your flights. Additionally, lounge users can access the British Airways Lounge Wi-Fi password.

- Apple Watch
The British Airways app on Apple Watch provides easy access to the most important flight information while you’re on the move. You can quickly view the flight number, route, departure time, flight status, a countdown to the departure time and the weather at your destination.

- Flight status and schedules
Search and track all British Airways flights for the latest arrival and departure times.

- Exclusive features for Executive Club Members
If you’re an Executive Club Member, you can check your Avios and Tier Points as well as view your full transaction history on your device. Optional enhanced services available for our Executive Club customers travelling with baggage to check in at the airport. Anyone can join the Executive Club for free on ba.com


- Siri Shortcuts
Add Siri Shortcuts to quickly check your next flight and Avios points

Please refer to the 'Application Licence Agreement', linked on this page, to view the terms of use of this application and use of mobile boarding passes. By downloading the BA application, you agree to the terms of the Application Licence Agreement.
British Airways Plc Web Site British Airways Support Application Licence Agreement.
releaseNotes: We’re always working behind the scenes to make improvements to your experience. Our tweaks improve the British Airways app by making it faster, safer and easier to navigate.
reviews:

After waiting on hold, it automatically connects me with American Airlines to start all over! | Let me start by saying that we are frequent flyers to the UK because or daughter is a University student there.

When we went to check in only to discover that our seats (that we paid extra for when we booked the tickets months ago) were move, without notification, to the far back of the plane. The agent kept repeating that she could not change us back because we had already checked ourselves in for the flight. That was not correct because we had not checked in yet. No plausible explanation was given for the change and she said if we wanted to upgrade our seats, as we tried to request to correct the issue, she would have to remove us from this flight and try to make the change. This service was worst than flying a discount airline like Ryan Air or Spirit Airlines. All aspects of our travels to the UK and back home to the US have been completely unsatisfactory and it is the last time we are flying British Airways! | This has to be the worst app I have ever used, it doesn’t even deserve 1 star.  It’s been like this for years.  BA please please fix your app | So disappointed that we are not able to check-in prior to arriving at Heathrow… doesn’t anyone test these apps?… I’d love to see a upper manager at BA attempt to check-in to a international flight… 

Integration with the American Air app is a disaster also…
🤷‍♂️ | Absolutely garbage app. Made a booking for 4 passengers. No alert reminding you to check in for your flight, took forever to check in because I kept getting error messages, I can only access my boarding pass, there is no option to print or download the boarding passes of the other 3 passengers. Utterly useless. | The app is slow and very buggy. Am absolute pain to do simple things like getting your boarding pass. | If you have the audacity to use this app while on a VPN, expect across-the-board failure: show my account (sorry), book a flight on points (sorry), se past transactions (sorry). Doesn't always even display your bookings. Usually last to know assigned gate. It'll often contradict what the gate PA screen is stating, or be missing information that otherwise is available. Should probably be able to tell the luggage allowance for your booking or time of boarding, but doesn't -- instead the timeline helpfully (and, yes, I'm being sarcastic here) offers to share your flight info if you feel like providing BA with marketing information on your friends. Seat picking seems to be relegated to your browser (so no VPN). Notifications would be useful (as long as they're related to your travel, not nagging for preregistration or flogging sales): a past 2h flight were delayed three times totalling 4 hours 50 minutes (and I lost my seat, so they were presumably looking for a new aircraft) ... it would be nice if we could rely on being notified about such changes, instead the app said I had no upcoming flights. Checking in and getting a boarding pass is often relegated to a browser - basically, don't trust the app to do anything useful when needed - check in at the counter or well before going to the airport (and then save the boarding pass to your wallet). Tries to collect a creepy amount of information on you, some of it is fair for a company with which you have financial transactions, but others, like location is pretty frivolous (though you can, and should, deny it this). Worst of all, it doesn't work with a VPN. Neither does BA's website, so they clearly think use of a VPN indicates nefarious intends, where in fact it's a very sensible way to protect oneself while travelling and using wifi networks you may not control. | App isn’t great. Kept crashing or won’t execute tasks. App need some work to run smoothly.

title: Agoda: Cheap Flights & Hotels
description:
Experience the world with Agoda, the ultimate app for booking your travel plans. Find cheap flights and affordable hotels in just a few taps! 

Booking international or domestic flights on Agoda is seamless. Discover countless airfare deals across 200 airlines worldwide. Our unique search engine compares flights and prices in near real-time  so you can book the best deal as soon as it drops.

Booking hotels, resorts, villas, homes, BnBs, and more is even easier now with over 3.9 million  accommodations available to book in 39 languages and currencies. Make the most of your hotel search with filters, hi-res photos, map views, local information, and over 28 million  verified reviews. On Agoda, you can even discover hotel rooms tailored to your travel needs and preferred budget. 

Want to earn? With Agoda Homes, you can become a host and start earning from your own property. 

Travel with confidence! See the world for less, with up to 80% off from Member Offers , Last-Minute Deals, and much more. Book a flight. Book a hotel. Book an unforgettable vacation with massive savings on Agoda. 

AGODA FEATURES
CHEAP FLIGHTS WITH JUST A TAP
- Search for affordable flights from over 200 airlines, flying to almost any destination
- Book flights knowing you’re getting a highly competitive price 
- Save your info and adjust your flight booking directly in the app

BOOK A ROOM EASILY 
- Choose from over 3.9 million  properties across the globe
- Reserve your next stay whether it’s a hotel, resort, villa, home, BnB, vacation rental, or anything in between
- Travel confidently! Read user reviews, view pictures, and browse local information

DEALS MADE FOR AFFORDABLE TRAVEL
- Save on trips with extraordinary deals on cheap flights and budget-friendly accommodations
- Plan your trip, travel, and fulfill your wanderlust without breaking the bank
- Enjoy a variety of special offers , with secret deals, discounts, and more

TRAVEL WORRY-FREE
-  Save your vouchers, details, and maps directly in the app for easy check-in and print-free travel
- Manage or edit your booking anytime, anywhere
- Need help? Agoda's Customer Support is available 24/7 in various languages to ensure your journey is both smooth and cost-efficient
- *Agoda speaks 39 languages!* You can get  the best Hotel deals: فنادق أجودا,安可达酒店订房,Agoda酒店,Agoda訂房,อโกด้า,תי מלון אגודה, حجوزات,اجودا,агода. 

To learn more about device information used in our app, including interest-based advertising and cross-device tracking, and to exercise certain opt-out choices you may have, please see our cookie policy.
releaseNotes:
Agoda now offers flights! Your trusted accommodation partner now brings you the very best updated deals on flights to your destination. So you can book your room and your flight from one great app, knowing you'll get the lowest price on both and 24/7 customer support. And with the Agoda Widget, you can stay on top of great deals and travel ideas!

Other recent improvements include:
- Find your next great destination with the Agoda Widget
- Send messages to a property when you have a question
- Easily recognize homes & apartments in search (pink stars)
- Host mode for Agoda Homes hosts (list your home on agoda.com/homes)

Explore, travel safely, and keep in touch!
reviews:
Our family has been using Agoda for years. I have never cancelled or have any issues with them. Until this time. I contacted them few months before the trip due to my father health problem. Agoda couldn’t help anything with it because I booked the non cancellation booking. Few week after that we contacted them my father passed away. Now we planned to go for a trip (This trip is for our son). Today (before our trip 6days) my son has tested positive for Covid. I have photo of my son Covid test but the assistant never asked me for it. She says my request has denied due to my dispute. 
I had hoped that Agoda could help me better. Ask me for more information and could understand more of my situation. 
Lastly I will never booked through Agoda again and will never recommend my family and friends to use this site. Because at least another sites would give you a credit for next time booking even though it is non-cancellation booking | I recently had a dreadful experience with the GetYourGuide app (which is connected through Agoda when you try to book a tour). Despite booking a popular large group tour in Rome several weeks in advance, I inadvertently booked the same tour again for the same day. Shockingly, the app failed to notify me of this duplicate booking. Upon realizing my mistake, I immediately attempted to cancel one of the bookings, only to find out that I couldn't because the tour was less than 24 hours away.

Customer service was an absolute nightmare. Despite numerous emails and interactions with different agents, they all robotically regurgitated the same excuse: "rules are rules." It's clear their primary concern is protecting their own interests, even at the expense of customer satisfaction. They shamelessly lied to me about the possibility of a refund, claiming the tour provider wouldn't cooperate, only to be exposed when I reached out to the actual agency and received a prompt and courteous refund directly from them.

It's evident that GetYourGuide's customer service is severely lacking, with a dismissive attitude that suggests they believe their dominance in the market exempts them from providing quality assistance. Save yourself the headache and use alternative platforms like Booking, Airbnb, TripAdvisor, Klook, or any other service that actually values its customers. Trust me, it's not worth the hassle. | Not able to answer question and can’t even gain access to realtime or in person host access. A waste a time | Easy to use and pricing never disappoints! | Love Agoda | On 04/12/2025 I am utterly dismayed by the appalling treatment we received from both Agoda and Furama Silom Hotel during our recent trip to Thailand. Despite paying well in advance for a reservation at Furama Silom with a pool, we were shockingly informed upon arrival that our booking could not be honored due to overbooking and a supposed computer system error.

Instead of accommodating us at a comparable hotel in the Silom area, as one would expect from a reputable booking platform like Agoda, we were unceremoniously shuffled off to Furama's alternate location in Pratunam. The receptionist had the audacity to claim that this relocation was an upgrade, blatantly lying about its supposed superiority. Not only did this relocation disrupt our meticulously planned itinerary, but it also deprived us of the amenities we had specifically booked for, including the rooftop pool.

Flying all the way from the USA to Thailand only to be met with such disappointment and inconvenience is utterly disheartening. Our plans with friends were ruined, and the subpar room and atrocious breakfast included at the alternate location only added insult to injury.

While both Agoda and Furama Silom offered apologies for the inconvenience, mere words cannot undo the disappointment and frustration we experienced. It is unacceptable for a reputable booking platform and hotel to fail so spectacularly in meeting the expectations of their paying customers.

I urge fellow travelers to exercise caution when booking through Agoda and to thoroughly research alternative accommodations in case of such mishaps. As for Furama Silom Hotel, their inability to honor our reservation and subsequent lack of proper compensation only serve to tarnish their reputation further. | Until you buy a ticket from a garbage airline, in Bangkok stuck there 3 days and no end in sight. | Why you add tax, when there is no tax in Kuwait | Why not show the actual cost of the room, including all taxes and fees from the beginning.  I typically use a different website that doesn’t have any Added fees at the end. | It seems like I get good deals with this app although it constantly seems to be barraging me with coupons of various amounts and durations, to which, I’m unsure if those discounts have ever been applied.  App seems to game the prices: if you’re on the fence and leave a hotel at the book button it will come back at your with slightly better offer or ‘coupon.’ | Agoda provides efficient and excellent booking service | I tried to contact customer service during my stay. Worst ever experience. Not able to contact anyone no response at all in chat box | Very bad app. Technical glitches everywhere.. their filter criteria works perfectly fine on the search page. title: Cruise Norwegian - NCL
description:
Prepare for your cruise by pre-booking dining and shore excursions while at home. Once onboard, access Daily Activities and continue to book dining, shore excursions, and entertainment, and even stay in touch with friends and family using the chat and onboard-calling feature*.

Key features include: 
Retrieve reservation details, view your E-docs, prepare and save time boarding with mobile check-in, and access directions to the pier.
Organize vacation itineraries by pre-booking activities in advance and while onboard i.e. shore excursions, dinner reservations, entertainment, and make purchases including gifts (wine, flowers, and treats).
Call and message guests onboard through the app, including Group Chat*. 
View ship itineraries, port information, and daily activities. 
Review your folio for onboard purchases in the app.
Check Latitude Reward points and learn more about our CruiseNext program.
Review disembarkation information including immigration and easy walk-off details.

*Calling and Texting Package has a nominal one-time fee per person for making unlimited onboard calls and texts during your cruise.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews:
List no time or place. We can’t determine if we need vouchers. The number you call rings, picks up and then no one answers. | We all had a wonderful time!  Ages ranging 69-4.  Something for everyone!  Staff is so sweet and accommodating!  Made wonderful memories!❤️ | This app crashes all time.
